name: New & Clean Single Room in TST, next to MTR!
summary: Located in the heart of Hong Kong - Tsim Sha Tsui, this is 1 of the 7 private rooms of a newly refurbished boutique guest house, offering unbeatable convenience and delightful, refreshing accommodation. This single room  (windowless) features a 1.2m x 1.9m bed and private bathroom. The room offers individual digital door lock access, air-conditioning, free wifi, hair dryer, electric kettle and basic amenities like towels, shampoo, shower gel, etc. Hot water for shower as well.
space: This boutique guest house is located on 11th floor of a clean and safe building with elevator access as well as 24 hours security guard. Located on Nathan Road and right next to Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station (Exit B2), offering great convenience for all types of travellers. All guest rooms equipped with private digital door lock entrance, offering great privacy and a hassle free experience.
description: Located in the heart of Hong Kong - Tsim Sha Tsui, this is 1 of the 7 private rooms of a newly refurbished boutique guest house, offering unbeatable convenience and delightful, refreshing accommodation. This single room  (windowless) features a 1.2m x 1.9m bed and private bathroom. The room offers individual digital door lock access, air-conditioning, free wifi, hair dryer, electric kettle and basic amenities like towels, shampoo, shower gel, etc. Hot water for shower as well. This boutique guest house is located on 11th floor of a clean and safe building with elevator access as well as 24 hours security guard. Located on Nathan Road and right next to Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station (Exit B2), offering great convenience for all types of travellers. All guest rooms equipped with private digital door lock entrance, offering great privacy and a hassle free experience. Public area inside the guest house is mainly a shared corridor, where you may make use of the space for dropping off your luggag
access: Public area inside the guest house is mainly a shared corridor, where you may make use of the space for dropping off your luggage if you arrive early before standard check in time, or you need to keep your luggage after check out too.

host.host_about: Greetings from Hong Kong! My name is Yuki and I'm mom of 2 little cute kids. I  enjoy meeting people and making friends, while traveling is always on top of my wish list! I'm a new host on airbnb too, working together with my partners Anthony and Sam to offer great airbnb accommodation for people visiting the lovely HK city :)

reviews.comments: 住的位置很好 去哪里都很近 房间收拾得很干净,住起来很舒服
Perfect location, clean and safe. Yuki is very nice and helpful.
去的时候空调的噪音很大,已经跟房东说了,不知道现在处理好了没有｡房间位置很不错,而且相对安全,好像过了十点一楼的大门就会锁上了,要叫门卫才会开｡还是挺有安全感的,房东回复也还是蛮快的,解决问题也算是及时吧｡
Nice place for single person or couple! Yuki provided very detail information of check-in and situation around the place! Very convenience!
Great location and excellent host
The room was clean. Just a bit small. But livable for one person.
真的很好哦 合算 温馨
Make a fantastic trip with this lovely house.
第二次入住啦,很熟悉,购物超级方便,很干净!推荐!
交通很方便,服务周到
这个房源真的非常干净,床也很舒适,唯一不足的就是通风和透光不够好
不完全是民宿,就是独立公寓,楼层门口有服务,全程密码锁,大楼一层有看门大爷,很晚回来按门铃,就给开门!房东很热情,很好说话,楼下就有莎莎,万宁,地铁口,很方便｡空调很给力!不过无法调小,凌晨会冷
走路不到10s就能到尖沙咀b1出口,特别方便 房间里装修很好而且很香,收拾房间的工作人员也很热情友善,性价比很高
very nice host!
位置非常棒: 出门就是尖沙咀站; 房间整洁,装修简约实用,是香港的特点,对一个长居宿舍的人而言感到挺自在｡房东为寄放行李提供了非常棒的帮助｡总之十分适合在香港旅游居住｡

房间彰显了香港寸土寸金的特点｡地理位置优越,门口就是地铁｡房东在早晨会给出茶餐厅的推荐｡总体来说,性价比很高,值得入住｡
This is a small room but have basic service. Subway entrance is nearby.
地理位置特别好 机场大巴来去很方便 出门左转就是地铁 一个人来出差 方便最重要
Yuki非常热情,会提供很多帮助和建议｡公寓的位置非常好,出行很便利｡
地理位置十分优越!楼下有保安叔叔!
首先得感谢房东贴心的提示和旅途指引,只要是不明白的或想要去的地方,房东都会通过信息及时回复｡第二,这个住所位置方便,楼下拐个弯就到金英大药房,THE ONE ,海港城,购物非常方便｡第三,房子外公共区域处有冰箱可以用｡第四,机场大巴过来下车就到了,连走两步都不用了｡如果下次来,还会来这里住
房东热情 服务周到 赞
一定一定要给大家推荐这里   交通不要太方便,是处于整个香港的中心地带｡房间干净整洁,和yuki说一下就可以让阿姨每天换毛巾｡晚上迟回楼下大叔会锁门但是按门铃就可以进去｡最后一天因为手机电量不够yuki还允许我下午两点在原房间充电  下次再带女朋友来住!

advance, it was rather unusual to assign the women's toast to the accommodation next to the entrance. I couldn't sleep well because someone opened the door last night, and the second day I couldn't sleep because I was worried about it. The owner's feedback also seems to lack consideration for the guest.

음성듣기
Room is quite small, but the location is great. Very detailed instructions about how to access the place, and all was seemless. Would recommend

I had a comfortable stay in Yuki's AirBnB. We didn't get to meet, but the communication was very easy and everything was well explained. The apartment is super close to an MTR station, which made sightseeing very easy. If you're staying for a long time, it might be inconvenient that there's no window in the room. But it's perfect for a short stay!
出行特别当场,性价比特别高的一个住所｡ 房东特别热情｡很不错的一次旅行｡
방이 생각보다 많이 작습니다 침대를 제외하면 사람 세명이 나란히 서있을 정도의 공간밖에 남지 않습니다 캐리어를 펼수가 없어요 하지만 방은 굉장히 깨끗하고 혼자 지내면 큰 불편함은 없을 듯 합니다

Small compact place which is typical of HK. Good to just sleep and get about as I was out most of the day . Close to shopping,MTR,A21 . Yuki was very helpful with timely responses. Check in was smooth. Will stay again.
很香很干净~大厦本身也算新

The place is easy to find (right next to TST station, next to Sasa) but Yuki is such a great host that she tells you how to get to the house from the airport. The self check in was easy. The room, although quite small, is really clean and cozy. The location of the place is great. Near a lot of food shops and the MTR.
Easy check in!
yuki的房子小巧整洁,位置超好,回复及时~
在尖沙咀住民宿比一般酒店性价比要高很多,第一次进房间和图片描述一模一样,北欧风,房间虽小但是一个人住足够了,最主要特别方便地铁口就在旁边,好吃的也多,楼下有保安守着也很安全,我入住的两天不吵,睡得很香,谢谢房东推荐的餐厅｡
位子确实还不错 但是这是我住过最小的房间

The property was really close to the MTR and major TST attractions.

Yuki provides clear and detail instructions on how to check into the property.
She also response quickly as well.

This is the second time I have stayed at Yuki's guest house. Great value and convenient location with super easy check-in. Yuki was very good with communication also. An excellent choice for brief stays in Hong Kong.
位置非常棒!房间也很安全,装修风格简约时尚,很舒服~

位置非常便利 紧挨地铁 出门就是尖沙咀  随时买买买;房间虽然不大  但整洁干净
推荐
小姐姐超級好,推薦了好多遊玩的地方地理位置非常好,樓下就是地鐵站,下次去還會住ʘᴗʘ
房东人很好,很热情,给我们介绍很多好地方,可以存储行李很棒｡酒店位置特别好,在尖沙咀闹市｡酒店很干净｡就是热水是存储式的,需要等待,没有窗户,不过也很隔音｡
第一次入住香港,真切的感受到香港的房价贵｡有点小误会,但房东很快解决｡很安全,楼下有保安,三道关卡,没有任何打扰｡还是建议住带窗户,阳光撒进来的那种｡
地处尖沙咀弥顿道,交通便利,机场巴士直达,下楼有地铁,商圈(有好吃的咖喱鱼蛋),附近就是九龙公园,打卡景点路线都比较好规划｡房间较小,但配套设施基本齐全,床可以容下两个不胖的,楼下有安保人员,特别感谢旅行过程中房东都积极及时沟通并提供特色建议,特别是存放行李,不论入住前､退房后,让初来香港的我感到亲切放心,顺利开心的完成接下来几天的香港行｡
位置极佳哦,交通购物方便,性价比高｡
地理位置好,但是桌子上有 (Hidden by Airbnb) ,
地理位置非常好!尖沙咀B1出口右手就是大厦,距离海港城也很近｡大厦很安静安全,电梯口有管理员,公寓也有密码锁｡房间大约七平米,有床头柜､椅子､烧水壶､电吹风､洗浴用品､毛巾｡入住清晨yuki会发当地早餐推荐,回复信息也很快｡总之,在寸土寸金的香港,这家住宿性价比真的非常高了!
房间虽然小,但是很干净~床特别舒服一个人住妥妥的~

The place is very conveniently located and communication with yuki was very good. Detailed instructions on how to get from the airport to the Airbnb.

Bring your own towels if you are staying longer. Mine have not been exchanged (3 night stay) even though it said they would be changed every 2nd day.
地理位置真的无敌好,房间干净整洁

방이 고시원만큼 작고 창문이 없긴 했지만 청결했고 호스트가 매우 친절했습니다. 방이 작은건 에어비앤비를 이용하는 이상 홍콩 어디에서 묵어도 그렇다고 하네요.
그래도 비행 도착 시간에 맞춰 체크인 일찍 할 수 있게 배려도 해주시고 식당 추천도 많이 해주시고 호스트가 매우 세심하게 챙겨줘서 좋았습니다.

name: #Cosy Private Room #5mins to Mei Foo Metro
summary: Essentially at the midpoint between the Airport and Hong Kong Central, both at about 30min distance by the metro.  The location is 5min from metro (Mei Foo MTR). Host will give you the survival tips to explore around this urban jungle and whereabouts of secret restaurants for delicious local food. To save you time planning your trip, host might guide you around the city upon request and depending on time availability.  Host would provide help in whatever purpose you're in the city for.
space: True Hong Kong living style in one of the biggest high-rise private residential development in Hong Kong.   The development is close to all amenities including local park, supermarket, 24 hr convenience store, pharmacy, restaurant, and major transport interchange.

transit: Train (5min away), Bus (Direct bus from airport about 30min away), Car etc.

house_rules: Whilst high quality amenities will be provided (extra/other amenities might be provided upon request), please do not take away any item of the property without prior consent from the host.   General respect to the property and standard cleanliness are expected during the stay. Should you wish to access the property between 12am-6am when coming in or during the stay, please advise the host first.

name: Cosy Studio in the Heart of Hong Kong
summary: Lovely studio right in Sai Ying Pun. 5 minute walk to MTR and 2 stops away from Central. There are plenty trolleys and busses he stop right on the main road outside the building. It’s about 15 minute walk to Central where you can find lots of attractions along the way.
description: Lovely studio right in Sai Ying Pun. 5 minute walk to MTR and 2 stops away from Central. There are plenty trolleys and busses he stop right on the main road outside the building. It’s about 15 minute walk to Central where you can find lots of attractions along the way.

host.host_about: Hi! I’m originally from upstate New York and moved to Hong Kong last year for work.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Nancy's place is in a great location right near Sai Ying Pun MTR station. The flat has all the essentials with a shower, kitchen and bed. It's a great base from which to explore Hong Kong.
Nancys place is a great location from which to explore HK!
Great place! Room was super tidy and it's a very short walk to the Sai Ying Pun MTR. Pleasant communication all around.

Nice place, convenient, and really good location, close to Sun Yat Sen Park and next to a subway entrance! The neighborhood is lively but the room quite quiet. Check-in was easy, check-out even more . The place is small But not that much for Hong Kong and well-equipped, perfect for a solo traveller.
房間打開行李箱就卡住走道了,蠻小的,適合單身住宿,位置很方便,浴室毛髮沒有清...

Location of place is very convenient. Like many places in Hong Kong, space is at a premium, but there is more than sufficient space for a single traveler or a couple. Place is an excellent value for those looking to spend more of their time enjoying Hong Kong and just need a place to sleep late at night. 

Nancy was very responsive and the place was all set up when we arrived. Would definitely stay again in future.

The location of this place was perfect! You are very central and in a cool up and coming area. It's easy to get to from the airport. It is quite small but perfectly fine for 1-2 people. The only downside is the bed, which was extremely hard and difficult to sleep on. I would still recommend this place as it was very convenient!

We didn't enjoy our stay at Nancy's place due to the extremely hard bed. Whilst the host was helpful in answering any questions we had unfortunately the apartment had not been cleaned. Whilst this may be a one-off issue the unwashed bedding and lack of working air conditioning left us feeling unrested and unable to sleep comfortably. 

The apartment is a private lockable room in a shared flat in an apartment building - about 2 minutes from the A2 MTR exit and 1 minute from the tram stop. We got the impression that other residents/the landlord did not want non-residential guests staying in the building - this made us feel uncomfortable several times throughout our stay.

name: New! Bright 2bed easily connected to the center
summary: Welcome to my home! My beautiful 2 bedroom apartment, in the vibrant area of Sant Gervasi, is a stylish and comfortable place to stay and has terrific transport links. You’re just a 5 minute walk away from the nearest tube. Explore the neighbourhood and enjoy this bustling part of Barcelona.  I hope you enjoy your stay!
space: Our beautiful home is ideally located in Sant Gervasi just a 5 minute walk from the nearest tube. There are 2 bedrooms, making it ideal for families. The living area is light and airy with a beautiful, modern design and lovely finishing touches. Relax on the sofa, hang out with your friends, make yourself at home! It’s a welcoming and inviting space where you can kick back. If cooking is your thing, you’re going to love spending time in the stylish kitchen. All the appliances are modern and easy to use - you’ll enjoy showing off your culinary skills here! There’s even a welcome pack stuffed full of coffee, tea and catalan delicacies. The master bedroom has a super comfortable king size bed and, with fresh luxury linens, what more do you need for a good night’s sleep? You don’t have to live out of your suitcase; plenty of storage room means you can get unpacking and start feeling at home right away. Second bedroom also has a double bed and the sofa bed is up to 2. Sleeps 6 in total! Fre

You’re just a 5 minute walk away from the nearest tube. Explore the neighbourhood and enjoy this bustling part of Barcelona.  I hope you enjoy your stay! The master bedroom has a super comfo
neighborhood_overview: Sant Gervasi Galvany is a nice traditional neighbourhood, located in the upper side of the city. Is close to Avenida el Tibidabo and of course the Tibidabo itself.  You will have lot of restaurants and cafés around and lot of metro and bus stations.
notes: You will be required to present your ID/Passport upon arrival. In order to follow local regulations and to be able to register all our guests on the local police’s database, we will have to take pictures of ID documents for all guests. I hope this is not an inconvenient! Check in time is at 3pm or later.  Check out time is 11am or earlier. Please no smoking inside of the flat. No pets allowed. Please respect the neighbours. No loud noises after 10pm. No parties or events allowed.
transit: Padua (FGC) station  is the nearest station to the property, just a 3 minute walk away. This connects you to the city center, meaning you can get to iconic Barcelona sites in no time at all, such as Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia. Exploring Barcelona could hardly be easier!
access: You will have the whole place for yourself. The apartment has two bedrooms, one bathroom, living room with sofa and kitchen. There is also a washing machine in the apartment that you can use. We will provide you with the products needed for the washing machine. The whole place is available.
interaction: My friends at Hostmaker are looking after my home while I am away; they are a short-lets management service team who know Barcelona like the back of their hand! I trust them to look after you and give you a warm welcome! If you have any questions about your stay, please get in touch through the channel platform.

host.host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

name: Spacious, charming & quiet delight
summary: True to the title, the apt is delightful. Located on the first floor in the back of the building so it is peaceful and quiet with no noise from the street or neighbors. Located on a beautiful, tree lined  block just steps from fantastic restaurants.
space: This apartment is right in the center of everything thats hip and fun in NY while still being quiet and safe because of the brownstone, tree lined block. Neighbors are mostly families and super friendly. It's located in the back of the building, facing the garden so its very quiet.  The charming and spacious, pre war design features a drop down living room and high ceilings. Newly renovated bathroom and a full sized kitchen. It is extremely quiet with zero street noise. The bed and couch are very comfy.
description: True to the title, the apt is delightful. Located on the first floor in the back of the building so it is peaceful and quiet with no noise from the street or neighbors. Located on a beautiful, tree lined  block just steps from fantastic restaurants.  This apartment is right in the center of everything thats hip and fun in NY while still being quiet and safe because of the brownstone, tree lined block. Neighbors are mostly families and super friendly. It's located in the back of the building, facing the garden so its very quiet.  The charming and spacious, pre war design features a drop down living room and high ceilings. Newly renovated bathroom and a full sized kitchen. It is extremely quiet with zero street noise. The bed and couch are very comfy.  Laundry room My friend/ property manager will give you keys and be on hand to help with any issues. I'm available by phone or email upon your request The charming chelsea neighborhood is super friendly and safe. The block is a treelined an
neighborhood_overview: The charming chelsea neighborhood is super friendly and safe. The block is a treelined and quiet where everyone knows each other. Art galleries, the famous Highline park, Chelsea piers, children's parks, great restaurants and amazing nightlife are all steps away. Across the street, the theological seminary has a botanical garden open to the public.
notes: I am happy to provide plenty of suggestions for fun local things to see, do and explore.
transit: There are cabs everywhere and all subways are a block away. You also have Citibikes down the street.
access: Laundry room
interaction: My friend/ property manager will give you keys and be on hand to help with any issues. I'm available by phone or email upon your request
house_rules: No pets, no smoking. I ask that you take care of the furniture and treat it as if it were your own. Use coasters.  Please be polite to the neighbors and keep noise to a minimum. Please have your photo and verification process complete with airbnb.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a small business owner, entrepreneur . I live in NY and LA. I love traveling back and forth between the 2 coasts. Collecting furniture is a hobby of mine so I'm always looking for unique pieces for both my homes. As a host, I hope guests will appreciate the  charming style of my Chelsea apartment, enjoy the beauty and quiet of this historic block and explore the character of the neighborhood. I can be reached with any and all issues and  have plenty of great neighborhood friends and family that can make my guests more comfortable and  resolve most issues.

reviews.comments:
We had a wonderful stay in NYC and Justin was a great host. He stayed in contact with us the entire trip and was really nice. 

The apartment is as lovely as the photos show. Incredibly spacious for NYC and quieter than I thought possible! It's a very short walk to the highline and Chelsea markets which are great (especially for food lovers). 

Justin does have dogs and while this didn't surprise or bother us one bit, and there was barely a trace of dog hair, it might affect someone with allergies. 

I can't recommend this apartment highly enough. It made our stay so enjoyable and comfortable!

Jay was a fantastic host!  He was available and communicative throughout the entire process.  Our comfort was his priority and it was truly a pleasure making arrangements with him.  The apartment is very comfortable, accommodating, and spacious--as the listing indicates!  It is fantastically located near food, galleries, recreation, and transportation.  It is also very quiet--a great place to recharge after exploring or working.  Also, the bed is comfortable and the WiFi is very reliable. We felt very lucky to have found such a nice spot for this trip.   We would love to stay there again!

Jay is an excellent host and was extremely quick in responding to our queries. His apartment is spacious, nicely decorated and very quiet. We especially liked the comfortable bed. We stayed with our 2 year old and the flat is child friendly. The surrounding area is safe, easily accessible for public transport and close to the Highline. In fact we really liked Chelsea with its numerous cafes and trendy galleries. 
We recommend Jay's flat.

We absolutely loved staying here.  Jay’s apartment is large, light, airy, clean, and beautifully furnished.  The bed is super-comfy, the Internet fast and reliable, and there was ample closet and dresser space available for us to use.  The apartment is also very quiet and peaceful, so if you are someone who likes/wants/needs a peaceful oasis to go back to after being out and about in the city, then Jay’s apartment is definitely the place to stay.  Jay himself is friendly, kind, organized, up to all sorts of interesting things in his own life, and clearly committed to his guests having the best possible experience.  

The location of the apartment is also fabulous: we particularly enjoyed being just moments from the High Line (New York’s incredibly cool elevated linear park).   In addition, the huge Episcopal Seminary right across the street has gardens that you can go and sit in (hours were 10 am -5 pm during our stay: just ring the buzzer on the gate and they will let you in). All in all, our stay could not have better, and we very much hope that we will be able to stay at Jay’s again on future visits to New York.

The location is great, just as described.  The apartment was comfortable.  Bed and couch were very comfortable.  As is probably the case with most NYC apartments - they are always smaller and darker than the wide angle shots on the sites - so bear that in mind.   We arrived much earlier than the check in time and Jay arranged for us to get the key and get in with our luggage so that was very very helpful.  Jay walked me through setting up the tv (needed that help for this very elaborate and huge system).  Wifi was great.  All in all - the place was good and Jay was attentive and helpful.  We would recommend it.

Great apartment, great building, great location! My husband and I stayed in Jay's apartment while we were visiting our daughter, who is a student at a nearby college. Jay and his assistant were very accessible, friendly, and did everything possible to ensure that we had a great stay. The apartment is perfect (we loved having a separate bedroom versus the studios we've rented before). Quiet street. Very convenient to everything! I highly recommend Jay as a host.
Jay was a great attentive host.  The apartment was very comfortable, and quiet. The Chelsea District is fun to explore.  We would definitely stay again!

An excellent, unusually spacious apartment, and I'd definitely return. Ground floor means you avoid clomping up and down stairs. It was at the back of the building so it was very quiet, but as it's North facing it was also a little dark without the lights on.

Just returned from four FABULOUS days in NYC -- the comfort and convenience of Jay's apartment were a big part of making our trip a success! This Chelsea location is as perfect as it gets...centrally located to an increasingly charming part of town, and delightfully quiet (no street noise AT ALL). Jay and his colleague Mara were both extremely available and helpful, accommodating our unusual arrival and departure hours, and checking in via text to make sure we had everything we needed. On a personal note, I felt a kinship seeing Jay's personality reflected in the apartment, which is simply but stylishly furnished with a mix of modern design and Asian pieces, with an artistic nod to his clear love of animals both domestic and wild. While apartment doesn't feature an abundance of natural light, it's worth the trade-off for peace and quiet -- and there's ample greenery out the windows. Separate kitchen, bathroom, and bedroom in addition to a living room make this a pretty spacious place by New York standards! Overall, we felt grateful for Jay's generosity in opening his home so we, too, could get a taste of Chelsea living. P.S. there is an Intelligentsia coffee bar at the pricey High Line Hotel around the corner on 10th Ave.
We found the description of the apartment to be accurate.  This was a terrific apartment for us.

Jay was exceptionally conscientious about making sure our stay was good.  He checked in periodically regarding our arrival, satisfaction with the apartment, and departure plans.
The Chelsea location is ideal for exploring that part of Manhattan.  There are many great small neighborhood restaurants in the area and plenty of shopping.  It's a low rise residential neighborhood far less noisy and congested than other parts of NYC.
The most satisfying aspect of the apartment itself is the quietness.  It's rare to be able to escape the barrage of traffic and construction noise in Manhattan.  So, it was nice to come home to a guaranteed peacefull setting with a pleasant north-facing courtyard view.
The apartment itself was fine although the quality is a tad less that represented by the photos.  It reminded me of an apartment I might have rented right out of college with a cobbled together collection of furnishings, pots and pans and hand-me-down appliances.  Nevertheless, the location, size, quiet and first floor walk-up made up for those minor shortcomings.

O apartamento é fantástico com uma decoração muito cuidada.
Está muito bem localizado e a vizinhança é muito tranquila.
O serviço foi excelente.
Nada a criticar.
Ficámos fãs e tentaremos reservá-lo novamente na nossa próxima visita a NY.
Muito bom. Tudo.

Jay's apartment is fantastic and is in a perfect location ! The apartment is very spacious, modern, very clean and has all the amenities you need ! Jay is also a perfect host, he is so immensely helpful, very polite and goes out if his way constantly to make sure your stay is a great one ! I highly highly recommend staying at Jay's apartment !

We loved Jays place, being at the back of the building it was lovely and quiet, we even saw squirrels playing out the back. The apartment had everything we needed, lovely and clean, the bed super comfortable. Wifi worked well. Gorgeous building in a lovely area close to everything. Jay also gave information on good eating places which was appreciated. Would definitely stay again if in NYC.
Jay made and kept in contact by email. His friend arranged to meet with me to hand over the keys. Very comfortable apartment and great neighbourhood. Would happily recommend.

Jay's appartment was exactly as shown on the pictures. The appartment is super quiet, exactly what I was looking for. I love the way it is decorated.

Very convenient to come from the airport as you do not need to change the subway and it is only 5 mn walk from the station.

Also Jay is very responsive in case you have any question. It is not him who welcomes you but his friend who is also available if you need any assistance.

It was my first airbnb experience and I am very pleased with it. I would return without any hesitation to Jay's appartment.

Jay´s apartment is very well located in a quiet area (which is really appreciable in nyc). 
Clean, comfortable and nice decoration. 
Bed is pretty comfortable as well. 
Jay ´s friend, Laura, made herself available to give us the keys and Jay reminded available for any question.
The only small things to be noted are that:
- the apartment is relatively dark (located on ground floor) which was not an issue for us as we spent most of the day out. 
- There is low insonorisation between apartments and we could hear the sound of the water for the avive  apartment. But again, quiet neighbors so not a big issue.
We recommend warmly this apartment.
Jay's apartment was exactly as advertised - very spacious, very quiet and in a great location! Jay was also super accommodating and helpful.

A wonderful stay.  Sorry to be leaving after just 3 days here.  Apartment is exactly as shown with large windows that let in lots of light. Quiet location, quiet street but close to lots of choices, including High Line and the wonderful restaurant, Barchetta!  Laura accomodated my later than planned checkin and that evening when I texted that the apartment was cold Jay was there w/n 10 min.  All warm and cozy after the radiators were turned on!   A most enjoyable experiece.  I will definitely stay here again if available my next trip back to NY.

We loved this apartment. Very comfortable and just as described. Great location - on the doorstep of cool bars, cafes and restaurants. 

Jay gave us lots of great tips about places to check out.

We had an awesome time and would definitely stay here again on our next trip to New York. Highly recommended!

We really enjoyed our stay at jays apt. It was spacious and looked the same as his photos. Everything worked and was clean. We were made to feel welcome.    Location was perfect for us and we are looking forward to returning.

Jay's apartment was a fantastic place to stay for our 5 day trip in NY. Jay and his friend Laura were so helpful and made everything so easy. They even let us stay in the apartment till 6pm on the day of check out as we had a late flight and they had no new guests checking in that day.

The apartment is just like the photos, super comfortable and located in a fabulous spot! There are some great bars and restaurants nearby and if you have a chance you should check out Cookshop on the corner of 20th and 10th Ave.

very nice apartment. clear, large, quiet , windows to the outside. close to everything. I stayed there for over two weeks and all equipment worked well. host was very nice and communicative. will come back.
fantastic. cozy. comfortable. quiet

Jay was very helpful and fast to respond to any questions i had.
The apartment was really lovely and spacious and the bed very cosy.
Bright and light apartment and nice little kitchen and dining area too.
The handing over of Keys was also very easy and the lady was really nice in showing us the flat.
I would recommend, the area was really great too.

Very good, charming and quiet location with good space. 
Near high line, Subway and shops. 

Jay's friend Laura was always available by mail
We really enjoyed our stay in Chelsea close to everything we wanted to explore. Thank you Laura for always being only a text away. Very comfortable and met all our needs!

L'appartement est bien situé dans une très joli quartier. Il est plutôt spacieux il ne manque rien. L'hôte (que je n'ai jamais) rencontré prend des nouvelles régulièrement pour savoir si tout va bien.
Il y a quand même un très gros problème c'est que le ménage n'était fait qu'autour des meubles. Beaucoup de poussière et sous le lit je n'avais jamais vu ça c'était affreusement sale (photos à l'appui si besoin) l'appartement est au rez de chaussée un peu sombre avec les vitres très sales ça n'a rien arrangé. 
Si vous n'êtes pas exigent sur la propreté cela peut passer mais pour moi ça été un peu dur la cohabitation avec la poussière.

We had an opportunity to come back into Manhatten for a few days and were so happy Jay's Chelsea apartment was open. A big thanks to Jay for his patience when we had some trouble with the reservation process as well as to Laura with shifting arrival times.  A comfortable  haven we would highly recommend.

Charming apartment in perfect location -- walking distance from almost everything including the High Line and Hudson River Parks which are practically next door.  We had a comfortable and enjoyable time and hope to come back some time.
This was my second stay at jays. I hope to continue as a guest for many years. Jay is a wonderful host. The apt is clean and spacious. Location is great. Thanks jay.

Have just had the most exceptional stay at Jay's apartment in Chelsea. I am a travel agent and great accom is always recommended to me...well I am totally recommending this apartment to anyone whom is after a complete NYC experience. The apartment is spacious with all the amenities, including extra linen, hairdryer and everything you need in a kitchen. The wifi was fast and efficient and a massive TV if you want to chill out and relax. It was spotless, in a beautiful and quiet apartment block and in the most perfect location. It has so many great places in the vicinity, that you don't need to walk far! We spent 2 weeks here, exploring the whole of NY but we loved coming back to Chelsea and enjoying the local area..

Jay was a perfect host and offered fantastic tips in the area and made everything we needed to know about the apartment clear.  The communication was efficient and if I stay in NYC again, this would be my number 1 choice!

Loved our stay in Chelsea and the apartment was perfect for what we wanted. A great safe neighbourhood with plenty of good cafes etc close to the High Line , the Hudson River and the Chelsea Markets . Booking was smooth was met by Laura exactly as planned. Apartment is a good size with seperate kitchen and bedroom . It's on ground floor and at the back so it's very quiet , small group . We had occasion to contact Jay during our stay and found him to be very responsive and extremely helpful. Would recommend to other travelers.

My sister and I very much enjoyed our stay at Jay's lovely apartment in Chelsea on what was a combination business & pleasure trip. The location was perfect on a quiet and tree lined street accessible to transportation anywhere in the city with lots of good restaurants and services available close by in the neighborhood.
We appreciated the quiet and peacefulness of the apartment located in the back of the building after long days of both work and museum hopping.
The apartment was spacious and decorated in a tasteful, interesting manner with everything we needed for a wonderful trip.
We especially appreciated the hosts' graciousness in providing a cheerfull greeting when we arrived in the middle of the night after both of our flight arrivals were delayed very late!

The apartment was amazing and exactly how it was described. We particularly loved the neighborhood that was so peaceful, yet so central. Jay is an ideal host - he was very approachable, responsive and even shared a list of must-dos and must-visits for us.

Would totally recommend this place to everyone.

Great communication start to finish, including great tips on where to eat, where to go, what to do in the local area.
Lovely place, well situated and ideal for our purposes.
Thanks Jay, we had a wonderful visit.
Great place! Super clean, loved the location, and an amazing size for Manhattan. Would definitely stay here again.

A fantastic apartment to stay in a lovely neighbourhood.
The apartment is spacious and bright, exactly as it looks in the photos.

Jay was very welcoming, even sending over a list of local places to eat/drink/visit so I was able to settle into the area on day one. Exactly what you want in a new city.
Jay's apartment is in a nice building, beautiful street and great location just a few blocks from the highline and subway.  Jay was very kind when we needed to check in a few days earlier.

Excellent place to stay in NYC. The apartment is exactly as described and as we expected. The location is ideal - quiet and with good access to transport.

Jay kindly sent great details of what to do and where to go, especially to eat, locally so we felt at home straight away. This was really useful as we arrived late and wanted to find a good place to eat quickly.

Many thanks for the opportunity to stay in your lovely flat.

Jay's apartment was as described, in a convenient neighborhood to access all the sights NYC has to offer a tourist.  It was surprisingly quiet most of the time...some construction within the building started in the early morning during the week.  Jay provided insights into neighborhood eateries, things to see and do.  Walking distance to the High Line, a must see for any trip to the Big Apple.  From the apt you can walk, catch a bus or subway.    The bed was comfy. The entire unit homey.  Access to the washer and dryer was easy, and a necessity if you are traveling for any length of time.
Highly recommend the unit for its location, ease of access and comfortable amenities.

We had a great stay at Jays place, we arrived in late from Australia and Laura met us at the apartment, she was great. The apartment is really good, spacious and clean. The location was amazing, the French restaurant at the corner of the street was great, we are there many times in our weeks stay. Walk the other way and the high line is there for a great walk. I would highly recommend jays place. It's a really quiet apartment on the ground floor at the back of the block. The area is a quiet family irientatdd area. We had a great stay and would recommend it.

Just spent a week at Jays apartment in the chelsea area. Perfect location for seeing New York. Tons of restaurants and sights close by. Subway and cabs available. The apartment was in great condition. Comfortable bed and   couch. Kitchen has everything you need. The bathroom was fine.  We were met when we arrived  to get the keys. Communication with our host was always quick.  I would highly recommend this apartment
The apartment is in a fabulously convenient location. It's just as described and worked out so well for myself and my son. I'd definitely stay there again!

Jays apartment is perfectly situated right in the heart of Manhattan. It's easy to get around using the subway and bus network and has all the facilities needed for a stay in the city. Would defiantly recommend to anyone traveling to NYC and will use again when we come back.

We had a fabulous time at Jay's.
The apartment was as quiet and spacious as advertised.

Chelsea is a great location to stay, easy to get to all the main tourist areas, but is residential and surprisingly quiet given that it's in Manhattan.
Would highly recommend staying at Jay's.

Jay's apartment is perfectly located and really spacious. It's near loads of great restaurants. bars and shopping areas - the perfect base to explore Manhattan (and put on a few lbs!). Jay was always contactable and quick to respond, and Laura kindly met us late on Christmas Day (with a ridiculously cute dog) to let us in.  Can definitely recommend Jay's.
The apartment was perfect! Ideal location surrounded by trains, bars and restaurants. Jay was helpful and quick to respond. Would absolutely stay again.

The apartment was just what we'd hoped for. The location was ideal for our needs and we were happy to have an attractive and roomy space to kick back and relax in between forays into the City. 

The kitchen was well-equipped and we appreciated that the cupboards were not bare. The shower/bath worked well. Everything was clean and tidy. The bed was very comfortable. As a light sleeper, however, I was somewhat challenged by the intermittent hissing of the central heating system throughout the night. Also, we needed to open the windows to cool the place down, but this was not a problem.
Perfect !

My stay at Jay's flat in Chelsea has been great since the location is perfect if you'd like to be close to cafes, restaurants, and away from the noise of the city. Also, he's great in replying to emails and getting back to you immediately. If it's possible I'll stay there again!

Jay's apartment is even better than described.  He updated the TV to a flat screen.  The apartment is on the end of the building with a court yard in the back of the living room and off the bedroom.  For being in the exciting part of Chelsea, it was super quiet.  Also the building has a secure entrance that it accessed by a key fob and even though the apartment is on the first floor, because of the basement and court yards, it is super secure--windows not accessible from the street, not street traffic.  The French bistro on 9th was wonderful, we ate lunch and dinner.  The wine shop on 7th is great because NY grocery stores don't sell wine and wine is expensive by the glass unless you go to happy hours.  Subways were close.  Felt like a native, we walked everywhere.  Definitely would return!

Apartamento perfectamente ubicado en un barrio tranquilo en el corazón de Chelsea, a un paseo del corazón de Manhattan.
La casa en general muy bien, amplia,con cama y sofá muy cómodos,dos teles y bastante tranquila.
Jay se ha portado muy bien y siempre ha respondido rápidamente a nuestras consultas. La entrada el día de llegada la hicimos con Laura que nos esperó pacientemente y después nos llevó a un súper en el que comprar comida.
Como puntos negativos la limpieza, había mucho polvo en los sitios que "no se ven" pero que los niños descubren...
Great spacious apartment in a wonderful location! The apartment had tons of personality with many streaming options available and a mini library.
The host canceled this reservation 59 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great location, close to Chelsea Market, High Line, subway and yet very, very quiet. Very spacious apartment, nice wooden hangers, all the necessities. Fun way to get a taste of New York living :)

Like most other reviewers who have been lucky enough to snag this little gem, I had a wonderful stay here. The apartment is very secure, very quiet, spacious and well located.

Speedy Wifi, laundry in the building, two TV's, full kitchen appliances, comfy bed....

Get the idea?

Enjoy your stay!

TIP: If you are a real coffee lover, go out the door, turn left, cross the street, and go to FIKA.

TIP 2: Don't eat meat? Go out the door, turn left, turn left on 9th, go to BLOSSOM.

Great location, very central and excellent base to explore the city!
Apartment was spacious and clean.
Jay's always quick to respond too. Everything was really easy.
Thanks!

This place was perfect for us. I was looking for an apartment that was spacious and comfortable that would give myself and my 12 year old son a taste of real New York living and we got exactly that. Cool, chic spotlessly clean with big TV's comfy couch and hotel like bed Jay's apartment was exactly as described. His friend met us with the keys and was extremely welcoming and helpful. the location is superb, its 2 blocks from the Subway, one block from the highline and walkable distance to Chelsea Piers and Chelsea markets. Some great  eateries in the location, we ate in this area most nights and the Rail Line Diner on the corner was our breakfast pit stop every day. This place is perfect for anyone looking to get more New York that a tiny hotel in time square, perfect for 3  . 

Neighbourhood is really safe, Subway is easy to get around on - We had a great experience in NY and this apartment made  it for us - I've no hesitation in recommending it and hope its available on our next visit!

Trying to choose a place to stay in New York City can be overwhelming to say the least but we were so pleased to come across Jay's place and to find it was comfortable and exactly as described! We were met at the apartment by a friend of Jay's who allowed us to store our bags at the apartment (we arrived earlier than checkin time) and were given a key so we could come back by 2pm. The apartment had everything we needed and was quite spacious by NYC standards. It was in a great location (could walk easily up or downtown), only a short walk to the subway, great wifi and access to cable tv and Netflix as well as being super quiet. Jay's notes with suggested places to eat and instructions etc were also an extra touch that was much appreciated. Highly recommend this place!

Jay's apartment was great for us.
We were met on arrival and shown around. Everything was neat and clean. It is just as it appears in the pictures (except the giant projection screen TV has been replaced with a large LED unit - one in the bedroom too.)
The neighbor hood was a real delight. I've never stayed in NYC and had such quiet peaceful nights. We really liked the Rail Line Diner on 9th for breakfast. We would definitely stay there again.
Awesome apartment - nicely furnished with a surprising amount of space for the middle of the city. Prime location with easy access to restaurants and subways. We had a great time!

After long days of exploring the city and seeing the sites, Jay's apartment was the perfect retreat to recharge.   It's perfect location in the heart of Chelsea provided easy access to quality restaurants, the Highline, the subway, galleries, etc.  I can't think of a more perfect place to stay while in NYC.
The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 22 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 53 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Spacious, comfortable and quiet!
Amazing location, peaceful space, very comfortable bed.  Plus a responsive host who gave helpful tips on the area. Pretty much exactly what I needed!

Bellissimo appartamento, molto ben posizionato, dotato di ogni comodità, caldo e accogliente. Ci siamo trovati benissimo da Jay, ha risposto sempre velocemente alle nostre richieste ed è stato molto attento alle nostre esigenze, un ottimo ospite. Non ci è mancato veramente nulla, consigliamo vivamente a tutti di soggiornare in questo favoloso appartamento. grazie ancora Jay !!!!
Jays place is perfect. Comfortable, spacious. Close to lots. Jays instructions were simple and clear. Communication was easy as was access to apartment. Would  definitely stay here again.

Jay was in touch several times before our visit and both before and after we checked in on Thanksgiving night.  The apartment was spacious, with lots of room in the living room, bedroom, and dining nook.  The fact that it is on the first floor is a plus and we certainly had no concern with privacy or security (the apartment is at the rear of the building and there is plenty of space with trees to the building behind).  The apartment also is extremely quiet, with few if any sounds from the tenants beside or above us.  The building is clean and obviously well cared for.    

The neighborhood is ideal:  a tree-lined street with a seminary occupying much of the other side of the street, subways within a block and a half, about 27 restaurants within a two block radius, plenty of stores nearby for anything you might need, lots of galleries on 10th Avenue and beyond, and the High Line within a block.  What's not to like?

(Website hidden by Airbnb) enormous sigh of relief as we entered this apartment. Quite possibly our premiere AIR experience to date.Everything we needed in a nifty, convenient and personable neighborhood.
Neighbors friendly and a QUIET and fashionable space. Comfy bed, good hot water supply all kitchen essentials including full oven/stove, microwave and toaster oven. Restaurants recommended were spot on. We loved Meatball, Billy’s Cakes .the Empire Diner and the French bakery one corner away on 9th, authentic French pastries and they packed an amazing Beef Burgunione to go for us. La Grainee also great.
We relished our usual Museum overload, the all stars plus the petite Neue across from the Guggenheim.Austrian art including Klimt’s  Woman in Gold of his cousin Adele.  Do not miss a meal in their authentic Austrian cafe, best spatzle ever ! Discovered the FIT MUSEUM , a Fashion museum, free entrance that is open 12:00 to 20:00. We luckily saw “ PINK” and a fabric exhibition.
Chelsea Market easily walkable on the glorious HIGHLINE. BEWARE that it is uncomfortably clogged on the weekends, at least in the afternoon. The soup take out stand is yummy. Visited Nola neighborhood and it is the most chic, highest density of SUPER ELITE shops I have ever seen and I have been to Paris many times ! I honestly felt intimidated ! Long lines for entry to restaurants were so lengthy that they barricaded access to many shops even if you wanted to buy a $200 candle ! Granted, it was a Sunday. 
Soho was far more civilized and  Le Lauderre cafe dininitely worth a little French splurge. Winter salad of pumpkin purée topped with delicate slices of delicata squash, a full burrata, pumpkin seeds and other ingredients. My husbands morel omelette was perfect and we shared a very generous and delightful sundae of coffee ice cream with nut brittle and fresh whip cream toppings.
As an avid knitter I was transfixed in Purl Soho, a knitters Mecca including a plentiful supply of Liberty fabrics , chic jewelry making supplies, unique notions and a charming staff. Upper East Side/Madison stroll still lovely. Eataly yummy and you’ll pay for it ! Then sadly, we ran out of time.
Highlight was Andrea BOCELLI at Madison Square Garden ! A dreamy dream COME TRUE for me.
Get thee to NYC taking comfy shoes.
ALR

I got this place for my parents who were visiting for a week. They were extremely happy with the accommodations. Amazing location! Cute and cozy apartment. very comfortable, it had everything they needed! Jay was very responsive to all of thwir needs! Would recommend this place to everyone!
The host canceled this reservation 44 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Cozy Room in TST Ideal for Single Traveler
summary: Located in the heart of Hong Kong - Tsim Sha Tsui, this is 1 of the 7 private rooms of a newly refurbished boutique guest house, offering unbeatable convenience and delightful, refreshing accommodation. This single room features a 0.9m x 1.9m bed and private bathroom. The room offers individual digital door lock access, air-conditioning, free wifi, hair dryer, electric kettle and basic amenities like towels, shampoo, shower gel, etc. Hot water for shower as well.
space: This boutique guest house is located on 11th floor of a clean and safe building with elevator access as well as 24 hours security guard. Located on Nathan Road and right next to Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station (Exit B2), offering great convenience for all types of travellers. All guest rooms equipped with private digital door lock entrance, offering great privacy and a hassle free experience.

Public area inside the guest house is mainly a shared corridor, where you may make use of the space for dropping off your luggage if you arriv
access: Public area inside the guest house is mainly a shared corridor, where you may make use of the space for dropping off your luggage if you arrive early before standard check in time, or you need to keep your luggage after check out too.

host.host_about: Greetings from Hong Kong! My name is Yuki and I'm mom of 2 little cute kids. I  enjoy meeting people and making friends, while traveling is always on top of my wish list! I'm a new host on airbnb too, working together with my partners Anthony and Sam to offer great airbnb accommodation for people visiting the lovely HK city :)

reviews.comments: 房东人很热情,入住方便

I really wish I could give more than 5 stars !!! The property located at where you will never get starving (hundreds of restaurants and venders behind the buildings). The MTR station only about 20 feet away. The cleaning lady made my bed daily which made me so shame, and Yuki will answer whatever the question you have related to HK from how to get to the room from airport to what to do. Strong recommend to solo explorer.
Small room but great location and great value. Very quiet and the host was very accommodating and quick to respond to questions.
房间位置真的超级棒了!去哪里都很方便的!楼下就是公交站机场一趟直达,10米就是尖沙咀地铁站｡100米就是theone｡房间也很干净｡楼道有监控｡外面还有个密码锁大门｡安全性也很好｡一个女孩子住完全不会害怕｡100多米就是珍妮小熊饼干正店｡下回来可能还会住这里啦!

Great place,located just next to one of the exits of TST station and conveniently located to alot of nice restaurants. Yuki is also easy to reach and gracious enough to allow me to check in earlier as I cannot take the blistering heat of Hong Kong. Yuki also recommended some nice place for food. Really happy to stay in this guest house.
地理位置十分方便,一应俱全,yuki 很细心,会告诉你该如何到达目的地,很贴心的为你介绍附近有什么好吃的东西!
It’s very closed to the airport bus station and mtr. The room is clean and quiet, and easy to check in.
You can self check in and you might not meet the host your entire stay.
性价比不错,交通方便,房间也干净!
Nice and tidy single traveller stay in the middle of everything in hong kong, good for a private person
地理位置好,很多好吃的
Logement ultra central et propre, parfait pour les voyageurs solitaires.

사진이랑 똑같아요.
화장실에 슬리퍼가 없어서 챙겨가셔야 하구요.
방음이 잘 안돼서 밤에는 이어폰 꼽고 잤어요.
다른 방이 문 세게 닫으면 깜짝 놀래고 전화통화하는게 다 들렸습니다.
2박했는데 수건은 첫날 작은거 한개 큰거 한개 구비되어 있길래 다음날 수건 갈아주나 했는데 그대로길래 여쭤봤더니 2일에 한번씩 갈아주신다고 하셨어요. 혹시 필요하면 복도에 새수건있으니까 그거 쓰라고 하셨어요! 
밤 늦게 체크인 해야하면 문앞에 벨 누르면 경비아저씨(?) 같은 분이 문 열어주십니다.
혼자 여행하는데 위치가 너무 좋았고 주변에 맛집 많아요.
如果有問題問房東回覆很快,房東也人很好會推薦當地食物;住的地點交通便利､房間也算新,下次還會想去住!
房间位置特别好,离尖沙咀站B出口和机场巴士车站非常近｡房间虽小但干净整洁,热水空调都很方便,布置得十分温馨,有公共冰箱是个惊喜｡Yuki非常Nice,对提出的问题都很快给了很详细的解答｡再次感谢~是一次不错的体验~

The subway was near and good to go to sleep
The price is chep
위치도 좋고 전반적으로 괜찮은 스테이였습니다. 공간은 협소하니 참고하세요~
没想到尖沙咀正中有这么舒适的地方,跟干净,也比较隔音,房间内麻雀虽小五脏俱全,Check in 很方便,yuki还贴心推荐了很不错的餐厅,整体来说,是很棒的体验
很喜欢哦 房间很干净 睡的很舒服 li yag里外两个门 很安全哦,我自己一个人住完全不用害怕｡空调也很liang sg凉爽｡非常棒的一次旅行｡老板gem很仔细为你做好一切服务｡

一個人出行真的是很好的選擇｡房源置很好,在尖沙咀B2出口走幾步就到了｡在這附近住過好幾個大廈,這個是交通最方便的｡附近吃的也很多哦｡
自助入住也很方便,每天下午都會搞清潔｡
房間小小的,但佈局很合理｡裝修比較新,簡約舒服｡就是窗機的空調有些噪音,這也是無法避免的啦｡好在我自備耳塞,所以沒什麼影響｡房東一直有用手機跟我聯絡,詢問入住情況和介紹附的好吃的店｡
這個地段來說,這樣的房間價格真的是超值,反正一個人也不需要多大空間｡
下次還會考慮這裡哦｡

Yuki was extremely accommodating, helpful and friendly! The location is perfect in Tsim Sha Tsui only being a short walk away from the promenade and Star Ferry. Would highly recommend staying at her place whenever visiting Hong Kong.

Excellent location. Airport bus service bus stop just outside the building. Located in the heart of TST, convenient to shop around the area. MTR stn exit right next to the building within 1 min walk. Definitely a good stay for the price paid.
Yuki is very hospitable and nice, recommended me a lot of nice restaurants around TST and always gave quick response. The room is clean and tidy, perfect for single travelers and couple travelers.
Single traveler 的性价比首选
位置非常好,出行方便,附近有很多好吃的｡房间虽然比较小,但设施齐全,有独立卫生间,适合一个人旅行｡Yuki很贴心,会提供所有需要的信息｡总的体验和性价比不错｡
Great value for money in TST. Small but densely packed with every amenity you’d need. Excellent AC, keyless entry, and fantastic location. Highly recommended for solo travelers.

交通非常便利,离地铁站非常近
房间非常干净

Yuki's place is in a really central location which is close to shops and public transport. Although the room may be small, it has all the necessary amenities and is perfect for one person. I highly recommend Yuki's place for solo travellers to HK.
Great location, very clean, host great at comma. bed size is a bit small if you are tall

Yuki is an amazing host! She reached out to me a week prior to my stay to provide me with all the information that I needed to know. She was always so prompt with her responses when I asked for more information about the food places that I could go. The stay has exceeded my expectation. She provided amenities including hair dryer which saved me the trouble of bringing my own! There were cups and kettle to boil water. Bath and face towels. Soap and shampoo. Toilet paper and refills of toilet paper. Little decorations to brighten up the room. Bathroom is of reasonable size and there is hot water. Water pressure is good and air-conditioning has different modes to adjust temperature. The room is cleaned up everyday and I always come back to a cleaned and turned down room ready for sleep. Feels like a hotel stay! No doubt the room is tiny but the size is perfect for a single traveler who needs a cozy, comfortable, clean and safe space to rest for the night. It is also very convenient to travel around from the Airbnb place as it is located just next to the MTR station and the airport bus stop is right outside the building. You can easily find cafes, restaurants and eateries nearby. The location is safe and the building has a security guard too. Highly recommended for single female traveler. You can reach out to Yuki for questions and she will be ready to answer you. This is my first Airbnb stay and I enjoyed the stay very much!
香港寸土寸金,房间非常小,但麻雀虽小五脏俱全,下楼就是尖沙咀地铁站,出行非常方便｡价格也非常合理｡

It was very nice place, the room was small but it was clean and comfortable , the house is at a convenient area , it’s close to the tourist places, Ms. Yuki was very helpful , I'm sure I will stay here if I visit  Hong Kong again.

Overall, a great place to stay for the price!
Yuki's place was right in the middle of Tsim Sha Tsui, so it was very convenient to get to anywhere. It is cozy enough for one and Yuki gave great recommendations for places to see and eat on the second day.

However, there were some things I wish could have been better. One, if you're a light sleeper I would maybe recommend elsewhere - you can hear other rooms opening and closing their doors. In addition, upon arrival areas such as the desk had dust and hair particles which made me feel a bit uncomfortable. Lastly, even though I had asked the host twice for the housekeeping not to come into my room, someone had come into the room the next day when I was out. Other than these details, however, it was a great place to stay for the few days I was in Hong Kong.
房东Yuki很热情,回复很及时,房间所处的地理位置很好,旁边就是尖沙咀地铁站,交通很便利,房间里很整洁卫生,虽然面积小了点,但一个人居住绰绰有余了｡
房間內的設施完善! 每天都有打掃人員整理 很乾淨! 地點超級方便 離地鐵站很近 我非常推薦!

Pleasured to have one night stay  in Yuki’s house! She rearranged the room for me without any hesitation when I acquired that.  The location is also amazing. If i had another chance to stay in Tsim Sha Tsui, I would choose Yuki’s place again and again. However, the bed length is a little bit short for the height with 178mm or above. Anyway it’s really good place to host!

房间很干净,位置也很好!
房主人很亲切,提前提供了详细的交通信息还推荐了茶餐厅( ´ ▽ ` )

EXTREMELY convenient location - literally above Tsim Sha Tsui station - makes this place ideal for a short stay, or those going beyond the Island. Yuki's directions and support were precise and helpful, while the unit itself provided everything the urban traveller needs - the strength of WiFi signal helped especially with work. Warning: the beds are a bit small, especially for taller travellers like myself - but a small price to pay for such convenience.
地點非常方便,房東人很好!住起來很舒適!

The room was good enough for one person, but the air con was broken, switched to other room for the first night but not second night because all the rooms were fully booked, other than that, everything is fine.

Place is good value for money in a great location. Size is as expected being very small but fine for solo travelers not spending much time in their room. Keypad access made it easy as did the (Hidden by Airbnb) communication. 

The outside doors close around 11pm however buzz to get in

地理位置超级棒,楼对面是九龙公园｡
yuki回答疑问非常及时,整个行程感觉很贴心｡
房间小之前就已经做好心理建设了,去的时候房间还没有铺好先把行李放好了｡
推荐一个人旅行或者短时间入住

Very nice location just a minute away from the subway station. You can also reach the famous shopping center and the restaurant by walk. However the size of the room was really small as writen in the homepage. I could open only one 28inch luggage on the floor. But if you are budget limited solo traveler, I think this room is the best option you can choose. Yuki contacted me by messenger and let me know the location and how to get her property. She responded my asking in quick with kind. Thanks Yuki.
第三次来香港了,这次住的应该来说比预想中要高很多,房间很干净,很整洁,住宿位置非常好,去哪都很方便,适合买买买的朋友,下次来香港还会考虑｡
不错的体验,不过对于高大的男生房间会显得有些小｡
下次来还会选择这里的

Yuki was really thoughtful and provided lots of information such as direction, where to eat and so on.
the room was clean and tidy!
highly recommend!

reviews.reviewer_name: พุทธินันท์
reviews.comments: The place is very good, clean, comfortable and easy to find the place. Yuki is very good host. The place is suitable with one person it's valueable!!
地點簡直是無敵,對於來逛街､商務､旅行的人來說都很方便｡每天有人來打掃,維持的非常乾淨,可以放心的入住｡
房間的地段尤其棒,出門就是地鐵口｡香港寸土寸金,住宿都很小,但是这个room温馨,干净,很合心意~最惊喜的是退房之后,房主告诉我可以把箱子锁在大厅,要走的时候再来拿,好贴心!大厅还有公用小冰箱,一次非常nice舒适的旅程｡
Yuki gave us a kind instruction for check-in, including access from the airport. A midnight, entrance was locked and I needed to call security person (but he came soon. no problem at all).
位置超方便,房間小了點,但依此地段是值回票價的住所

位置就在尖沙咀地铁站出口边上,房东发来指南有入口照片,很好找,出行也十分方便｡
房间比较小,但在香港在这样的地段,已经有心理准备,基本上一个人住也够了｡
房间有点闷,开窗的话外面是类似暗巷很多空调外机什么的,会有异味,只能开空调换气会好一点｡
房东人很好,有什么事发信息也都回复很及时,指南都带有照片十分清晰,还给推荐了比较红的餐厅｡
性价比超高,下次来香港还会来住的｡
房间很整洁,设施齐全
房間小但應有盡有,地理位置方便,價格便宜

Yuki’s place is a licensed hostel right next to the TST station, you cannot get a better location than that if you want to explore the whole Hong Kong! 

The room was very nice, well lit, very clean and contained good amenities. There was also an option for storing your luggage after check out which I am sure many travellers will appreciate greatly. The building itself had security available, locked the doors at night (you could still buzz yourself in) and Yuki’s place was secured by a coded electronic lock. The room had a double locking system as well. Made me feel very safe which I think is quite important for many travelers who travel by themselves. 

Yuki was flawless as a host: from providing you with a guide on how to get to her place with pictures from the airport to listing all amenities available and giving you some restaurant tips, she truly outshined many other hosts whom I had the pleasure to stay with. Despite not meeting her in person, she has regurly checked up on me and made sure I had everything I needed.

Little cons to the place:
1) if you take long showers (like me) and you’re not careful enough - the water from the bathroom will slightly leak out into the room. (Or might have been a malfunction specifically in my room). For those unfamiliar, many Asian bathrooms are designed only to contain the shower head going firectly from the wall without an actual stand to save up on space.

2) Thin walls. On my last night, I could clearly hear some guests laughing and talking loud. You can also hear the main door and any doors of the other rooms to bang as people entered and went out. I personally did not mind - Hong Kong is known for this general problem, but sensitive sleepers might want to reconsider.
房间的性价比超高~地点交通方便,出门就是地铁口,房间干净整洁,本来以为要下午三点多才能入住,结果当天11:30左右就能入住啦,房东也很nice,会关心住得习不习惯,还推荐了一堆附近的美食｡唯一不足就是房间小了些,还有就是空调好像没办法调温度半夜开空调太冷,不开又太热…不过在可理解范围内~总之很不错~❤️
地理位置很方便 房东很热情 总之更推荐
房间小,其他没缺点｡

name: smoothly, cheap house in Sisli,Istanbul..
summary: Hello Dear Guest! I'm Mustafa. I'm computer engineer and working for a pc company.I want to meet with new people and socialize with them.That's why I want to rent one room of my house.  There is a bed,wardrobe,sofa etc in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) the house has all basic needs.The house is in Gulbag which is 20 mins away by walking and 5 mins away by vehicle from mecidiyekoy which is the hearth of the transportation and you can reach every location easily. Access time: 15 mins taksim 25 mins Eminonu by bus.

Ein sehr netter, freundlicher und hilfsbereiter Gastgeber. Er ist auf alle Wünsche eingegangen. Ich war sehr zufrieden und habe mich sehr gefreut. Ich kann ihn einfach weiter empfehlen..
very friendly people . safe place to stay. very convenient and easy access to transportation and touristic places.

Ev, alışveriş yerlerine çok yakın, çok temiz.. istediginiz ihtiyaçlarıniz eksik kalmayacak bir şekilde.. 
Ev sahibim Mustafa çok iyi bir insan ve ayrıca çok iyi bir ev sahibi.. yardım sever, her sorunu anında çözebilecek kapasitede biri.. temiz kalpliligi, dürüstlügü, ve konuklara verdigi değerden dolayı onu candan tebrik ediyorum ve tüm ev sahiplerininde bõyle olmasını temenni ediyorum..teşekkürler

My stay has been excellent! It exceeded my expectation. Mustafa’s hospitality is amazing! He is by far the best host I have ever met. He picked me up at the metro station,  cooked breakfast, prepared teas and was a great companion to chat. He was also taking me to the tourist area during his spare time. Responsive, attentive, caring, always there for the guest... what more can we ask from a host. He was really a superhost! Thanks a lot Mustafa, for everything!
Couldn't ask for a better host in Istanbul!
Mustafa's house , it will surely be a good choice to spend a holiday in Istanbul. thanks a lot.

name: Studio home in Taksim
summary: My place is located 5 mins walk from the Taksim Square, tram and bus stations. I have all facilities you would need from a home.
space: My place is 80 square meter 1 bedroom 1 living room studio flat. There is king size bed and 1 foldable single bed in bedroom. Living room has L shape couch for 2 person. Kitchen has all facilities: full size fridge, microwave, oven and filtered water for drinking.
description: My place is located 5 mins walk from the Taksim Square, tram and bus stations. I have all facilities you would need from a home. My place is 80 square meter 1 bedroom 1 living room studio flat. There is king size bed and 1 foldable single bed in bedroom. Living room has L shape couch for 2 person. Kitchen has all facilities: full size fridge, microwave, oven and filtered water for drinking.
house_rules: No shoes allowed in the house.

reviews.comments:
Whatever i say about this place in my opinion will not be enough. First the location is perfect close to Taksim square and to other attractions. Shops outside open till late. Semih himself was on holiday but was reachable 24/7. Quick responses, excellent tips about local bars, restaurant. His friend Refik, who we collected the keys from was very helpful as well. The flat is decorated creatively and was much bigger than i expected. It was a bargain compared to previous airbnb i have stayed at.
Thank you guys for making our stay fun and safe you guys are the best. 

Nishant and Prajwal

I truly liked staying at Semih's place. Location is great, some minutes walk from Istiklal and Taksim square. The apartment is even bigger and cosier than it looks like in the pictures. He was always helpful when we needed anything or answering our question. He is a great host and I'd definitely stay here again next time!

If you plan to discover Istanbul, just come to Semih's flat. You ll find everything that you looking for. The flat is well located close to Taksim, supermarket, and a taxi station on the same street. The flat is just amazing and very well furnished. Our stay was perfect thanks to Semih and his brother. Thanks you so much Semih, one more time

Semih's place was spacious tidy and clean. He was not there for check in but had a friend meet us and was attentive to messages, always replying quickly. He was also kind enough to let us leave our bags after checkout before traveling to the airport. Recommended!

In this apartment is the mind of an artist, very stylishly presented to the world. A very inspiring, and soothing retreat away from the hustle and bustle of Istanbul. Perfectly located near Taksim square so life is happening just downstairs! Samih is happy to share tips on where to go and what to do. Highly recommend this apartment for your stay!!
Her türlü ihtiyacınızın karşılandığı Harika konumda çok güzel bir ev ve herşeyinizle ilgilenen evsahibi

Semih's apartment was great! We only stayed for one night and we wish we could enjoy the apartment more because it's very nice. Samih's hospitality was outstanding. Thanks Samih for letting us staying at your place.
Semih is very nice host, he has this very stylish apartment located close to subway station, you have everything you need in the apartment. Highly recommend ;)
Apartamento excelente con una vista desde el balcón increíble, todo muy bien y genial
Semih beyin harika bir konuk severliği var,  bir daha ki İstanbul'a gelişim de ilk tercihim bu ev olacak.Neye ihtiyacınız varsa bu evde mevcut. Gönül rahatlığı ile tercih edebilirsiniz.

Le logement était parfaitement située pour toutes les visites touristiques et très bien desservit par les transports en commun (bus, tramway, métro) le quartier est très calme. Semih nous a très bien accueilli et à répondu avec beaucoup de raidité à toutes les questions que nous lui avons posés par message afin de connaître les meilleurs endroits à visiter. Très agréable et accueillant, Semih a fait de notre séjour un moment exceptionnel.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Semih. L’appartement est très spacieux, agréable, propre aux photos et la localisation est parfaite pour découvrir Istanbul. Nous avons passé un très bon moment

The house is located in one of the best locations in Istanbul. The place is very calm but at the same time is very near to Taksim Square/Station and Kabataş Funicular. The house is super clean and well arranged. It has artistic vibe which instantly mesmerizes you. Every detail is very unique and the interior design is chic. It is very comfortable and feels like you are at home. The host is super friendly and is ready to help the guests anytime. I recommend everyone not to miss a chance to accommodate in this perfect house. Enjoy your future trip in Semih’s place :)

Die Wohnung von Semih liegt sehr zentral und doch in einer sehr ruhigen Umgebung.
Zudem erfüllt die Wohnung mehr als alle Erwartungen. Alles war super sauber, ordentlich und komfortabel!
Mit meiner Familie fühlten wir uns sehr wohl, meine Kinder wollten schon gar nicht mehr weg!
Auch Semih als Gastgeber war einfach super zuvorkommend, hilfsbereit und super sympathisch. 
Er fragte uns immer wieder, ob alles ok ist und bot uns seine Hilfe an.
Ich als Gast mit meiner Familie kann nur die Wohnung weiterempfehlen.
Daumen hoch!!!
Vielen lieben Dank lieber Semih es war super toll!!!
Bis zum nächsten mal.

Very good experience. Everything went good. The apartment is beautiful and very well located. A small problem with internet that was quickly solved. I forgot my wallet and Semih did everything to post it to me quickly. Thank you Semih.

Très joli studio spacieux avec une décoration moderne, très proche de Takcim square et de toute commodité.
Emplacement difficile d'accès puisque sur une pente, et aussi c'est un cinquième étage sans ascenseur. 
Sinon c'est un bon rapport qualité prix.

This is an amazing house in our favourite part of the city (Taksim) ! The flat is awesome , big living room , nice bathroom , very well decorated and it has  air conditioning , wash machine / drier and all the facilities ! The host (Semih) is the nicest guy ever ! We should have spent more time there , I couldn’t recommend this place more ! If you see it’s available don’t hesitate to book it ! A++++

Semih is a great host, always prompt to respond any enquiry and always willing to help. The apartment is stylishly decorated, with a spacious living room, bathroom and bedroom and is very conveniently located, only 5 minutes away from Taksim Square and the tram/bus lines on Bosphorus. A great place and a super host that I recommend warmly to everyone!

Great location , pictures dont do the place justice. The detail is beautiful . 

 No elevator so be mindful of the walk.
Good location and nice host. You will feel so warm to have the reservation here. Recommended to all.

Me and my boyfriend stayed in Semih apartment for 5 nights and we loved the (Website hidden by Airbnb) felt at home, it has all the amenities you need.The location is perfect in fact Taksim square is very close and perfect when you arrive from the airport with the bus or metro and from there is very easy to go around the city.If you want there is also super close a tram station that brings you to Sultanahmet in 20 minutes.When I will come back to Istanbul I will definitely come back to this apartment!
A perfect place with a very gracious  host.  A+++

Eine richtig tolle Wohnung mit sehr vielen schönen Details in einer zentralen und sehr hübschen Strasse. Der Kontakt war sehr nett und stets hilfsbereit, Antworten gab es umgehend. Alles sehr weiter zu empfehlen!
Отличная квартира, большая и стильная! Все рядом. Хозяину отдельное спасибо! Очень хороший и отзывчивый человек. Очень рекомендую! Обязательно приеду ещё.

Semih is a great host! The place is really nice, and the location is perfect!
Highly recommended
The apartment was great, very comfortable and spacious. The location was perfect. There is a hill you must go up and down so be in shape, but it was not a problem.
Nice apartments, interesting design.
I had an amazing experience in Semih's place. I would definitely recommend his flat. The location is very good and the flat looks just as shown in the photos. Very tidy and clean!

Отличная квартира, чистая, красивая и удобная. Расположена на относительно тихой и очень зеленой улочке. Полностью соответсвует описанию. На такси можно подъехать прямо к подъезду. Но будьте готовы подняться на последний этаж по лестнице :)

Great apartment, larger then the photos make it look. Good water pressure in the shower, nice big lounge for relaxing. Amazing central location , but be warned it's a top floor apartment with no lift ( as is the norm in Turkey ), wasn't an issue for us though. Semih was a great host. 너무 좋았어요
위치도 좋고 아파트도 너무 깔끔했어요
조용했고 보일러때문에 춥지도 않았구요

Квартира комфортная, светлая, в тихом районе. 5 минут от площади Таксим. Semih is the best host ever. Очень рекомендую эту квартиру!

Wonderful apartment

Good Value

The living room has a comfortable sofa and a large TV screen. The kitchen is complete. The bedroom is spacious and has a large and comfortable bed. The bathroom is clean and has a washing machine. 

And generally located in a secure 
location. Close to Taksim Square and Istiklal Street. Public transportation is available (Metro, tram, bus, taxi). The building is located on a street with restaurants, cafés, supermarkets and shops for all supplies. 

For the host: Simeh was a respectable and cooperative person. Soooo lovely
Great location, super friendly and helpful. Amazing stay overall!

L appartement est conforme à la description spacieux et chaleureux 
Très bien équipé 
Nous le recommandons

name: Beautiful apt with sea view & Wifi
summary: This apartment, located in Vila do Conde, is ideal for 5 vacationers. It offers 2 bedrooms, a furnished balcony and WiFi.
space: This apartment, located in Vila do Conde, is ideal for 5 vacationers. It offers 2 bedrooms, a furnished balcony and WiFi.  The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day in the sun. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book in front of the fireplace or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including WiFi and a Hi-Fi.  The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 8 or outside, on the balcony enjoying views of the garden, the sea and the city.  The apartment has 2 comfortable bedrooms, 1 including a double bed and a private bathroom with a bath tub, a shower and toilet and 1 including a double bed.  The bathroom is fitted with a bathtub, a shower and a toilet.  The apartment features  cleaning products, ironing equipment and a washing machine.  Note that the cleaning, towels, bed linen and tourist tax are included in the rental fee. Parking is available onsite. Smoking inside is not allowed. Pets ar

name: Executive private room near museum station`
summary: Planning an adventure stay in the city of CDB. Our place meets your need. It three (3) minutes walk from museum station (Airport line 4 stops) to our executive apartment. It is clean and comfortable with view from your bedroom, kitchen and balcony. Prime location close to trains, buses, ferries and parks with 20 mins walk to  International conventional Centre, CBD hubs, Darling Harbour, Botanical Gardens, Opera House, high ends shopping, restaurants, hippest cafes. Supermarket/gyms on Oxford St.
space: Your room is fresh, modern, boutique and cosy with top quality bed linen queen bed and big smart TV on wall with unlimited wifi. You can access netflix if you have netflix account and chromecast stereo in the lounge room or a Bluetooth speaker in your room. Recently added wireless charger for your convenience. Bottle water, Espresso machine and coffee and continental breakfast is complimentary for your desire.  You have full access to the sunroom with full view of Oxford St great for Mardi Gras and study room to read or relax on our green sofa. Most of the time you don't even see us due to our busy work schedule after the initial meet and greet to exchange key and to answer any questions you might have. Most of the time you will have the apartment to yourself. In the evening you might see one or both us for a chat over wine with cheese or tea. Our space flows between the two balconies facing oxford St and the botanical garden. The view from our balconies changes throughout the early an
