neighborhood_overview: Darlinghurst is full vibrant and in an exceptional of life just like Surry Hill which is across the street. People in this neighborhood is very friendly and different. Darlinghurst is an inner city eastern suburb adjacent to the Central Business District, Hyde park and Central station. It is fun at night with dancing classes from Kizomba, Tango to Salsa within few minutes walk from our place. French, Manpower shows and Slide show is just across the street  If you are lucky you might see some very colourful customs on the late weekend.  I am sure you won't be bored when you stay with us. There are lots of cafes and patisseries for you to try in every direction you face. My only concern is that you will run out of time. Crown St, Bourke St, Stanly St, Pitt St, George St and Haymarket is full of excitement for food,  restaurants from different nationality cuisines, bars and dumplings places for you to try. Bars and clubs just across the road or 2 mins walk If you feel like Korean food the
notes: Occassionally, there might be 2 x four legged friends visiting you especially on the weekend. They are very friendly and cute small white and caramel poodles. We have bikes for you to borrow if you wish to ride down to Botanical garden and a scooter. You need a license  to ride a scooter. Helmets are available if you need.
transit: The best way to appreciate the city of Sydney is by foot, there are so many bars and gens only you can discover them by foot. Eg "Wall in the hole"  Grandma Bar. Bike is your next option if you want to travel a bit further like to cycle down to botanical garden and opera house. Bus at door step to Bondi beach Train is only 3 to 10 mins walk Have fun and enjoy your love of our famous city of Sydney.
access: Guests have shared use of balconies with bean bags and sofa to relax as well as the lounge, dining and kitchen areas. The only room that is inaccessible is the master bedroom. Guests have access to laundry and iron board if needed.
interaction: Guests can email or SMS me if you need me for anything.  I response quickly. Best to SMS as I don't sit next to a computer often. Otherwise I will get to reply to your email after 24hrs.
house_rules: Guest must clean up after used

reviews.comments: Enjoyed my stay, fantastic location,  excellent host.
The host canceled this reservation 212 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Carol and Ian were lovely hosts who went to great trouble to ensure I had a good stay, including a local area guide,  a heater and bathroom toiletries.

We definitely do recommend staying here! Carol is so lovely and friendly. She greeted us in person at Museum train station which is an extremely convenient location. Her place is only 2-3 mins walk from the station and about 5 mins walk into Hyde Park. The room was very comfortable - lots of pillows, and she even gave us water and cookies! Ian was also very kind to us and gave us suggestions on transport around Sydney. The bathroom was also very modern and clean. Also no issues with check in and communication. Very responsive.
What a great experience - thanks Carol and Ian for your warm and welcoming hospitality. I had a wonderfully easy and relaxing stay. I look forward to seeing you both again.
I would recommend Carol and Ian’s place to everyone

Great night away with my partner! Very welcoming and friendly hosts! They went out of their way for us and we really appreciated it. 10/10 from us. 
We will be back, thank you!
房東非常的有耐心和友善,家裡非常乾淨,窗外也有很美的景色,最棒的是位置在市中心很方便,非常推薦大家入住!

Carol and Ian's place is perfect. Location on Oxford Street is central to the city, trains, and great restaurants. The apartment is neat and modern, with fantastic views of the city. The hosts are lovely people that are great to talk to but also respect your privacy. I'd stay at Carol and Ian's place again.
I stayed for one night only - place is well located and is a lovely clean apt. Room doesn’t have a lot of space but overall I enjoyed my stay and would stay again.

Carol and Ian did really good job! We do enjoy this trip! They provide best services and give us very useful travel advice!  Definitely recommended! Great thanks!


非常棒的一次体验!Carol and Ian真的是超级棒的房东!他们人非常好,很亲切,就像朋友一样!他们热情好客!给我们推荐了很多可以去的地方,还在第一天告诉我们怎么机场到住处的火车,而且Ian还专程去车站接我们!总之在他们的帮助下一切顺利!Carol是非常亲切又漂亮的女房东,她感觉很温柔,有一天早上还为我们准备了早茶!房间超级干净!一切井井有条!房间窗外的景色也不错,阳台上有个懒人沙发,可以在哪里看看风景!他们简直太棒了!非常非常难忘的一次入住体验!强烈推荐!地址位置也很好,就在city那边,唐人街什么的走路几分钟就到了!很感谢他们!

Incredible hosts! Ian and Carol went above and beyond to make my stay enjoyable and comfortable. They are real authentic people who genuinely care about your stay and experience with them. Will be back.

they are really good host who cares guest. Carol and Ian, they always cares about you 

The location is perfect to go anywhere in sydney. Hype park, surry hills, town hall, and so on. 

Plus, the apartment area is quite queit at night. so no worry about noisy sounds! 
I definitely recommend this house for all people :)
Fantastic hospitality and great location.  Carol and Ian are great hosts and made us feel like old friends visiting.  Highly recommend as the place to stay when visiting Sydney CBD

Thank you Ian & Carol for your hospitality and hosting. Thoroughly enjoyed our time in Sydney and felt very comfortable in your home. Want to mention how convenient the location was and how helpful you were in getting us around town & picking up from the train too! If we come to Sydney together I’d like to stay there again! Thank you so much!

Would like to say a big thank you to both Carol and Ian for their hospitality. They are terrific hosts, who truly go out of their way to make your stay the best it can be. The location of their home is perfect; everything was super easy to get to, whether that be by walking or public transport. Would definitely recommend staying at their home! 
I'm sure we will be back soon! :)

숙소가 정말 좋았어요! 시드니가면 무조건 다시 여기로 잡을거에요. 깨끗하고 위치도 너무 좋고, 조식이랑 과일도 늘 있어서 편하게 먹었어요. 집 시설도 되게 깔끔하고 좋았습니다. 테라스에서 일정 끝나고 맥주마시는 것도 짱이에요! 무엇보다 호스트분들이 인생 호스트였습니다. 비내리는날 직접 역안으로 데리러 와주시고 우산도 씌워주시고, 짐도 들어주셨어요. 친절 보스였어요!!!!❤️

name: Beautiful Mezzanine Studio (2 Guests) - N. Nasoni
summary: Welcome to Villa Mouzinho! Our reconstructed centenary building serves to honour by the culture, architecture and history of the city. Located in the historical centre of Porto, classified as Cultural Heritage of Humanity by UNESCO, perfect for 2 guests looking to explore the city. This mezzanine studio features a lovely living space, kitchen and cosy bedroom. Complete with hotel quality linen, fresh towels and complimentary toiletries to make your stay all the more comfortable and enjoyable!
space: The warm tone, wooden floors and gorgeous mezzanine bedroom ties in this cosy room together. The living space is fitted with a sofa, TV and dining table, perfect to lounge and relax after a busy day in the city. The kitchen is equipped with a microwave, stove, oven and toaster, so you can prepare a lovely home cooked meal.  Up a short flight of wooden steps, the mezzanine features a comfortable double bed, TV and bedside table. The sky light keeps the space bright and airy.

neighborhood_overview: Porto is an amazing city to explore by foot, with many attractions within walking distance. There are some great dining option along the street of the home, including local cuisine and even a vegetarian restaurant.  Bolsa Palace and Douro River are only a 5 minute walk away.
transit: Porto is easily accessible by foot, but if you prefer public transportation there is a bus stop right by the home. Porto São Bento station is only a 5 minute walk down the street, which will connect you around the city.
access: This home is called Nicolau Nasoni, on the 3rd floor of a charming renovated building. The whole apartment is only for you!
interaction: Our dedicated team is available 24/7 should you have any questions or requests during your stay.  Additionally you are able to leave your luggages at our reception before check-in or after check-out. Our reception is located in Almada Street and is open Monday to Friday from 9am to 7pm and Saturday to Sunday from 10am to 5pm.

host.host_about:
We manage several apartments in Oporto's Historic centre. If you are searching for the best place to rest after exploring this amazing city, we can help you with that :)

The apartments can provide you with a real native experience! They are all furnished and well equipped for a pleasant, yet alternative, stay compared to a traditional hotel room. They are all located near most of the main attractions in the city.

If you have any questions our staff can give you all the information.

Hope to see you here! :D

host.host_about:
Destination Residences Hawai’i offers an exclusive collection of premium vacation residences and villas in seven resorts in Wailea and Makena, Maui. Located along pristine beaches, lush gardens and sun-drenched fairways, guests can choose from one- to five-bedroom accommodations, each featuring a living room, dining area, fully-equipped kitchen, separate bedrooms, washer/dryer and private outdoor lanai.

Although we manage multiple properties, we are still dedicated to providing you with the same personal experience and excellent service that you expect from AirBnB rentals.

As part of your stay at any of our luxury villas and condo rentals, the following services are also included at no additional charge for Destination Residences Hawaii guests:

+ Welcome Lei Greeting
+ Shuttle Service between our resorts and anywhere in Wailea

+ Maika'i Grocery Discount Card

name: Apartamento de Qualidade no Porto
space: Apartment located in a small high quality brand new building just two floors with five apartmnets and garage. It is located in the middle of the historic city of Porto, near the University buildings, the Tower of the Clerics, the typical streets and close to all the attractions that can be visited on footing. Moreover, it is served by bus stops with direct connection to the airport, beaches, and other locations in town. It is also served by the typical tour buses and trams. In front of the building there is an extensive garden, with ancient trees, lake and beds of beautiful flowers. It consists of a bedroom with double bed, a very large room, where there is also a sofa bed which can sleep two people comfortably, and a fully equipped kitchen. The garage is a plus in an area where it is not easy to find place to park, and in parks where parking is very expensive. The whole apartment is very comfortable and equipped with quality furnishings and contemporary taste.

host.host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal
host.host_about:
I am a person of age 64, retired from my main occupation, and taking advantage of the fact of living in this beautiful city of Oporto, decided to provide a high quality space for all to visit the city.
When I sought this space, I put as conditions that were located in the historic city, which was comfortable and modern, which have public transport links nearby and accessible, which have good accessibility to the airport and had high quality equipment.
Upon discovering this brand new apartment in the historic area in front of a beautiful garden, where there was tour buses and trams and it also has its own garage, i do not hesitate to choose it.
With my wife, i've equiped it with modern, comfortable and functional furnishings, and refined taste.
Just happened to be a pleasure to welcome people of all nationalities who wish to visit this beautiful city of Oporto that we love.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Ohhhh, the flat is fantastic!! Really nice, confortable and new!!! 
Cool weekend in Oporto! And also the owner, some grateful details!
I do recommend it!!

The apartment has a good central location near the hospital. It provides a very convenient outdoor private parking place on the building's backyard. This flat is equipped with virtually everything you'll ever need, including a mixer! So everything else, like toaster or  boiler, one might ned in the kitchen is there. In fact, the place is better equipped than my own house!
Good kitchen appliances, electric heating, good TV, cable and internet and so on. Fresh towels, fresh bed sheets, fruits, some food and even Port wine... And all this within a space so nicely decorated. The places just looks and feels good.

What's not to like however, and this is why I award them only 3 stars, is the noise and the bed mattress. These two are of such an importance to me that, and even do the renting price is very competitive, I have to drop a star for each one of them. The road in front is just very very noisy. With cars running all night long on a cobbled road. The windows should really be improved to provide better sound insulation. If one is prone to trouble falling asleep on noise environments, he is definitely going to find it hard to fall a sleep in this flat. As for the mattress, it just is a cheap foam mattress, you're bound to sink on it. I wish there was a spring mattress there, made me miss my own bed at home.
O apartamento do Carlos encontra-se agradavelmente decorado e muito bem equipado. Os meus amigos ficaram muito bem hospedados!

The apartment was fully furnished - groceries and all.  The parking was perfect and safe inside the back yard.  The furnishings were top of the line, and functioning perfect.  Carlos greeted us in person, even though we revived a little late.  He brought a jar of fig jam to welcome us to Porto.  He gave us lots of tips and directions.  The apartment is not within but within walking distance of the very center of Porto and the waterfront.  We could hear some noise from the street overnight but manageable.  We would recommend Carlos's apartment and Carlos as a host anytime.

Carlos received in person at the agreed time and gave us all the information needed about the apartment and some more about the city of Porto.
The apartment is excellent, clean, very well located, complete and well equipped.
Some people have commented here any problem with noise near the building, but I must mention that to us it was not a problem, instead, we had moments of tranquility at night. The apartment is well heated, and still enjoy the courtesy of a few doses of port offered by the host.
Enthusiastically recommend to friends and people who want to know the port stay in this excellent apartment. Thank you Carlos.

Fantastically located apartment in the heart of Porto, close to everything you need. Really well presented, tidy and great warm welcome. 

Highly recommended, couldn't ask for more!

Carlos´ house is perfect. It´s very well located in Oporto and you really have everything you need in it. I really can´t think of anything missing. We´ve even had some oporto wine on our reception!
It´s spacious and full of light, noise isolated and really close to every attraction in oporto and little great places to eat.
Carlos is very kind, he helps great information about oporto, and provides plenty of guides and books about the city. 
In summary, would absolutely go back there when back in oporto.

Nous étions reçus par Carlos dans une ambiance chaleureuse, avec des muffins savoureux préparés par sa femme et une bonne bouteille de porto ... nous avons passé une semaine dans son bel appartement, situé dans une position stratégique pour visiter la ville et découvrir des coins inoubliables. Dans l'appartement, tout était propre et parfaitement confortable. En outre, Carlos a suggéré de très bons restaurants et des voyages interessants à vivre près de Porto. C'est donc le point de départ idéal pour connaître vraiment une partie du Portugal.

Appartement chaleureux et idéalement situé pour visiter Porto.
Chaque détail est pensé pour recevoir les invités. Nous avons été gentiment accueillis.
Le linge et l'appartement étaient impecable. La place de parking est vraiment pratique. L'appartement est face à un joli parc et les commerces sont à proximité.

Nuestra estancia en el apartamento del Sr. Carlos Sobral ha sido extraordinaria. El recibimiento fue maravilloso. Teníamos fruta fresca a nuestra disposición e incluso unas riquísimas magdalenas caseras hechas por la esposa del Sr. Sobral. Su atención y amabilidad han sido insuperables.

En cuanto al apartamento se puede resumir en tres palabras: "No falta nada". Es realmente increíble. Es que, de verdad, no falta nada, pero nada de nada. Lo tiene todo. Tiene televisión por cable, wifi, cadena musical. La cocina esta absolutamente equipada: sartenes, cazos, aceite, microondas, lavavajillas, lavadora, calentador de agua (kettle), horno normal, tostadora, cafetera para hacer café italiano y cafetera para hacer café americano. Por supuesto, mantel, servilletas, platos, vasos, cubiertos, cubre manteles.., Si por tener hasta tenía vino, café, té e incluso media docena de huevos en la nevera. Mayonesa, kétchup... Es que es increíble!!!

El baño impecable de limpio.

La habitación, sencilla pero correcta y limpia.

Y tiene garaje privado, en un patio interior.

En resumen, es un apartamento de 10 sobre 10. Lo tiene todo. Está amueblado con muebles de IKEA, moderno y práctico. Sencillo pero muy acogedor.

Aún encima está situado extraordinariamente bien. A 3 minutos andando de la rúa do Carmo, a 4 minutos de la Torre de los Clérigos y de la librería (de Harry Potter) Lello e irmao. a 6 de la plaza da Liberdade.

Es un auténtico lujazo. En cuanto pueda volveré y se lo recomendaré a todos mis amigos, sin dudarlo!!!

Sr. Carlos Sobral, muchas gracias por todo.
Muito, muito obrigado!

No tuvimos la suerte de conocer a Carlos, pero en su lugar nos recibió un familiar suyo llamado Hugo, y hemos de decir que el trato fue magnífico y muy cercano pese a que el pobre nos tuviera que esperar durante dos horas!

Somos una pareja con un bebé de 2 meses y hemos estado de lujo. Para empezar el apartamento tiene parking privado (gratuito). La casa está al detalle: decoración IKEA, WI-FI, cama de matrimonio muy cómoda y hasta cuna de viaje para el que la necesite. Además, está muy pero que muy bien localizado, en pleno centro y con restaurantes y monumentos a escasos minutos a pie.

En definitiva, da gusto que te reciban con tanta cordialidad y en un lugar tan agradable. La ciudad de Oporto es una maravilla y la casa de Carlos es un sitio ideal desde el que descubrirla. Sin duda, volveremos!

Buenas noches!  Destacamos la amabilidad y disposición de los dueños para ayudarnos en todo lo necesario; el contenido de la casa, pues no falta de nada; la ubicación: caminando llegas bien a todas partes y tienes todo lo necesario en los alrededores, frutería, minimercado, carnicería, restaurantes, parada de taxis y bus, además de tener aparcamiento privado sin coste adicional. Quedamos encantados y volveríamos a alojarnos allí. Muchas gracias por todo!!

The apartment was fantastic! It was such a handy location and we were able to walk to most of the places we needed to go. It was also great having a hop on hop off bus stop right downstairs. Carlos was very helpful, allowing us a flexible check in time and there was useful information left in the apartment for us.
Would recommend to anyone looking to visit.

Notre séjour en couple du 29 septembre au 3 octobre 2013
À notre arrivée nous avons été accueillis sympathiquement par Carlos qui a pris en compte nos souhaits pour nous conseiller, en français, pour les visites, déplacements et restaurants. La documentation, le plan et de beaux livres sur Porto sont à notre disposition.
Nous le remercions pour les délicates attentions gourmandes !!!
Face à un parc, l'appartement est très agréable, bien équipé, super clean, ambiance douce et harmonieuse. On vit à son propre rythme.
Bien situé, il est proche du centre historique. Porto se visite facilement à pied, il faut quand même marcher !!!
En bas de l'appartement, taxis et nombreuses lignes de bus qui permettent de sortir du centre et aller à la Casa Musica pour écouter de la musique  ou visiter le musée contemporain et son parc.
Une adresse à retenir et en faire profiter ses amis !!!

Tanto la estancia, como la limpieza y la amabilidad han sido de diez. Nos hemos sentido como en casa y el apartamento es nuevo, precioso y con todo tipo de comodidades. Mejor que un hotel de cinco estrellas!
Ficámos lindamente instalados. Super centrais. A casa é bestial!!!

El apartamento es precioso. Luminoso, limpio,silencioso, bien caldeado y bien equipado. Su ubicación es excelente, el parque que se ve desde las ventanas está muy limpio y cuidado. Cruzas el parque y ya estás en el centro, a 5 minutos de la preciosa torre de los Clérigos.Los detalles de bienvenida son de agradecer.Todos los comentarios que he leído se ajustaban a la realidad. Lo recomiendo a quien quiera ir a Oporto.

The house is absolutely fab!!! The location was also amazing and the hosts just delightful. Thank you so much!
A casa e fantastica, a localizacao tambem. Os proprietarios sao super amorosos e fizeram-nos sentir benvindos desde o 1o segundo. Muito obrigada!!!

Passei 10 dias com minha família no apartamento do Sr. Carlos no Porto e foi maravilhoso! 
Fomos muito bem recebidos, e tratados de forma especial durante toda nossa estadia pelo proprietário,  muito atencioso e prestativo conosco.

O apartamento é ótimo,  possui uma localização incrível,  próximo a todos os pontos turísticos,  mercados, farmácias,  padaria, hospital e tudo que for necessário. 

Muito limpo, organizado e com uma linda decoração. Ficamos apaixonados pelo nosso local assim como pelo Porto.

Muito obrigada por nós proporcionar dias incríveis Carlos.
Espero voltar logo.

Luiza

If you are looking for a place to stay in porto stop at this one; it was a beautiful apartment with everything inside i could possible wish for, amazing location, warm, bright, comfortable... Easy to deal with owner; one of the best airbnn places i have had the pleasure to come across..

O apartamento de Carlos é tudo o que promete: novinho, charmoso e funcional, maravilhosamente localizado - é realmente muito perto de tudo, além de ter uma praça muito bonita logo em frente ao imóvel. O anfitrião é muito gentil e deixa todos à vontade. 

Amamos a estadia e esperamos voltar várias vezes.

Piso muy bien situado, bien comunicado, moderno, acogedor, tiene de todo, ...... hasta secador!!!! ;)

El anfitrión muy amable y nos aconsejó sobre lugares de visita y donde comer.

O apartamento é exatamente o mostrado nas fotografias. É excelente! Super limpo e com todo o conforto para uma excelente estadia! E a localização é a melhor possível! Fomos a pé a praticamente todos os pontos turísticos da cidade! Sem falar no fato de ter estacionamento para nosso carro!! Muito bom mesmo! Adorados e indicamos!!!

wonderful apartment with great location you can visit some of tourist spots by foot, good restaurants nearby.
A good surprise was the restaurant Papagaio - Travessa Carmo,30.
We stayed 2 days during a family trip around Europe, and this apartment made the difference, clean, modern and with a great welcome from Carlos' s daughter in law and his grandson =)))

This is an exceptionally comfortable and superbly equipped apartment with absolutely everything you could possibly need. It's really nicely designed, with plenty of space and lots of natural light. Everything is brand new and Carlos has provided modern equipment, including a washing machine, dishwasher, TV and hifi! The location is also superb. Perfectly placed for exploring Porto on foot. We never needed to use the bus. There's a garage for your car, and if you are travelling without a car there are key bus routes right outside the flat as well as the open-top tour bus. Good local shops for food, and brilliantly placed for key sights and bars and restaurants. The park and duck ponds outside are a pleasant bonus and makes the apartment feel calm and relaxing. Carlos is friendly, easy-going and helpful. A pleasure to meet. He was there to show us all the main features of the apartment and then left us to enjoy our stay. This is the best airbnb expereince we have had, and I highly recommend Carlos and his apartment if you are thinking of visiting this beautiful city.

The apt was very clean and convient to the historical center. It was in a quiet area.. The washing machine was a plus. No dryer but clothes dried on the heated towel rack. Also free parking on premises. 

good place to stay.

Nous avons reserve cet appartement pour decouvrir Porto a l occasion de notre premier voyage au portugal.
L appartement est idealement situe, pres du centre, avec des bus au pied de l immeuble, ainsi qu un parking prive, tres appreciable. Cote confort, tout est parfait, il est completement equipe, on ne manque de rien.
Bref une adrssse que nous avons beaucouo apprecie, a conseiller absolument.
Nous esperons avoir l occasion de revenir.
Marisa

Carlos's apartment was truly great!
Perfect location not far from all the attractions, close to shops and good restaurants and fully equipped. The apartment was really nice and clean and stocked with everything we could have needed, as well as having super wifi! Carlos was a great host and left us plenty of information and was also kind enough to meet us early in the morning to open the flat for us and give us a tour. I would recommend this flat to anyone staying in Porto!

Accueil super par Lourdes à notre arrivée, appartement très confortable et très bien situé dans le centre.
Nous avons adoré notre séjour à Porto!

Everything is good. The owner is friendly and helpful :)
Good location
The perfect Airbnb experience. Lovely place, charming host. You'll have every thing you need in the apartment, and every tips to enjoy the city from the owner. We had a great time, thanks Carlos!
This apartment was our oasis. So calm, great light, wonderful park across the street, spacious, and a great location. Even a washing machine!

Un appartement très bien placé, très bien tenu, décoré avec goût, et en prime l'accueil de Carlos est plus qu'amical. Ses conseils sont vraiment a suivre. Sûrement une des meilleures réservations que j'ai faite sur air bnb jusqu'ici.

We are very, very satisfied with this apartment. The localisation is fine. It was only few minutes walk to the centre of Porto (and the supermarket). The flat is perfectly equipped and clean. The host Carlos is very hospitable, friendly and helpful.  I recommend this apartment to all Porto visitors.
Adoramos o apartamento, a localização é excelente, as camas são otimas! Ficamos muito felizes com a hospedagem, os anfitriões deixaram dicas super legais sobre a cidade! Super recomendado!!

We felt right at home. Very organized and attentive host and a very comfortable and well-located apartment. We sincerely recommend it!

Nos sentimos em casa. Anfitrião muito organizado e atento, bem como um apartamento muito confortável e bem localizado. Recomendamos sinceramente!

Je vais pas redire ce qui a déjà été dit par les autres.Tout est vrai. Tout est parfait ici, l'appartement est exactement comme dans le photos. Aussi joli.
Je vais plutôt finir de vous convaincre de aller chez Carlos;
Suivez les indications de Carlos, prenez le bus 601 à l’aéroport, si vous arrivez par avion; le bus vous laisse devant la porte. Il est d'une amabilité extrême et répondra à toute vos questions.
Appartement  très bien situe; la torre dos clérigos, la librairie Lello et d'autres très beaux magasins sont à trois pas. Le quartier bars, restos boites de nuit, c'est le même (autour de dos Clerigos).

Il faut savoir qu'à Porto ça grimpe tout de suite; Nous sommes de bons marcheurs, sans plus, mais nous sommes rentrés à pied du pont san Luis I et allées à pied vers le parc de Palacio de Cristal ( très belle vue sur le Douro à cet endroit, je vous la conseille) et casa de la Musica. Très central.
Les bus touristiques passent juste devant, vous pouvez les prendre d'ici.
Surtout allez à Matosihnos (metro ligne A) si vous aimez les poissons grillés.

Au niveau des commerces: qui sont vraiment pas chers. Un marchand des fruits et légumes juste au pied de l'immeuble. Vous trouverez un dépôt de pain ici. Très bonne qualité. Un peu plus difficile de trouver un mini market (seul un DIA pas loin) ou boulangerie. A Porto ce sont plutôt des petits commerces. Pensez à faire le plein quand vous trouverez un.
Bon séjour au pays de l'amabilité!

Everything has been perfect as we expected. We stayed for few nights in Carlos' apartment, the flat was really clean and fully furnished, the position is great, you can walk everywhere. We definitely had a good time and I would suggest this flat to everybody.

Carlos es una persona estupenda, agradecemos todas las atenciones  y recomendaciones que nos dio de Porto, el piso es maravilloso es mejor de lo que se ve en la foto, todos los detalles cuidados en todos los aspectos. Seguro que volveremos!! Muchas gracias por todo.

Un hôte qui vous fait sentir à l'aise chez lui. Son fils Miguel nous a accueilli avec une grande générosité, il nous a donné quelques conseils de visites et un plan de la ville. C'était vraiment très agréable. Quartier sympa, près de tout, calme! Un très bon séjour à Porto!

Really nice apartment in a great location at the city centre and a fantastic host. Really flexible with check out time and helpful at all. The apartment is close to a supermarket and everything is in walking distance. I stayed there during a few really cold winter days but the apartment was warm and cosy. The kitchen is equipped with everything you need for cooking and even has a washing machine and dishwasher.  I definitely would stay here again and can recommend it to everybody!

It was fantastic to spend my time in Porto in Carlos' flat. It was really clean and perfect to be in. Close to everything just a small walk distance. It was perfect and I could imagine myself living there :). Carlos was a really good host. He received me with a big smile and it was really nice showing the flat around. Flexible check in and out hours, which is a big plus. Furthermore, outside were a lot of taxis in case of need. This flat made my Porto experience to be amazing.
Great apartment, great neighborhood. Easy to get around to all the things to do and see.

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour dans cette jolie ville pleine de charme qu'est Porto et l'appartement de Carlos y a contribué. Madame Sobral nous a reçu dès notre arrivée avec une grande gentillesse.L'appartement , bien situé,permet de faire toutes les visites à pied . 
Il est très confortable,lumineux,propre et très bien équipé. Il fait face à un petit parc dans un quartier agréable.
La proximité des bus pour l'aéroport est vraiment très pratique!

My hosts (Carlos and Miguel) we're fantastic! I was so happy with the apartment and the way I was welcomed to Porto. Honestly, I didn't want to leave. I went home telling my boyfriend how much I would love to live in an apartment like there's. The location was great. If I'm in Porto ever again, I plan to contact Carlos and Miguel!

Carlos his son, Miguel waited for us when we arived, he explained everything about the appartment and about Porto. We liked the appartment very much! Every thing we needed was there!  Its close to the citycentre, the old town is within walking distance. When we left we could just close the door and leave the keys in the  mailbox, perfect!

L'appartement est fidèle aux photos, propre, moderne, parfaitement équipé et situé.
Carlos était présent a notre arrivée, il a pu nous donner des infos sur porto.
Très satisfaits !

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Lurdes, la femme de Carlos. Elle nous a présenté l’appartement qui était juste impeccable. C'est un grand appartement très confortable et bien équipé. Il se situe dans un endroit calme et proche de la zone touristique. Je recommande fortement.

Super apparte très confortable et calme dans quartier a la fois central et d'artistes (rue super branchée juste derrière).
Bus pour l'aéroport au pied de l'immeuble. Adresse top. Nous rejoignons les autres commentaires!

Nous avons passé un superbe séjour. L'appartement est très bien aménagé et très propre, à proximité du centre historique. Accès très facile depuis l'aéroport par le bus 601.
A notre arrivée nous avons été accueillis par Miguel qui nous a prodigué ses conseils en français.

We had a great time in Porto, the apartment is located 5 mins from the centre of town and it was really easy to get around on foot. We had a hire car and the off street parking provided a safe location to store the car. Carlos' son greeted us and provided us with a local map, highlighting sights and recommending places to eat. We'd definitely stay here again!

Very nice, very clean apartment, the location is great, very central, you even have a taxi station in front of the building and a bus station at 50m. The apartment was furnished with every little thing we needed, there was a lot of information about the neighborhood too, where to go, where not to go, perfect! Everything was very smooth with Carlos, from the reservation to the stay. Thanks again!
Merci à Carlos pour son accueil parfait. Appartement impeccable, bien équipé et bien situé!

Our host Carlos was very helpful and welcoming. The apartment was very clean and location was great and the bed very comfortable!! Enjoyed our stay very much.
Chritine and Kamal

Carlos nous a merveilleusement accueilli malgré le gros retard d notre avion. Il a pris le temps de nous donner toutes les informations nécessaires sur l'appartement et la ville dé Porto. Nous y avons passé un excellent séjour. L'appartement est très spacieux et fonctionnel pour 2 personnes. Il n'y manque rien. Bien situé nous avons pu explorer facilement cette belle ville.

We were met by Carlos' son Miguel for the check-in. Miguel was very flexible with regards to our check-in time, and showed us to a parking spot within the courtyard of the building, which was unexpected but welcome.

Miguel was extremely kind and attentive and really took the time to explain to us where to find the best spots in town - known and less well-known - for exploring as well as dining. The apartment was clean, spacious, light and quiet at night. The bed is very comfortable and the bathroom very well equipped. The kitchen had everything we needed. We explored Porto on foot from the apartment and didn't need to use any public transportation. The only potential downside to the apartment are the construction works that are ongoing next door, which started at 8AM during our stay. For us this was not a problem, because we intended to get up early anyway, but if you intend to sleep in then I recommend bringing ear plugs. Overall I really recommend staying in Carlos' apartment.

Appt trés bien situé,tres confortable , propre et accueillant
Merci à  Carlos et son fils pour leurs conseils
Nous avons passé une excellente semaine dans cette belle ville
N"hésitez pas à réserver ce logement
Christophe et Sylvie

Miguel, Carlos son, welcomed us. He was very friendly and helpful.
The apartment is central, great location, specious, very well equipped.
Carlos is a great host. The house is clean, comfortable and in a walking distance from the city's major highlights. I totally recommend. It's a must repeat accommodation.

Le logement de Carlos et sa femme Lourdes est fidèle à la description et aux photos. Mon conjoint et moi-même y avons passé un superbe séjour. L'appartement est propre, grand, et idéalement situé (à deux pas du fameux Clerigos). Ceux qui apprécient la marche pourront tout faire à pieds : découverte de la ville, de ses musées, du centre national de photographie (un must), visite des "caves" de Porto, balades le long de la ribiera, excursion sur le Douro... C'est une ville magnifique où il y a beaucoup à voir et à faire, vous ne serez pas déçus ! 

Le petit plus : Carlos et Lourdes ont même pris soin de laisser sur la table du salon une note en français pour nous donner quelques renseignements pratiques, nous dire de ne pas hésiter à nous servir dans le frigo, et nous souhaiter un bon séjour. Ils avaient également mis à notre disposition des guides de la ville, des captures d'écran (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps des meilleurs restaurants dans le coin, etc.

Séjour à Porto très agréable, Miguel le fils de Carlos, nous a accueilli avec beaucoup de gentillesse et de très bons conseils et bonnes adresses. 
Il a pris le temps de nous fournir un plan de la ville et nous a laissé des guides touristiques à disposition. 
L'appartement est idéalement situé, très confortable et conforme aux photos. 
La place de parking est un petit + très appréciable dans une ville comme Porto! 
Nous reviendrons chez Carlos avec plaisir!

Ce séjour à Porto a conclu magnifiquement notre découverte au Portugal. L'appartement est parfait pour découvrir Porto à pied et pour se ressourcer après une journée à arpenter les rues de la ville. Tout y est agréable, grand, propre, lumineux et bien équipé. Les contacts par mail facilitent l'arrivée sur place. Très bon accueil et conseils pour la découverte de la ville, le supermarché et les restaurants aux alentours.

Miguel, Carlos' son, met us at the apartment, provided us with a map of Porto, explained the lay of the land, and gave us great tips for restaurants. The apartment is as pictured, spacious, clean, modern, and very comfortable. It was especially nice to have good counter space in the bathroom. The location is very convenient for access to the Old Town section of the city--the place to be in our opinion--an easy walk away. The neighborhood is very busy so having a parking spot was essential and appreciated. One thing to be aware of is that construction is going on next door so Mon-Sat morning, don't expect to sleep late.

Excellent séjour à Porto. Merci à Carlos pour son accueil chaleureux et ses explications sur les visites à effectuer. Le logement est confortable et à proximité du centre ville, ce qui permet les déplacements à pied.

Passamos excelentes dias no Porto, e com certeza o apartamento do Carlos foi muito responsável por isso. Arrumado com capricho, muito limpo e organizado, o apartamento tem tudo necessário para deixar os hóspedes sentindo-se em casa. Carlos foi sempre muito acessível, flexível com horários de check-in e check-out. a localização é muito boa, com ônibus direto para o aeroporto literalmente em frente ao imóvel, e curtas distâncias para todas as atrações da cidade. Muito obrigada, Carlos!
Carlos was very helpful host, he helped us arriving to the apartment. We got detailed information from him of the apartment and of the city. The apartment was clean and cosy and has a good location.

El anfitrión fue fabuloso con nosotros, a la llegada nos recibió con vino de oporto y un pastel que había hecho su mujer como regalo a nuestro aniversario. La descripción de la casa era aún mejor que lo que se reflejaba en la página. La casa estaba muy equipada, a menos de 10 minutos del centro de la ciudad, con tiendas y restaurantes cercanos y el barrio muy seguro para poder pasear de noche tranquilamente.

This appartment was our favorite during our trip to Portugal. It was super well located, we could walk to the historic Porto, Vila Nova de Gaia was walking distance, it was super confortable and luxurious compare to other places we have stayed and we had a parking spot! It had all the commodities that we needed to ensure that our trip was great and the host, Carlos, was an amazing, convivial and warm host who gave us all the information that we needed to spend a great time in Porto, and in the Douro. We definitely recommend that aparmamento, and if we go back to Porto, we will definitely check with Carlos if it is available.

L'appartement est tout à fait conforme aux photos. Un aménagement et une déco de qualité. Un emplacement parfait pour découvrir le centre de Porto. La place de parking est un vrai plus. L'accueil de Carlos a été très cordial et des infos touristiques étaient à disposition dans l'appartement.
Seule petite critique, les travaux dans l'immeuble d' à coté source de bruit en journée...

Appartement tres propre et confirme aux photos et descriptifs . Et également à proximité du centre de Porto et des différents sites touristiques a visiter . Attention Par contre bruit incessant des voitures , (  même la nuit ) . De plus immeuble cousin de l' appartement est en teavaux , donc des huit heures du matin " marteau piqueur ... ) . 
Pas grave si visite prévue tôt et toute la journée . Porto est une ville superbe , bon restos à prix sympa .

El apartamento es exactamente como aparece en las fotos: limpio, bonito y muy muy práctico. Está completamente equipado. Además Carlos fue super atento cuando llegamos nos recomendó sitios dónde ir. El piso está muy bien ubicado, a 5-10 minutos anda do del centro. También la plaza de garage está muy bien para los que can en coche. Recomiendo este apartamento a todo el mundo que vaya a Oporto

Para describirlo en breve una estancia PERFECTA. Un apartamento con todas las necesidades, bonito, muy limpio y sólo a 5 minutos del pleno centro. Carlos y su hijo Miguel, increíbles, nada más llegar consejos sobre que visitar y donde comer, una botella de vino de porto y un bizcocho exquisito de chocolate, que más se puede pedir. Por desgracia tuvimos un pequeño percance con la puerta del garaje, otro de los aspectos que consideramos muy importante, y Carlos, personalmente se ocupó de solucionarlo, insistiendo en que no nos preocupásemos, que disfrutáramos de la ciudad, que no era problema. Lo recomendamos plenamente y si volvemos no tendremos dudas de donde alojarnos. Muchísimas gracias por tu ayuda y amabilidad.

This was our second stay at Carlos' apartment this year. Carlos is a great host and the apartment is perfect for 2 people. The location is within walking distance of all the downtown area attractions. And the garage space is a big plus. We highly recommend staying here.

O apartamento do Carlos é tão bom quanto às imagens aparentes no site. 
Aconchegante e de ótimo gosto. A limpeza e delicadeza dos anfitriões é impecável, assim como a localização e o estacionamento dentro da moradia. 

Certamente um bom destino para um casal.

Nossa estadia foi excelente. O apartamento do Carlos é ótimo, muito bem equipado e confortável. Além disso, a localização é realmente excelente, a poucos minutos de caminhada dos principais pontos turísticos do Porto. O Carlos foi um ótimo anfitrião, nos recebeu bem, atendeu os pedidos de última hora pra nosso bebê e deu todas as orientações que precisávamos. Recomendo muito!

We loved staying here while in Porto for 4 days!  The place has everything you need and Carlos gave us great tips on how to get around when we arrived. We felt like we were a local! Highly recommend the coffee shop a few doors down 'Espiga' - we ended up there every day!  Would definitely stay here again next time in Porto.

Nous avons été très bien reçus par Maria ,la femme de Carlos qui nous a fait la visite de l'appartement dans ses moindres détails de fonctionnement et a mis à notre disposition tous les produits de base contenus dans la cuisine et la salle de bain. De plus une bouteille de porto et des chocolats nous attendaient sur la table ! L'appartement est conforme aux photos et très confortable . Il est très près du centre historique et du Douro et possède un parking privé. Tout se fait à pied sans (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande vivement cette adresse

Fantástico!! Carlos ha sido un excelentísimo anfitrión y además, el apartamento está muy bien ubicado y es amplio y luminoso.
Carlos fue absolutamente flexible, tanto con la hora de entrada y como la de salida y nos explicó / recomendó sobre Oporto como si de una oficina de turismo se tratase. 
Cuando vuelva a Oporto, sin duda repetiré :)

Estuvimos un fin de semana en la casa de Carlos y nos sentimos como en nuestra propia casa. La casa no puede estar mejor equipada, mejor situada y no puede tener mejor anfitriòn. Tal cual aparece en las fotos.

We loved Carlos' apartment in Porto. The location was within walking distance to the river bank, restaurants, and shops. The apartment itself was clean, cozy and comfortable for three people. We had a great stay and would highly recommend it!

Staying with Carlos was fantastic, he received us and took time to explain everything and gave us great advice. the apartment is perfectly located and beautiful with everything you could ever wish for.

We had an amazing stay at Carlos' apartment in Porto. 

Carlos was super flexible with checkin and was waiting outside the apartment on amour arrival. The apartment was easy enough to find via (Hidden by Airbnb) maps. 

One of the best things about the apartment has to be the off street parking,
as parking in Porto can be a nightmare! The parking spaces were secure out the back of the building accessible by remote control.

Carlos was an absolutely amazing host providing some excellent food recommendations which made our stay in Porto all the better. He obviously has a passion for food as well! 

The apartment itself is a walk up with lots of space, modern and completely furnished with everything you could need for your stay (washer, hairdryer, iron, lots of towels, full kitchen etc). The space is big and the apartment has a really nice feel to it with wooden floors. 

On first entering the apartment it did smell a little damp, however we soon realised the whole city of Porto can be like that (hence the need for tiles). But after keeping the windows open for a while on a hot sunny day it was fine. 

During the time of our stay (early June) there was also some construction nearby which commenced daily at 9am, but luckily we were always up before then, so it didn't impact us. 

The location of the apartment is great and wishing walking distance of most of the major sights, although not in the centre of town so still nice and not overly touristy. 

Overall we loved our stay in the apartment would definitely stay again if we get the chance to go back to Porto!

L'appartement est bien équipé et spacieux. La place de parking est un vrai atout, d'autant que l'appartement est bien situé et permet de tout faire à pied.

La rue est passante ce qui est un peu génant la nuit mais qui ne nous a pas empêché de dormir. Le lit est également trop mou à notre goût.

Deux conseils pour les futurs voyageurs : allez prendre votre petit déjeuner à la Padaria Ribeiro (moins 10 min à pied) : un vrai délice et tentez un déjeuner dans le self pimenta rosa du centre commercial Bombarda (5 min à pied) : super rapport qualité prix

Absolutely stunning place, close to the centre, comfortable and modern. The house has all the facilities in place, all working and you will find yourself like at home. Carlos is such an awesome host, approachable, kind and easy going. Communication was easy and the only thing I can say is I'm looking forward to have the same experience again.

Location is fantastic and apartment very spacious and clean. We really enjoyed our stay . Everything within walking distance. Nice to have park opposite and area felt safe . Overall a great place. Thank you Carlos for all your information and help. Much appreciated. Would recommend to all travellers.

Absolutely great place to stay in Porto! Our family stayed in Carlos's place for 3 nights and we loved it. Very good location - surrounded by good cafes, 5 minutes walk from Porto University, Clérigos Tower, and famous Livraria Lello bookshop. Porto's "hop on hop off" blue bus stop is just around the corner (in front of National Museum Soares dos Reis).  

The apartment and entire building is newly remodeled, very clean and comfortable. Windows overlook a small park with large platanus trees and a small pond. 

P.S. Checkout Crystal Palace Park nearby - it is bigger than it appears 
on tourist maps (it continues west) and provides nice evening stroll after you spend a day exploring old part of the city.

My parents and I stayed at Carlos' apartment for three nights. Everything about our stay was perfect. Although we did not have the pleasure of meeting Carlos, we were able to meet his lovely wife. She was so helpful in getting us settled and making sure we had everything we needed.  The apartment was just what we needed for our stay in Porto. It was clean, safe, and had everything you might need. The location is perfect, you can walk just about everywhere from it. If you prefer to take transit, it is easy to located transit from the apartment. Overall, we had a great stay and I don't think you will be able to find a better place to stay in Porto! Great apartment and host, and beautiful city!

On a l'impression en arrivant chez Carlos d'arriver chez des amis. L'appartement est idéalement situé. Tout est accessible à pied. L'appartement est l'un de nos coup de coeur AirBnb. Quel plaisir apres une journée de marche d'avoir le sentiment de rentrer chez soi. Et pour ceux qui viennent en voiture, de pouvoir se garer dans l'immeuble est un réel plaisir.

Acceuil très sympathique et appartement impeccable, très bien placé
Merci

Logement agréable à vivre, bien équipé, proche du centre et conforme à l annonce.  Le parking est un plus. Carlos (en francais !) donne des renseignements et apporte des petits plus très sympathiques comme plan et livre sur la ville, une petite bouteille de porto avec des chocolats. Merci Carlos. Nous avons passé un agréable séjour.

Carlos had his son greet is and give us a great review of the city. The house is across from a quiet park, has a shops to buy meals, liqueur, and groceries right outside the front door. 

The apartment is lovely and the bed is very comfortable. Overall we enjoyed our stay at Carlos's apartment very much!

We were welcomed by the lovely lady Carlos wife with a chocolate cake and Porto wine ( very well received and consumed with gusto on daily basis after our day trips). The place was very well equipped, well positioned with parking being a premium and bonus!!!. We will certainly recommend Carlos accommodation.

Nuestra estancia en el apartamento de Carlos fue inmejorable. Su ubicación, su estado, la limpieza del apartamento... Estuvimos cuatro personas (dos de ellas niñas), y no tuvimos ningún problema de espacio. Está realmente cerca del centro histórico, lo que sin duda es una gran ventaja para optimizar el tiempo.
Nos recibió Miguel, el hijo de Carlos, que hizo muy fácil nuestra adaptación a Oporto. Nos dio varias indicaciones muy acertadas sobre la ciudad que pudimos aprovechar.
Sin duda, repetiremos si tenemos la oportunidad de volver a Oporto.

Très bel appartement au centre de Porto, dans un quartier calme. Super accueil et une petite bouteille de Porto en guise de bienvenue ! En revanche, on a eu droit à quelques coups de marteau venant de l'immeuble voisin en journée. Mais cela n'a pas duré longtemps. Un appartement à recommander!
Superbe appartement dans un lieu tres bien localise  avec un hote hors pair
Quel séjour fantastique ! Nous avons été entièrement satisfaits ! Merci pour tout, l'accueil a été très appréciée, et nous avons apprécié de nous sentir en parfaite sécurité dans l'appartement.
Carlos nice and helpful.  Closing the shutters at night made it dark and quiet Across the street is a 24 hour taxi stand.  Made our early plane very easy to catch

Carlos fue súper amable explicándonos desde un mercado cerca hasta cómo salir de Oporto. Un gran anfitrión. El departamento un 10, muy bien ubicado!!! Súper recomendable. No duden en elegirlo. El departamento es tal cual las fotos.

foi excelente nossa estadia neste local. Sr Carlos foi muito simpatico e atencioso para conosco. O apartamento eh simples mas muito confortável para um casal. Pudemos nos sentir em casa o tempo todo. Tem estacionamento no local e facilidade de sair caminhando. O apartamento eh bem equipado. Ao lado existe o SABOR da FAZENDO para um cafe da manha ótimo e barato.  Sr. Carlos foi tao atencioso que providenciou algo para nos ajudar com a secagem das roupas pois não ha secador de roupas no apartamento. Nos ofereceu uma garrafa de vinho do porto!!!! Encontramos tudo bem limpo e organizado. RECOMENDO e vamos voltar

The apartment was just as described and Carlos was a great host, meeting us on arrival. It's really well located and extremely convenient for walking around the city. Having parking onsite was a huge draw for us.

En general experiencia SATISFACTORIA, céntrica ubicación y apartamento limpio. el único pero, es la ausencia casi de  espejos. El único que había estaba en el baño. 
También hemos tenido problemas con la caldera del agua, ya que al ducharnos 2 a la vez, el segundo se ha quedado sin agua caliente

Carlos's place is comfortable and has a very convenient location for the center of Porto. There is a bus that takes you directely to the airport very close by. He welcomed us very well upon arrival and even offered us chocolates and Port wine. The apartment is well equipped with everything we needed for our stay. I would recommend his apartment for anyone staying in Porto.
位置好,环境好,配套设施齐全,房东也非常友善热情,足够4人住宿

Best stay, best host ever!
Carlos' flat is very spacious, clean, cozy, safe and fully equipped, located in a tranquil neighborhood. A private parking lot is another merit! He offered us some good advice for traveling Porto and even generously gave us a Porto wine and chocolates to enjoy. You can reach almost every main attraction of Porto on foot from the flat. There is a taxi stand right across the street as well. 
I think you will not be able to find better place to stay. I will definitely choose this flat when I visit Porto again and highly recommend you doing so.
:D

La estancia fue estupenda. Carlos nos recibió con gran amabilidad ynos dió un montón de consejos e información sobre la ciudad. El apartamento estaba muy limpio, la cama estupenda y en general muy completo. Y con parking! un lujo
Check in was flexible and Carlos's place was easily walkable to all areas of Porto and a great home base for exploring the city. Thanks Carlos!

포르투 두번째 방문인데요~ 너무나 기억에 남는 숙소입니다. 너무 깨끗했고 주방이며 방이며 전부 마음에 들었어요~ 위치는 렐로 서점이랑 가까고요~ 집앞에 공원이 있어요! 창밖으로 보이는 풍경이 아름답습니다 ^^ 

호스트는 너무나도 완벽했습니다. 영어를 잘했고 똑똑한 분이셨어요~ 저희 부부에게 와인을 선물로 주셨고 여행에 필요한 모든것을 준비해주셨습니다 ^^ 
슈퍼 호스트는 역시 이유가 있었어요 
너무나도 좋은 추억을 만들어준 카를로스에게 깊은 감사를 전합니다 ^^ 
포르투에 가면 또 카를로스의 집에 머물고 싶습니다 ^^

It is the second visit in Porto ~ It is a very memorable house. It was so clean, it was a kitchen and a room, and I liked it all. ~ Location is close to the llelo bookstore ~ There is a park in front of house! The view from the window is beautiful ^^

Carlos was so perfect. He was a good English speaker and a smart person. He gave wine to gave us and everything we needed to travel.
The super host had a reason!
I am deeply grateful to Carlos for making such wonderful memories ^ ^
I would like to stay in Carlos' house again if I go to Porto.

Thank you Carlos for the warm welcome! The flat is very well equipped and near to Porto's city center so that you can go downtown by feet. We had a car, so it was a great bonus to have a private parking lot!
Carlos graciously picked us up at our train and gave us a full introduction to the apartment.  The apartment was fine.  We enjoyed being across from a park and the closeness to the metro was great!

We had a wonderful stay in Carlos's apartment. It is located just on the edge of the heart of Porto on a small square with a taxi stand, and you can easily walk to all of the sights.  It is close to everything with a market around the corner and a good neighborhood restaurant. The apartment was immaculate and very comfortable for the two of us. Carlos and his son, Miguel,  were very welcoming and gave us great recommendations for things to see and do in Porto.
Good apartment with good parking access. Marco was very helpful in getting us checked in smoothly. There is a bit of sound from the street otherwise the apartment is great!
Great apartment minutes from some of the best spots in town. Highly recommended.

For me Carlos is the best Portuguese man. His apartment was very clean and he helped me to check in easily  even i arrived hours earlier than expected. He was also welcome me by a special drink.  His place was everything we hoped for and more. Taxi stand is just down in front of the apartment, very convenience. I'll be recommending Carlos place to anyone we know going to Porto!

Thank you very much Carlos for the things you did for me.

L'appartement est bien situé en bordure Nord-Ouest du centre historique : on peut faire toutes les visites à pied. Il est grand, propre, agréable, bien équipé avec les produits de première nécessité. au pied de l'immeuble, un marchands de fruits et un boucher (fermés le samedi après-midi et le dimanche) mais un peu plus loin un mini-market est ouvert même le dimanche matin. On entend un peu le bruit de la circulation et parfois les chauffeurs de taxi qui discutent tôt le matin mais ça ne nous a pas vraiment gênés car il y a double vitrage , nous avons bien dormi car le lit est confortable.
Carlos, qui parle Français, nous a bien accueillis et nous a donné un plan et diverses informations utiles.
Le bus 601 de l'aéroport s'arrête près des urgences de l'hôpital à 150 m de l'appartement. Pour le retour, on peut prendre le 602 dont l'arrêt est juste à la porte.
Pour ceux qui aiment les visites guidées, nous conseillons celles de Jorge Dias ( (Website hidden by Airbnb)

Surtout si vous vous rendez à PORTO n'hésitez surtout pas à faire une halte dans l'appartement de CARLOS , il est très propre , fonctionnel et surtout près du centre historique ,et proche de tout , nous avons passé trois nuits dans cet appartement , nous avons tout fait à pied afin de découvrir PORTO , ville avec tant de splendeurs , que nous y retournerons et bien sur ce sera chez CARLOS .

Hello, Carlos est un Hôte vraiment génial. Problème de ventilo qui à été résolu très rapidement, donc très bonne réactivité. L'appartement est dans le centre de porto donc vous pouvez tout faire à pied, et les transports sont vraiment très proches. L'appartement est légèrement bruillant quand on ne ferme pas les doubles vitrages, mais ce n'est pas gênant, et c'est tout a fait normal pour un emplacement dans le centre-ville. Sinon, appartement très très propre, avec toute les commodités et tes sécurisé. Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermées.  Merci Carlos ! Bon séjour

This is a great apartment that is located just on the edge of the historic center of Porto. The apartment was extremely clean and modern. Carlos' son helped us check in, and he also highlighted some key destinations on a map. The parking spot was also a great help, allowing us to keep a car for day trips outside of the city.

Carlos' apartment is super comfortable and modern feeling. It is super well located, close to all the attractions that can be visited on the footing. The bedroom is spacious and has plenty of storage space. The kitchen was well-equipped and provided everything we could possibly need. 
The garage is a plus in an area where it is not easy to find places to park. Carlos, the host, is very kind and helpful, flexible with changes in check in and out. He always responded very quickly to all our inquiries. Plus his restaurant recommendation was top notch!

Carlos, THANK YOU very much for having us at your place. Muito Obrigado for the welcome gift! It was a real pleasure meeting you. We had a wonderful stay and a very relaxing and enjoyable time in Porto. 

If you are thinking to go to Porto this apartment will be a perfect choice. Highly recommended. 6 stars!

Carlos' apartment was a perfect place from which to explore Porto. it is a short, five minute  walk to the center and near small cafes and restaurants for eating or having s cup of coffee. The apartment is comfortable and well equipped.  It was perfect for the two of us. Carlos met us at the apartment and gave us lots of information to help organize our time in Porto.  

Obrigada, Carlos.  We had a lovely time in your beautiful city.

A spacious and modern apartment with great amenities and a great host! It faces a park and a taxi-parking space so it's quite loud at night, but that is the only issue we had and it was resolved by getting earplugs. 
Carlos also kindly provides you an inside garage which is amazing given the central location! A great experience overall, highly recommended!

I was met by Carlos's daughter in law who was very friendly and she kindly showed me around the apartment and went through the map of Porto with places to visit & local restaurants , bars and hidden gems.  She gave me some good local tips and Carlos kindly left a nice bottle of port which was a lovely gesture.  The apartment was lovely, new, modern and well equipped with everything I needed.  Porto is very compact with good transport links and very walkable.  I throughly enjoyed my stay in Carlos's apartment and would visit Porto again.
Excelente ubicación. Un apartamento agradable y muy cómodo
Great airbnb...perfect location, helpful host!

We hebben een fantastische driedaagse in Porto achter de rug. Voor het grootse deel te danken aan het prachtige verblijf. Het begon al bij de boeking. We kregen onmiddellijk reactie van Carlos en die snelle respons op al onze vragen bleef tot de laatste minuut van ons verblijf. We werden op he afgesproken uur warm ontvangen door Miguel ( de zoon) die ons een duidelijke uitleg gaf over alles in het appartement en ook vele nuttige tips over de bezienswaardigheden, restaurants en winkels in Porto. Het appartement is voorzien van alles wat nodig is en voldoet volledig aan de beschrijving. Het is op wandelafstand van het centrum en openbaar vervoer is letterlijk voor de deur. We waren met de wagen en de afgesloten privé-parking was niet alleen veilig maar een absolute meerwaarde in een omgeving waar parkeerplaats zeer schaars is. We zouden dit appartement aan iedereen aanraden die op zoek is naar de ideale uitvalsbasis om de prachtige stad Porto te verkennen! Bedankt Carlos en Miguel voor de gastvrijheid en hopelijk tot nog eens.

Carlos's place is comfortable and very well located -- quiet but near everything. We enjoyed our time there very much and would recommend it for anyone visiting Porto. Carlos and his son were excellent communicating with us and went above and beyond in making us feel comfortable and welcome. Excellent.

The apartment is nice, 5 minutes by car from the highway and 10 minutes walking from main city attractions (Lello bookshop is at 5 minutes). The car park is inside the courtyard. Basically is the perfect location in order to visit both the city and its surroundings. The space inside the apartment is enough for 4 people but not very large. The kitchen is nice and we cooked for 2 dinners. The host was really nice: he gave us an overview about the most amazing places in the city as well as the best restaurants frequented mainly by locals. We recommend this apartment an our host Miguel.

L'appartement est très agréable,plus que parfaitement équipé et super bien placé. Le parking très appréciable. Super accueil. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Porto. Le seul bémol est le bruit de la circulation, malgré le double vitrage, la rue pavée est passante.

Magnifico lugar para quedarse en Porto. Carlos es un anfitrión excelente, que desde el recibimiento hasta la salida os hara todo muy sencillo. La casa esta super bien ubicada, en el centro, pero en una tranquila plaza. Limpisima, funcional y muy comoda. En definitiva, inmejorable.

Ofrece justo lo que indica. El apartamento está cerca del centro y la zona turística, pero alejado del jaleo. Miguel vino a recibirnos, nos enseñó el apartamento y nos dio indicaciones de lugares de interés, para comer y cenar y conciertos y eventos de esos días. En definitiva la estancia allí marcó la diferencia en nuestro viaje a Oporto.

Carlos's apartment is in a great location and contained everything we needed for our stay. Very comfortable and the bottle of port was a lovely touch. Miguel met us to check in which was very late at night and was so welcoming and helpful. We had a wonderful time and would certainly recommend this apartment. Thank you. Lynn and Rod
Nice apartment in a location that use barely out of the way – 2-3 minutes walk to historic parts of the city, but just far enough away that it's quiet and relaxed.

Já há algum tempo viajo alugando apartamentos pelo Airbnb, mas o que o Carlos e sua família oferecem aos hóspedes merece destaque. O apartamento é ainda melhor do que aparece nas fotos e tem tudo de que se precisa para uma estada confortável - importante ressaltar que todos os equipamentos funcionam perfeitamente. Tanto a chegada quanto o check-out foram muito tranquilos, e o anfitrião nos deixou um pequeno relatório de tudo que precisávamos inicialmente saber (como localização de mercados e a senha do ótimo wi-fi). A localização é um capítulo à parte: em frente a uma aprazível praça, a dois passos da rua da Cedofeita, das igrejas do Carmo e das Carmelitas e da Torre dos Clérigos; cinco minutos andando até a beira do Douro. Fácil acesso (até a pé) à estação São Bento e à estação de Campanhã (uns dez minutos de ônibus). Valeu a pena escolher este apartamento!
Excelente alojamiento, muy bien ubicado. Lurdes, la señora de Carlos, nos recibió con mucha cortesía. El alojamiento tiene todas las comodidades para una estadía placentera. Lo recomiendo

L'appartement de Carlos est très agréable, propre et bien équipé. L'hôte lui même est très attentionné et de bon conseil. Toute la ville est accessible à pied depuis l'appartement, je recommande fortement ! Merci Carlos !

El alojamiento de Carlos es fantástico, tal cual se ve en las fotografías. El apartamento es muy completo, tiene todo lo necesario para una familia, está limpio y muy bien situado. Tiene como extra la plaza de garaje. Tanto Carlos como su mujer son muy amables y nos recibieron de maravilla. Lo recomiendo encarecidamente a todo aquel que vaya a pasar unos días a Porto.

El apartamento de Carlos ha cumplido todas nuestras expectativas, esta super bien situado para hacer turismo y es muy cómodo. Nosotros fuimos con un niño pequeño y tenían de todo para el incluso algun juguete. La hora de entrada y de salida es flexible lo cual es un gran ventaja, y la plaza de garaje lo mejor ya que la zona es de pago. Sin duda lo recomendaremos a amigos y si volvemos a Oporto REPETIREMOS

Solo decir que el apartamento esta muy bien en todos los aspectos.
Se encuentra muy bien situado. Nos atendió Miguel hijo de Carlos y aparte de comentarnos las cosas del apartamento, nos aconsejo algún que otro restaurante que por cierto estaban muy bien.  Si tengo que volver a Porto, sin duda va a ser la primera opción a considerar.
Promete lo que da. Muy buena relación precio/calidad. Carlos, el anfitrión, muy amable

Carlos was an amazing host!! From booking and communication to welcoming and an amazing location and apartment full of amenities. The location was super central, the little vegetable market located under the apartment was a winner!! The bottle of port was a very thoughtful touch, thank you so much for a wonderful experience!!!

Simplesmente perfeito. O apartamento é lindo, muito espaçoso e confortável. Limpeza nota 10. O jardim em frente é super agradável. A localização é incrível: perto de todas as principais atrações da cidade, dá para fazer tudo a pé, se quiser. Ainda assim, exatamente em frente ao prédio, existe um ponto de táxi e uma parada de ônibus para o aeroporto. Para finalizar, um fator importante: a hospitalidade de nosso anfitrião, que foi sempre simpático e extremamente atencioso conosco. Realmente nos sentimos em casa. Muitas saudades do nosso cantinho no Porto!

Muito bem localizado e próximo ao centro. Bastante limpo e organizado. O Sr Carlos foi muito atencioso e nos ajudou com excelentes dicas. O presente de boas vindas foi uma grata surpresa. 
Um excelente lugar voltaremos em breve.

Carlos and Maria are wonderful people.  The location of the apartment was very convenient and within comfortable walking distance to all sites.  Restaurants and mini markets are just steps from the apartment.  The private and secure parking is great if you travel by car.  Carlos and Maria were always very responsive before and during our stay.  The apartment is spotless and exactly as shown in the photos. Carlos was very patient waiting for us as we arrived one hour later than planned.  I would definitely return here and highly recommend the apartment.

Pasquale
Canada

Sejour très agréable à l'appartement. Excellent accueil de Carlos, avec en prime, une bouteille de Porto.  Appartment spacieux pour 2 personnes, très propre et très sécuritaire. La locatisation de l'appartement est parfaite, très près du quartier historique.  Pour nous, c'est le meilleur Airbnb à Porto. Merci Carlos! Nous y retournerons.

Carlos nos respondió siempre de forma muy rápida, muy atento y dispuesto a contestar cualquier duda.
El apartamento es perfecto; muy tranquilo, muy cómodo y con una excelente ubicación.
La plaza de garaje, ideal si vas en coche.
Hemos pasado muy buenos días en Oporto.
Gracias!

Adoramos a estadia, o apartamento muito limpo, a vista maravilhosa, recepção excelente, recomendo a outros que querem um lugar gostoso e com recepção 10. Foi uma viagem inesquecivel, com as recomendações do anfitrião. Quem se hospedar não vai se arrepender.

Really reactive contact. We asked for baby bed, it was provided fully equipped with linen. We also got a baby chair which was really help full. Easy explanation on how to get there. It was important for us with the baby to be able to access the place quickly. All this happened really easily.

Petit coup de coeur pour cette appartement. Très propre, bien située avec tout les équipements nécessaires pour un court ou long séjours. On a le sentiment d’être à la maison !

Accueil très chaleureux et convivial
Nous sommes très heureux de ce séjour à Porto

Carlos fue un inmejorable anfitrión, muy amable y atento. Nos dejaron muchas cosas de uso básico, tanto en la cocina como en el baño. Y también había preparado guías y mapas de la ciudad. Apartamento 100% recomendable.

El apartamento está en una zona muy bien ubicada en el centro de la ciudad pudiendo ir  andando a cualquier lugar de  oporto con supermercados, farmacias,bares..etc al lado del apartamento.
A sido una estancia muy agradable!!
Buen apartamento con buena ubicación para desplazarse por Oporto, sobre todo muy cerca de todo el ocio en la zona de la Baixa.
It was a big apartment with heating which helped because it was a bit cold. The apartment had private parking and great amenities including a dishwasher and washing machine.

Close to the city centre by foot, 
Stylish and cozy! Everything you need is fully equipped. Highly recommended!!

But the nos
Excelente ubicación, céntrico y tranquilo. Apartamento de nueva construcción con todo lo suficiente para 3-4 personas. Nos recibió Carlos, que es encantador. Cuando vuelva a Oporto, repetiré

A hospitalidade não poderia ser melhor, espaço extremamente limpo e organizado, havia tudo que necessitava, sem contar as dicas de pontos turísticos e restaurantes dadas pelo anfitrião. Ganhamos ainda uma lembrança especial na chegada. Super recomendo!!
Departamento super recomendable. Mejor que lo publicado. El marido Carlos super atento y nos dio todos los tips para aprovechar mejor la estadía. Si van a Oporto este es el lugar para quedarse.

Nous avons passé un excellent moment à Porto dans l'appartement magnifique et tout équipé de Maria et Carlos. Celui-ci est situé en plein centre ville en face d'un superbe jardin du XIX et dispose d'un parking privatif.
Un petit mot rédigé spécialement en français et des guides touristiques de la ville étaient également à notre disposition.

With easy parking in a secure courtyard below, we found the apartment very convenient. There is a dishwasher and washing machine for clothes and drying rack provided.
It is a short walk to some of the tourist areas, shops and restaurants, and 20-30 minutes walk to the river and the nearby shopping and tourist areas. We loved that it is very close to the art district. There is a nice view from the windows ( one floor up) of a small park with a small lake and mature trees. We were welcomed with a bottle of port and some cheese for our visit! We recommend!

This place was a great place to stay, and it was close to a lot things we wanted to see. The host was accommodating as we could not find a time where it was convenient for us to meet for the keys, but his son was able to meet us with the keys and told us what places to visit/eat, very helpful!

Fantástico! Fomos recebidos com muito carinho e atenção pela Maria de Lurdes que gentilmente nos recebeu com um vinho do Porto e um queijo, nos deu dicas da cidade e nos colocou à disposição para qualquer dúvida.
Excelente localização. Fizemos tudo a pé. Próximo de mercado e todo tipo de comércio. Frente a uma praça arborizada. Super confortável, aconchegante e impecável. Acomodações amplas, limpas e muito bem decorada. Nós sentimos em casa. Voltaremos com certeza! Muito obrigada!

Maria’s place is within walking distance to great restaurants, coffee shops and tourist attractions.

Carlos was great at communicating with me before we arrived to make sure they could accommodate our check in etc. 

Maria was there to greet us when we arrived and walked us through the apartment and provided us with books and brochures on where to go in Porto! 

I would recommend their place to others who are looking for a place to stay.

We had a great stay. CArlos and Maria were wonderful  hosts. Very thorough, responsive, helpful, clear and amazingly nice. The location  was excellent.  A 5 minute walk from many major spots and not too far to walk anywhere. The apartment  was wonderful...spacious and clean and quiet.  Air conditioning  worked very well. TV was big and many channels. We highly recommend  this listing. You will be very happy here.

Accueil des plus agréables. Communication très facile. L'appartement a plus que répondu à nos besoins nous nous sommes senti chez nous pendant toute cette semaine. Nous recommandons fortement la réservation de cet appartement. Merci à Carlos pour toutes les petites attentions lors de notre arrivée.

Great, spacious 1 bedroom apartment. Was clean and great location about 10 mins walk to the river front. Cafe next door had good pastries and coffee for breakfast as well and a lovely small park opposite where you can sit to enjoy them. 

Carlos and Maria were easily contactable if we had any questions about Porto and advised on how to get to and from the air bnb- the bus from the train station was easy to use and stopped close to the apartment. Their daughter in law met us when we arrived and helped us work out what to do for our short stay and how to use the public transport which was a great help. 

Had a great time in Porto, and recommend this air bnb. Thank you Maria, Carlos and Salome.

Good location and a very clean apartment.
Fell in love with Porto with a lot of thanks to this place!

We had a very good stay. The bed was very comfortable, the bathroom was clean, and the living room well organized and comfortable. A bonus perk was how good the view was from the windows. It was nice being next to a park and within walking distance of all the tourist hot spots without being in the centre of them and having to deal with excessive noise. The apartment is near a shop too, which made buying food very handy. Would definitely stay there again.

Très bel appartement bien situé et permettant de profiter pleinement de Porto.
L'accueil, la flexibilité et la qualité de la communication avec Salomé et Carlos facilitent grandement l'arrivée.
L'équipement dans l'appartement ainsi que le parking privé font vraiment une différence.
Hautement recommandé !!!

Porte에 다시 오게 된다면 다시 이곳으로 오고 싶을 정도로 너무 만족하고 갑니다!! 

체크인 전부터 원활한 의사소통은 물론 체크인하면서도 친절한 숙소 설명과 주변 지도 설명까지 너무 자세하게 해주셨습니다~ 

숙소 주변에 주요 관광지까지 다 근처에 위치해 있어서 따로 교통권을 끊지 않고도 걸어서 다닐 수 있는 거리였습니다!

숙소도 사진과 똑같아서 저희에게 전혀 실망감을 주지 않았습니다. 그리고 청결도 또한 너무너무 깔끔해서 여행내내 쾌적하게 생활할 수 있었습니다!!

Appartement idéalement placé pour découvrir Porto à pieds, mais : 
-situé en face d'un grand hôpital donc bruit de sirènes fréquents à toutes heures, -station de taxi au pied de l'immeuble et chauffeurs très bavards parfois jusqu'à 3h du matin,
-circulation dense toute la nuit causant beaucoup de bruit, même fenêtres fermées. Selon moi, cet appartement convient bien pour des jeunes lors de courts séjours ( 3 jours maxi ), au delà, l'espace et le manque de linge de maison se font cruellement sentir ( serviettes, draps ).

Lugar para sentirte como
En tu propia casa

Carlos was very helpful and gave us tips to travel from airport to the apartment. Our flight got delayed and he was quick to respond to help accommodate our new arrival time. We were given home made biscuits upon arrival and free bottle of port wine! Location of the flat was great, easy access to city centre and about 20 mins walk to the river front. The bed was a little small for 2 people but the sofa is a good alternative. Highly recommended! Thanks Carlos!

My boyfriend and I had a great time at Maria and Carlos’ place when traveling to Porto. I would recommend the apartment to anyone who is looking to stay somewhere in a more quiet area but still in walking distance to the city center. The apartment also included a parking spot which was extremely convenient for us as we kept a car in Porto.

We had a great stay at your apartment! Everything was fine. Miguel was a great host and gave us a LOT of insider-tips and information about the Top-Spots of the city, which helped us. Having a private garage for parking is awesome so close to downtown Porto. And thank you very much for the delicious Bottle of Port Wine! We really enjoyed it! If we visit Porto agsin, we would definitely take this apartment again! :-)

We have been in Porto for 3 days this week. This apartment was the perfect adress to enjoy Porto. The location is fantastic, the hosts are fantastic so that we could enjoy our stay a lot. The apartment is very clean, you have all the things you need in the kitchen and a parking space was also avaliable. We didn't miss a thing! It was great and we highly recommend it! :-) Thank you again! We will come back again :-)

Maria and Carlos' apartment in the centre of the old part of town is wonderfully comfortable, well equipped and so well located near to many of the things visitors to Porto will want to see and do. Having off-street, secure parking right next to the apartment was a great bonus, and we left it there for the whole stay, as everything we wanted to do was within walking distance. There is a mini-mercado a few doors away, and cafes and bars very close by. There is great dining down by the water, and it's an easy walk to the high bridge, then down the chairlift on the Gaia side for some port tastings. Don't miss the photography museum (currently housing an exhibit of Frieda Kahlo works). We thoroughly recommend Maria's apartment - very comfortable, super clean, and you'll likely receive the same warmest of welcomes as we did. 110% !!

An excellent apartment, modern, well maintained and with all facilities. The location is great for walking into the city and very pleasant to return and relax. Lots of information and helpful suggestions from the owners.
Secure parking for the car is very welcome.
Very highly recommended. One of the best apartments we have stayed in.

This was the best Airbnb we stayed in on our 2 week honeymoon in Europe. It felt so homey and comfortable, and the location couldn't be better.
