It's in a great neighborhood with a lovely park across the street, and is very quiet at night. We walked everywhere with no trouble. Plus, we were able to park our rental car in the lot during our stay, which was so helpful. Maria's son Miguel met us at the apartment and gave us so many great recommendations. We ate at two of the restaurants he suggested (within a 5 minute walk of the apartment) and they were some of the best meals we had on our whole trip! Being able to do our laundry after traveling for a week was a huge perk as well. We hope to come back to Porto someday, and would stay here again in a heartbeat.

La localización del apartamento es inmejorable, a cinco minutos andando de la Librería Lello. Estuvimos tres días y fuimos andando a todos los sitios del centro. Limpieza máxima y anfitriones estupendos.
Excelente apartamento. Lindo. Recomendamos. Hospitalidade e atenção do Sr. Carlos Cabral nota máxima!. Muito bem localizado. Tudo pertinho.

Maria’s apartment is fantastic. The location was really easy to get around. Communications were easy. Great size apartment & parking spacious. My only suggestion would be a queen size bed instead of a double. We would definitely recommend this apartment for a stay in Porto.

Siamo stati tre giorni nell’appartamento di Maria Lourde e abbiamo avuto un piacevole soggiorno. L’appartamento ha tutto il necessario per accogliere e coccolare gli ospiti. Il Sig. Carlos ci ha accolto con simpatia e ci ha dato ottimi consigli per visitare la città e su buoni ristoranti locali, che abbiamo provato! Grazie e a presto!

Carlo's place was perfect place to explore Porto beaucse it is within easy reach of almost all tourist attractions. We walked around all over Porto so we didn't need to take subway or bus. I strongly recommend this place who want to visit Porto

The house overall is pretty up to dated and clean.  And both Carlos and his wife did a very good job communicate with us.  The only disadvantage with the house is it is on the 3rd and without elevator, so it is pretty hard if you have some heavy luggage to carry.
This is the place to stay. Great welcome, super location and very clean. I would go back anytime.

where to start with this fantastic apartment? Maria and Carlos were highly organised and responsive, check in was easy, the location is absolutely fantastic (overlooking a nice park) and the apartment was a home away from home! 

great place!

Ótima hospedagem com excelente localização. Tem tudo por perto. 
Dicas de restaurantes tradicionais, exatamente como queríamos. 
Maravilhosa viagem!
Obrigado
A great spot! Super close to everything. The kitchen was well equipped and the apartment had cozy touches like blankets on the couch and Christmas decorations

El alojamiento está genial, muy bien ubicado en una zona tranquila pegada al centro y no lejos de la zona de Ribera. A 5min. andando tienes bares y restaurantes y la zona de la Torre de los clérigo, etc...Tiene de todo, viajamos dos personas y esta de más, creo que incluso 4 personas estarían bien. Se oyen algo los coches pero no hay casi tráfico delante de la casa. Un gran sitio para pasar unos días en Oporto

있을께 다 갖춰져 있습니다 위치도좋아서 대중교통없이도 명소들을 걸어다니기좋았습니다
호스트도친절합니다 내집같은분위기에 편한히  지낼수있었습니다

name: Large 2 Bedroom In Tour Des Canadiens
summary: • Beautiful Tour des Canadiens skyscraper complex. • Situated in the heart of Montreal right next to the Bell Center. • Considered as Montreal's 1st and only Sports and Entertainment Condominium.  • You will experience the local lifestyle all in luxury.  • Restaurants, bars and clubs are all mostly at walking distance. • Featuring an outdoor rooftop terrace with a pool • Party rooms, rain spa, a fitness center and more amenities. • Perfect for friends, families or corporate travellers!
space: • Fully furnished and well designed for you to live the high class dream!  • 2 Bedrooms - perfect for a family or friends! • Amazing view of Downtown Montreal • You will experience the local lifestyle all in luxury.  • Very high speed internet with Fiber optic cable. • Kindly note that you cannot exceed the number of guests allowed.
description: • Beautiful Tour des Canadiens skyscraper complex. • Situated in the heart of Montreal right next to the Bell Center. • Considered as Montreal's 1st and only Sports and Entertainment Condominium.  • You will experience the local lifestyle all in luxury.  • Restaurants, bars and clubs are all mostly at walking distance. • Featuring an outdoor rooftop terrace with a pool • Party rooms, rain spa, a fitness center and more amenities. • Perfect for friends, families or corporate travellers! • Fully furnished and well designed for you to live the high class dream!  • 2 Bedrooms - perfect for a family or friends! • Amazing view of Downtown Montreal • You will experience the local lifestyle all in luxury.  • Very high speed internet with Fiber optic cable. • Kindly note that you cannot exceed the number of guests allowed. • Full Access To Entire Place And All Listed Amenities • Swimming Pool • Sauna • Lounge Room • Gym • Game Room • Pool Room • Patio I am always ready to answer to any issues o
neighborhood_overview: • Downtown Montreal is a very touristic and exciting area full of excellent restaurants and shopping outlets.  • Walking distance from Crescent Street, where many bars and nightlife spots are located. • Right next to the Bell Centre, which is center stage for NHL games, concerts and other grand events.
notes: • Kitchen appliances, dishes, pots and pans, rapid boiling tea kettle, coffee maker (tea, coffee, sugar, salt and pepper) are all included. • All essentials included (towels, bed sheets etc.) • Private rooftop terrace is 1000 square foot with two outdoor fireplaces.
transit: • Minutes away from the airport. • Incredible ease of access via train, subway and bus stations. • Parking lots and corners scattered across the area. • Near a significant highway that connects you to other parts of the city.
access: • Full Access To Entire Place And All Listed Amenities • Swimming Pool • Sauna • Lounge Room • Gym • Game Room • Pool Room • Patio
interaction: I am always ready to answer to any issues or questions my guests might have via: • Airbnb App • Text Messages, (Hidden by Airbnb) , (Hidden by Airbnb) ( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: We would love our guests to keep the apartment in good standing and not to smoke indoors to avoid fees taken out of security deposit. Check in and check out times are 4PM and 11 AM. If you require an early check in/late check out, a charge of 50 $ will be added.

host.host_about:
I am an easy going person with a great passion for nature and travelling.. I love to be with and around people, I think I can learn something new from every person I meet.. I am curious to explore other cultures and ways of life..
currently I live in Montreal but have visited many places when I got the chance.

reviews.comments: great in every way possible

name: Stunning Beachside Studio Unit  on Bondi Beach
summary: Gorgeous  ground floor 36 sq metre studio on Bondi Beach. Newly renovated with a queen size wallbed, new mattress and built in wardrobe for a versatile living area. Designer kitchen with full fridge and all cooking utensils.Beautiful bathroom with full size tub and shower rose over bath. Fabulous common rooftop with views.A perfect base to enjoy the delights of Bondi Beach and sightseeing in Sydney. Public transport at door,with buses running regularly to Bondi Junction Station and into the CBD.
space: Enjoy an enviable lifestyle with Bondi Beach as your backyard. Two parks on either side to enjoy picnics, sunrises and sunsets.Start the day with a morning dip whilst admiring an amazing sunrise.Enjoy a swim in the Icebergs pool ( $7 visitors entry includes sauna) and  have breakfast overlooking the beach.Take a stroll on the promenade  and enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner at the many cafes and restaurants .Fully furnished with hotel quality bed linen and towels, queen sized wall bed with new mattress easily folds away for a versatile living area ( or leave down as the unit is large enough).Lovely Futon Sofa Bed.Dining table seats 4. Smart TV. Common shared laundry on 1st floor. Fabulous common rooftop with BBQ and ocean views. Internal lift in the building but the unit is conveniently located on the ground floor.The unit faces Campbell Parade so does not have an ocean view, but the view is right there when you walk out the door. Wi Fi included. We want our guests to be comfortable and
description: Gorgeous  ground floor 36 sq metre studio on Bondi Beach. Newly renovated with a queen size wallbed, new mattress and built in wardrobe for a versatile living area. Designer kitchen with full fridge and all cooking utensils.Beautiful bathroom with full size tub and shower rose over bath. Fabulous common rooftop with views.A perfect base to enjoy the delights of Bondi Beach and sightseeing in Sydney. Public transport at door,with buses running regularly to Bondi Junction Station and into the CBD. Enjoy an enviable lifestyle with Bondi Beach as your backyard. Two parks on either side to enjoy picnics, sunrises and sunsets.Start the day with a morning dip whilst admiring an amazing sunrise.Enjoy a swim in the Icebergs pool ( $7 visitors entry includes sauna) and  have breakfast overlooking the beach.Take a stroll on the promenade  and enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner at the many cafes and restaurants .Fully furnished with hotel quality bed linen and towels, queen sized wall bed with new m
neighborhood_overview: Bondi Beach is a melting pot of cultures, with a relaxed yet Vibrant energy.All amenities are within an easy walk, and there are lots of fabulous restaurants and bars.There is a Woolworths, IGA and Harris Farm Markets within walking distance.Bondi Beach has been voted one of the most beautiful beaches in the world and only 10 km to the CBD.
notes: The unit is on the ground floor and does not have an ocean view but the view is right there as soon as you walk out the door! Parking is not included but there may be an available spot in the building for $25 per night, please ask in advance . Beach Parking Permits might be available at $15 per day, please ask in advance.You really don't need a car in Bondi as the Public Transport system is so easy.Public transport with bus stop 20 metres away, buses run regularly to Bondi Junction Station, the CBD and Circular Quay where you can take the ferry around beautiful Sydney Harbour.
transit: Located right on Bondi Beach and a 1 minute walk to the cafes,shops and restaurants of vibrant Bondi Village.Public transport right at the front door with buses running regularly into Bondi Junction and the CBD. You really don't need a car in Bondi as the Buses are so regular and public transport in Sydney is very easy. On street  and Beach parking permits might be available at $15 per day, these are rare so please ask in advance.
access: Entire Apartment, Building is security access. Common Internal Laundry. Common Rooftop Terrace overlooking the beach.
interaction: We live on the other end of Bondi Beach and are only a phone call away if our guests require assistance. We look forward to hosting you and will do everything to ensure you have a wonderful stay.
house_rules: Please be careful of our new kitchen Bench tops and use cutting boards supplied. Use pull out range hood when cooking.Please hang wet towels on the bathroom hooks behind the bathroom door.If using the sofa bed please use mattress protector and linens on top shelf of wardrobe.Please be careful not to lose swipe cards as these cost $100 . Lost keys or swipe cards will need to be deducted from the damage deposit. Please close window when you go out and turn off all electrical appliances. Please no high heels on the wooden floors.Please swim between the flags on the beach as currents and waves can be strong and we want you to be safe. Maximum of 3 people thank you.

host.host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about:
I live in Bondi Beach with my husband Johnny and our beloved Maltese Max. Having lived in Bondi Beach for 35 years I am a true local and love welcoming our guests to this wonderful part of the World.I have a Media Buying agency and work from home.We enjoy traveling, exploring new places and having adventures. We love good food, snorkeling and anything to do with the ocean. Peace and serenity are important to me.I believe in being thankful and making the most of everyday. 
Life is Beautiful!

reviews.comments:
I loved staying at this adorable apartment. 
The location is amazing, literally metres to the beach and handy to everything. The apartment is modern, clean and very well equipped, I had everything I needed for a perfect getaway in Bondi.
The bed was super comfortable and the kitchen and bathroom are immaculate.
But the best part was waking up, walking outside and having gorgeous Bondi Beach at my doorstep.
Heavenly! Thank you Natasha, I will be back.

Stunning apartment in a perfect location. Right next to Bondi Beach and easy access to everything you need. Apartment was totally kitted our. And the hosts were extremely accommodating. Would definitely stay again.

This is the perfect location in Bondi! If this apartment is available for your chosen dates I highly recommend it. Beautiful space, perfectly clean, incredible location, rooftop with a view of the beach and Bondi Icebergs - everything you could possibly need. Natasha could not have done more for us, going above and beyond as our host and her local insights meant we had the best recommendations for Bondi and throughout Sydney. I will definitely stay here again on my next trip to Bondi! Thanks Natasha :)

Natasha was extremely helpful and responsive to any communication. 
When we arrived there were thoughtful touches such as fresh flowers and a lovely bottle of chilled wine.
The apartment had everything we needed and was comfortable and very clean.
Natasha offered good advice about the area and local amenities and restaurants. 
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and found the apartment to be in an excellent position for visiting Bondi, catching buses and eating out.
The only slight negative about our stay was the noise from traffic and other residents chatting in the corridor early in the mornings which made earplugs necessary- however we realise you can’t have the convenience of being near to a bus stop and amenities without hearing the traffic noise!
Lovely apartment and perfect location, Natasha was very kind. I highly recommend this place

Great location 
Great host
Great town
The place was an AMAZING location! Natasha gave some great local tips and made check in/checkout seamless. Would HIGHLY recommend.

Great host that is hospitable and caring.  Place is nice, clean, fully equipped, and conveniently located.  Prompt responses and wanted to check up on my status. Very important for solo travelers. Great price for location.  When in bondi, stay at natasha's studio.
Jason
Amazing location and Natasha was the perfect host.  Showed me around, left me some food and a bottle of wine... couldn't ask for any more.  I'll be back.

Natasha was an exceptional host and we really enjoyed our stay! The place was stylish, metres from the beach and very cozy. Natasha did a fantastic job at communicating with us, she helped us find the best restaurants, bars, must see spots and was a wonderful host. I would absolutely recommend Natasha’s suite - it was perfect!
Lovely host. Thanks for a great stay!

Place is in amazing location, right near the beach and the many cafes, restaurants and bars nearby. The perfect place for a getaway. Natasha was incredibly friendly and helpful and made the process smooth from start to finish. Highly recommend!
Natasha was an excellent host, and exceeded our expectations and provided a great start to our stay with nice little touches! Would definitely recommend this place to friends

Natasha and Johnny made our stay so easy. The place was immaculate and the location is epic! 
Very easy to communicate with and the little extra touches didn't go unnoticed. Thanks again,  we will definitely be back!

We stayed in this lovely apartment for one week and had a fantastic time! Natasha is a wonderful host, welcomed us with a bottle of wine, shared a lot of recommendations for restaurant and activities with us and was always very responsive. The apartment has a perfect location right next to the bondi beach. There is also a rooftop with a fantastic view and the bus station to the city center is just in front of the apartment. The apartment itself is very modern, cozy and you feel at home. It has a perfect size for two people. We will definitely stay there again if we get back to Bondi Beach. Highly recommended.

Natasha was an incredible host. Her apartment sits in the heart of Bondi, its walking distance to the beach, shops and restaurants. Not only that the hospitality provided by Natasha was outstanding. The room was spotless clean and we were gifted a bottle of champagne upon arrival. Natasha even bought our fur baby a chew toy for his stay. I highly recommend airbnbing with Natasha she’s wonderful.
Very nice apartment, very well located, we recommend it!!!!
Outstanding location. Was a real treat to experience Bondi Beach this way. Highly recommend.

Great little pad in a truly sensational location, very clean, has everything you need. It was smaller than expected, and it's on the ground floor which means the window looks out on to the main road. A little noisy at night (backpackers opposite) and you can hear the early risers rushing down to the beach, but it's not too bad. All in all very good!

Natasha was a great host. She stayed up extra late on Friday evening to greet us on arrival from the airport and to show us around the apartment.  Was happy to give us some local info before arriving and put us in contact with hair dressers etc for a wedding. Also loved the wine and food left for us on arrival. Also the biggest sell point is the LOCATION. 1 minute from the beach. 10/10 would recommend and stay again!
Cute little studio apt at the beginning of Bondi Beach. Great food around!

Natasha's place is in a great location, just steps from Bondi Beach and the Icebergs pool. The apartment was clean and it had all the amenities we needed. The air conditioner was a bit noisy but it worked well. The Murphy bed was very comfortable. 

There were laundry machines in the building but you needed to pay to use them. 

Natasha put together a very informative local guide book and she passed along unused transit passes that were left behind by her previous guests. Natasha is a kind and flexible host. She let us check in a bit early and met us at the apartment to explain everything we needed to know. She responded promptly to all messaging.

My only criticism of Natasha's place is that it was on the ground floor right beside a very busy sidewalk. The only window faced the sidewalk, which afforded absolutely no privacy if the curtains were left open. This is just simply the design of the apartment, not much that can be done. However, if you can find reasonably priced accommodation  that faces the ocean or is on a higher floor it may be worth spending the extra money for the scenic views and added privacy.

name: Studio in the heart of Soho
summary: In the heart of Soho with plenty of restaurants and bars just steps from the building . It is a perfect location for visiting Central: 2 minutes to MTR station, 1 minute to Central escalator, fresh market/groceries just meters away.
space: The entire apartment is available until September since my son is studying abroad. This studio has a separate queen size bed, storage (wardrobes), a small kitchenette (Nespresso machine, microwave, fridge and freezer), just renovated bathroom, high speed wifi, Bose bluethoot speakers, 35" Tv with Netflix.
description: In the heart of Soho with plenty of restaurants and bars just steps from the building . It is a perfect location for visiting Central: 2 minutes to MTR station, 1 minute to Central escalator, fresh market/groceries just meters away. The entire apartment is available until September since my son is studying abroad. This studio has a separate queen size bed, storage (wardrobes), a small kitchenette (Nespresso machine, microwave, fridge and freezer), just renovated bathroom, high speed wifi, Bose bluethoot speakers, 35" Tv with Netflix. Guest can access the entire apartment and all amenities in it I usually am in Hong Kong and my office is very near by the place. I will complete the check-in and check-out. The neighborhood is vibrant and plenty of caffeteria, restaurants, curios, accessories and art galleries. host.host_about: Architects and furniture manufacturers for the hotel industry , we live in Asia from the student's years.. Our home is Hong Kong and the SE Asia : our places are available when we are away , since quite often in  China and Middle East.  We looking forward in your visit at this exciting cities.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: This is a really good place and Cesare always reply quickly.

Cesare's place is perfectly located in the heart of central, yet it's very quiet at night at the same time. We also enjoyed the artsiness of the decor and coziness of the room. The communication was great and smooth, and Cesare has made everything easy for us! Will definitely come back next time!
great location, nice little flat
Great location and comfortable, everything is around: mtr, seven eleven, shops and few streets further is lan Kwuai Fong, a place with many bars and clubs. Caesare answered all my question very fast.
Awesome location. I’d highly recommend this place. Friendly owner as well!
Great small flat in Central. Accurate description and quick responses from host.
Great communication. Very central location.
great place, situated in the heart of hong kong. you can walk just about everywhere in central from here. a little difficult to find but otherwise good place with all the basic needs available

Perfect location. Near to MTR. Clean and comfortable room. Air conditioner may be a little bit noisy the first day but we didn’t think so the next day. It would be a nice choice to live if you want to explore hk.

Good price, very clean, perfect location (realy - very convinient).  Kitchin facility is basic but you don't need to cook - a lot of meal around for any price. Cesaro was  friendly, answered immediatly, all my issues was solved very quickly.
Perfect location, easy to find and access.  Hosts responded quickly.  Perfect little place for the week to enjoy Hong Kong - highly recommended
I was in HK for a week of meetings and the home was ideal- conveniently located and seamless check in. Great communication and helpful hosts.
Great place in a great location.  Would definitely stay again.
Wonderful stay and such a great location! 100% staying again when I’m back in Hong Kong.
It’s a great location and the space is beautiful. Everything was clean and pretty spacious for Hong Kong. We had a great time and recommend this place!

had a lovely stay here. host was very quick to communicate with any qestions i had. easy check in and check out, great location. and after a long day of siteseeing was able to watch some movies on primevideo. would recommend.

This is a small but functional apartment with a great location in the middle of soho. It’s a walking distance to everything within the city Centre, which we really appretiated. Can recommend this Place to anyone looking for an affordable place to stay in Hong Kong!

Highly recommended-location is 10 minute walk to Lan Kwai Fong (popular drinking destination) and surrounded by highly-rated food (street and sit-down options) as well as cute boutiques. Building is clean and room is as pictured: bright and neat. Cesare and Stefano are very responsive and kind; they allowed me to check-in early and check-out late due to my travel logistics. One of my best AirBnB experiences and I would definitely stay here again.

Well located near Central and Soho.  Very clean, comfortable and compact. Bathroom facilities ok but small shower in corner of bathroom with  limited hot water and no hot water in kitchen or bathroom basin.  Kitchen is a sink, microwave, toasty maker, kettle,  fridge and coffee maker but no hot plates for cooking. Comfortable bed.  When we booked the  listing included free breakfast, microwave and Bose stereo, none of which were provided but a microwave did arrive after 5 days.  This is a secure building with a lift in a quiet street with quite a few restaurants in same street and hundreds nearby.  A good place for a base to explore Hong Kong Island.

Amazing location with so many amenities nearby! Good sized apartment by HK standards and very clean. Only downside was the blinds seemed to be broken and unable to shut all the way so quite a bit of light in the mornings. Bring a sleeping mask :)
非常好的体验!!下次再约这一间

Absolutely loved my stay here at Cesare's! The apartment is great, and the location is absolutely perfect. Neat and clean. In Sheung-Wan close to the metro. Next time I'm coming to Hong Kong, I'll definitely try and book this place again. If there are any problems, Cesare is quick to respond. 5 stars for sure

name: Piso 3 habitaciones con encanto en Fuente Mágica
summary: Amueblado y con encanto al lado de Plaza España y Fuente Mágica para media/larga estancia. Muy bien comunicado:2 minutos del metro L1 y L3 lo que permite llegar al centro en 10 minutos. Hay autobuses que van al aeropuerto y al hospital de Bellvitge (MIR). La estación de tren Sants está a 10 minutos caminando. Tiene 3 habitaciones exteriores(1 doble) y está nuevo para entrar a vivir. Excelente para aquellos que necesiten estar una estancia por trabajo, estudiar o MIR y con todas las comodidades.
space: El alojamiento tiene 3 habitaciones exteriores :1 de matrimonio con armarios grandes empotrados, otra  con cama que puede convertirse en doble y con armarios empotrados, y la tercera destinada para estudio u otras cosas. Cuenta con cocina office americana completamente equipada con horno, microondas, lavaplatos y lavadora. Hay un baño con ducha perfectamente decorado. El piso es de diseño y cuenta con luces indirectas que lo hacen más cconfortable. Tiene vistas a Montjuic (concretamente al palacio del museo nacional de arte de Cataluña) donde se puede ver desde el salón y balcón. Está muy bien comunicado al estar situado a 2 minutos caminando de plaza España.  Metro línea 1 y 3 que permiten llegar al centro en 8 minutos (caminando son 20 minutos). Además existen autobuses en la misma gran via que llevan directamente al aeropuerto permitiendo estar céntrico pero con acceso fácil a este. Otros que llevan al hospital de Bellvitge (ideal para los que cursen el MIR). La estación de tren de

neighborhood_overview: Es una barrio tranquilo, permite tener las ventanas abiertas, pero a la vez céntrico, con todos los servicios disponibles (metro, atubús,supermercado, centro comercial las arenas,  gimnasios, etc..) Además estás al lado De la Fuente mágica por si te apetece pasear por esta idílica zona, como por Montjuic, para los que les gusta correr o pasear es ideal. También cuentas con servicio de bicing a 2 minutos.
house_rules: - Adecuado para quienes vengan por trabajo una larga estancia - Adecuado para estudiantes de MIR - Adecuado para estudiantes - Adecuado para azafatas

name: Beachside studio in idealic Bronte
summary: Private studio with separate entrance located walking distance to the best beaches in Sydney.  Just 500m from Bronte / Tamarrama beaches and a short distance from iconic Bondi Beach. This is the ideal base to explore the best of Sydney. The self contained studio has luxurious hotel quality queen size mattress, TV, wifi, kitchenette (no stove) and bathroom. You have your own private entry via rear lane way. Choice of beachside cafes located at Bronte Beach.
description: Private studio with separate entrance located walking distance to the best beaches in Sydney.  Just 500m from Bronte / Tamarrama beaches and a short distance from iconic Bondi Beach. This is the ideal base to explore the best of Sydney. The self contained studio has luxurious hotel quality queen size mattress, TV, wifi, kitchenette (no stove) and bathroom. You have your own private entry via rear lane way. Choice of beachside cafes located at Bronte Beach.
house_rules: HOUSE RULES DOOR LOCK: Please keep the code in a safe place and do not share with anyone else. SMOKING: Being a family home, we have a NO SMOKING policy. So, if you could please not smoke or make use of any drugs in or around the property it would be appreciated. We also ask that you do not light any incense or anything else that could leave the accommodation with a lasting smell UNREGISTERED GUESTS: Visitors or guests that are not currently booked or do not have a confirmed reservation, are not allowed in the studio. We ask that you kindly respect that Rule. Please only bring in guests that have booked to stay. Unregistered guests are unfortunately not welcome SECURITY: To ensure full safety of our guest’s belongings, we ask that you please make sure the studio door is locked when you enter and leave the property. Whilst being in a really safe area, we want to ensure every guest stay remains problem free, and this is just one small and simple thing we’re able to do to ensure that. BAT

reviews.comments: Vivian's loft apartment is perfectly located, close to great coffee spots and transport. Ten minutes from the beach and the stunning Bronte to Bondi coastal walk- not to be missed. The apartment has beautiful fixtures, a fantastic bed and a great shower. We would definitely stay at Viv's again, she was a generous and helpful host.

Vivians little place is A+++. It has all you need without the expense of staying in the city.  The bus and train stations are close by if you want to venture to the city.  
The space is clean, fresh and beautiful.

Vivian's place is lovely :) The apartment is stylish and really beautifully appointed. Everything is new and shiny! Vivian was responsive and lovely to deal with. Anything I needed, she followed up. It was a good location and close to the beautiful Bronte Beach and public transport. It was a really great experience staying at Vivian's place, I thoroughly recommend it to others!
Vivian’s place is a homely beautifully styled studio and I couldn’t have felt more comfortable. She is super easy to get in touch with and happy to help anyway she can. Highly recommend her place!

Vivian’s place is beautiful, clean, fresh, welcoming and secure.
The bed is extremely comfortable with 1000 count sheets making it feel very luxurious. The place is literally a 10 minute walk through the park to the beach. Gorgeous walks, great cafes - totally recommend! Vivian was a generous host.
Vivian’s place was lovely and cosy! Only a short walk down to Bronte beach!  She was a great host with quick responses and very helpful.

Vivian’s place is great. Stylish, comfortable and extremely clean. The location is perfect for activities in the eastern suburbs. Vivian’s communication was excellent and check in and out was super easy.

Loved staying here, great location and amazing space. Has everything you need, Vivienne was quick to respond to any questions and the place has great amenities. Would definitely recommend to friends and stay again.

I absolutely loved my (Email hidden by Airbnb) pletely private, super clean, the comfiest bed ever, a little kitchenette - nothing more to ask for here. 

Vivian took my booking last minute, accommodated my check in and was such a pleasure to deal with. I can't wait to come back! x

Vivian's place is perfect! Next to the beach and super clean.
I loved!
Small but clean and modern space in great location.
A great second stay in this comfortable studio. Communication and cleanliness were superb.
This studio is wonderful and we hope to be back soon! It is super clean and stylish and in a great location!
깔끔하고 아늑한 집이었습니다. 브론테비치와 걸어서 10분거리에 있어서 산책하기에도 좋은 위치에 있습니다. 5분정도 거리의 버스정류장에서 본다이정션까지  바로가는 버스도 있습니다.

The studio is very comfortable, clean,
private and easy to check in. 

The location is great, an easy walk to Bronte Beach and Vivian even provided beach towels to use. 

It was a great please spend a weekend in Sydney and would happily stay again

Pictures don't do it justice; a really beautiful space with your own private entrance and all the touches of home comforts! Could not recommend Vivian and Patrick more- easy instructions and lots of privacy.  You will not be disappointed!!
Clean, modern & nice place.
good place
excellent location in a compact studio, all required for a few days by the beach
The perfect spot to do coastal walks and chill at the beach. The perfect studio to escape from Sydney city life  but easily accessible too! Best of both worlds :)
Perfect location and so easy to get to Bondi. Great value for money!

Great comfortable bed and great touches such as a beach bag and towels! The studio is very modern and has a great shower also. The keyless entry was very easy to use and made the check in process very stress free. Would stay again.
I loved staying in this apartment. Everything was just superb. I’d definitely come back :)
A fabulous small and compact studio in a great location for the eastern superb beach life

Vivian’s place was wonderful. We stayed there after a conference, and wanted to be in walking distance to the beach. The studio flat is perfect for two, with all the amenities, and extra touches like coffee, milk, hair dryer, beach towels and nice linens and toiletries. 

Vivian also offered us a late checkout and did her best for an early one but we didn’t end up needing it.

Her place is a short 7-8 minute walk downhill through a park to the quieter Bronte beach. It’s also about a 30 minute walk along the coastal cliffs to Bondi. 

All in all it was exactly what what we wanted and we wish we could have stayed longer.
Great cosy spot near one of Sydney’s great beaches.
Vivian’s place was modern, well furnished and clean! Great location, thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Absolutely adored Vivian's place! Amazing location, loved the beach bag and towels, the good reviews are very well deserved. Can't wait to come back!

Great location, within walking distance to the beaches. Stylish place with house inspo with the finishing touches to their styling. Easy self check in which was convenient after getting delayed coming in. Recommend Vivian’s place for a weekend get away!
Beautiful studio in a great location.  Vivian was incredibly communicative and helpful in arranging my stay.
Lovely space, well appointed, great location
Lovely spot & easy to get to the city by Bus and Train if you need.
Small but very stylish and clean. Great for one person or a couple. 15 min walk to the beach and off street parking available 100-200m away (free and untimed).
This place is just perfect, and the location is amazing! If you’re thinking of booking then do it! Thanks again so much for the stay Viv
Charming little space with modern touches within walking distance off all the beaches. Great host, even shared a Christmas gift as we stayed through the holiday! Would recommend.

What an amazing place to stay in one of the most beautiful areas of Sydney. Right from the start I was greeted with amazing hospitality, an extremely clean (and new) space, and every little touch you could imagine already accounted for. Vivian was so responsive and even checked in to make sure things were fine. The place was very comfortable (for two), well laid out and in a location that couldn't be any better if you like heading out to the beach and the surrounding areas. I primarily travelled with Uber Pool, but it was also very close in terms of public transportation options. Loved the beach towels and beach bag and the brand new shower. Air conditioner worked fantastic. Wi-Fi and internet was great. Overall would stay here again in a heart beat, thanks for the great stay!
Excellent location, great value and the beach towels and beach bag addition were great
Within walking distance to the beach, this sparkling clean studio was perfect for our stay in Bronte.

We really enjoyed our stay. Such a cute house and so clean! Vivian is a great host. Quick response and easy access to the place. A quick walk to the beautiful Tamarama Beach. There’s a great cafe just around the corner. Can’t wait to go back!
Stayed for a weekend and everything from check in to location and walkability of the area was perfect. Great spot for solo or a couple to spend a weekend.

Comfortable and clean studio, really handy for a short stay in Sydney! Walking to the beach and shops is so easy from here and it really helped having aircon. Would definitely stay here again. Vivian was a great host and really easy to get hold of for any queries we had :)
fantastic studio in a convenient location
This place checked all the boxes for me: flexible checkin/out, great AC, great location, responsive hosts and a clean space. Bonus! It was cute. Will definitely be back.
Perfect place to stay! Great location, perfect apartment, very cosy bed! Definitely would recommend.
Very clean, well situated, easy to access. Hope to come again.
Lovely fitout in a very convenient location
Beautiful studio with thoughtful touches! Very central to multiple beautiful beaches! We enjoyed our relaxing weekend on the coast and Viv was a great host!

I stayed 4 nights at Vivian's, the location was perfectly located 5mins of the best Sydney beaches. The studio was pristine fitted with everything I needed. The day I arrived there was a mini glitch with the door system, 5mins after my call, Patrick came over and fix it. Definitely a place to stay for few days !

Great access to the beach.
Very comfortable unit

Vivian’s place was exactly as advertised. Well located, cosy yet spacious, comfortable, and with a lot of thoughtful extra touches. Perfect place to stay when you want to experience the most iconic beaches of Sydney.

Vivian's place was perfect for my parents stay in Bronte. It was beautifully presented, very clean and in a great location for exploring the beaches. The use of space and private entrance were great. I would highly recommend this air bnb.

name: Garden Small Village
summary: Moradia Graciosa e singular T1 duplex em Santo Ovídio em vila Nova de Gaia junto ao Metro. totalmente restaurada, como nova, completamente mobilada e equipada. No R/ch temos sala, cozinha e pequeno espaço exterior, no piso superior o quarto com casa de banho completa. Decoração muito cosy para que os nossos hospedes se sintam muito bem!
description: Moradia Graciosa e singular T1 duplex em Santo Ovídio em vila Nova de Gaia junto ao Metro. totalmente restaurada, como nova, completamente mobilada e equipada. No R/ch temos sala, cozinha e pequeno espaço exterior, no piso superior o quarto com casa de banho completa. Decoração muito cosy para que os nossos hospedes se sintam muito bem! Se necessitarem de alguma coisa estarei sempre disponível para o ajudar. A casa está inserida num largo muito simpático e agradável. Tem um jardim com um parque infantil mesmo em frente a casa. Está rodeada de comércio, restaurantes e serviços. A 5 minutos da casa existe a estação de metro de Santo Ovídeo que o leva até ao centro do Porto. A casa está muito bem situada.
neighborhood_overview: A casa está inserida num largo muito simpático e agradável. Tem um jardim com um parque infantil mesmo em frente a casa. Está rodeada de comércio, restaurantes e serviços.

interaction: Se necessitarem de alguma coisa estarei sempre disponível para o ajudar.

name: Very bright Studio, downtown Montreal with view.
summary: Studio de coin entièrement fenêtré avec magnifique vue sur la ville. Très comfortable en plein coeur du Centre-Ville de Montréal, distance à pied du métro et  tous les services. Dans un building avec portier 24h/piscine intérieure sur le toit et garage. Le stationnement est en sus à 20$/jour.
description: Studio de coin entièrement fenêtré avec magnifique vue sur la ville. Très comfortable en plein coeur du Centre-Ville de Montréal, distance à pied du métro et  tous les services. Dans un building avec portier 24h/piscine intérieure sur le toit et garage. Le stationnement est en sus à 20$/jour. The key will be with the 24/7 doorman in an envelope under your name.
interaction: The key will be with the 24/7 doorman in an envelope under your name.

reviews.comments:
Très beau logement, conforme à l'annonce, avec une belle vue sur la ville, un accès à une salle de sport, une piscine et un sauna.  A 2 pas du mont Royal et proche du centre ville.
Propre, lumineux.
Un seul petit regret: l'absence de réponse de l'hôte aux messages (ce qui m'a poussé jusqu'à annuler puis à reprendre après réception de la réponse). Aucun regret d'avoir repris, au contraire. 
Je recommande ce logement, sans hésitation.
Great place to stay, view is absolutely stunning! I love that the place is so bright and well lit. Would definitely recommend for the price point!

The apartment is exactly as describe. Bright, very clean, tidy and has everything one needs along with all amenities including a comfortable bed. The location is perfect. The metro station, restaurants, café, groceries and downtown are just few minutes away. Happy experience, I will definitely come back!
Nice place

Carole's place is the perfect spot for a Montreal getaway. It's in a great location where you can walk everywhere and the concierge were all so friendly! It has stellar views of the city from the room plus from the roof top terrace and pool which was a real treat. The apartment was also very clean and it doesn't look like anyone lives there so felt more like a hotel rather than being in someone else's living space which was nice

This apartment is lovely and spacious for a studio, and a steal for the location as well! I was in town for an event at McGill and it was super convenient to stay at Carole's place. Everything worked perfectly, and the doormen/women were helpful and kind. There were also at least 2 convenience stores close by, in case you forgot any toiletries like I did. Carole was also very responsive when I had small questions and flexible with the check-in time. Would highly recommend!

Great value! 
Clean and great location. 
We weren’t able to get the wifi working. 
Could use another mirror. 
Definitely would stay again
And parking ended up being free
This place was bight and cute and in a very convenient location to downtown. Loved it and would definitely stay here again!
Nice place with an amazing view! In a great location!!
Nice place, nice building. Close to McGill and S-te Catherine street. Only unpleasant detail: the concierge didn't have the key prepared for my check-in (10-15 min. delay).
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great location and friendly doormen/woman. The views from all windows of the apartment are fantastic. The place is close to Mont Royal, minutes walk from McGill main campus.
Carole’s place is clean, spacious and comfortable. It’s very close to McGill and the downtown core with lots of shops and restaurants nearby. Excellent value in the heart of the city!
Very clean place in a great location. Carole was very quick to answer questions we had.
Great place, great location. Can get around to anywhere downtown from this place easily. Staff in the building are very nice
Very nice

Grand studio très très propre et agencé avec beaucoup de classe et de goût. Mieux qu'à l'hôtel! Petites attentions de la propriétaire. Place de parc à disposition en bas de l'immeuble et gardien (24/24h). Piscine couverte au sommet de l'immeuble et terrasse: que demander de plus! Parfait!
位置很好,有免费停车位,大堂有服务人员,房间视野很好,明亮｡

Très beau séjour. Le studio est bien situé, très  lumineux, propre et plusieurs commodités possibles (stationnement, salle d'entraînement, piscine). 
Je recommande fortement !!
Great location I would like to come back again
Place was everything we were expecting and more, would definitely stay here again!

Die Lage ist sehr zentral, nur ein paar Gehminuten von der gößten Shoppingstraße entfernt. Es gibt im Erdgeschoß einen Portier, der sehr freundlich ist und rund um die Uhr für einen da ist. Die Wohnung ist ideal für ein Pärchen und am Dach gibt es auch noch gratis Fitnessstudio, Sauna und Schwimmbad!!!
Awesome place, close to everything, clean, quiet and friendly staff. Parking was great too.

Carol's place exceeded my expectations.  The place looks better than the pictures and was extremely comfortable as well as spacious.  I would not hesitate to book this space if I were you.  P.S. great views of Parc Du Mont Royal from the upstairs pool.

Todo estuvo muy bien, el apartamento es precioso, súper limpio y muy cómodo. Muy cerca del centro y la atención del conserje impecable, pero eché de menos respuestas por parte de la anfitriona a preguntas sobre el check in y la disponibilidad para guardar las maletas durante el día hasta el momento de entrar. No hubo comunicación fluida aunque sí me indicó cómo conseguir las llaves del apartamento.
The place is very well located and the space is very accurate to the pictures. We stayed only 1 night but would stay again there
We had a great time in Montreal and Carole’s place was very clean, everything was well organised and ready for our arrival. The gym and swimming pool with view was a nice touch! Perfect location too.
lovely apartment, very well furnished
A+

We had a great stay at Carole's apartment. 
Good 
- great central location to downtown MTL
- Clean
- Comfy bed
- Carole is very responsive

Could be better
- There was no soap or toilet paper when we arrived. I notified Carole and she was reachable right away. Luckily she had extra supplies in a nearby unit so I was able to restock our place. 
- The place was a bit cold because the heating unit was off. We had to leave it on the whole time to keep the place some what warm.
- Apartment overall was a bit dated

Overall we enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend it to anyone else. We didn't stay long at the apartment and just needed a place to sleep so the dated look and temperature of the apartment wasn't a big deal.

Great value!

The building is an amazing area for food and shopping. The balcony has a nice street view & the space inside is adorable. 
Would book with Carole again for another trip.
Très joli appartement, idéalement situé, non loin de la rue Sainte Catherine et très bien équipé. Nous y avons passé un très agréable moment.
Great location! The WiFi did not work for us but it wasn’t a big deal.  Great view of the city and parking was very convenient.  Very clean as well.

name: HOMESTAY NEAR MONTREAL AIRPORT
summary: Quiet home, near Airport, Good for 1-4 persons. Close to all.......5 mins walk to bus #208, 20 mins walk to Sunnybrook train station, 20 mins drive to Montreal Airport, Via-Rail & Downtown. Highway 13, 20 & 40 nearby. Park, Grocery, Pharmacy, Hindu & Sikh Temple walking distance. Nice & Quiet neighborhood ! Vegetarian food on request.
description: Quiet home, near Airport, Good for 1-4 persons. Close to all.......5 mins walk to bus #208, 20 mins walk to Sunnybrook train station, 20 mins drive to Montreal Airport, Via-Rail & Downtown. Highway 13, 20 & 40 nearby. Park, Grocery, Pharmacy, Hindu & Sikh Temple walking distance. Nice & Quiet neighborhood ! Vegetarian food on request.
house_rules: - No shoes in the house. No smoking, no parties, no events, no noise pls. - Respect people in the house & neighborhood. No pets pls. - Only light cooking in the shared kitchen. - As a courtesy, pls wash your dishes, leave sink & kitchen counter clean after use. - No alcohol or drugs in or around the house. - Restrict your shower to maximum 10 mins so that there is enough hot water for other guests. - For Hygeine & sanitation reasons, pls don't keep your luggage on beds. Don't drag on the floors pls. DO NOT HESITATE to approach host, if any problem occurs. - Thank you for choosig to stay with us. - Pls don't consume food or beverage in the rooms. Enjoy your meals in dining area.

host.host_about: I am sociable & a good host. I am an educated, professional & semi retired lady. I love my family and friends. I am well travelled and well informed. I consider myself a spiritual person. Love to cook. I am very sensitive to human needs. I would love to help people if I can.

reviews.comments: Clean and comfortable room

The host was very accommodating and extremely sweet. She took great care of us. The room that we stayed in looked amazing and was clean until we looked behind the bed. There was a lot of dust or sawdust .. not sure which and unfortunately my nephew got allergies as he is allergic to dust. The home needs a bit of TLC. The bathroom was also not in a great shape, there was a hole where the toilet paper role was but it got fixed the very next day, which was great. The unfortunate part is that we didn't realize it was a shared bathroom with other guests which was quite annoying as we are quite picky people . It is mentioned under house rules that it is a  shared bathroom. I wish this was written upfront on the summary page. Also whenever we wanted to go back to the house we had to call the host as we did not have the keys. The host was very accommodating but we felt bad going late. Once again the host was amazing very patient and nice but some things in the house were lacking.
가격 대비 별로~~~
Feel like home

Room was okay but too much chaos. host advised privacy but there was constant interference. Air conditioning in the room was leaking and host advised to keep checking so we had to keep an all night to see for water leak. I was conjusted and the value we paid was not even 1% worth what we got. I wont suggest if you are looking something clean and private o lying suitable for a ghetto place. Host was good and responsive but the place didnt do justice.

name: Trendy and cosy apartment with bay views!
summary: Sydney's trendiest neighbourhood, cafes at your doorstep! Minutes walk from kings cross station, recently renovated and with a balcony that has bay views. You’ll love this place!
space: The open-plan living/dining area is exposed to all day sunlight. You can open the balcony door to extend the living room area, connecting it to the balcony for you to enjoy the fresh air and an outdoor chill without getting out of the apartment.
description: Sydney's trendiest neighbourhood, cafes at your doorstep! Minutes walk from kings cross station, recently renovated and with a balcony that has bay views. You’ll love this place! The open-plan living/dining area is exposed to all day sunlight. You can open the balcony door to extend the living room area, connecting it to the balcony for you to enjoy the fresh air and an outdoor chill without getting out of the apartment. One train stop and walking distance  from the city, and two stops from Bondi plus plenty of restaurants and cafes under 10min walk!
neighborhood_overview: One train stop and walking distance  from the city, and two stops from Bondi plus plenty of restaurants and cafes under 10min walk!

host.host_about: Lovely professional Sydney Sider

reviews.comments:
Perfect location with quite neighborhood also convenience to heart of city, airly living area and comfy room where I got quite nice rest.
Sarah is a considering host and easy to communicate, I had a great stay here!  Definitely recommend to people who like to have pravicy and also explore Sydney!
Nice place in a quaint neighborhood.
really nice place

Sarah’s place is in a very nice area, super convenient/ walking distance to the CBD. Lots of restaurants in close proximity. We mostly did our own thing, but Sarah also invited me to a dinner, which was thoughtful. We had a couple of miscommunications, but all worked out in the end. I probably had way too much baggage to stay here (including dive gear), but Sarah was accommodating, and this wouldn’t be an issue if you were traveling light (which I rarely do, due to the nature of my work).
Great place, great location, lovely host! Would stay again for sure!!

Great place for a stay, ideally located in Elizabeth Bay, 10 min walk to King Kross and shops. Sarah is very reactive and nice. The room is light, very comfortable and clean. 
I recommend it.
Sarah was a very easy host to stay with. she was great at communicating and was very mindful about helping me whenever possible!
Pleasure to stay with Sarah after arriving from Ireland to begin my move to Sydney.  Really nice apartment, great service, helpful tips & friendly demeanour. Would highly recommend.
Great spot, wonderful host.  I would love to stay again.
Clean and quiet place as described.
i liked my stay. the location was great between King Cross and a beautiful park along Elizabeth bay. Sarah was friendly and helped me when i had to check in earlier and check out later.

name: ANITAHOUSE

host.host_about:
Ola sou o Luis  tenho 39 anos .Tenho duas habitações onde prezo pela higiene e decoração.
adoro receber hospedes conhecer suas origens ,tirar qualquer duvida   que os hospedes tenham...tento dar as melhores ferias .

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal
address.government_area: Santa Marinha e São Pedro da Afurada

reviews.comments:
Encontramos un alojamiento precioso y cómodo en una zona en la que era fácil aparcar con todo lo necesario para una aloja miento cómodo y cerca de sitios para comer o cenar como el Dom Gancho donde se come una francesinha deliciosa y una sangria espectacular y al que llegamos a pie. Había cerca también supermercados donde comprar lo necesario para prepararse algo en casa. 
Luis nos atendió muy rápidamente y nos aconsejó donde comer y que ver en la ciudad y tardó menos de dos minutos en acudir para entregárnoslo la llave. El alojamiento tenía de todo y estaba mejor decorado y equipado de lo que espera esperábamos. Sin duda para aconsejar y volver.

Nice spacious flat with vary nice hosts.

Looks much better than on photos.
Great place, friendly host that took their time out when we needed help. It has WiFi and it is a very comfortable place for friends or family to stay at.

Hemos pasado unos días en este alojamiento para conocer Oporto y alrededores. El apartamento es maravilloso y el trato recibido por parte de Luis y de Ana ha sido inmejorable. Por las noches se descansa fenomenal, ya que no se oye nada de ruido. Justo enfrente de la casa hay un bar/cafetería donde se desayuna muy bien. Y la estación de tren para moverte a cualquier sitio, está a menos de 10 minutos andando. Desde luego, si vuelvo por esa zona, repetiría alojamiento sin dudarlo.
Un alojamiento moderno que mejora a las fotos, limpio y comodo, fácil de aparcar en la calle y zona tranquila. Hemos estado muy bien, gracias a Luis y Ana que nos han atendido muy bien.
Superbe appartement, très design avec une petite terrasse idéal pour les parties de cartes entre amis. Je recommande !
Excellente prestation
Everything is perfect, really nice house but without à washing machine. Luis and Anita are very nice hosts.

Un muy bello lugar para hospedarnos y descansar luego de una jornada turística! Todo muy bien y muy limpio, atención al 100% muy amables , recomendado en todos los aspectos, volveremos con todo el gusto del mundo.

nous avons passé un excellent   séjour. nos hôtes nous ont attendu et accueilli et nous ont même offert un petit souvenir de porto. la maison est juste parfaite, très bien décoré et très spacieuse et très propre.a 10 min en voiture du centre de porto.  Anna nous a accueilli avec un beau sourire et beaucoup de gentillesse. je recommande vivement et j'y reviendrai certainement lors de mon prochain voyage à porto.merci beaucoup à vous de nous avoir accueilli dans votre admirable maison
Olá Sr Luís eu e minha família gostamos muita da estadia no seu alojamento recomendo a qualidade e condições . Obrigado Gorete comprimentos  da Ilha da Madeira
mucho mejor que en las fotos
Big place, plenty of room for at least six people! Terrace is also very nice

Logement parfait! Belle terrasse et chambres et SDB très confortables. Idéalement situé, proche des caves à visiter. Luis est Ana ont été des hôtes accueillants et disponibles! Grand merci à eux! On reviendra! Je recommande vivement ce logement!
Maravilloso apartamento , recomendable 100%.. Hay que estar una semana  por lo menos, para disfrutar de esta bonita Ciudad y sus alrededores.
Excelente casa! Muito espaçosa, limpa, bem decorada e completa! O Luis nos recebeu muito bem! É uma excelente pessoa! Recomendo!
Muito agradável a estadia e recepção dos anfitriões muito boa.
Maison fonctionnelle et très bien décorée. Luis est très réactif et très accueillant. Je recommande

We had an amazing stay at Luis’ place in Porto. He was a great host, made sure we knew all the local tips and communication was excellent.

The property was very nicely decorated (the fireplace was a highlight), and very well equipped! 

We really enjoyed our stay at Anita House and we can’t wait to go back!
Merci pour l'accueil.  le logement est spacieux et bien équipée.  la situation géographique est également idéale  . très bon séjour merci

une très bel appartement fidèle au photo avec un rendu encore plus sympa une fois sur place.
pour l'emplacement le premier métro est à environ 20 minutes à pieds et armez vous de mollets bien musculés car la topographie offre beaucoup de dénivelé ! néanmoins il y a plusieurs arrêts de bus dans les 500m aux alentours il suffit juste de s'organiser avec les horaires et ne pas rentrer trop tard... 
le logement est aux calmes un petit café juste en face qui peut dépanné mais pas de vie de quartier c'est plutot du genre pavillonnaire donc parfait pour les personnes qui recherche du calme.
excellent weekend pour nous et très bel appartement 
Luis est très réactif pour les messages et vérifie que tout se passe bien lors de notre séjour c'était cool ;)
bon séjour à vous

Luis e Ana são ótimas pessoa, o local é incrível e muito bem decorado, muito bom gosto e todo o conforto necessário para nos sentirmos em casa.

Luis and Ana are great people, the place is amazing and very well decorated, very tasteful and all the comfort needed to make us feel at home.
Um sitio maravilhoso e faz nos lembrar a nossa casa.

name: Origami Porto Deluxe Suite
summary: The accommodation is located in Avenida de Republica 1125, Vila Nova de Gaia. The accommodation is located just 1 min from the Metro Camara  de Gaia and just 10 min from the famous the Luis I Bridge near downtown of the Porto Center. It is well connected with several public transportation, including metro. The room includes a king size bed, seating area, flat TV screen with satelite channels, balcony and a bathroom attached to the room. There are common areas like kitchen and living room.

host.host_about: I'm a 38yr male from Sydney,Australia. I'm easy going and am passionate about the things I believe in and enjoy. Some of these include: nature and conservation, science, camping and travelling. Sport is also a big part of my life and I regularly surf, play football and tennis. Less regularly, I also play golf, squash, scuba dive, cycle, and ski. I have a soft spot for dogs, and recently became a dad :)

name: Blue Room With Balcony Barcelona Rambla
summary: Large room with lots of light, in the center of the city, the best area of Barcelona, a few meters from La Rambla and 50 meters from Plaza Catalunya, close to the main places of interest; Paseo de Gracia, Casa Batlló, La Boqueria, Gothic Quarter and more. The room has a private bathroom only shared WC, also has a nice balcony where you will have a table and two chairs so you can have breakfast or have a nice time. Beautiful and wide terrace with incredible views to several points of the city.
space: Bright apartment in one of the most traditional neighborhoods of Barcelona. The apartment has an unbeatable location, a few meters from La Rambla with a variety of restaurants where you will find typical Spanish food (Tapas, Paellas, Maricos). We have a large and fully equipped kitchen, where you can have your breakfast and have access to all the utensils of it. You can relax on the terrace with incredible views of different parts of the city. You can not lose this! We provide high speed Wi-Fi, bedding and towels. Live the experience and enjoy Barcelona with us!

neighborhood_overview: Flowers, music, shows, mimes and terraces define Las Ramblas, the most well-known street in Barcelona and an essential sight. La Rambla, is one of the main arteries of Barcelona and one of the best known places in the city. It is a pleasant 1.3 kilometer walk that connects Plaza Catalunya with the old port of the city. The Ramblas are always lively, full of street artists. The walkway has numerous pleasant terraces to sit and contemplate.
transit: Easy mobility and access. It has metro lines and different bus stops. It is very close to the Aerobus stop if you travel with it to get to the city or return to the airport.
access: *Kitchen fully equiped. * Living. *Bath. * Beautiful and large terrace overlooking different points of the city.
house_rules: - No podrá hacer ruido despues de las 23h - If your arrival is later than 10 pm, 25 euros will be charged for check in late

name: Porto Gaia Wine's Place
summary: Cozy and renewed apartment close to D'ouro River, in the street of world famous Graham's Porto Lodge (Port Wine Cellar, Restaurant and Museum). Transport to Porto Downtown and  beaches at the door. Plenty of commerce (restaurants, cafe, bar, market, mall). Confortável e renovado apartamento próximo ao Rio D'ouro, na rua do famoso Graham's (Cave, Rest. e Museu do Vinho do Porto). Transporte para a Baixa do Porto e praias à porta. Zona de muito comércio (rest., café, bar, mercado, shopping, etc).
space: - Comfortable and renewed apartment in a privileged location where you can feel the energy and vibrancy of Porto. - Apartamento confortável e remodelado  em localização privilegiada onde é possível sentir toda a energia e vibração do Porto.

notes: *** Tourist Tax of Vila Nova de Gaia - Applied from December 1, (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) *** PLEASE NOTE: The Tourist Tax must be paid in cash at the time of Check-in. Values: - From 01/10 to 31/03: 1 Euro per person per night. - From 01/04 to 30/09: 2 Euros per person per night. - Charged only for 16 years old or older guests - A maximum of 7 nights in a row are charged. It is not charged after 8th night. Link to the law  (in Portuguese):  (Website hidden by Airbnb) *** Taxa Turística de Vila Nova de Gaia - Aplicada à partir de 01 de Dezembro de (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) *** ATENÇÃO: A Taxa Turística deverá ser paga em numerário/espécie no momento do Check-in. Valores: - De 01/10 a 31/03: 1 Euro por pessoa por noite (É cobrado apenas para os maiores de 16 anos - Cobra-se no máximo por 7 noites seguidas). - De 01/04 a 30/09: 2 Euros por pessoa por noite (É cobrado apenas para os maiores de 16 anos - Cobra-se no máximo por 7 noites seguidas). - É cobrada apenas para os maio
transit: - Plenty of public transportation to all zones of Porto and Gaia. However, it is possible to walk to several landmarks such as the Gaia Pier and the Luis I Bridge, and commercial centers such as Arrábida Shopping. - Abundância de transporte público para todas as zonas do Porto e Gaia. Entretanto é possível ir a pé à diversos pontos turísticos como o Cais de Gaia e a Ponte Luis I, e comerciais como o Arrábida Shopping.
access: - Guests have private access to all rooms of the apartment. - Os hóspedes tem acesso privativo à todas as divisões do apartamento.
interaction: - We're available on phone, (Hidden by Airbnb) , e-mail,  SMS, and even in person in case of necessity. - Estamos disponíves por telefone, (Hidden by Airbnb) , e-mail,  SMS, e até mesmo pessoalmente se houver necessidade.
house_rules: ***ENGLISH***  ------------------- - Check-in: From 02:00 PM to 10:00PM. - Check-out: Until 11:00AM. - Please treat the place like your own and enjoy it. - Respect your neighbor and please don't make excessive noise. Fees may be applied if a official notice is issued by Condo's Manager. This is a family condo and not a party place. - Absolutely no smoking in internal areas (rooms, kitchens, etc). Fees may be applied. - Pets are not allowed. - Please leave the place reasonably cleaned. - You can have guests over but only the amount of people informed at booking time (four at maximum) can sleep over. Fees will be applied for each extra person. - Guests themselves are responsible for their personal property and valuables left in the place. The owners will not be responsible for loss thereof. - Lock the door of the house before leaving and ensure stove, oven, and electronics are turned off. - In exceptional circumstances and in the absence of a guest the owners of the facility has the righ

host.host_about:
My name is Enrico, I'm an IT professional, and my wife, Mariana, is a dentist. We love traveling and knowing different places and people. We have lived abroad (Brazil, Canada and Portugal), so we know exactly how a guest must be treated.
    // Meu nome é Enrico, sou um profissional de TI, e minha esposa, Mariana, é  dentista. Adoramos viajar e conhecer diferentes lugares e pessoas. Já moramos no exterior (Brasil, Canadá e Portugal), por isso sabemos exatamente como um hóspede deve ser tratado.

reviews.comments: Great host, reactive, apartment clean and spacious

Très bel appartement super bien situé, propriétaires très gentils, appartement très propre, équipements de qualité
Nous recommandons vivement
Nice flat and nice hosts. Everything was clean and we made the check-in with no problem. 100% recommended!
Enrico and Mariana were really helpful in all my logistic problem. They are very kind people.

Enrico & Mariana’s home was absolutely beautiful! It was a short walk to the Douro River where all the shops and sights are! Mariana was very accommodating and helpful throughout our stay and I would happily return to stay in the future!

We had a enjoyable stay at Enrico & Mariana‘s Appartement! Everything was clean and really well organized. What we appreciated the most was the spontaneous check in. Our flight was delayed (2h) and they waited for us although it was getting really late.
The apartment's okay and clean. I got a nice welcome.

The whole apartment was excellent, it was very very clean, stylish, and  the location was great and easy access to transportation and to local restaurants, cafes. The hosts , Mariana and Enrico was excellent on everything, they were very hospitable, friendly and very quick on response when we need it help.  We will definitely recommend their home!!!!
We spent a nice moment in that place. The place was really clean and cozy. Location is also very close to the center of Porto. Enrico was very kind with us. I definitely recommend that appartement.
Localisation bien car en haut du centre ville et sans bruit. Très propre et complet. Hôte réactive et aux petits soins.

O apartamento é ótimo, confortável, próximo de todas as vinícolas e da Ribeira e tudo pôde ser feito caminhando.  O espaço é confortável, amplo e possui tudo o que se precisa em uma casa.
Obrigada por tudo!

Great place in a great location not far from Porto proper. Very nice and clean, especially for the price. Had a bike accident and mangled a key while falling, they were totally understanding and didn’t charge me anything for it. Was a total accident but some people aren’t that nice! Wish I could have left it cleaner but fractured my wrist and was hard to keep it to my standards. Great place, nice people.
