host.host_about:
Sou host de airbnb, porque adoro conviver com pessoas e a minha cidade, além disso viajar é uma das minhas prioridades. 
Sou mãe de dois rapazes e adoro cães.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Vanessa's place was really amazing, the flat is brand new and we were first guests there. Apartment was sparkling clean with all amenities you will need.  We came with a baby so comfort was extra important and we had it all. Vanessa made sure we felt comfortable, she welcomed us personally, also made sure we had some food for the beginning, which was very thoughtful. Flat has an excellent location in a very lively area, however hidden that you can not even hear cars. Vanessa was always responding to our questions and if we needed something she was happy to help. Her WiFi is superb! We had an amazing time in Porto !! Don't event think to stay somewhere else, you must stay at Vanessa's place!!

Newly renovated flat with great bathroom and kitchen facilities. Very close to bars & restaurants, but on a side street so no noise. Vanessa was very helpful with directions, meeting us at the flat and providing the best breakfast we've had at an airbnb!

The place was lovely, like the pictures or even better! Location is behind great, near of everything but the street is quiet enough to allow for a relaxing time. Vanessa was a great host always taking care of all the details, they also left us with some food for next day breakfast, what is a sweet touch. Plus everything was incredible clean and the cleaner came half week to clean again and change sheets. The only down side is the place is a bit cold but there was heaters to fix the situation. Overall an amazing stay!

Appartement tres propre et bien équipé. 
Emplacement parfait dans porto. 
Vanessa a été très accueillante
On recommande

Appartement très bien situé avec une belle décoration et refait à neuf
Vanessa avait acheté de quoi préparer le petit déjeuner et les apéros.  Elle a été de bon conseil. 

Je recommande +++
Logement bien placé, propre et très fonctionnel ( en plus il y a une très jolie terrasse ) Vanessa est très gentille et très à l’écoute de nos attentes . Super expérience.
Très belle appartement, Vanessa est superbe, l’appartement est très humide vraiment humide. Mais,il  est très propre. Super qualité prix.
Very helpful

Vanessa is super friendly and kind. The flat is very well located all the places we wanted to see were within walking distance. The apartment was clean, spacious and comfortable. Really enjoyed our stay, thanks again.

L'appartement de vanessa est très bien situé....proche du centre mais dans une rue calme. Il est propre, bien équipé et Vanessa est aux petits soins pour ses locataires. Arrivant tard sur Porto, elle avait prévu de quoi déjeuner le lendemain. Nous y avons passé une très bonne semaine!
Hele nette, mooie en zeer goed gelegen appartement

Vanessa and her Apartment are the perfect address for Porto. You are in the heart of the city. You can almost reach everything by walking. Vanessa is such a nice person and loves to help you with useful tips. If you travel with a child this apartment is absolutely the place to be as Vanessa can support you with everything you and your child needs. Would love to come again and stay at her apartment.

Vanessas apartment is just like on the pictures! Very nice interior and actually very spacey! Also it’s in a little side street, at night it is super quiet!! Vanessa welcomed us herself and is super friendly and easy to communicate with! She left us a little breakfast, but a bakery is also just at the other end of the street. Highly recommendable!!

Vanessa nous a apporté les clés de l appart 30 min après notre résa! Super réactivité! Attention géniale de sa part en laissant des jeux pour notre fille de 3 ans! Appart très bien situé pour visiter Porto. Terrasse agréable! Encore merci Vanessa pour ton hospitalité

Excellent and stylish apartment located near many attractions, restaurants, metro, and shops. It’s fully furnished with high quality materials. Vanessa is friendly and attentive to guests needs. I highly recommend staying at her place.

L’appartement est idéalement situé, reste frais du fait de son rdc ce qui est très appréciable en cas de grosses chaleur, et possède tous les équipements pour un super séjour de court ou long terme. Par ailleurs, Vanessa est adorable et tout à fait dispo pour un accueil au top. Merci à elle.

Vanessa’s place was really nice and comfortable. It was very clean and cleaning lady was scheduled 2 times a week. Kitchen also had everything what we needed so we could make our own meals; there was also coffee and washing machine, etc. Vanessa was Kind enough to wait for us due to our delayed flight, show us the place and left us food for breakfasts.  The place was in the city center so we had buses, metro station nearby but also plenty of attractions and restaurants. Really good place for a long and short stays. Thanks Vanessa for all the help we’ve got from you! :-)
Espaço bastante cómodo e acolhedor, muito bem localizado na cidade do Porto.

L’appartement est très placé pour visiter Porto. Tout est accessible à pied. Il est bien équipé et confortable. Vanessa est très accueillante, réactive pour toutes questions. Elle avait fait quelques courses à l’arrivée. Elle est très arrangeante pour l’arrivée et le départ.

Ubytování u Vanessy bylo velmi příjemné. Byt se nacházel v centru města, takže se na většinu míst dalo dojít pěšky. V okolí se nacházelo velké množství restaurací a barů. Uvnitř bylo čisto a vybavení odpovídalo obrázkům. Navíc během týdenního pobytu přišla jednou uklidit uklízečka. Při další návštěvě města ráda zvolím opět toto ubytovaní.

l appartement est très propre et très bien situé avec sa petite terrasse super sympa.. Vanessa nous avez laissé de quoi déjeuner et à toujours était la si besoin. Merci encore à elle. n hésitez surtout pas pour visiter porto

L'appartement est très mignon (encore plus que sur les photos) et d'une propreté remarquable. La rue est très calme et ce dans un quartier des plus vivants et proche de tout. Vanessa est très réactive et à su nous accueillir et nous conseiller sur la vie à porto ! 
Je recommande à 100%.
Excellent location and host was very helpfully and responsive, with great recommendations! Apartment had all the necessary amenities and was very clean
all great!

Vanessa ist eine nette und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Sie gab uns Tipps zum Ausgehen und beantwortete alle Fragen zeitnah und zuverlässig. Die Unterkunft liegt sehr zentral und in ruhiger Lage. Alle Sehenswürdigkeiten und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind fußläufig zu erreichen.

Vous pouvez faire confiance à Vanessa, hôte parfaite à tous points de vues, agréable, souriante, accueillante. Elle aime partager ses bons plans et reste joignable et très réactive durant tout le séjour. Elle avait prévu quelques fruits, pain, lait, jus d'orange afin d'assurer notre premier petit déjeuner, ttention très agréable. 
L'appartement est idéalement situé à Porto et permet de visiter la ville à pieds sans soucis. La rue est très calme alors que le logement est dans un des quartiers les plus animés, vraiment top !!
A y être  très bien, conforme  aux photos, à recommander, quartier calme bien situé
L'appartement est très bien agencé, propre et très bien placé par rapport aux activités de la ville. Nous avons adoré l'accueil de Vanessa, seul bémol l'humidité de l'appartement au RDC. Merci

El alojamiento ha sido muy agradable. 
Nos ha obsequiado con  un buen desayuno.
Vanessa es muy simpática y nos ha indicado muy bien dónde comer bien y que lugares de interés para visitar.
Awesome place :)

Appartement très bien conçu avec de l'espace pour chacun. D'autre part, très central, sans aucun bruit. Notre hôtesse à eu la délicatesse de garnir le frigidaire et la panière de fruits pour notre arrivee. A moins de 100m, 3 supermarchés !  Un large choix de restaurants dans les proches environs.
Un grand merci à Vanessa

El departamento es grande y tiene todo lo que uno necesita. Esta muy bien ubicado aunque haya que subir unas escaleras para llegar a el (preferente ir con equipaje liviano). Vannesa es una excelente anfitriona, responde rápidamente a las inquietudes y asesora acerca de destinos turísticos. Nos sentimos muy a gusto en su departamento y claramente lo recomendaria!

Espaço bem decorado e localizado. A casa tinha uma temperatura ambiente bastante agradável. 
A anfitriã muito prestável, sempre disponível para responder a qq questão que tivéssemos!

Vanesa fue muy amable y nos dió sus recomendaciones de los mejores sitios para comer y visitar. El apartamento es tal y como en las fotos, al lado del centro y muy cerca de zona de restaurantes y avenida de los aliados.

pasamos allí tres noches estupendas! está muy céntrico a poco tiempo caminando de cualquier zona turística, repetiría mi estancia allí!, en la cocina no sólo había cualquier utensilio de menaje necesario si no que también cosas básicas para cocinar (sal aceite azúcar...) y café, leche, cereales, tostadas... un lujazo y hasta una botella de vino, y Vanessa es majísima nos recomendó lugares de la zona.

Nice, stylish flat. Perfect for exploring the city by foot. Close to Trindad metro for easy access to the airport.
I can recommend it.

El apartamento de Vanessa fue muy bueno! La ubicación es excelente ya que se puede recorrer caminando los puntos más importantes de la ciudad, también hay muchos supermercados cerca, restaurantes y cafés. La hospitalidad de Vanessa fue una de las mejores porque siempre responde rápido y está atenta a cualquier inquietud que se tenga. El apto está bien equipado y cuenta con todo lo necesario para una estadía tranquila en un barrio local y céntrico. Gracias por todo Vanessa! :-)

Great very spacious and modern flat in cebtral location. All attractions are in walking distance. Vanessa was very helpful and gave us tips for local restaurants. We had everything we needed in the flat even small snacks and drinks were provided. Vanessa also stayed up late to check us in at night time. Can definitely recommend this place to anyone!

La casa es tal cual se ve en las fotos, todo limpio y en orden. Vanesa una buena anfitriona rápida en las respuestas y servicial,de agradecer que sabiendo que viajábamos con un bebé nos puso todo lo necesario (cuna,trona,toalla y muy importante Juguetes)

This is such a lovely space in a great area. Given our visit was in February, the space was a very comfortable temperature. The shower was superb and the patio was a nice bonus. Vanessa accommodated us at the last minute and was very responsive. I’d definitely stay at Vanessa’s when in Porto next.

name: 3 bedroom house close to station, CBD and airport
summary: 3 bedroom house in a quiet, safe neighbourhood. - 7min walk to train station (14min train to Sydney International Airport & 20min train to City) - Shops, grocery/supermarkets, restaurants, cafes, bars and movie cinema all within walking distance.
space: We've recently moved out of the house to live with our parents and are now renting it out.  Older style house and furnishings are very basic but we are more than happy to supply anything you might need for your stay. Apologies in advance for our (non-existent) backyard as we're building a granny flat!
description: 3 bedroom house in a quiet, safe neighbourhood. - 7min walk to train station (14min train to Sydney International Airport & 20min train to City) - Shops, grocery/supermarkets, restaurants, cafes, bars and movie cinema all within walking distance. We've recently moved out of the house to live with our parents and are now renting it out.  Older style house and furnishings are very basic but we are more than happy to supply anything you might need for your stay. Apologies in advance for our (non-existent) backyard as we're building a granny flat! You'll have the house all to yourself except for the backyard. Rooms will be made available based on the number of guests/requested room configuration. We live 5min away but we work in the city during the day. We're happy pop by to say hi and offer some handy tips if you like, otherwise, we'll leave you alone to enjoy your stay. Beverly Hills is a 20min from the CBD but it really has everything you need. You'll be within walking distance to the m
neighborhood_overview: Beverly Hills is a 20min from the CBD but it really has everything you need. You'll be within walking distance to the main strip which is full of restaurants and cafes as well as the local movie cinema. You are also surrounded by parks where you and/or your kids can run around (we can provide sporting equipment).
notes: It's a quiet neighbourhood so please keep the noise down after 10pm. As mentioned, let us know in advance if you have any special requirements and we'll try and accommodate as best as we can!
transit: Street parking is abundant however the train network is the best way to get around Sydney (we are only 7min from the nearest stations).
access: You'll have the house all to yourself except for the backyard. Rooms will be made available based on the number of guests/requested room configuration.
interaction: We live 5min away but we work in the city during the day. We're happy pop by to say hi and offer some handy tips if you like, otherwise, we'll leave you alone to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: Hello and thank you for your interest in our house.  As your airbnb host we aim to make your stay as comfortable as possible. To help us to do so we would really appreciate if you can follow the following simple house rules.  Check-in & Check out -	Check-in is at 2pm, and check-out is by 10am. Whilst we would try our best to accommodate an early check-in or a late check-out but due to the time required for cleaning we may not always be able to accommodate, please check with us when you make the booking to clarify. No Smoking -	No smoking inside the home. Extra cleaning fees to remove odour and stains may be applied. Lights & A/C -	Please turn off all lights, TV and air conditioning when you are not at home. Kitchen and food -	We welcome you to use our kitchen but would ask you to PLEASE WASH YOUR DISHES AFTER USE. If dishes are not washed, extra cleaning fees may be applied. -	We provide general condiments, coffees and teas in our pantry for your ease of use. Also from time to time, we

reviews.comments: Fabulous family sized house! Very clean & Tidy. Well equiped ammenities. Delighted to find toiletries provided as we forgot to pack ours. Very close to train station, IGA and restaurants (all within walking distance). Alice and Richard were great hosts, willing to provide any request. Will definitely book this very affordable house again.

Alice and Richard are very sweet hosts. They were in touch with me from the moment I booked the AirBNB to when we checked out of their place. They welcomed us with a little gift basket of food and kept a little note to make us feel at home. Their hospitality was excellent! I’d highly recommend their Home to anyone!
Alice is a great host! She’s easy and accommodating to all of my request. I love the location and it’s close to the nice eateries, very convenient!

Alice's place was exactly as advertised. Great space for great value. The location was also fantastic in that everywhere we had to go was within an hour. We especially loved the personal touch like the box of chocolates that greeted us on arrival. Very happy with everything including comms with Alice.

The place : Plenty of room in a nice and cozy house.. located close to the train station and parks and in a safe and quiet neighbourhood. Not too far from the airport. There is ample parking - off street or on street. 
The hosts : very prompt, flexible and most of all they respect your privacy.
Very nice host, always a quick reply. House is clean and tidy. Thanks for preparing the coffee and tea.

Alice and Richard are great host. Very easy to reach and responded quickly when needed. As a welcome gesture,they even offered us free timtam and multiadaptor. All rooms were well kept and equipped with comfy beds. Great location walkable distance to Beverly Hills train station. Lots of shops and restaurant nearby. The only downside is the shower pressure and temp control which can either be too hot or too cold. Overall we had a great stay. Would definitely recommend to anyone
A great place. Perfect for our family that came to visit us during our working holiday. We had a great stay and the hosts were always ready to help answer questions or provide things.
Alice's house is very clean n comfort..near the grocery store..love to stay..
Thanks a ton for a wonderful stay. The amenities you guys offered were amazing. In short, it was a home away from a home!! Highly recommended to everyone!
its a nice place and spacious
地理位置不错,走路10分钟到地铁站,房间宽敞,用品齐全,就是设施稍旧一些,房东很周到很好沟通,入住比较温馨,房子整体性价比不错
A great place! Very clean and the host is nice and caring.
这是一个很温馨的住处,离机场很近,去华人区吃饭也不远｡我们早班飞机抵达悉尼,房主友好的安排我们提前入住｡期间热水出了一点小问题,房主也很及时的帮忙解决｡下次来悉尼还会选择这里｡

Alice and Richard are wonderful host. they are not only thoughtful, helpful and try to make our stay a memorable one. the house has games and books for those who are worried about a boring night.  they made every effort to ensure their guests are comfortable in their house.  thumbs up for this pair of super host.

A fantastic experience - a beautiful home with amazing hosts. Our little family loved the place and we were able to access public transport, playing spaces and public facilities such as cafes and supermarkets very easily. Alice and Richard ensured our stay was comfortable and enjoyable and were very easy to communicate with. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Responsive host. Quiet, lovely neighbourhood. Short drive away from eateries and shops. Convenient to and from the airport.

Staying at Alice is the good choice i have made. The response is very fast. Very helpful event in the last minutes. You will not regret choosing this place to stay..A very quiet place, good area, near to train station and mini mart.. everything is GOOD.. Thanks Alice :)
Beautiful home, had everything we needed and we never wanted to leave. Would definitely hire this home again anytime we visit the area. Highly recommend this place!!
Close to Train. Great price. Not a lot of utensils but quite enough for what we needed for our stay.  Would strongly recommend staying at Alice's place as it is nice and simple and clean.

Great value for your money, especially if you’re on a budget. A good location with easy access to many services such as the train station, cinema, a park and Uber eats. Would recommend to others trying to travel with 5 or 6 people on a budget. The house comes with an above average TV and great wifi which can handle many devices connected at once. Overall our stay was enjoyable and Alice is a fantastic host.
Summer time facilities
坐地铁可以去悉尼市中心｡
Very good house very nice host.
it's a nice and tidy place around 7 minutes from the station which is not bad. good value for money.

Special thanks to Alice & Richard for being a nice host. Both are responsive. The house is near with Beverly Hills train station, located in a quite and beautiful neighbourhood. 

We found that the kitchen utensils were well provided and we got comfort bed and clean bedsheets. The living room was spacious & TV was provided. There was a washing machine, iron with iron board and a cloth hanger in laundry area but it would be great if there is a dryer as well.

Overall I had a nice stay in Alice's place because it is such a cozy and spacious house
The house is old and sparsely furnished and needed some maintenance. But it was clean and spacious. It is in a good location within walking distance of Beverl Hills station.
It's very good & lovely . And nearly station.

Alice house is humbly described in the BnB. The house has provided me everything I need as a traveller, didn’t expect so much. I really appreciate the way she and her husband handle the power outage problem, thanks so much.
close to station
还不错,价格很划算｡
Great place to stay. Very spacious and rooms are decent. Hospitality was great!

name: Dee Why beachside retreat
summary: Great Beachside two bedroom apartment. 50 meters from Dee Why beach; shops; restaurants and Cafes. Private garden entrance with beautiful tropical private garden with BBQ. This is perfect for a beach get away, or a chance to explore the local Nature walks. Bus stop is 10meters from our terrace, direct bus to City (40mins) or Manly wharf (20mins) or national park (30mins). Surfboards and wetsuit can be available on request. Check in at anytime using the key lock located on the terrace.
description: Great Beachside two bedroom apartment. 50 meters from Dee Why beach; shops; restaurants and Cafes. Private garden entrance with beautiful tropical private garden with BBQ. reviews.comments: Fantastic location, close to beach, park and some great restaurants. The place was very well presented, clean and owner very responsive to questions.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Chambre privée au coeur de Rosemont
summary: Au coeur de Rosemont, près de la promenade Masson, près de tous les commerces : Première moisson, les Copains d'abord, restaurants, terrasses, épiceries Poivre et sel, pharmacie Jean-Coutu etc. Desservi par tous les moyens transports, Autobus 47 vers métro Laurier, 67 vers Métro Joliette et St-Michel.
space: Grand appartement lumineux situé au 2ème étage avec balcon,  à  2 minutes de la Promenade Masson. Accessible à tous les commerces à pieds. Je me ferai un plaisir de vous accueillir!
description: Au coeur de Rosemont, près de la promenade Masson, près de tous les commerces : Première moisson, les Copains d'abord, restaurants, terrasses, épiceries Poivre et sel, pharmacie Jean-Coutu etc. Desservi par tous les moyens transports, Autobus 47 vers métro Laurier, 67 vers Métro Joliette et St-Michel. Grand appartement lumineux situé au 2ème étage avec balcon,  à  2 minutes de la Promenade Masson. Accessible à tous les commerces à pieds. Je me ferai un plaisir de vous accueillir! Cuisine équipée et salle de bain partagées, bureau et balcon. Rosemont est un beau quartier avec de nombreux parcs, pistes cyclables. Cinéma Beaubien, La rue Masson et ses commerces animés ( restaurants, épiceries, cafés, brasseries et terrasses). Lignes d'autobus : 47 vers Métro Laurier, 67 vers Métro St-Michel et Joliette 197, vers Rosemont. Idéalement pour couple ou femme seule

house_rules: Merci d'enlever vos chaussures à la maison  Ne pas rouler vos valises sur le parquet Ne faîtes pas de bruit en arrivant tard le soir (après 22h) Interdit de fumer même sur le balcon Interdiction de télécharger des films et des séries, ou de les partager via des sites de Streaming Ne pas oublier de vérifier que les portez du balcon et principale sont bien fermées. En cas d'urgence, vous pouvez me contacter par courriel au : (Email hidden by Airbnb)  ou sur la messagerie Airbnb, Messenger et mon tél. : (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.comments: Ce séjour a été magnifique et ça a tellement cliqué avec Touria ! Je me suis sentie comme chez une amie  :-) et en plus tout était impeccable. L'appartement est calme, à 3min des commerces et lignes de bus.  Qualité prix imbattable, je le recommande fortement. Un gros merci à Touria :-)

Je vous recommande fortement le logement de Touria. Il est très bien situé à Montréal (la chouette rue Masson avec restos, bars, commerces a 1 minute), il est propre et très agréable. De plus, il est particulièrement silencieux. Il y a un très grand «walk in» dans la chambre, et le lit est très confortable. Touria saura vous guider à Montréal avec gentillesse et proximité. Un vrai plaisir de loger chez elle !

Mon séjour passé chez Touria était formidable. Elle m’a chaleureusement accueillie et m’a mise rapidement à l’aise. Tout le confort absolu. Toutes les pièces étaient propres et bien aérées. Ma chambre était spacieuse et jolie avec un grand « walk in closet » Le lit était confortable, du coup toutes mes nuits étaient agréables. Je me suis bien reposée pendant tout mon séjour. Touria est une hôte de classe supérieure. Elle parle avec tant de douceur et d’élégance. Elle est si agréable et très conviviale.  Ce fut un réel plaisir de séjourner chez Touria. Je reviendrai encore chez elle si l’opportunité se présente et je la recommande vivement à tout le monde.

Arielle
Very nice place with amazing location and good restaurants

Touria and her husband live in a quiet neighourhood with trees and lots of friendly cats. There are lots of restaurants nearby, and once you figure out the bus to the Metro, you can do anythi g you want.

It is a very quiet location. With bus transportation nearby, It is much easier to go for the down town than I expected.
I am sure I will choose it for next visit.
It is a wonderful and comfortable home, full of good energy !!!

name: The Best point to Enjoy Barcelona
summary: My flat is so confortable and you can use the kitchen if you want, it is just next to the Arc de Triomf and is a very good location to know and enjoy this city: you can move by walk, bike, bus, metro or train from here to every where.
space: My flat is very lighter and has capacity for 5 people, is a very good location if you want to be closer of many interested places of the city and also to the beach, this is not a luxury place, but has a very nice and personal decoration, is a good place to have a nice and confortable time in Barcelona.
description: My flat is so confortable and you can use the kitchen if you want, it is just next to the Arc de Triomf and is a very good location to know and enjoy this city: you can move by walk, bike, bus, metro or train from here to every where. . . . .
access: The people who come to my home can use everything what we have at home, like kitchen, refrigerator, wash machine, Tv, internet Wi Fi, etc

host.host_about:
Im a friendly person, sociable, open-minded. I really like to share life experiences with other people, know and enjoy at the same time about other cultures from this planet. I love to travel and all the experience of means this action. I really enjoy to cook to others persons.
Im from Venezuela and my profession is Film Maker. Im an passionate with music, films and arts in general.
Nice to meet you! :-)

reviews.comments: We had the whole appartment for ourselfes and enjoyed it very much. The kitchen is well equipped and the flat is very cozy and nice decorated. Leonor was very easy going with the check in and check out times and made it possible that we could stay on the last day until we had to leave for our late flights. Leonor is a very very friendly host, we would come again to this place!!

Квартира Леоноры находится в очень удобном месте, рядом с метро Триумфальная арка. Можно пешком с детьми добраться и до Sagrada Familia, и до площади Каталонии, и до Рамблы и до зоопарка и до Французской станции, откуда ходят поезда до Порт Авентуры.
В принципе квартира небольшая, окна гостиной и спальни выходят на улицу, где ночью может быть шумновато, остальные две маленькие спальни окнами выходят в междомовую дыру.
Леонор очень приятная женщина, в доме есть все все необходимое для жизни и питания. Очень много посуды. 
Единственный минус - сосед снизу, который не выносит какого либо шума. Леонор нас предупредили при заезде о нем, но когда он вышел из квартиры ругаться в тот же день по поводу шумного спускания пос. лестнице мы поняли насколько это серьезно. Дети не на шутку пере пугались, постоянно приходилось на них шикать, а сосед то и дело приходил и стучал к нам в дверь. При этом мы ни разу серьезно не шумели, так - дети пробежались, громко посмеялись и вуаля - злой сосед стучит к нам в дверь. На отдыхе это напрягает.
Не рекомендуем семьям с детьми. Взрослым - очень хороший вариант.

Leonor has a great apartment right next to Arc de Triumph. It is only 10 minutes walk to the main Catalunya square. Apartment is clean, has separate bedrooms and the large living room were guests can meet and chat. Leonor herself is the best host I had so far. She helped me with getting around, treating my sunburns and was so friendly and so polite - I could not believe)

Leonor was a perfect host!!! Everything was as good as expected 
Thanks a lot

Apartment super well located, near the Arc de Triomf and Parc de la Ciutadella. Leonor is just the perfect host, she helped us on everything we needed for our staying and everything in the house was as listed.
If I ever come back to Barcelona I'll definitely know where to stay over!

ﾍﾞﾈｽﾞｴﾗ出身ということで､以前からﾍﾞﾈｽﾞｴﾗに興味があり宿泊することにしました｡ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝは各国に出るﾊﾞｽﾀｰﾐﾅﾙに近く､旅情あり｡JaumeⅠあたりへも歩いて行ける距離で､夜に飲みに行くにもいい場所｡Leonorさんはとても明るくﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰ｡私がﾈｯｸﾚｽをなくした時も親身に心配してくれました(その後見つかりました)｡部屋はｶﾗﾌﾙでﾊｯﾋﾟｰな装飾｡美しい息子さんとﾊﾟﾜﾌﾙに生きているLeonorさんを見て刺激になりました｡一度ﾊﾞｰへ一緒に飲みに行ったのも楽しかったです｡
Nice host. Provided everything we needed and in a very convienient location for everything.
The overall experience was good. I didn't expect the room to be bigger and private bathroom.
I great eXperience. Leonor help us with everything she can, always being helpful and offering help. I highly recommend, for all of this. Locatio of the house is awesome.

My sister and I were at her place and Leonor was a great host. Very nice and helpful with the Barcelona info. Cosy flat at good location.
I would definitely recomend it.

Leonor's place was perfect for me. Very clean and well looked after home. Excellent communication with Leonor and she was always very friendly and a great host. This place is very close to anything you might need, I loved the location and had a very comfortable month here. Thankyou!
Sono stato 4 giorni a casa di Leonor. Lei ed il figlio ci hano accolto con grande gentilezza e amicizia . Abbiamo mangiato e bevuto insieme e chiacchierato molto. Tornerò sicuramente

Het appartement is heel prima gelegen op loopafstand van de Ramblas en de Sagrada. Tegenover het appartement ligt bustation Nord van waar de bus vanuit vliegveld Girona aankomt en vertrekt.
De metro Arc de Triomp ligt op paar min lopen als je geen zin hebt om naar de stad te lopen.
Kortom een prima gelegen plek wanneer je een paar dagen Barcelona wilt verkennen.
Leonor is een fijne gastvrouw.

The stay at Leonor's place was great. She is a very helpful and kind person, and came with many good recomendations for where to go. The place is great, located central: you can walk to everything. Everything was very clean and the appartment was nice. To sum it up it is a great place to stay!

Staying at Leonor's place has been really nice. My friends and I didn't spend too much time at her as we went to Barcelona mostly for a Festival. 
Leonor is a nice host, the house was clean, room a little bit smaller than I thought but ok for our journey. She booked for us a  taxi to go to the airport. Lovely person. Recommend it!

Wir haben uns sofort wohlgefühlt! Leonor ist ein echter Schatz. Besser hätten wir in Barcelona nicht wohnen können! Wir wollten es einfach und günstig und bekamen dazu eine große Portion Gastfreundschaft, Sympathie, familiäres Miteinander, Tipps zu unseren Unternehmungen in Barcelona und ein immer offenes Ohr. Immer wieder und für nette Menschen sehr zu empfehlen! Wir wünschen ihr zauberhafte Gäste ! :-)
Fantastic location. Wonderful hostess.

Mi estancia en lo de leonor fue muy placentera. Es una anfitriona muy recomendable. Una persona muy alegre y amable. La ubicación del departamento es muy buena y linda. Y el piso es muy bonito, tal cual se ve en las fotos :)

Leonor is very friendly and helpful. The apartment is really close to the metro station and the bus station. Area is quite and safe. A perfect place to stay in Barcelona. Super suggested! 
:)

El piso de Leonor es la mejor alternativa por donde lo mires, tiene una ubicación increíble lo que te permite moverte sin problemas aunque nunca antes hayas estado en la ciudad. Además de eso la disposición de Leonor y su calidez humana es impagable! Estuve casi 1 mes y jamas tuve ningún por problema, por el contrario, me dio pena partir. Si buscas un lugar en Barcelona, este es!!
The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Cozy loft in the heart Old Montreal
summary: 800sq ft, very sunny, on the ground floor. In the heart of the touristic Old Montreal.  Kitchen is fully equipped (stocked fridge and pantry, oven, stove, fridge, espresso machine, blender, washer, dryer, toaster)
description: 800sq ft, very sunny, on the ground floor. In the heart of the touristic Old Montreal.  Kitchen is fully equipped (stocked fridge and pantry, oven, stove, fridge, espresso machine, blender, washer, dryer, toaster) As much or as little as you like. There’s a small park around the corner. A 24/7 convenience store, dry cleaning store and so much more from bars to restaurants. Fresh towels, pillows and blankets all available in the apartment. Also, if there's certain things (groceries or alcohol, for example) that you would like to see in the apartment, feel free to place a request.

reviews.comments: Comment évaluer le sejour chez Anas vu qu'il n'y a pas eu de sejour ? Hote injoignable des jours en avance. Aucune réponse aux mails, Sms et appels car il s'agit d'un faux numéro de communiqué sur l'annonce Airbnb. Une fois sur place, et sans nouvelle, l'appartement n'existe pas, ou du moins l'hôte n'existe pas sur les registres du concierge. C'est ainsi le jour j, apres des heures de transport, que j'ai eu l'agréable surprise de n'avoir aucun logement avec pour seule solution : l'hôtel. Bref, hôte et logement à bannir.

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended

Paulo Barbosa
Good but impersonal like a hotel. Clean, decoration is perfect, communication is good and very functional. The view from the balcony is quite weird (old cars garage )
Beautiful, clean und well designed flat
Gute Lage, netter Gastgeber, saubere Unterkunft.
Un très bon accueil, un appartement très agréable, une petite terrasse fort sympathique et des toilettes rondes ;-)

We had a nice stay in this apartment. It's very clean, stylishly designed and well located. We only needed 10 minutes to the center and 5 minutes to the metro station. By the Check In we got some good tips for eating and sightseeing.

Just the view from the terrace was weird, because the backyard was old, deserted car service station and we found it a little bit spooky, so we don't sat on the terrace. 
The neighborhood was not the best, some deserted houses and so on, but we accustom us there very fast.

Nevertheless, we are happy to had book this nice appartment and can recommend it.
Apartamento muito bonito, limpo, calmo muito perto do centro uns 15 minutos a pé. Acolho muito simpático com bons conselhos para visitar o Porto .  Obrigado pela estadia
Espacio muy bien diseñado, nuevo y con todos los servicios. La salida de la terraza da a un concesionario abandonado, no es muy bonito pero sí muy tranquilo

La casa è ben arredata e pulita. La cucina è nuova e funziona tutto. Il soffitto del soppalco non permette di alzarsi in piedi e gli scalini per salire non sono adatti a persone anziane. L'area esterna è all'interno di un parcheggio abbandonato abbastanza inquietante e di conseguenza non l abbiamo usata. Le prese di corrente vicino al letto non funzionavano e abbiamo chiesto all host di sistemarle. Non abbiamo ricevuto risposta ma confidiamo che le metterà a posto.

Appartement impeccable et conforme aux attentes.
Attention terrasse en RDC mais par contre aucun vis a vis ce qui est top !
Clean and nice place. We recommend.

Philipe's flat is gorgeous, and stylish. You get a sense of real getaway pad for a weekend in a city. The extra touches like an iron and ironing board (as we were in town for a wedding), a bottle of complimentary wine were really lovely. The flat is beautifully bright and located in a great neighbourhood, easy to get to the centre of town.
Petit studio fonctionnel, propre et bien situé. Je recommande ce logement pour un séjour à Porto.

Sehr schöne und gemütliche Wohnung. Stilvoll eingerichtet, hell und gut gelegen. Gute Ausstattung. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.
Allerdings war es etwas ärgerlich, dass das Wasser beim Duschen nicht ablief und der Rollo an der Tür zur Terrasse geklemmt hat.
Ansonsten haben wir uns wie zu Hause gefühlt!

Place was incredibly well located, pristine, stylish, I couldn't be more happy with the place. Management is not efficient at online communications, so I recommend calling and not relying on email or airbnb messages.

Muy muy recomendable. Todo precioso y limpio!

Otherwise a very pleasant stay. Would reccomend 100%
Appartement très sympathique, propre, et assez bien placé dans la ville (10 min à pied du métro).
Very nice place to spend sometime in Porto.

Very good place
Highly recommended!
Muy buen alojamiento, bien situado y muy amables. Muy recomendable , para volver sin duda! Un detalle la botella de vino que regalan. La cocina está completamente equipada.  Un estancia inmejorable!

El alojamiento es más pequeño de lo que aparece en las fotos, ya que juegan con las perspectivas, pero para dos personas están bastante bien. Además, la localización es buena, ya que se encuentra a menos de 5 minutos del metro.

Joli appartement bien situé MAIS gestion affreuse.
- Nous avons envoyé plusieurs e-mails à l’agence qui s’occupe de l’appartement à la suite d’un sac oublié dans la cuisine et jamais eu de réponse.
- Nous nous sommes retrouvés enfermés dans la hall d’entrée le jour du départ, car nous devions laisser la clé dans l’appartement mais la porte d’entrée de l’immeuble ne s’ouvre qu’avec une clé depuis l’intérieur. Conclusion: enfermée dedans à 4h du matin le jour de départ.
- Très peu d’ustensiles de cuisine et très sales 
- Propreté médiocre
Muito bom espaço e muito boa recepcao. Tudo condiz com o anunciado e a limpeza impecavel!

name: Bright, Cosy 1BR Apt in hip area.
summary: Cosy, yet bright one bedroom apartment with lots of natural sunlight in the heart of Sai Ying Pun on Hong Kong Island.  Conveniently located for the nightlife hotspots such as Lan Kwai Fong and Soho in Central, in addition to the many bars and eateries a few minutes' walk away on the High Street.
space: Open plan lounge and dining area adjacent to a double bedroom. The bedroom has a built in wardrobe and a set of large drawers for your use. There is a sofa in the lounge which is big enough for another person to crash on.  Small but stylish bathroom with a rainforest shower.  Washer dryer in the kitchen for you to use should you need to do laundry during your stay.  Household appliances such as an iron, hoover, dehumidifier and hairdryer all avaliable for your use.

Happy for you to reach out to me at any time should th
neighborhood_overview: Sai Ying Pun, a traditional neighbourhood of Hong Kong is now home to many of HK's best eateries. Although the area is now clearly  product of gentrification, it still has a lot of the old school charm it is famous for - traditional businesses abound.  There are four hip restaurants right next to the building; Potato Head is right opposite the building.  A few minutes' walk up to the High St will find yourselves in the middle of a popular evening hangout spot with many bars and restaurants. A French wine shop/bar is one of my personal favourites.  The area is very close to Central yet far enough from the choas to wind down after a long day. You can truly have your cake and eat it in Sai Ying Pun
notes: LGBT guests welcome!
transit: 3 minutes walk will get you to the Second Street entrance of Sai Ying Pun MTR station, which itself is two stops away from Central.  15 minutes on the MTR will get you to the main shopping districts of Tsim Sha Tsui and Causeway Bay. The night markets in Mong Kok and Yau Ma Tei are also within easy reach on the MTR. Several bus routes stop 1 min away from the apartment.  The Hong Kong Airport Express is also within easy reach by either MTR or taxi
access: Keys and the entry code to the building will be provided to you on check in. Lift up to the apartment on 9/F
interaction: I am available for contact via (Hidden by Airbnb) , email and calls. Happy for you to reach out to me at any time should there be an issue. Happy to introduce guests to a socialable group of friends who will be happy to show you around the area and wider Hong Kong, and the nightlife which HK has to offer.
house_rules: Please leave the apartment in the same condition as when you first arrived. I'm pretty flexible on everything else.

host.host_about:
Young professional based in Hong Kong, relocated back to Hong Kong from London recently. I'm thoroughly looking forward to explore yet to be explored places in the region. 

Travelling is one of my favourite pastimes and I love to immerse myself in the local culture of the places I'm visiting; learning about local history and art. Look forward to meeting different people along my travels :)

name: Penthouse da Música for 8
summary: If you are a family or a group of good friends, this is the right place in Porto! Full of light, with 4 terraces. You will find everything you need to feel yourself at home. This house is quite spacious, modern, new and very, very beautiful. So close to "Casa da Música" is the perfect home for a cultural journey in Porto. Parking is for free only during the night (7pm-9am) and all weekend. During the day there is a lot of offer with nice prices in a range of 50m.
space: This penthouse is situated 2 minutes by foot from "Casa da Música". Here around within 50 m you have all kind of offer for a day by day life (walking). You can find payed parking even in front of the main entrance. You will be the top inhabitant of the house. So, you will never be bothered by the top neighbor heels!You can bring your biquini because you'll find total privacy here! And remember, you'll have 4 terraces for tanning and eat!

neighborhood_overview: Boavista is the financial area of the city. We can find all kind of offer related to a day by day life within a distance of 100m.  The "Casa da Música" is very unique and special building created by the architect Rem Koolhaas for "Porto European Capital of the Culture 2001" event and is now the best place for you to attend a concert, make a guided visit or for a workshop. Check the site! Boavista roundabout has a very nice garden with garden seats, where we can easily find some yoga exercises, meditation and nature connection.  The metro is 100 m away from the penthouse and we have bus stop towards everywhere in the city, including to the beach.
notes: The listing shows the price for 1 night/8 persons. The whole space is physically divided in 2 independent apartments. The advantage is that both are neighbors and both are the only houses on this top floor.
transit: We can find plenty of paid parking around with a very friendly value. During the weekend and weekly from 7pm to 9am it is for free.
access: This penthouse has everything a group up to 8 people need to feel themselves at home.
interaction: Imagine that you have a sister living in Porto... That is exactly my role here. Let's bring up the best part of brotherhood. I have a brother, i adore him, respect him and i am always available for a brother.
house_rules: - Generosity generates generosity. That is the rule. Wherever you go, whomever you contact, please spread the best of you! Thank you very much.

host.host_about: Olá, o meu nome é Branca. Sou portuguesa. Vivi no Porto durante 20 anos, fui viajar, trabalhar e passear pela Europa e agora estou de volta ao Porto do meu coração. É com prazer que falo sobre esta cidade. É uma enorme honra poder mostrar qualquer recanto do Porto. Sinto vaidade pelo Porto! Gosto muito do clima e adoro estar em contacto com a Arte e a Natureza... Tenho a companhia de um gato encantador, Noé Fofi, e uma gata que é uma fada, a Chita, meus companheiros peludos nesta vida :-) E tenho ainda muitos amigos no coração :-) E o coração aberto para muitos mais :-)

reviews.comments: An amazing apartment/s with lovely balcony. Situated in ideal location for anyone visiting the city. Branca was amazing and provided us with local tips and was very easy to communicate with. There were plenty of amenities, this felt like a home from home!
El mejor lugar en Porto. Muy limpio y con excelente ubicación. Lleno de detalles por parte de Branca. Muy recomendable. Sin duda volvería ahí en mi siguiente visita a Porto

THE best airbnb we have ever stayed in by miles! The location is perfect, the apartaments are immaculate and beautifully decorated. Brancas attention to detail is what really makes it special, with a fridge full of fresh fruit, eggs, milk and everything you could need for breakfast on the sunny balcony! We will definitely stay here again.

Branca is very friendly, kind and helpful, certainly one of the best airbnb host, and you will be welcomed in a fantastic place that you probably won't want to leave in the morning to take the really close metro (around 500m).  Modern and cozy, you feel at home right after arriving. It's even harder to leave. Our stay in Porto was delightful, thanks to Branca and her hard work on creating a wonderfull experience. I definitely would get there again, and recomend that place and host!
Un accueil chaleureux!
Très bonne expérience. Le logement est très confortable et Branca a été très gentille de nous accueillir à une heure très tardive. Merci !

Simplesmente fantástico!!! Tornou a nossa estadia no Porto uma experiência ainda melhor. O espaço é incrível, decorado com muito gosto e com tudo. À atenção aos pormenores , tudo. Foi perfeito! Fomos muito bem recebidos numa casa que para além de ter tudo aquilo que se pode pedir tinha ainda um frigorífico e uma dispensa cheias com várias coisas. Aconselho vivamente!!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour moi et ma famille. Nous avions à porter de main tout ce qu'il faut. 
Le logement est conforme à la description, aucune surprise. 
Je remercie Kerem bey pour son accueille chaleureux et je n'hésiterai pas à revenir dans cette appartement.
Identique aux photos!! Accueil chaleureux, hote disponible reponds aux messages , excellent sejour

Great apartment with excellent location. I enjoy staying in kadıköy while in Istanbul as it's more relaxed area. Alot of amenities are near by and kadıköy ferry is around 15 mins walk away. Keep in mind when taking a taxi to take one from the right straight because of one way system and highways around the flat a short journey can get very long if the taxi is not taken from the right place. I stayed here during summer, the apartment has one AC which is not sufficient for hot summers. However this apartment is excellent for any other time of the year. All in all, I enjoyed this place, the host was great and everything went very well, I'll recommend this place to friends and if I come to Istanbul I'll stay here again.
It was great appartment!

reviews.comments:
Das Apartment ist fantastisch. Groß, schön eingerichtet, sauber und mit allem ausgestattet, was man braucht. 
Um zum Strand zu gelangen, muss man nur die Strasse überqueren. Strandkiosks, Restaurants, Geschäfte - alles ausreichend vorhanden und füßläufig zu erreichen.
José bzw. seine Eltern sind sehr freundliche, hilfsbereite und großzügige Gastgeber, die Kommunikation problemlos.
Eine klare Empfehlung meinerseits für einen schönen Aufenthalt am Meer.

Appartement parfaitement conforme à la description. Vue superbe sur la mer, propreté des lieux, localisation  proche de porto, tout est fait pour passer de bonnes vacances. l'accueil de josé et de sa maman est très chaleureux et les petites attentions prévues à l'arrivée dans l'appartement sont très agréables. Merci pour cet agréable séjour. ça donne envie de revenir. A recommander.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Gostámos imenso da nossa estadia! O José e a mãe receberam-nos da melhor forma e foram bastante simpáticos e disponíveis! A casa é bastante acolhedora e com tudo o que é necessário para uma boa estadia. O ponto forte da casa é sem dúvida a vista magnífica, dada a sua proximidade da praia, o que nos proporcionou uma semana relaxante e muito agradável! Voltaremos com certeza!

Excelente apartamento, muito bem equipado, com todas as comodidades disponíveis para uns otimos dias de descanso. 
Uma vista de mar fantástica.

Anfitriões de trato simples e de extrema simpatia. 

Resumindo: tudo absolutamente impecável.

Voltaremos assim que se proporcione.

Jose was an excellent host. He was patient & waited for us to arrive despite our flight being late at night & delayed. The apartment itself was very spacious, clean & the ocean view is unbelievable. Happy to have found this place & will definitely recommend to friends & family.

Great experience and location!
Definitely I recommend it.... ;-)

name: Montréal - Petite Patrie : idéal pour une famille
summary: Appartement typiquement montréalais. Décor aux inspirations des voyages faits par la famille dans un quartier vous conviant au rythme montréalais et au calme d'un quartier familial.
space: L'appartement est situé au premier étage d'un duplex (2 appartements).  Très éclairé et chaleureux par son style inspiré de nos voyages et les boiseries, il offre un espace réellement apaisant. La terrasse vous permet de manger à l'extérieur, vous faire un BBQ et vous détendre doucement dans le hamac. Le voisinage est calme et nous souhaitons préserver leur quiétude (party interdit) et notre bon voisinage.
description: Appartement typiquement montréalais. Décor aux inspirations des voyages faits par la famille dans un quartier vous conviant au rythme montréalais et au calme d'un quartier familial. L'appartement est situé au premier étage d'un duplex (2 appartements).  Très éclairé et chaleureux par son style inspiré de nos voyages et les boiseries, il offre un espace réellement apaisant. La terrasse vous permet de manger à l'extérieur, vous faire un BBQ et vous détendre doucement dans le hamac. Le voisinage est calme et nous souhaitons préserver leur quiétude (party interdit) et notre bon voisinage. Tout l'appartement vous sera accessible. Aucun Le logement est situé dans le quartier de la Petite-Patrie, quartier montant de Montréal. À proximité vous trouverez de tout : cinéma de quartier, boulangerie, fruiterie, épicerie fine avec grande offre sans gluten. Le secteur favorise le transport en commun en vous donnant aisément accès à 2 stations de métro (Beaubien et Iberville), aux autobus et aux vélos
neighborhood_overview: Le logement est situé dans le quartier de la Petite-Patrie, quartier montant de Montréal. À proximité vous trouverez de tout : cinéma de quartier, boulangerie, fruiterie, épicerie fine avec grande offre sans gluten. Le secteur favorise le transport en commun en vous donnant aisément accès à 2 stations de métro (Beaubien et Iberville), aux autobus et aux vélos en libre service. À 15 minutes du sublime marché Jean-Talon, 30 minutes du centre-ville, du vieux port ou de la place des festivals.  Idéal pour les familles.
notes: Un chat vit dans cet appartement. Il n'y sera pas, mais si vous êtes très allergique, cet espace n'Est peut-être pas pour vous !
transit: Autobus 18 et 94 à 1 minute à pied Métro Iberville à 8 minutes à pied Métro Beaubien à 20 minutes à pied (ou à 10 minutes via l'autobus 18) Vélo-libre Bixi à 2 minutes Stationnement sans frais aisé dans le secteur
access: Tout l'appartement vous sera accessible.
interaction: Aucun
house_rules: - Pas de bruits après 24h - Maximum de 5 personnes - Pas plus de 3 adultes

reviews.comments:
Si vous recherchez un endroit typiquement Montréalais , cozy et bien situé , n'hésitez plus. Pascale est d'une grande gentillesse et disponibilité. Nous avons apprécié ses petites attentions. Le logement est fonctionnel, très bien équipé et propre. Sa décoration inspirée par ses nombreux voyages fait que nous nous y sentons bien immédiatement. De plus, le logement est situé dans un quartier très agréable, calme et dynamique à la fois. À 2 min à pied , se trouve un grand parc ainsi que toutes les commodités nécessaires. Vous pourrez aisement vous y promener. 
Ce fût une très bonne expérience pour nous.
Logement très agréable et bien situé. Pascale est très réactive et a su nous donner des conseils pour bien choisir les petits restaurants  et commerces situés à proximité.  Merci

name: Appartement ensoleillé près du marché Jean-Talon
summary: Appartement (4 et 1/2) dans un immeuble tranquille et situé dans le sympathique quartier de Villeray, à quelques minutes à pied du marché Jean-Talon. Idéal pour une personne seule ou un couple.
space: Excellent pied-à-terre. L’appartement est ensoleillé toute la journée et donne  sur une ruelle verte. Confortable,  propre et charmant, l’appartement vous permet de vivre une expérience montréalaise ! Vous aurez accès à deux balcons, un à l’avant et un à l’arrière.
description: Appartement (4 et 1/2) dans un immeuble tranquille et situé dans le sympathique quartier de Villeray, à quelques minutes à pied du marché Jean-Talon. Idéal pour une personne seule ou un couple. Excellent pied-à-terre. L’appartement est ensoleillé toute la journée et donne  sur une ruelle verte. Confortable,  propre et charmant, l’appartement vous permet de vivre une expérience montréalaise ! Vous aurez accès à deux balcons, un à l’avant et un à l’arrière. Nous recherchons des voyageurs respectueux. Il nous fera plaisir de communiquer par courriel au besoin lors du séjour. Sympathique quartier, typique de Montréal, familial et tranquille. Idéal pour découvrir la vie montréalaise loin du flot de touristes. Cafés, boulangeries, magasins d’artisans québécois, restaurants, crèmeries, vous aurez l’embarras du choix! Et le tout à une distance à de marche.  Le marché Jean-Talon est à deux coins de rue ainsi que le parc Jarry. - À 10 minutes à pied des stations de métro Jarry (Ligne Orange), Je

Cafés, boulangeries, magasins d’artisans québécois, restaurants, crèmeries, vous aurez l’embarras du choix! Et le tout à une distance à de marche.  Le marché Jean-Talon est à deux coins de rue ainsi que le parc Jarry.
transit: - À 10 minutes à pied des stations de métro Jarry (Ligne Orange), Jean Talon (Lignes Bleue et Orange) et De Castelnau (Ligne Bleue) - À 2 minutes à pied de la ligne de bus 55 (15 minutes de trajet pour rejoindre le Plateau, 20 minutes le centre-ville) -Nombreuses stations bixis à proximité
interaction: Nous recherchons des voyageurs respectueux. Il nous fera plaisir de communiquer par courriel au besoin lors du séjour.
house_rules: - Pas de bruit après 23 heures - Respect des lieux et des effets à la disposition des locataires.

reviews.comments: Vous serez très chanceux

name: Large Luxury Hong Kong Island apartment
summary: Fully renovated building with beautiful pool, children's play area, library, squash and tennis court, snooker room, gym and children's games room. Situated in Pokfulam 15 mins by bus into Central. Easy access to taxis, buses outside the building. Walking distance to Kennedy Town MTR station. Booking periods accepted between 30-120 days.  Ideally suited to a family relocating to Hong Kong and seeking temporary accommodation or a HK based family inbetween leases or during a flat renovation.
description: Fully renovated building with beautiful pool, children's play area, library, squash and tennis court, snooker room, gym and children's games room. Situated in Pokfulam 15 mins by bus into Central. Easy access to taxis, buses outside the building. Walking distance to Kennedy Town MTR station. Booking periods accepted between 30-120 days.  Ideally suited to a family relocating to Hong Kong and seeking temporary accommodation or a HK based family inbetween leases or during a flat renovation. Pokfulam is a quiet neighbourhood yet only ten minutes drive to Central.  Minibuses and buses go from outside the door into Central and beyond. The closest MTR station is a ten minute walk or short minibus ride away and then seven minute ride into Central. The airport A10 bus route also runs outside the door every 30 minutes. Taxis are also readily available outside the door. Please note that the minimum stay is for 30 nights (discount to apply on stated day rate). The apartment comes with a live-in h
neighborhood_overview: Pokfulam is a quiet neighbourhood yet only ten minutes drive to Central.  Minibuses and buses go from outside the door into Central and beyond. The closest MTR station is a ten minute walk or short minibus ride away and then seven minute ride into Central. The airport A10 bus route also runs outside the door every 30 minutes. Taxis are also readily available outside the door.
notes: Please note that the minimum stay is for 30 nights (discount to apply on stated day rate). The apartment comes with a live-in helper who has been with us for many years and who will be available to service the apartment on a daily basis (save for Sundays).

address.street: Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Mong Kok double room private toilet near MTR
summary: Air conditioned and comes with a TV. You will find a kettle in the room. All rooms have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find slippers, free toiletries and a hair dryer (outside at counter). You will find luggage storage space at the property.
space: Astronaut's Hotel is situated in Mong Kok, Hong Kong which is the central of busy city, only about a 5-minute walk from MTR Mongkok Station, Ladies Market and Langham Place Mall. We have CCTV in the place and password lock outside the front gate for safety purpose.
description: Air conditioned and comes with a TV. You will find a kettle in the room. All rooms have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find slippers, free toiletries and a hair dryer (outside at counter). You will find luggage storage space at the property. host.host_about: I am easy going and nice

reviews.comments: 非常好的房东,离开的时候下大雨,还送了我一把伞,谢谢!
一般招待所水準的賓館,只是停留一晚所以感覺還行｡
Owner is very nice, good facilities with dryer, universal plug, microwave oven provided.
我们之前跟着地图走走错了 就直接搜索金轮大厦就好了 位置很方便 离地铁站超近 旁边就是波鞋街
地段真的很好,位于旺角地铁站步行5分钟的位置｡直接在地图里搜金轮大厦就好,airbnb的地图导航不准｡房东很周到,有事打电话联系很方便,有什么需求也可以直接说｡房间还行,因为没窗稍有味道,开一下换气扇稍好些｡因为行程定的仓促了,房价都比较贵或者售罄,这是在预算范围内能订到的比较满意的房子｡
A good basic place to stay near Mongkok Station.
位置方便,入住簡單快捷,好評~
在旺角算是性价比非常高的了
Good location but not a verycomfortable room
这种房间这个价位在香港算性价比还可以的了,需要自备牙膏牙刷,其他日常用品都有,我们的房间临街会有点吵,对睡眠质量要求高的不建议｡最大优点是位置极好且安全｡管事的大姐人很和善!
地理位置非常理想,离太子地铁站或旺角地铁站都非常近｡一分钱一分货,这个价钱对得起它的价值!

name: Modest House
summary: Modest house with 3 bedrooms, a bathroom, kitchen / living room and terrace at the height of the roof! Our house has been renovated, is very close to tourist points! 20 minutes walk from Ribeirinha, 5 minutes walk from the historic center of Gaia! The house has a bus stop in front!
description: Modest house with 3 bedrooms, a bathroom, kitchen / living room and terrace at the height of the roof! Our house has been renovated, is very close to tourist points! 20 minutes walk from Ribeirinha, 5 minutes walk from the historic center of Gaia! The house has a bus stop in front! travelers have access to the whole house! We provide bath towels and bed sheets! The house has the necessary to receive 6 people! we are always reachable and we have staff that can intervene if needed! La maison se trouve dans une rue proche des différents points touristiques ! Pour les personnes qu’aiment se promener, la maison est à 20 minutes à pied de Ribeirinha et Porto centre! Nous avons aussi l’arrêt de bus en face à la maison! Nous sommes à 5 minutes à pied du centre historique de Gaïa et du Jardin do Morro ! Enfin proche de tout sans avoir besoin des transports!
neighborhood_overview: La maison se trouve dans une rue proche des différents points touristiques ! Pour les personnes qu’aiment se promener, la maison est à 20 minutes à pied de Ribeirinha et Porto centre! Nous avons aussi l’arrêt de bus en face à la maison! Nous sommes à 5 minutes à pied du centre historique de Gaïa et du Jardin do Morro ! Enfin proche de tout sans avoir besoin des transports!
access: travelers have access to the whole house! We provide bath towels and bed sheets! The house has the necessary to receive 6 people!
interaction: we are always reachable and we have staff that can intervene if needed!
house_rules: Interdiction de monter sur le toit de la maison ni des voisins! Interdiction de faire du bruit après 22h jusqu’à 8h du matin! Ne pas faire des griffes  sur les murs ni portes! Chaque locataire doit laver la vaisselle après avoir utiliser! Ne pas fumer dans la maison! Pour chaque règle non respectée nous avons le droit de demander un montant monétaire ( indemnisation)!

reviews.comments: Le logement est fonctionnel et bien placé. (A 5 min a pied du tram qui va en ville). Nous avons meme souvent fait le trajet a pied pour économiser le prix des tickets de tram. Pour le retour il faut tout de meme etre marcheur car il y a des grosses cotes si on part de la baie de ribeira. Le logement est donc quand meme bien placé. Sinon l'interieur est fonctionnel et propore. La grande terrasse semi couverte sans vis a vis permet de profiter de l exterieur meme s il pleut et est un bon endroit pour manger et se retrouver pour discuter.  En bref nous avons passé un tres bon séjour a porto grace a ce logement avec un bon rapport qualité prix ! Je recommande
Easy check-in, very clean and spacious house, good beds. Recommended!

Julian's place was beyond my expectations!
The house is huge, three rooms, really well decorated and perfectly cleaned. The place is new, with everything you need. It's comfortable, I could spend weeks there, easily! 
It's well-located, you can go to everywhere near Rio Douro walking - and the bus stop is really close as well.
The check-in is really simple, the communication easy and my experience was amazing. I totally recommend this place!

Es handelt sich um eine saubere Wohnung, wir hatten leider keinen Zugang zur Dachterrasse und der Nachbarshund hat uns schon sehr früh durch tägliches 30minütiges Bellen aus dem Schlaf gerissen. So hatten wir die Möglichkeit mehr vom Tag zu haben. 
In allem war die Kommunikation super, Lage ist auch gut, Stadt Porto mit entspannten 30minutes walks erreichbar, Platz für drei Personen mehr als ausreichend nur leider recht laut durch Hund und Bus vor der Tür und stickig, wenn man die Hintertür zum Dach wie wir nicht öffnen konnte, da versperrt.

The only reason why we have booked the house is for the terrace! And when we arrived we found out that he has closed it! Therefore no terrace! We brought the table from the kitchen outside as it was really hot and there is not window inside! We have scratched some walls and door and he is asking for 1,300€! Ah! While we were taking shower it broke down and they have only fixed the next day... please do not book!

We enjoyed the stay at Julian's. It is just south of the river, and very accessible. Within 10 minutes, we can be in the center of town. He calls it a modest house, and it turns out to be better than many other places.
Clean and spacious house. Only downside is location a little far from the city center of Porto.
Hôte extrêmement réactif qui a su répondre à toute mes questions durant et avant le voyage . La maison était propre et correspondait à la description. super séjour !

maison "dans son jus" excentree suffisante pour un pied à terre. La chaudière ne fonctionne pas très bien les douches sont donc peu appreciables. La terrasse est entouree de taules ce qui donne l'impression d'être enfermé. La maison en perd toute sa valeur. Neanmoins les hôtes sont extrêmement réactifs et ont tenté de rendre notre séjour le plus agréable possible. merci à eux !

Un bon rapport qualité prix mais il faudrait rajouter un peu d'équipement dans la cuisine.
Contact très rapide avec l'hôte.
Bon logement à proximité de Porto

Logement propre et pratique avec ses trois chambres. Il est assez bien situé pour visiter Porto. Le logement est équipé au minimum mais cela est suffisant si l'on passe beaucoup de temps dans Porto. Un arrêt de bus se situe juste à côté !
Logement agréable, propre et confortable. Nous avons passé un bon séjour.

Un alojamiento genial si te planteas visitar Oporto con un grupo de amigos. Muy cómodo y cerca del Puente de Luis I a partir de donde comenzar la visita. Igualmente hay una parada de bus a menos de 10 minutos que conecta con el centro.

Además es una zona muy tranquila para descansar bien y con todo lo necesario para la estancia. Tanto la llegada como la salida del apartamento se hacen de una manera sencilla y autónoma.

Recomendable.
Great bargain! Easy in and out and just a short ride to downtown Porto!

Un apartamento muy limpio y con lo justo e imprescindible. Está en Vila Nova de Gaia, un poco lejos del centro de Porto, aunque se puede hacer andando. El metro está a 10 minutos de la casa (parada General Torres).
L'appartement est très propre, situé à 15 min environ à pied du métro et du centre historique. un arrêt de bus se trouve au pied de la maison!

Hôtes très réactifs.
Logement placé juste à côté de Porto ce qui est un avantage pour visiter Porto et le côté Villa Nova de Gaia qui est aussi très beau!
Seul bémol les équipements sont limités (ex : pas de tapis de bain...)
Je recommande ce logement pour son placement, sa terrasse et ses chambres

La casa está muy bien, cómoda y limpia. No está muy lejos del centro. Ha sido bastante fácil aparcar en la calle. La comunicación con Julián y Ana ha sido genial y rápida. Nos hemos quedado muy contentos. Muy recomendable

We had a great time, lovely house and the rooftop is a great bonus. Extremely clean and good location to visit Porto. If you don’t mind the neighbors dog occasionally barking in the morning, then this is a great place to stay. Thanks again
Modeste logement mais propre et bien situé.
Alles top. Das Haus ist klein, sehr sauber gut ausgestattet. Zu Fuß bis zum Fluß/Porto sind nur 15 min.

Отдельный дом на шестерых с выходом на крышу и местом для парковки. Все соответствует фотографиям и описанию! Один санузел - на шестерых немного замедляло процесс сборов, но с этим можно справиться. Расположен достаточно далеко  от центра, и идти надо в горку, что по жаре тяжеловато. Но прямо у дома есть автобусная остановка - так что этот вопрос тоже можно решить. Рекомендую этот дом - за эту стоимость он очень хорош.
Ótima casa
Very good place for its value. Nice bathroom as well and cool patio/kitchen back area to chill. Recommended.
Great location, close to the river. Big terace and lovely house.

Adoramos nossa estadia, quartos confortaveis e otima localizacao.
Bairro super simpatico, proximo a um parque.
Tem um ponto de onibus que leva direto para a parte central de porto, mas fizemos tudo a pé sem problemas.

The house was very accurate to the photos. It was clean and the beds were comfy. The house was located outside of Porto, around 30-40 minutes walk to the main tourist attractions. The key was left in a secure place outside of the house so we were able to check in by ourselves. Overall it’s an affordable basic place in a slightly far out location. The only slight defaults were that there didn’t seem to be heating therefore the house was very cold and the neighbours dogs barked consistently throughout the day.

A casa possui uma ótima localização, próximo a um parque e não muito longe do metro mas você consegue ir a pé ao Porto sem problemas. Ana foi super atenciosa, muito gentil e sempre respondia rápido, quando tivemos alguns problemas com o gás ela resolveu rapidamente. Quartos aconchegantes e casa simpática. A única coisa que sentimos falta foi de uma sala com sofá e televisão. O terraço poderia ser aproveitado com uma decoração melhor.

Jolie maison atypique mais non conçue pour 6 voyageurs en période hivernale. Pas de matériel ni ustensiles de cuisine, beaucoup de problèmes avec l’eau chaude, d’odeurs de gaz, pas de lave-linge fonctionnel, pas de rangements pour le linge et pas de chauffage en nombre pour chauffer la maison.

name: Luxury 2 storey apartment with outdoor dining
summary: This spacious split-level apartment, with outside dining area is perfect for couples or singles, providing both luxury accommodation and unbeatable convenience to the heart of Sydney.  Not only will you be in walking distance of many of Sydney’s iconic attractions but you’ll have an endless supply of incredible bars, cafes & restaurants all on your doorstep. The central attractions may be close but only a 15 mins ride by public transport are some of Sydney’s top beaches including Bondi & Coogee.
space: A unique apartment in the heart of Sydney with a beautiful open-plan living area which includes an outdoor dining area, lounge and kitchen. Upstairs you’ll find a large bedroom, double fitted wardrobes, a balcony, a multi-purpose study room and a bathroom.
description: This spacious split-level apartment, with outside dining area is perfect for couples or singles, providing both luxury accommodation and unbeatable convenience to the heart of Sydney.  Not only will you be in walking distance of many of Sydney’s iconic attractions but you’ll have an endless supply of incredible bars, cafes & restaurants all on your doorstep. The central attractions may be close but only a 15 mins ride by public transport are some of Sydney’s top beaches including Bondi & Coogee. A unique apartment in the heart of Sydney with a beautiful open-plan living area which includes an outdoor dining area, lounge and kitchen. Upstairs you’ll find a large bedroom, double fitted wardrobes, a balcony, a multi-purpose study room and a bathroom. You’ll have access to a large rooftop area with stunning views of Woolloomooloo Wharf, as well as access to the communal lower ground toilet and bins which can be accessed from the entrance corridor below the main steps. I’ll be available at
neighborhood_overview: Staying in Woolloomooloo you’ll be in walking distance of some of Sydney’s top attractions, including the Opera House, Sydney Harbour Bridge, Darling Harbour, Botanical Gardens, Chinatown and various local markets, as well as the iconic suburbs of Kings Cross, Potts Point, Surry Hills and Darlinghurst. On your doorstep is Woolloomooloo Wharf which continues to be a favourite location for visitors who seek its incredible views of the Sydney skyline. Woolloomooloo is also home to Finger Wharf, the largest wooden structure in the world. Its dining options include a variety of ethnic restaurants ranging from Asian to Italian, and visitors can enjoy a quick meal before heading off to the historic Old Fitzroy Theatre for a show.
notes: There really is no better place to explore the city of Sydney than in this location, so take advantage of all that there is to offer.  Not only are you in walking distance of all the central attractions and an endless supply of bars, cafes and restaurants, you’re only 15 mins ride by public transport or Uber to the beautiful beaches of the Eastern suburbs, including Bondi, Coogee, Bronte and Clovelly.
transit: One of the key features of this apartment is the exceptional convenience of its location. So whilst there is a selection of both limited free street parking and paid parking areas, the location lends itself to taking to the streets by foot.  You’ll be in walking distance of many of Sydney’s iconic areas and attractions and only a 15 mins walk from 2 major train connections of Kings Cross and St James, as well as numerous bus routes.
access: You’ll have access to a large rooftop area with stunning views of Woolloomooloo Wharf, as well as access to the communal lower ground toilet and bins which can be accessed from the entrance corridor below the main steps.
interaction: I’ll be available at all times to answer any questions or queries, don’t hesitate to contact me for any requests.
house_rules: - Smoking permitted in outside areas only

reviews.comments: The place is amazing, with everything you need. The location closed to most of the sightseeing places and 2 train station. Mike always response within 10mins and give valuable response. We definitely will reserve here again when we visit Sydney again.

Mike is a great host felt special picking up the keys and having barista coffee thrown in.

The space is great the photos don’t do it justice, walking distance to Woolloomoo Wharf and Kings Cross,
clean, fresh and surprisingly quiet being in an major overpass.

Highly recommend Mike as a host and the space would stay again!
Amazing place in a great location. Highly recommend
The accommodation was beautiful and well centralised. The host was friendly with great communication. Definitely recommend

name: Puamana Resort #20-2
summary: Just steps away from the lulling warm waters of Pacific, this spacious one bedroom townhouse is the perfect setting to celebrate an anniversary or a romantic honeymoon getaway.
space: The unit is close to all of Puamana’s most notable amenities- the ocean side pool, tennis and badminton courts, and the historic clubhouse originally built as part of the sugar plantation in the (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) s. This peaceful, updated home has a fully equipped kitchen, washer/dryer, air conditioning, large flat screen HD television, wifi, DVD player, and sound system. The back lanai is furnished with a comfortable outdoor dining area and BBQ, and with its serene location, you can enjoy an uninterrupted glass of champagne with your loved one, while listening to the songs of Maui’s tropical birds.  TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

summary: In the heart of the Plateau, streets away from Downtown. A bright & spacious apartment, featuring an exterior patio. This unique space boasts quality finishes, and all furnishings are of designer quality and have been selected to provide a stylish, comfortable and functional atmosphere. Minutes away from the coolest spots in the city, Foodies and adventurers have months of discoveries in the immediate vicinity. Welcome to your new home away from home :)

notes: This home is a one floor up by stair access only, and no elevator. This home comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: Mont Royal subway station is a 2 minute walk. Drivers can find free and paid street parking nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.

house_rules: House Rules 1.  All bookings must comply with Airbnb rules and regulations. 2. Check-in time is any time after 3 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 3. We do not allow smoking; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 4. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 5. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. It may be possible to obtain permission to host a party; contact us to learn more. 6. If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $40 for every extra hour of cleaning required. 7. Guests are not allowed to book a stay in their city of residence. 8. Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities.
