host.host_about:
We are young professionals, and have always had a passion for real estate and travelling. As a result, hosting on Airbnb has been a natural progression. 

We are looking forward to hosting you at one of our unique places. Along with our team of travel enthusiasts, we will  ensure you have a memorable and personalized experience, from the time you book, until after your check-out!

See you soon :)

reviews.comments: We had a great time there. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. The apartment has everything you need and the neighborhood is very conveniently located.

Exactly what was advertised. Very clean and check-in and out was a breeze. Hamza is a fantastic host, responding right away and attentive to needs of guests. If you love the Plateau of Montreal this is the place for you. Really cool decor, including the old records on the wall. We actually made an apple music playlist of the tunes you will find there for fun: (Website hidden by Airbnb)

Hamza's home was beautiful! By far the best air bnb I've stayed at. It looks exactly like the pictures. The apartment is located right off the main drag where all the shops and restaurants are at. Its a super nice area with plenty to do. Would definitely come back and stay here again!

Our stay at Hamza’s flat was short lived but more than anything we could have asked for. It’s summer so it was hot - the area was air conditioned and cool throughout but still had natural light. A lot of thoughtful touches like coffee and snacks as well as restaurant recommendations and flexibility with our flight schedules. Hamza was extremely professional and very friendly. Thanks for an awesome stay :)
A stylish apartment in an incredible vibrant location. Great value for money. Sparking clean and great communication with the host.
A nice place, perfectly located, easy communication with Hamza.

Our family of four had a great stay at Hamza's apartment. It was even more spacious than it looks in the photos! 

Check in was quick and easy, and we had everything we needed when we arrived. The kitchen was well stocked with pots, utencils, and dishes and there was even cooking oil, salt, and pepper. We especially appreciated that there was plenty of coffee and sugar. Our kids loved that there was a basket of snacks. 

The bed was super comfortable, and our kids happily slept on the twin inflatable mattresses provided. They were the nice tall ones that would be comfortable for adults, too. 

The location was fantastic! It is close to many great shops, restaurants and bakeries and a quick walk to the metro. Even though it is on a fairly busy street, we heard almost no noise in the apartment. The private terrace was amazing as well. 

Hamza was readily available through chat and quickly responded to every question we had. We would gladly stay at Hamza's apartment again!

Hamza’s place exceeded our expectations and we couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay in Montreal! Communicating with Hamza was stress-free before and during our stay and I would highly recommend this Airbnb!
Beautiful apartment in a cool location!
Hamzas place is great and equipped really well. We felt at home and the location is excellent.

We just returned from a wonderful 2-night stay at Hamza's apartment.  The apartment was exactly as advertised, very clean, and at a great location.  There are plenty of shops, bars, and restaurants right outside your door.  The metro station is just a few blocks away, which can have you in the historic part of town in under 15 minutes.  The apartment was surprisingly quiet even though the bedroom over looks a busy street that had an end of summer street festival going on.  We (and our 3 month-old baby) had no issues with street noise at any point during the stay.  Hamza is very responsive to questions/requests and even proactively checked in with us after the first night.  Overall, we were very happy with our stay and would stay here again the next time we are in Montreal.
Hamza's place was very modern, clean and well-situated. In addition, Hamza is super responsive and accommodating.

Loft très bien localise dans le quartier du plateau proche de pas mal d'animations. 
L'aménagement et la propreté sont de mise et C'est très agréable!
Je recommande  :)
Nice and cozy appartment in the best location.
Stylish space, perfect location, awesome communication

A complete must , one of the greatest rbb I have been period
Super clean , nicely spotted , huge place , host is also great and super fast to answer
Great place, super clean and in a great location. Host was amazing and replied very quickly to any questions. Would definatley stay here again!
Hamza’s stylish pad will not disappoint!  Great design and thoughtful touches, perfectly located on Mont Royal, tons of great venues to eat, drink and play.
One of the best air bnb’s I’ve ever stayed in ❤️

Thank You for being such a gracious host Hamza. I could not have asked for a better host for our weekend getaway. 

The place was fantastic. It is clean, modern, spacious and inviting. Plenty of clean linens and extra blankets. The patio and its large double sliding doors opens up the space to the outdoors. Access to the place is simple and off a main street. Parking can be tough to find at times if you do drive, but I find that true for Montreal generally speaking.

Location was convenient, about a 10 min uber ride to downtown. about a 5 min walk to the closest metro station. Close to some popular restaurants, most of which are about 15-20 min walk.

Hamza was a great host. Checked in with us to make sure things were going well. He was always helpful, responded quickly to enquiries and questions. Ensured that our stay was enjoyable and that was his top priority. I had peace of mind while we were at this place.

I would definitely stay here again when visiting Montreal in the future!

Wonderful apartment, conveniently and centrally located for those looking to explore the city. The apartment was very clean and inviting, just as advertised. For those visiting during summer, the central air is a big plus. The main bedroom is located on a main street which may be loud for those looking for a quieter spot, but I had no issues with this at all coming from another city. Thanks to Hamza for the wonderful stay!
Hamza's place is great and stylish. It's just as described. Hamza is a great host and is very accommodating with requests and is quick to respond. I highly recommend staying here.

Excellent séjour dans cet appartement qui est réellement encore mieux que sur les photos ! Nous étions avec notre fille de 2 ans et tout a été parfait. Emplacement, propreté, équipement, accueil : rien à redire ! 
Check in et Check out simple et efficace,ce qui fait gagner du temps quand on est en voyage ! 
Hamza a tout fait pour que l’appartement soit prêt à notre arrivée ce qui a été très pratique pour nous. Il a aussi été très réactif pour répondre à nos questions. 
Bref, on recommande !

Très beau condo au coeur du Plateau. Près de tous les boutiques et cafés. La chambre est bien insonorisée. Le condo est spacieux et épuré. Beaucoup de serviettes et d'oreillers disponibles. Petites attentions à notre arrivée (bouteilles d'eau et collations). 10/10
Great hospitality, beautiful and stylish apartment. Perfect location for discovering Montreal

Nous avons passé un magnifique séjour. L’appartement est situé dans un quartier idéal pour visiter et profiter de Montréal. À 2 minutes à pied d’une station de métro, il est très facile de se déplacer. Hamza était présent et communiquait avec nous. Je recommande fortement ce logement :). Merci!

“The bed was very comfortable.” — My husband.
My husband spent several days at the apartment - and really enjoyed the neighborhood. He said there was a coffee shop right there, practically in the same building. He said the apartment was very comfortable, especially the mattress in the bedroom. He even researched it so we can buy it for our home.
He noted the place had a “weird” layout, with industrial-like flood lights and back door he hesitated to open, because he was afraid to trigger some alarm. He was happy the place was comfortably warm in the cold weather. Overall he enjoyed his stay.

-Idéalement situé dans quartier très sympa. 
-Plusieurs supermarchés autour 
-Super accueil avec touches d’attention
-propreté irréprochable 

Bref une super adresse.

My fiancé and I came to Montreal for a weekend getaway and I usually visit twice a year to see family and try out new restaurants. We stumbled upon Hamza's home after our original host cancelled our reservation and, to be quite honest, we're glad it was cancelled because Hamza's home was absolutely stellar. It was so much more than we expected: spacious, clean, and equipped with all  the necessary amenities that anyone would need. We can't wait to come again and we're certainly going to be staying at Hamza's! We've found our home away from home. Thanks so much for being an amazing and attentive host!
Fantastic location and clean!

The location is great -- the neighbourhood has lots of character and everything is in walking distance including some of the best food, music venues, shops etc. Also conveniently near the metro.

The apartment was clean, well kitted-out and spacious for a one-bed. It has a long and thin open layout with the kitchen separated from the living room/bedroom by a hallway. Polished concrete floors are stylish, but slightly cold on the feet -- maybe worth packing slippers. Some fun touches like the blackboard wall and popcorn machine.

I didn't meet Hamza but check-in went smoothly and communication was good. Thanks for a great stay!
Excellent airbnb! Great apartment, wonderful communication
Super appartement très design très propre et pas bruyant en plus wifi télé et Netflix en plus

I had a wonderful experience in Hamza's. The apartment is in the heart of Avenue Mont-Royal with many coffee shops, food spots, and shops just steps away. This place was everything I could have wanted - modern, spacious, great lighting, close to the metro, and filled with Montreal flavor. I'd definitely stay at Hamza's place and recommend his home highly.

The place was great very modern, super hip and clean. The location was perfect, very close to the train station, lots of restaurants and bars. Hamza as a host was very responsive to all of our questions and concerns. Would highly suggest staying here.

Hamza helped make my stay extra comfortable and was always supportive of the changes that come up. This is a wonderful apartment right in the centre of the plateau, clean, easy to access and wonderfully connected to transport and the rest of the city. A little gem in the winter.

Une super adresse ! Des petites attentions très appréciables ( café thé eau ...)
L’appartement est très propre et spacieux et bien placé à proximité du métro et de rues très commerçantes 
L’appartement est très calme car il donne sur une cour intérieure avec une grande terrasse 
Photos de l’annonce fidèles
Really nice place great location the host always answer our requests for im coming back!
Un très belle appartement très bien situé idéal pour les vacance sur le plateau.Trés proche  du Metro  !!
Accurate, clean,  very well located.  Smells, a bit,  sometimes,  in the kitchen,  a bit like pizza from the downstairs restaurant
On a beaucoup apprécié! Super endroit et bien localisé.

reviews.comments: The downstairs Unit GH was large, clean, air-conditioned and very new.  It was better for our large group than our original reservation on the 2nd floor of the adjacent building.  From my initial email inquiry, to checking in, to the key in the lock box, to providing more sheets/blankets, Bingning and his co-host were very prompt in all responses.   The freeway access is very easy, the location is good, the minimart across the street is convenient, and the free parking was great (although the construction materials and work made it slightly trickier to maneuver).   Our team would stay here again (Website hidden by Airbnb)
Generally speaking, this is a good place to stay

Place was as advertised. Our group of 9 fit wonderfully. The kitchen was spacious and had all of the tools, etc. that we needed and wanted. My daughter was especially happy to have shampoo, conditioner and body wash provided! Whenever we asked a question or requested help, we got a quick response, which we really appreciated.

Featuring vaulted ceilings, skylights, and windows designed for natural lighting and air flow.

house_rules: - WHILE ENJOYING YOUR STAY  Please enjoy yourselves and make yourselves at home.  Please treat the home with the same respect you would treat your own home. Our “house rules” are few… please use good judgment and common sense.  Much Mahalo in advance! •	Please join in local Hawaiian traditions and refrain from wearing shoes while in the house. •	No pets. •	Wash sand off with hose, (located by garage and staircase).  Remove sand from clothes and towels before using washer and/or dryer.   •	Beach towels for the beach; bath towels for the bathrooms. •	Sand toys for the beach; kitchen utensils for the kitchen. •	When using the grill, please make sure that the grease trap (the trap is the silver removable tray located below grill), which is accessible from the front of the grill.  After using the grill, CLEAN, cool and cover. •	Please turn off lights during the day when not in use. •	Chrome trash bin is located in the kitchen.  Line with bags and keep covered.  Rubbish is picked up on Tuesd

host.host_about:
Elite Pacific Properties is the leading luxury real estate brokerage and vacation rental firm in Hawaii, with over 100 agents statewide offering everything from luxury residential property sales to multi-unit projects/developer sales, to luxury vacation rentals. Elite Pacific Properties was founded in 2005 and is the only luxury real estate firm with staffed offices on each of Oahu, Maui, Kauai, and the Big Island.

Elite Pacific Properties is a member of Who’s Who In Luxury Real Estate, an exclusive organization of the top luxury brokers in the world; has been named to Inc. Magazine’s prestigious national  “Inc. 5000” list for both 2013 and 2014; and been ranked by Pacific Business News as the 9th fastest growing company in Hawaii on its 2014 Fastest 50 list.

Our Vacation Rental Division reflects our high standards of excellence. With over 70 professionally managed luxury homes available for vacation rentals throughout Hawaii, we are committed to making sure that our vacation clients experience the very best in quality, delivery and outstanding service.

Active Member of:
- (VRMA) Vacation Rental Managers Association
- (NAR) National Association of Realtors
- (HAR) Hawaii Association of Realtors
- (HBR) Honolulu Board of Realtors

name: Luxury 2+1 Apartment
summary: 2+1 Apartment near GalataTower. Fully furnished and neoclassical designed. Located near subway station and in a lovely district.
space: The apartment is located in the heart of Galata which has the magical soul. The area is always alive, day and night.  It's only 2 minutes walking distance to Istıklal Street which has many shops, night clubs...etc. you can find anything you need, this street is always alive and magical.
description: 2+1 Apartment near GalataTower. Fully furnished and neoclassical designed. Located near subway station and in a lovely district. The apartment is located in the heart of Galata which has the magical soul. The area is always alive, day and night.  It's only 2 minutes walking distance to Istıklal Street which has many shops, night clubs...etc. you can find anything you need, this street is always alive and magical. *With Subway: Metro is very very close to the building. Sishane subway station is only 1 minutes walking distance away. You can come in 30 minuytes from Ataturk Airport diretly. *With Airport Shuttle Service: You can find an airport shuttle service which called "Havabus" from Ataturk Airport and Sabiha Gokcen Airport in every 30 minutes. It comes directly to Taksim Square. From Taksim Square, you can walk to our apartment in 20 minutes or you can take subway and come here in 5 minutes! Taksim Square is only 1 station away from the Sishane Subway Station which our apartment loc
neighborhood_overview: Galata is heart of IStanbul. It has a magical soul and history meets with hospitality in this area.  This area has a great historical heritage.  You can see many antique shops, vintage shops, coffeshops around. All the buildings are historical and they are still gorgeous since 1800s. You can see their built date on the main door of these excellent buildings.  The other thing is there is a famous coffeeshop at the same area , Lattas Coffee! Wish you a pleasant stay in advance!
notes: There is an open buffet breakfast at our hotel building, at the breakfast room.  If the guests wish to have daily open buffet breakfast service, they need to contact with reception.Daily open buffet breakfast costs 5 euro for per person.
transit: Transportation is very very easy. The apartment is ; **less than 1 minute away to the subway station. **Only 3-4 minutes away to tram station and ferry station in Karakoy **Bus stations are near the apartment. You should walk only 2 minutes. Galata is in the middle of European Side so transportation is very easy to everywhere in Istanbul.
access: *With Subway: Metro is very very close to the building. Sishane subway station is only 1 minutes walking distance away. You can come in 30 minuytes from Ataturk Airport diretly. *With Airport Shuttle Service: You can find an airport shuttle service which called "Havabus" from Ataturk Airport and Sabiha Gokcen Airport in every 30 minutes. It comes directly to Taksim Square. From Taksim Square, you can walk to our apartment in 20 minutes or you can take subway and come here in 5 minutes! Taksim Square is only 1 station away from the Sishane Subway Station which our apartment located near it.
interaction: There is a mutual reception which had open 24 hours. The reception is in the same district , less than 1 minute wallking distance to the apartment.  Even I cant contact with our lovely guests directly, they will arrive firstly to the reception. After all the check in processes, thye bellboy or the receptionist will be assisting them to their apartment with the leys! The front desk team will be at our lovely guest's disposal during their accomodation to make them feel like their home away home!

host.host_about:
Hello I'm Arzu!
I'm 28 years old and an online sales manager at Meroddi Hotels & Apartments  at Galata. 
We have hotel rooms and also the apartments in the same distrct. 
Apartments are located in historical buildings. Hotelrooms are located in hotel building. We have 3 hotels:
**Meroddi Bagdatliyan Hotel,
**Meroddi Galata Mansion
**Meroddi Pera Flats

You'll see all the room & apartment types of our hotel in my listings.

Please note that, even somedays I'm too busy at the office, we have receptions which are 24 hours available.You cn alwayscall them.

Also you can reach me on (Hidden by Airbnb) anytime you wish.
If I'm in a meetingI can't answer your phone but I always can reply your (Hidden by Airbnb) or SMS  messages 
If I cantreplyyou on time, It doesn't mean that I don't care about you, Mostly it means I couldnt see it.SometimesI got negative reviews about my late responses, Iam feeling so sad about that.
Therefore wanted to explain myself!

Anyway, I love you al!

And waiting for you to wellcome at the most magical area of the Istanbul!

Loves from Galata,
Cheers!
Arzu

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Arzu’s place is in the best place possible close to public transport and shops and restaurants. Looks exactly like the picture and the host is the most hospitable and helpful person. Loved our time in Galata and will be back
House keeping should be more cooperative
Nice two bedroom apartment with walking distance to Galata tower, Istiklal street, and Sishane metro station.

Arzu it's a great host. We stayed at another apartment than we reserved because of some issues, but she get right away a solution. We had to choose between 2  apartments super cute and close to Galata Tower. She is very nice and friendly. 
Thank you for the stay.

Great location and the front desk help was extremely helpful. Breakfast on site was a nice addition. Rooms were nice and clean and quiet at night despite the busy neighborhood. We would highly recommend!

Arzu is good host,we where satisfied with our stay at Arzu's (Website hidden by Airbnb) was littlebeat noisy and in one bedroom was bed smell of humidity.Flat is spacious and clean and the most important is that location is great,close to everything,sightseeing,shoops,caffees,metro,funicular,tram..Kitchen is well equipped,but without table and chairs!?
We arrived  in Istanbul by car,and safe parking place is just few meters from flat.It cost 30TL for a day.
Overall it was nice place to stay for 5 of us,we recommend it.Good value for money.

It was not what was described.  It was in a dark valley.  Bldg was old and there was no light on stairs.  Cause it was old it was also so smelly.  
Furniture were pretty good.

Very close to Galata Tower and centrally located in Beyoglu, however they are renting out more than one similar space and using photos from other apartments than the one you're actually renting and even if they are similar, you still feel like it's not the one you've booked.  For example, the one we stayed at did not have the livingroom couch that was in the photos and the space in general was really tiny. Due to high humidity there is also a specific smell in the whole apartment. Also, when booking, I was selecting the pet friendly places and even if this one showed up, I needed to change the sleeping arrangements for my friend traveling with a small dog as the owned did not accept pets in any way. Seems to me in Turkey there is an intolerance against pet dogs in general.

name: Casa do Poeta
summary: Our charming Casa do Poeta (PoetsHouse) is right in the heart of Porto, the main pedestrian Street Santa Catarina, with all the iconic sightseeing sights at a walking distance. The building, that has been fully renovated in 2017, used to be home for a famous 19th century Portuguese writer and poet Arnaldo Gama. The apartment is simple and comfortable, perfect for families with children, a couple, businesspeople, and provides a genuine local experience.
space: The apartment is on the first floor of the building and can accommodate up to four persons. It has one independent bedroom with double-bed, a living room with a small balcony overlooking the main pedestrian street Santa Catarina, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette, a sofa that can be turned into a comfortable bed to accommodate two people, a table for meals, air-conditioning as well as other amenities. A baby cot can be pro-vided upon request.
description: Our charming Casa do Poeta (PoetsHouse) is right in the heart of Porto, the main pedestrian Street Santa Catarina, with all the iconic sightseeing sights at a walking distance. The building, that has been fully renovated in 2017, used to be home for a famous 19th century Portuguese writer and poet Arnaldo Gama. The apartment is simple and comfortable, perfect for families with children, a couple, businesspeople, and provides a genuine local experience. The apartment is on the first floor of the building and can accommodate up to four persons. It has one independent bedroom with double-bed, a living room with a small balcony overlooking the main pedestrian street Santa Catarina, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette, a sofa that can be turned into a comfortable bed to accommodate two people, a table for meals, air-conditioning as well as other amenities. A baby cot can be pro-vided upon request. Whole apartment is available only for you during your stay. Upon arrival, we will w
neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is in the most central area of Porto and near to the most emblematic landmarks of Porto. Casa Oliveira is just few meters away from the iconic Café Majestic, the famous Bolhão market, 300 me-ters away from the Torre dos Clérigos, Avenida dos Aliados, famous li-brary Lello and just few minutes’ walk from the Bolhão Metro Station that connects the Porto airport with the city centre.  In our neighbourhood you will find best viewpoints, churches, shopping ar-eas, squares, nightspots and lots of gastronomic choices. Here you will feel the true spirit of this city!
notes: Porto is to be explored by hitting the streets and getting lost in its secrets. Each of us experiences a city in different ways. Tell us what you are look-ing for and we’ll make sure you get the best recommendations.
transit: The accommodation is very closed to all public transports of the city. You are just 100 meters from the metro station Bolhão and less than 100 me-ters from the Bus Tours, Tram Stop and Taxi cabs.
access: Whole apartment is available only for you during your stay.
interaction: Upon arrival, we will welcome you, check you in, and share tips on what to do or what and where to eat in the city, as well as answer any other ques-tions you may have. During your stay, we are always on hand to assist you whenever you deem necessary.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Прекрасная квартира в центре города . Хозяйка очень открытая и внимательная . Я получил колоссальное удовольствие от пребывания в этих хороших апартаментах . Спасибо большое

Adoramos nossa estada na Casa do Poeta! Apartamento charmoso , bem no coracao do Porto na rua Santa Cataria proximo de tudo : restaurantes, supermercado, lojas, cafes, padarias, metro, bancos etc etc! Muito atenciosas as propeietarias Alexandra e Jovita! O nosso muito obrigado ! Super recomendamos! Nota 1000!!
The flat is in a great location close to everything on the main tourist street Santa Catarina. It can be a little noisy but the new windows are quiet soundproof.
The apartment was beautiful, clean,  very comfortable, and located in a great and vibrant area! We loved our stay at casa do poeta!!

My family and I stayed at Jovita and Alexandra's AirBNB for a week. Everything ran smoothly from start to finish. The space was clean and I was able to cook some meals from the home. It is centrally located - a very quick walk to several famous sites and lots of restaurants and cafes. You should get gelato from the chocolate shop across the street! The apartment is also in the middle of all the shopping. Thanks for everything Jovita and Alexandra

Our host Jovita greeted us on arrival with welcome port and gave us lots of recommendations. We visited two of the suggested restaurants and they were fantastic. She was welcoming and informative and very quick to respond to any questions throughout the trip. 
The apartment was clean, modern and had everything we needed - iron, hair dryer, cooking utensils, TV, air conditioning and plenty of clean towels.
Having a fridge also meant we could buy food and drink and use it throughout the stay. The flat was perfectly located for what we wanted, right in the centre of the town, we spent most of the trip out exploring so it was really handy to have a base so central. However if you are looking for somewhere with peace and quiet then this apartment is not for you as the shops bring a fair amount of people and noise. The apartment building its self also had guests come and go a fair bit so we were woken up in the night a few times by other noisy guests. 
Overall we had s brilliant time and I would definitely recommend staying there if a central, convenient base is what you are looking for. A great stay :)
A really nice place to stay in Porto!

The apartment is located very central at one of Porto’s shoping street. It’s close to the metro station, restaurants and cafés. If you don’t mind a little bit of city noise, it is a perfect place to stay.
Adorable apartment right on Rua Santa Catarina. We were easily able to explore all of Porto from this base. Very clean apartment. Perfect for our trip.

This place is in a good location.  You are quite literally on the main shopping street in Porto. 
The evenings are quiet.
Excellent localization and cozy apartment! Thanks a lot to the hosts! Highly recommend!

Un petit cocon de tranquillité dans la bien commerçant Rua Santa Catarina! Très bien situé pour un week-end de 3-4 jours, Jovita nous a accueillie avec un petit verre de Porto et nous a très vite mises à l'aise ! Très bonne communication avec les hôtes et petit havre de paix très chaleureux ! Propre et fonctionnel !

Amazing appartement in an outstanding location. 
The place to stay in Porto. 
Thanks 
Walid and Sabrina

Location is key and this AirBnb is at the heart of Porto on Santa Catarina. It is in walking distance to Sao Bento station. We did not have a car as we walked everywhere in this beautiful city. The flat itself had all the basic amenities (including air conditioning) and was very clean. It was fairly loud due to its location on a busy street, but the noise did quiet down considerably after 23:00. Overall, we highly recommend Jovita and Alexandra’s place for future visitors!
Very clean and stylish furnished, the 2 nights we spent in the apartment were very pleasant

This is a lovely apartment right in the city centre. The street can be noisy at night but you can close the shutters and the air-conditioning will help if you do need to do this. The location is perfect just 5 minutes from a metro station. We had a great week here and would definitely return.

The location of the accommodation is perfect! It is located right in the centre of porto, directly in the shopping street. You can reach everything by foot in a few minutes. The accommodation is a bit smaller than it appears in the pictures, but it is still enough place for two people. It has everything needed for a short stay in porto. The only thing, which was a bit disturbing for us at night, was that the accommodation is badly soundproofed. The steps and words spoken on the floor and in the other accommodations appear very loud. Nevertheless we recommend the accommodation because of its great location.

Casa Poeta is a perfect location for a visit to Porto. A modern well equipped apartment in a historic house on buzzing Santa Caterina. It is in easy walking distance of Metro, Rail station, and all of historic Porto. Jovita was a most considerate and helpful host.

We really enjoyed our stay in Jovita's apartment. It is in the perfect location for exploring Porto and everything we needed was around us. The apartment is right on the busiest shopping street and just up from the historical cafe majestic. Whilst it is bustling during the day at night times it was surprisingly quiet. Couldn't fault our host at all... clean and comfortable place to stay, even greater with port on our arrival

Had a great stay at Casa do Poeta on Rua Santa Catarina pedestrian street. We were right in the middle of all the energy of Porto. Safe, within walking distance to most sights and fabulous Gelato shop next door. We were met by a friend of the host on check-in, no recommendations for the city or restaurants but found a brochure on the table. It was good to have air conditioning in the apartment as it was hot during the visit. There was a coffee maker but the carafe was broken so we had to go out to the café in the morning. Good cozy place for a home base to explore the city.
This place was comfortable and immaculately clean, the bed was like a dream, the shower felt great. Basically it had all the things we needed for a great couple of days in Porto.
A lovely apartment in a great location on Porto's main pedestrianised shopping street. Comfortable, quiet with lovely communicative hosts. Highly recommended

Funzionale e ben organizzato.
Posizione ottima. 
Proprietaria disponibilissima e cortese.

Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit in der Unterkunft. Die Wohnung ist toll gelegen - direkt in der Fußgängerzone. Trotzdem ist die Wohnung sehr ruhig und man hört nichts von draußen. Die Wohnung war super sauber und es war alles vorhanden was man benötigt. Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit. Einchecken war problemlos, auch obwohl wir erst spät vor Ort waren. Es gab tollen Portwein zur Begrüßung. Wir würden diese Wohnung immer wieder buchen und hatten eine tolle Zeit!

Hi there !
I do recommand the appartement for its localisation, its atmosphere and very convenient !
Thanks for all Jovita !

A wonderful weekend break in Porto ! Thanks to Jovita for hosting us . Her apartment was in a fabulous central location & we soaked up the atmosphere from the street below . Great sleeps & a great shower . Make sure to take her advice on restaurant recommendations ... they were top notch .

the place is nice but immediately above a shop that has its speakers in the ceiling so there is loud shop music to be heard in the flat from 10 am to 8 pm all the time without any break. the shop was also open on sunday so we had this annoying music everyday of our stay. apart from that it’s a great place to stay but the loud music is a deal breaker.

name: Elegant 1bed in Trendy Le Plateau
summary: Montreal! My place is steps away from the city's most popular attractions, restaurants and bars. The kitchen is equipped, the bed is very comfortable, the living area is cozy, and the apartment is beautifully renovated.  Don't hesitate to reach out if you ever need anything during your stay!! Located just steps from the famous Saint-Laurent Street, you'll be close to bars, restaurants, nightclubs, Quartier des Spectacles, and so much more.
space: Cozy, spacious and inviting, you’ll feel perfectly at home in this modern 1 bed, 1 bathroom suite. Perfect for the solo traveler, couples, small groups, and those in town for business. The apartment has a spacious closet, Double sized bed. The kitchen and living room area are fully equipped with everything you need to eat and relax after a long day sightseeing or working. The living room includes two comfy chairs to help you unwind while you watch our complimentary Netflix on the HD TV . I have full sets of linens for the bed as well as towels for everyone - so you don't have to worry about that! The bathroom includes a shower and a shared washer & dryer are also located in the building for guests to use. High speed wifi is included in the unit as well as Netflix. There are several paid or free parking options close by. Looking forward to hosting you!!

Located just steps from the famous Saint-Laurent Street, you'll be close to bars, restaurants, nightclubs, Quartier des Spectacles, and so much more. Cozy, spacious and inviting, you’ll feel perfectly at home in this modern 1 bed, 1 bathroom suite. Perfect for the solo traveler, couples, small groups, and those in town for business. The apartment has a spacious closet, Double sized bed. The kitchen and living room area are fully equipped with everything you need to eat and relax after a long day sightseeing or working. The living room includes two comfy chairs to help you unwind while you watch our complimentary Netflix on the HD TV . I have full sets of linens for the bed as well as towels for ev
notes: Keyless check-in!
transit: Many different bus lines and Metro (Subway) stations are just a short walk away
access: The entire unit is yours!
interaction: I am always available for my guests when they need me. You can message me on the Airbnb app at any point during your stay and I will do everything I can to ensure your needs are met immediately.

host.host_about:
Lover of sports, animals, and good food (in no particular order!)
Young professional expanding my business as an Airbnb host, committed to giving my guests the best experience possible :)

reviews.comments: My dad loved it! Thanks!

We really loved our stay at Nikki’s place. We communicated very easily with our host whenever we had questions. The place was spick and span at our arrival and Nikki had let us some towels to bath wich we really appreciated. The airbnb’s location is very well situated. It is close to St-Laurent and St-Catherine’s street wich is cool if you love to shop. Unfortunately, there was no parking spot available in the street during our stay, but we parked our car at Excentris Public Parking wich is 5 minutes away by walk from the airbnb. We wouldn’t hesitate to come back to Nikki’s place if we have the chance!
Beautiful place and great location!
Exactly as pictured. Nikki was a great host and the location was amazing.

Presque tout de suite après l'envoi de ma demande, Nikki l'a acceptée et a été disponible pour répondre à mes questions. Quand je suis entré dans l'appartement, j'ai été impressionné par la propreté des lieux. En plus, ça sentait bon. Le balcon donne une belle vue sur une ruelle typiquement montréalaise. C'est situé au début du Plateau, juste en haut du Quartier des spectacles, du Quartier latin et du centre-ville. À deux pas de la rue Prince-Arthur, du boulevard Saint-Laurent et du carré Saint-Louis. L'appartement a aussi un beau plancher de bois franc. Tout s'est bien déroulé. J'encourage quiconque désirant passer du temps à Montréal à choisir le logement de Nikki. Mieux qu'à l'hôtel, c'est peu dire !

Nikki's place is a short walk from anywhere you want to be in Montreal. I didn't need to drive or Uber anywhere the whole time I was there. The place itself is completely new, clean, and modern. Nikki was very quick to respond to any of my inquiries (and hooked me up with an awesome poutine spot :) Would highly recommend to anyone visiting this wonderful, unique city!
Perfect spot. You won’t be disappointed!!

We loved our stay! This lovely pied-à-terre was wonderful. The place was spotless, and Nikki was extremely communicative and helpful. The location is wonderful - perfectly situated near Mont Royal park, and the restaurants, bars and shops of the Plateau.

Nikki''s place was fantastic. Super close to coffee shops and restaurants, shops at a walking distance. You can walk or ride a bike if you prefer to go to old Montreal from Nikki''s place. The studio was super neat, clean and with everything you need . I would recommended to anyone.

The space is exactly like the pictures, and it’s very clean, cozy and quaint. It’s in a great location—walkable to Mount Royal as well as local bars, shops and restaurants. Nikki is a great host and took the time to put together a list of restaurant recommendations for us! I’d highly recommend this place for a weekend visit in Montreal!

The location can’t be more perfect. The apartment was very clean and has all the amenities needed. Nikki was always responsive and accommodating. This is a great location with tons of restaurants in the Plateau and walking distance to all the major attractions.
Wonderful space. Brand new renovation, and kept in sparkling condition. Central location allowing easy access to lots of the great things to see, do, eat, and drink in Montreal.
Very clean, stylish and new.  Great location.
Beautiful apartment close to restaurants, bars and public transit. Sparkling clean and bed was super comfortable. Would definitely stay here again.
Very clean - great location - highly recommend
Great
Very cute pad, close to downtown and the park. Especially liked the patio off the back and Nikki couldn’t have been a better host.

Nikki is a great host, very responsive and this apartment has everything you would need for a stay in a Montreal. The location is about a 20 minute walk to downton and about the same for explore the mile end. The building is very new, clean and safe and check-in is very easy. Overall the experience was very positive and we loved our stay!
Great location

Place has literally everything you need, down to a hair dryer! Absolutely beautiful apartment. It looks exactly like the pictures, it was clean and neat and just a great spot! Cool little balcony! Everything was within walking distance and it was so convienient!!!
Clean stylish place to stay! Within walking distance of tons of restaurants and bars. Parking was a bit farther than expected, but overall a great stay!

I had a lovely stay at Nikki’s place on a solo adventure to Montreal for 3 nights. It was incredibly clean and looked brand new. There is a lovely terrace in the back that is very quiet and overall the building and apartment were super quiet. The location is perfect—not far from everything you need in the Plateau but on a pretty quiet residential street. Nikki was very easy to communicate with and gave me updates as needed. I’d highly recommend this place.
Great  clean place and the location was perfect.
This place is so clean and in a perfect location for everything you would want to explore in Montreal. Nikki is so nice and helpful!

The location is amazing if you are into clubs; I personally found the flat itself quite stylish and easy to walk to old town from.

I highly recommend staying here

Nikki’s place is an amazing spot to stay in Montreal — centrally located in Le Plateau with great coffee shops, bars, restaurants and breweries nearby. Especially great is the proximity to Mont-Royal, if you enjoy running outdoors. The apartment is very charming with a cute small back porch. We arrived to find it very clean, and the AC worked great (necessary in the 90+ degrees we had this August). There is also Netflix connected on the TV. The only (small) downside is that the shower pressure isn’t great.
This was a great apartment for visiting Montreal.  It’s in a cool neighborhood and easy to get around town from here. Nikki was very responsive and a helpful host.

Very cute and comfortable spot right by all of the hip areas of Montreal. 10 Min walk from Mont Royal, Chinatown, about 20 min walk from downtown. Super super clean and convenient. Only problem was the internet went out at one point and that issue was not resolved for the remainder of the stay. It wasn't a huge problem since there are plenty of cafes in the neighborhood, but it was not ideal. It did not ruin the trip though!

Nikki is a great host and the place is spectacular! Not large but a stylish, clean and cozy bachelor suite right beside St Laurent and lots of shops, restaurants and bars. Communicating with Nikki was always easy - very quick to respond. Great little jem worth every penny!
Pas grand chose à redire si se n’ est PARFAIT.
Wonderful location. Clean, lovely accommodations.
Fantastic unit and location. Works very well for business travel.
Lovely apartment, modern furnished, well equipped and clean. Perfect for 1-2 persons. Will stay here again if I ever come back to Montreal.
Lovely stay. Really clean. Well located. Perfect for a few days in Montreal.

Nikki's place is an outstanding value in a great location. The neighborhood is centrally located and very easy to get around in with out a car. The apartment was so clean and communication was great. Thank you so much!

I stayed in this apartment while in town for a work conference. It was great! I would stay here again and recommend it. Easy self Check-in, great communications, super clean, and in a great location but on a quiet street.

Nikki's place is very stylish, comfortable,  and clean.  We loved the location, so close to Boulevard St. Laurent, and we were lucky to find free on-street parking right outside (but read the signs carefully!)  Thank you, Nikki!
This was a great home for us the 2 days we were in MTL visiting family. Beautiful building, spotless interior and great location for us. Would stay here again when we come back to Montreal.

This place is exactly as it seems and more. It is very stylish and is in a fantastic neighborhood. It's close to downtown but such a cool neighborhood to hang out in. Even the bed is comfortable (a slat bed).  

The kitchen has everything you would want to cook with as a bonus. Though Montreal restaurants are soo good you might never get to use them.
Excellent property in a lively part of the city, close to the centre. I loved the restaurants and cafes nearby.

the apartment was very nice, clean, simple and organized. 
Easy to get in and out of the building. Not too loud or busy with other people.
Great location to nearby bars, restaurants and activities. 
overall good and would to others.
Very nice place
Really nice place in an awesome neighbourhood. Would stay again for sure.
Je recommande cet endroit bien aménagé et bien tenu

this space is a perfect Airbnb to visit some of the coolest parts of Montreal.

great value, super clean, super easy to check in.

easy recommend.
Great stay and perfect location.
très bien

Best Airbnb we've stayed in! Everything was clean and in great condition. We were so impressed with the quality of the apartment. When we booked, we wondered if the size of the space would be an issue, but the finishes are beautiful and the apartment is very well laid out, cozy, and highly functional. 

The thing that really impressed us the most was how well equipped the kitchen was. As a couple who tends to cook a lot, this was greatly appreciated. We've noticed that a lot of Airbnb hosts say they have a well equipped kitchen, but they have just a few plates, glasses, and cutlery. This place has everything you would need: non-stick pans, nice knives, cutting boards, can opener, baking sheets, strainer, salad bowl, French press, toaster...everything. There was also oil, vinegar, coffee, etc. The kitchen also has a nice layout with great counter space and a bar to eat at.

The location is great. We were within walking distance to grocery stores, shops, pubs, and cafes. It was a nice neighborhood, quiet and safe. We also had no trouble walking from there to many of the attractions we wanted to see, including Old Montreal. However, the Metro is close by (Sherbrooke station) and can quickly get you anywhere you need to go.

Nikki and Jean-Louis were great hosts. We would definitely stay here again.
Excellent accueil, grande hospitalité de la par des hôtes, ils ont su bien nous accommoder. Emplacement génial, nous recommandons cette place à n’importe qu’elle voyageur!

Wow, wow, wow! Nikki’s place is just great! Super location close to shops, restaurants and cafes! The apartment is recently renovated and all looks just perfect! Host and co-hosts super accommodating and kind! Thanks for everything!

My boyfriend and I stayed at Nikki's place during our stay in Montreal.  This place is in a great location, right next to shopping, the Metro, endless restaurants.  Nikki's place is very nicely decorated and included all the necessities for preparing food at the apartment.  His place was also very clean and easily accessible.  There were also nice tips left for you if you're not familiar with the area.  We were very happy that we found this place and hope to return in the future.  Thanks Nikki!
Perfect location to be in the center of it all!
Amazing location! Very convenient.
Une belle place à 10 minutes du métro et tout proche des bus, idéal pour un séjour à Montréal.

Nikki was a great host. He responded quickly to any questions we had and was accommodating. The place was very clean and well-kept. The kitchen was well-stocked , and the bed was very comfortable - perfect after a long day of exploring the city. The location was perfect. It’s within walking distance to everything you could need! We loved it so much we extended our stay!
Really brilliant apartment and really good value!

This is a great place. It's super clean, everything is new and tidy. I spent almost three weeks here, and what's great about the place is that everything's there: from umbrella to ironing board, and from whisk to knife set. Everything you reasonably might expect to need---it's there. Couldn't have been happier with it!
Highly recommended!

name: Double room only for pet lovers!
summary: Beautiful spacious room in a shared flat in the heart of the Barcelona's oldest district.  The room has 1 comfortable double bed, TV, AACC...  Filled with all major sights, restaurants, bars and boutiques in town, Gothic is the city's oldest and most charming district, and Barcelona´s heart. With all the history of the Old City a stroll through the culture of these streets is a must.  La Rambla  is at 3 minutes by walk. Apartment is on the 3th floor without elevator!
description: Beautiful spacious room in a shared flat in the heart of the Barcelona's oldest district.  The room has 1 comfortable double bed, TV, AACC...  Filled with all major sights, restaurants, bars and boutiques in town, Gothic is the city's oldest and most charming district, and Barcelona´s heart. With all the history of the Old City a stroll through the culture of these streets is a must.  La Rambla  is at 3 minutes by walk. Apartment is on the 3th floor without elevator! You have free access to the common areas - kitchen, toilet, living room (and the terrace prior notice). I will provide you with clean bed sheets, a selection of pillows and fresh towels. The house is equipped with  iron & iron board, hairdryer, WIFI access and HIFI sound player. You'll be staying at the start of the Gothic Quarter, the very heart of old Barcelona and only a 3 minute walk from the center of the city, Placa Catalunya. The location could not be any better, since it's at the VERY center while still managing to
neighborhood_overview: You'll be staying at the start of the Gothic Quarter, the very heart of old Barcelona and only a 3 minute walk from the center of the city, Placa Catalunya. The location could not be any better, since it's at the VERY center while still managing to avoid the noise and craziness of the neighbouring streets (being in a small side street located just before the madness starts.) Highlights include: 1. Placa Catalunya, the center of the city from which you can go anywhere in Barcelona and Catalunya. Is a 3 minute walk from my place.  2. The famous La Rambla street is around a 2 minute walk away. 3. The shopping street of Portal de L'Ángel is literally around the corner, a 15-second walk from our place. 4. The Cathedral of Santa Eulàlia, is 2 minutes away. The Picasso museum is around 8 minutes away, and Gaudi's Casa Batlló is around 7. It also takes 10 minutes to make it to the port, and a 15-20 minutes walk will see admiring the Barceloneta beach. 5. You're at the center of everything but
notes: You will also love the huge private terrace (prior notice) and the peacefulness of the place.
transit: Located in a little pedestrian street beside PORTAL DE L'ANGEL, only 2 minutes walk to LAS RAMBLAS and the nearest metro station, 2 minutes from the Townhall, 10 min walk to the Old Harbour and 15 to the Beach. There is a Starbucks at the corner. You will LOVE the very central location close to everything, BUT in a very calm, and silent  street, a peaceful spot in the heart of the city.
access: You have free access to the common areas - kitchen, toilet, living room (and the terrace prior notice).
interaction: I will provide you with clean bed sheets, a selection of pillows and fresh towels. The house is equipped with  iron & iron board, hairdryer, WIFI access and HIFI sound player.
house_rules: Not allowed to take the dogs outside.

host.host_about:
Born and raised in Barcelona. I have two wonderful dogs with whom I share my life! I am an easy going girl, who loves to travel, watch a good movie or listen to some music. We don’t spend much time at the apartment, as me and my dogs, love to travel, hike, trekk... 

Our home is in the heart of the city,  surrounded by incredible, ancient and modern spots. I will always available to give you advises  and suggestions about the whole city and zone! 

I hope you feel at home at my place!

name: Quinta Adágio
summary: Casa de pedra com piscina privada, ideal para uns dias de descanso em (Website hidden by Airbnb) todas as comodidades para passar dias maravilhosos.  A 70km do Porto, a 45km de Aveiro. A 35Km dos Passadiços do Paiva | (Website hidden by Airbnb) |    A 17 km da frecha da Mizarela | (Website hidden by Airbnb) |

A 35Km dos Passadiços do Paiva | (Website hidden by Airbnb) |    A 17 km da frecha da Mizarela | (Website hidden by Airbnb) |

reviews.comments:
Uma casa óptima para um retiro e para um convívio com amigos. Localizada numa zona extremamente calma, a quinta Adágio é uma casa incrível com uma piscina óptima e condições óptimas. O Sr. Cipriano é muito simpático e atencioso, sempre disponível. Adoramos a estadia. 
Recomendo para umas férias calmas e essencialmente para um convívio com amigos com churrasco, boas conversas e tardes na piscina fantástica.

Un paraje espectacular y un alojamiento a la altura de lo esperado. Un placer descansar unos días en un lugar así. 100% recomendable para todo aquel que quiera disfrutar del Pais vecino, Cipriano está atento en todo momento, y te recibe con una botella de brut, a la casa no le falta detalle, carbón, barbacoa, freidora.....todo lo que puedas imaginarte y mas, la piscina espectacular, sin ninguna duda repetiremos experiencia

Para todos os que procuram descansar uns dias com amigos ou família, podem esperar o melhor deste espaço. A casa tem ótimas condições com muito espaço e tudo o que é (Website hidden by Airbnb) piscina e a zona de churrasco muito agradável.  
O Cipriano mostrou-se sempre disponível desde a reserva e  deixou-nos muito á vontade. Um espaço para voltar noutra ocasião.

Una casa perfecta si buscas tranquilidad y te acompaña el buen tiempo. Es simplemente preciosa y tiene todo lo necesario para que tu estancia sea más que cómoda. La piscina, el jardín y su cenador con horno y barbacoa son estupendos y Cipriano te facilita la leña y el carbón vegetal !!.
El trato es exquisito, siempre atento a tu llamada (para lo que sea) pero en ningún momento aparece por el alojamiento si no es requerido. La zona donde se ubica la casa es la típica aldea portuguesa, similar a las existentes en Galicia y su entorno, montes y rios, es espectacular. A pocos minutos enuentras bares, restaurantes y zonas de asadores/merenderos y, si quieres hacer compras, en Vale do Cambra hay de todo.
Una experiencia genial !!!

Dépaysement garanti ! 
Très bon séjour,Cipriano est un hôte remarquable,pleins de petites attentions envers ses voyageurs
A recommander sans hésitation
Um espaço agradável, bonito e rural, para escapar ao dia a dia das grandes cidades, ideal para momentos em família e/ou refúgio a dois.
Obriagdo Cipriano, excelente casa!

Hemos pasado 4 días en la casa de Cipriano y la estancia ha sido perfecta. La casa impecable y con muchos servicios, una chimenea estupenda que canlentaba toda los radiadores de la casa a la perfección, el salón muy cómodo para los 8 que fuimos, y la cocina muy completa, con todo. Volveremos, Cipriano. Gracias.

Foi uma ótima estadia. A casa é muito confortável e está totalmente (Website hidden by Airbnb) a lareira e o aquecimento dá um conforto ainda maior. Receberam-nos bem e tinham tudo ao dispor para a nossa estadia. O único problema é não ter wi-fi e não ter rede em muitas partes da casa, o que por um lado pode até ser uma vantagem para uma estadia mais tranquila. Aconselho.

name: Comfortable room in a cosy flat in city center
summary: Single room for 2 people in a cosy flat in city center.
space: Central location near Taksim . Friendly people living neighborhood . Also very close to Osmanbey metro station . Very nice street with lots of local cafes and restaurants .
description: Single room for 2 people in a cosy flat in city center. Central location near Taksim . Friendly people living neighborhood . Also very close to Osmanbey metro station . Very nice street with lots of local cafes and restaurants . Living room , dining area , kitchen , bathroom . its pretty big area and  we have lots of space  that we can share . I can help my guests about the places they are wondering in İstanbul. Very friendly neighborhood . lots of nice and young people . local cool cafes and restaurants around. you will have fun when you hang out at the street. 5 mins walk to the Osmanbey metro station. if you like to walk to Taksim 15 mins. from very nice street . 10 mins. walk to Nişantaşı. We have a house keeping service once a week at wednesdays.

host.host_about: Hello , i am Özgür . Living in the city center of Istanbul with mu twin brother. Working as an interior designer . Love to travel and cooking worldwide cusine .

reviews.comments: Thanks Ozgur. Nice place, nice hosts, polite. Comfortable, clean, location... all great.

Thanks again Ozgur for our stay in your flat. We instantly felt at home. I loved your decoration taste! We had the biggest room of the flat, really bright with really confortable bed. And we were lucky enough to be alone to enjoy this huge apartment! Everything you need is there, bathroom and kitchen are both well equipped. The area is very safe, and only a few minutes away from Osmanbey metro. We didn't meet Ozgur, but his friendly neighbor Harun. Both of them were reactive to any requests. I will definitely come back to this flat in case of a future Istanbul trip!

Set on 15 tropical, low-density, private and quiet acres. Relax under the power-shaded ocean view lanai. Upgraded, comfortable, contemporary furnishings. Fully equipped kitchen, washer-dryer, AC throughout. WiFi, close free parking, beach gear. Close to Kamaole III and Keawakapu Beach. 3 blocks from Wailea. Must-see tropical pool.

Quiet, private location with great ocean views from the living room and lanai. Both bedrooms are Master Suites, with private lanais, AC, and TV's. Tennis, two tropical pools with hot tubs.

reviews.comments: This place was amazing. The location is great, the amenities are great and there is plenty to do in the area or a short drive away. There are tons of shops and eateries less than a half mile away in either direction. There are three grocery stores within a five mile radius as well as more places to eat and shop including Outback Steakhouse, Ruby Tuesday, Huli Huli Chicken & Ribs and several other chain places. You are only steps from multiple beach parks and if you are a runner or walker you can go for miles. Great unit, awesome location and I would definitely recommend it. We had four adults (two couples) and a child. The child slept on an air mattress but could have sleep on the pull out sofa. The space can comfortably accommodate six.

When we arrived on a Sunday afternoon, we found the place was not yet cleaned up and readied for us due to some miscommunications with the host and cleaners.  However, as soon as we got in touch with someone the situation was promptly addressed and we later walked into a very clean and welcoming place.  I didn't want to bring this up since the later results were exceptional, but I did want others to know how Kevin owned up to the issue and took care of it promptly.  All was forgiven and we had the best stay EVER! The place was exceptionally clean, the amenties were A++, the location couldn't have been more perfect as we were withing walking distance of food places, shops, and the beach.  Great oceanview from the lanai where every morning I enjoyed my cup of tea over the serene and beautiful view.  Thank you so much Kevin for your kindness!!

Kevin was great at getting back to us.   The place is exactly as advertised.  It's in a nice quiet complex near some great beaches.  Check-in is easy and the view is great.  The complex does have  a lot of rules around noise (including at the pool) for both kids and adults so you may want to bear that in mind if you want to let everyone loose.

This condo is spacious and offers great views.  The pool is close by and the office staff are great too.  We had an initial problem with some pests and some areas that weren't as clean as we had hoped, however Kevin sent a crew right away to deal with these things.  Thanks for a nice stay.

What a lovely view! The space is wonderful and tastefully decorated. The grounds of the complex are very nice. There is a cute little beach just across the street that hosts a few sea turtles every night. I highly recommend.
Awesome location! Awesome condo! Perfect for our family of three :)

Kevin's place is in an amazing location. Perfect to explore the island. The complex has two pools (we preferred the upper pool) and he provides everything needed for a fun day on the beach or pool. The interior is nice, the view from the balcony priceless. We even got to see some whales! Multiple beaches, restaurants, and shops are in walking distance- but we used our car daily to explore and drive to all the amazing sights Maui has to offer. Kevin was very quick to respond, and replaced a broken toaster right away. On a side note: We did encounter some critters in the apartment, and Kevin scheduled an exterminator to come by. Overall, I would recommend staying at his place! Aloha
Great location - close to everything and  as a bonus, my 5 year old loves tea pots and there are many here

summary: Un logement de couple, très chaleureux et éclairé. Situé au centre ville pour une marche au clair de lune, à côté d’un lac,beaucoup d’épiceries,d’arrêts de bus et de restaurants.  En plus de son ambiance aimante,l’immeuble est tout aussi animé par sa terrasse avec un barbecue, une belle vue sur toute la ville,ainsi que les environs proche du vieux port.Pour les obsédés de sport, une salle de sport et piscine sont à disposition pour vous au rez-de-chaussée. Un bon logement,pour un très bon séjour
space: Appartement cordial proche d’épiceries,du vieux port et situé au centre ville. Les voyageurs peuvent profiter du beau temps à la terrasse,et garder leur ligne en utilisant la salle de sport mise à leur disposition.

reviews.comments: Great place, well decorated, clean and in a prime location. My only criticism is that there wasn’t a lockbox and we had to coordinate times with the owner to pickup/drop off the keys.

Nice spot, good location. However, perhaps this was just an unfortunate anomaly, but the apartment had not been cleaned between the last guest(s) and myself, so I had to do that myself - not a great way to start a trip. Also, I had an issue with getting into the apartment as the host was unable to meet me. Essentially I had to wait in the lobby for a stranger to let me in.
Le logement est très bien situé mais Ikram aurait avantage à classer un peu ses choses afin de laisser de l'espace aux voyageurs pour s'installer: frigo, salle de bain..etc.

Cute little condo south of Griffintown 3 minutes from the Lachine Canal, however that makes for a bit of a hike to the nearest metro of the 'happening' parts of Griffintown restaurants/shops/nightlife, and unfortunately the area is presently (summer 2018( undergoing extensive construction. Ikram was a good host and excellent communication, quick to respond to and requests or questions - unfortunately we had a few hiccups with arrival and towels etc, but we managed to sort them out in the end.

Loved the location and shops nearby! Great bike ride to old Montreal and the hospitality was great! Ikram replied very quickly and we were able to really enjoy ourselves. I think my only negative was the lack of towels, paper towels , toilet paper in the condo.
Great location and communication during my stay. Thanks!
Excellent recommended 100%
The condo was very nice and clean. Amazing view! Ikram was answering my txt and calls very fast... communication very clear. Will come back!
Emplacement idéal, à pied du centre-ville et près des ponts. Notre chien a adoré le parc à chien juste en face, très pratique.
Great location, very good value for the price. I appreciated the easy check in and the view from the appartment was amazing.
Better than the pictures.  Nice quiet building.  Can be a bit of a trek to downtown but we enjoyed the close walk to the canal.

Ikram's place was quiet, clean and comfortable. It was a 20 minute walk to the metro and has a lovely view of Montreal. Ikram responded very quickly to any questions or concerns we had. It was our first time visiting Montreal and this place made us feel at ease.
Great place.

Nice, kind, and super helper host 
He answer very quickly 
His place was super clean 
Merci beaucoup
It’s a nice place to stay
Had a great stay! Everything was close to where i wanted to visit downtown.
Would stay again
Great location. Great condo. Perfect for a solo traveller. Would recommend to stay here.

Great Find 
Value for money
Homely feeling
Zouggari's place came as advertised, very fresh and new! We will be back!
Great location, great place. A couple of things that could have been better, but overall pretty happy.

reviews.comments: Although the house is new and nicely located, the listing is inaccurate, and the hosts did not have the place prepared for guests. We were clearly their first guests. After a delayed check-in, we were greeted by broken window shutters and air conditioning units that didn’t function. The apartment lacked the WIFI, laptop friendly work space, and washer/dryer units which are included in the listing. The hosts behaved more like landlords and did not apologize or go out of their way to help us when problems came up. They only reluctantly put a bed frame in the second bedroom (I had to insist, repeatedly). They refused to compensate us for the WIFI we were forced to purchase, although WIFI was on the apartment listing. We later found out that the TV was not set up either, so we couldn't use it. The house lacked other essentials: a table to eat on, trashcans and trash bags, pots or pans, hangers for clothes or towels, napkins/washcloths, etc. Anyone looking to book the place should verify that these problems are solved before reserving, because the apartment could eventually become a nice spot to stay in. At the moment, though, it was a rather bumpy stay.

summary: Habitación muy espaciosa y luminosa en piso de estilo romántico y acogedor. Acceso a baño privado, cocina y salón. A 10 minutos en bus de Plaza Cataluña. Hay 2 baños, uno privado para los huéspedes, con ducha.
space: Ofrezco un espacio cómodo y agradable. Me encargaré de que te sientas a gusto, aunque no soy profesional de la hostelería y tengo otro trabajo, por lo que prefiero que vengan personas no excesivamente exigentes. Si tienes mente abierta y eres una persona independiente y positiva dale a reservar!
description: Habitación muy espaciosa y luminosa en piso de estilo romántico y acogedor. Acceso a baño privado, cocina y salón. A 10 minutos en bus de Plaza Cataluña. Hay 2 baños, uno privado para los huéspedes, con ducha. Ofrezco un espacio cómodo y agradable. Me encargaré de que te sientas a gusto, aunque no soy profesional de la hostelería y tengo otro trabajo, por lo que prefiero que vengan personas no excesivamente exigentes. Si tienes mente abierta y eres una persona independiente y positiva dale a reservar! Los huéspedes tienen acceso a toda la casa excepto las otras habitaciones. Podrás comprar en el supermercado, cocina, lavar tu ropa, plancharla, ver la tele... y en definitiva, sentirte como en casa! Estoy disponible para consejos, indicaciones y cualquier cosa que puedas necesitar. Tendrás asimismo privacidad garantizada. Café, té y azúcar (otros productos de desayuno no incluidos). El apartamento se encuentra en el barrio del Eixample, en la plaza francesc Macià. Es un barrio tranquilo
neighborhood_overview: El apartamento se encuentra en el barrio del Eixample, en la plaza francesc Macià. Es un barrio tranquilo y muy accesible al centro de barcelona. A sólo 10 minutos en autobús del centro, pero sin el ruido y los inconvenientes de las zonas más turísticas.  Puedes llegar a cualquier lugar que quieras visitar en relativamente poco tiempo y a través de numerosos transportes. Puedo asisitirte para indicarte cómo llegar donde necesites.
transit: Muy bien comunicado con metro, bus y tranvía. En plena Diagonal. CÓMO LLEGAR: Desde el AEROPUERTO de El Prat: Coger el metro hasta zona universitaria y de ahí el tranvía a Plaza Francesc Macià (40min en total). Se puede llegar también en bus, consúltame si prefieres esa opción.  Precio taxi aproximado: 30e (15-20min) Desde SANTS ESTACIÓ:  (15-20 min de trayecto)  El bus 27 se coge nada más salir de la estación, en la parada Plaza dels Paisos Catalans/ St Antoni. Hay que bajarse en  la parada Buenos Aires/ Comte d Urgell. De ahí andando es menos de 1 minuto. En taxi tardarás 10 minutos y costará unos 10e. También se puede llegar en metro, consúltame si prefieres esa opción.
access: Los huéspedes tienen acceso a toda la casa excepto las otras habitaciones. Podrás comprar en el supermercado, cocina, lavar tu ropa, plancharla, ver la tele... y en definitiva, sentirte como en casa!
interaction: Estoy disponible para consejos, indicaciones y cualquier cosa que puedas necesitar. Tendrás asimismo privacidad garantizada. Café, té y azúcar (otros productos de desayuno no incluidos).

host.host_about: Hola! Qué tal? Soy una persona tranquila, ordenada.. Adoro viajar, cocina y practicar yoga. Soy psicóloga y hablo inglés y francés con fluidez. Estaré encantada de acogerte en mi casa, sólo espero que recuerdes que es un hogar y no un hotel, por lo que puedes esperar un lugar cómodo y limpio, pero no grandes lujos! Espero que podamos establecer una relación satisfactoria para ambos! Saludos!

name: Beautiful family house

A cleaner can come to help in the house (Monday, Wednesday and Friday mornings).

reviews.comments: L'appartement est propre et fonctionnel! Identique aux images! ;) Proche du centre-ville, nous avons pu marcher facilement où nous voulions sans prendre de transports en commun. Ricardo donne de très bons conseils, surtout pour la nourriture locale !  En face, petite boulangerie où nous avons manger tous les jours de manière excellente et à petit prix.

Apartamento acogedor, limpio, bonito, en zona céntrica y con todo lo necesario.
El vuelo llegó con retraso por la noche y en todo momento la propietaria estuvo en contacto con nosotros para recibirnos en cuanto llegáramos al piso. 
En general perfecto!
Great location, great host ! Near to the city center. The appartment is very clean and confortable.  It was a great choice ;)

Não tenho o hábito de fazer comentários após hospedagem. Mas, neste não posso deixar de falar. Apartamento novo e extremamente limpo. E, nunca recebi uma tanta atenção em uma hospedagem. Pedro me ajudou em tudo que precisei, parabéns. Recomendo. Nota 10. Retornando ao Porto, não tenho dúvidas de onde ficar novamente.

Very nice and cozy apartment. It's clean and modern. Quiet at night, but very close to a lot of cool bars and restaurants.

We had a great stay and didn't have any complaints. The host provided a lot of useful tips on our arrival and allowed us to do an early check-in (our flight arrived at 7am) which was really convenient.

We'd definitely repeat next time we go to Porto.

Hello
The apartment was very Clean and welcoming. It is perfectly located : close to Trinidade metro station, where you can take all metro lines, you can walk easily to thé center. The street is quiet but you can take ear balls with you....for the seagulls ;)
Pedro welcomed us in the studio, je was very Kind and provided good advices for our first stay in Porto

name: You'll remember the hospitality forever :)
summary: a modern flat in the center of the city. Five minutes by walk to Taksim Square and Istiklal Avenue (Istiklal is both local and touristic center of Istanbul. It runs from Taksim Square nearly all the way to Galata Tower. 10 minutes by walk to Nisantasi (This district has many of the world’s top fashion brands. It is a shopper’s paradise, with Prada, Louis Vuitton, Armani and l’Occitane, to name a few, lined up. Prices, in general, lower than in European capitals.)
space: gay friendly

Prices, in general, lower than in European capitals.) gay friendly you can use the kitchen, the bathroom, the living room and the entrance of the flat. I will be pleased to help you about all the questions that you might ask about the city. While Şişli (read as Sheshly) is often regarded as one of the upscale districts in Istanbul, there’s a lot more to it than just 5 star hotels and shopping malls. For a taste of Turkish culture, you can find impressive museums, churches and mosques all around this opulent district. Going to Şişli really is an experience of contemporary Turkish
neighborhood_overview: While Şişli (read as Sheshly) is often regarded as one of the upscale districts in Istanbul, there’s a lot more to it than just 5 star hotels and shopping malls. For a taste of Turkish culture, you can find impressive museums, churches and mosques all around this opulent district. Going to Şişli really is an experience of contemporary Turkish life.  You can see;  Atatürk Museum (Atatürk Müzesi), located on Halaskargazi Street, Atatürk Museum is a three story house museum painted in pink. Atatürk, the founder and the first President of the Republic of Turkey, first used the house for storage and residential purposes, but it was later changed to a museum to exhibit some of the personal belongings of Atatürk and depict his lifetime through historical documents and photographs. Since Atatürk did actually live and work in the house during significant historical events like the War of Independence and invasion of Istanbul, you will have a true experience of Atatürk’s life and Turkish history
notes: I have two cats  named Leo & Lisa. Leo is a 9 years old Siamese cat, I can tell that he is very friendly, he can come and sit on your lap after a few hours. Lisa is a 3 years old stray cat. She was in a very bad physical and psycological situation when I have adopted her from a vet. Now she is very happy and cool. You will not see her most of the time since she does not like to talk to the strangers :)
transit: ıf you come by plane to Istanbul Ataturk International airport (in the European sideof İstanbul) or Sabiha Gokcen Airport (in the Asian side of istanbul) the first thing you need to do is to get Turkish Liras – If you don’t have Turkish liras on you, use one of the many ATMs in the airport to withdraw some cash money. None of the transportation options mentioned below will accept credit cards, foreign currencies or big Turkish lira notes. Make sure you have some 5, 10, 20 or maximum 50 notes handy. Make sure that you write down or print out the address of my flat. Istanbul is a huge city. So, if you need help, just hand over the piece of paper. It’s not unusual for a taxi driver to ask for directions at traffic lights or call me. You can take Havabus. It is a municipality owned reliable airport shuttle service. You can find them outside the airport terminal, in the second lane. Every half hour, between 04:00 and 01:00, one of their buses heads for Taksim. The current pick-up and drop-o
access: you can use the kitchen, the bathroom, the living room and the entrance of the flat.
interaction: I will be pleased to help you about all the questions that you might ask about the city.

host.host_about:
Love a good party with family and friends.  I love attending as many festivals and live shows possible.  My last travel destination was going back to Haiti this past December.

Book: The Game, by Ken Dryden.  
Movie:  Do The Right Thing, by Spike Lee.
Show :  Billions, on Showtime.
Music:  Everything!! From The Heartbreakers to The Wailers!!

I like to travel light with my  voyages planned out.  However,  Am  I always ready for a last minute change?  Yes!  Especially if something wonderful emerges in mid trip.

I am a calm, generous and attentive host. Let's remain respectful of each other's time and space.

Personne accueillante et conviviale
