Konrad est un hôte très sympathique. Sa vie est aussi remplie qu'intéressante. Un séjour très agréable, je recommande !

name: At Home in HONOLULU
summary: Spacious one bedroom aprtment in the heart of honolulu.  Just recently refreshed to make any stays in Honolulu both comfortable and affordabe.
description: Spacious one bedroom aprtment in the heart of honolulu.  Just recently refreshed to make any stays in Honolulu both comfortable and affordabe.
house_rules: - -Quiet hours - 10pm-8am 7 days a week

host.host_about: Realtor and Property Manager.  Always interested to hear how I can make your experience better.  Safe travels.

reviews.comments: Claude was great! Place was clean and had everything we needed.
Well located, close to everything, a perfect spot for a couple! Clean and had everything we needed!

Very conveniently located to drive all over in Honolulu! Minutes away from Waikiki, Ala Moana Shopping Center and Kaka’ako.  It is in a residential area, but it was safe and quiet. 

The apartment was very clean and organized. WiFi signal was strong.  The parking is directly in front of the door. 

The shower had plenty of hot water available. It is very small, and has low water pressure, so it was hard to wash my long hair.  The bathroom was very clean.

Claude was very responsive and easy to get ahold of.

I, along with 3 friends, came to Honolulu for our best friends wedding. Upon checking into our hotel, we realized that the pictures from online were fake and the hotel was gross. We frantically searched for an Airbnb that would allow us to check in ASAP (within 2-3 hours). Claude not only graciously accepted our inquiry, his apartment was perfect for us! Clean, with enough space to move around. Also perfect location for us, only minutes from the wedding hall. We enjoyed our stay and would love to come back!
非常好的房子,设施非常完善,非常干净,漂亮,厨房很大,阳光很好,早上吃早餐非常享受!喜欢,还愿意再来!

Easy check-in & great price for being in town close to everything. Older apartment building-but the inside was nice, well kept & clean. A/C was a plus and parking stall was right in front of apartment. Highly recommended!
The BnB was cozy, comfortable, convenient, and in a great location (near restaurants and other attractions). Overall, great value!
Claude’s place was amazing & perfect for our trip. Clean & lots of amenities!
very nice!! it has a lot of amenities.
Great spot, close to many local specialties. Claude was very responsive and welcoming. We enjoyed our stay very much :)

Very bad experience, the apartment was dirty, dusty, many things were stained.  Despite our requests, the host preferred to minimize the matter and make decisions that benefited him and did not want to keep his word.  I don't recommend it at all.

Amazing location! Really close to restaurants and grocery stores. We had no problem finding it. This place also has everything you need! The kitchen has everything you need to cook a meal. We also really appreciated the extra towels and blankets, and the washer and dryer! Really came in handy after a muddy hike. Perfect place to stay for a group of 4! We would definitely book this place again.

This place was great! My party and I felt pretty lucky to find such a great space in Honolulu for a very good price! It was especially great to have a free parking spot and the entire place to ourselves. Definitely recommend!
En general el servicio fue bueno.
Clean, parking infront of apartment, and in good location. Will stay there again.
Claude’s place was a last minute book and saved us. We have originally booked somewhere else but was horrible. It’s in a great location and it was clean. The check in was easy!
Great location if you want to stay in town. Great value. Excellent communication.
Nice location to be central to tons of activities. Free parking in front of the place is a real bonus. We enjoyed our stay and would gladly return.
Great place. Very convenient to sites and city.
Claude represent the true Airbnb spirit.  He was quick to respond to all my questions. Overall a decent experience after some initial hiccup.

Pros:
Good location close to many places
Clean
Responsive communication
Easy access to laundry
Parking

Cons:
Dated and older looking 
Musty
Not comfortable second bed
No AC in front room

depends on what you are looking for, in our case we felt we paid for a 3 -4 star place but ended with a 1.5-2 star place.
The place was clean and fully stocked and was also larger than we expected.  Check-in and check-out happened without any issues due to the excellent instructions.  Would definitely stay again!
Great location close to Waikiki.
Thanks for the stay! Great location, nice room too.

name: Apartment in Montmartre, Paris
summary: A beautiful and cozy apartment in the north of Paris with view on Sacré Coeur. With records, candles, bathtub and nice neighbourhood with very nice neighbours as well.
space: The apartment is in the 18th district in Paris, close to M° Jules Joffrin (L12) and Marcadet-Poissonier (L4).  Whenever I take the train from Gare du Nord (to Belgium) or Gare de l'Est (to Germany), I always walk to the train stations. If you arrive by plane to CDG or Orly, you just take the RER B to Gare du Nord and you can change into the metro (line 4) towards Marcadet-Poissonnier and walk around 150m to arrive to the apartment.  The apartment is desirably located and close to with pubs, restaurants, cafes, ATM machines and markets... I will be telling you my favorites and guide you through your journey when needed. The only difficult thing about the flat is that there is no elevator and it is on the 6th floor. But once you are up there, you appreciate being calm and surrounded by daylight during daytime. I used to throw myself out whenever it is nice weather, but now that I live in this flat since a year, whenever it is a sunny day, I just lay for some sunbath. There is WIFI and al

host.host_about:
Hello,

I am a dancer and choreographer based in Paris and working abroad very often. 
I guess that I am living at other people's homes more often than I spend time in my own house because of the touring schedule. Sometimes I spend time in such lovely places that it makes me feel good and help me to focus on work. I take pictures to get inspired for my own living space... I would like to share this experience and make you feel home in a charming city where accommodation is always a big problem.

Looking forward meeting you,

Bahar

reviews.comments: I had a very nice trip to Istanbul. The apartment is very nice and you feel like at home in there. The location is just perfect, you can walk to taksim in 5 minutes. I really liked the place a lot.

Our hostel is providing a good location for  benifits of convenience to get to public transpotation like MTR Jordan station and the bus stop to airport just 3-5 mins distance . To create the extraordinary experience with music, each room are given  a distinct theme classic,fairtale,fantancy and moderin ..etc. Music is the universal language no matter where you come from. Either you can sing in a hall or in a bathroom, you will starting to love this place no matter you are backpacker , youth traveller ,couples or family,we are best option for you.

interaction: Reception hours: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

host.host_about: I love travel! We look differently when we experience different life!

reviews.comments: Enjoyed our stay! Thank you very much! :)
Yanne is very helpful and prompt. No hard time getting your requests.
服务态度很好,老板很nice很细心,会向游客介绍附近的景点以及推荐美食,住宿的环境也很棒!麻雀虽小五脏俱全!整体来说真的很不错,下次一定再来!
位置非常好!就在香港很有名的庙街内!楼下就有非常多的商铺!美食超多!
香港果然是寸土寸金呀,房东很热心,服务周到,可能是我们回去晚了,遇到热水出了点问题,房东后面也帮忙另外提供了洗漱地点｡
交通很方便,离佐敦地铁站很近｡香港寸土寸金,所以空间很小｡三个人能住下｡楼下很多吃的,可能有些吵｡
地理位置比较好找,服务也很热情,唯一缺点就是香港话我们听不太懂,沟通有点小障碍[捂脸]
卫生间小点,别的都还好!

name: Terrace- park view, great location, quiet street.
summary: Best of both worlds- our renovated heritage terrace has a park view in a quiet neighbourhood, yet is a short walk from the amazing atmosphere in Newtown. 2mins from busses, 5mins from train station, both options 15min to Sydney CBD- or you can drive as we have a private rear access car park.
space: Gorgeous original wrought iron out front and a renovated  open plan kitchen, living and dining room makes this terrace great to look at and relaxing to be in. The kitchen is fully furnished with everything you need to cook or just relax on the couch with a wine.  We have a unique rear lane access with a garage that can accomodate one car but you can park a second car in tandem behind the garage.
description: Best of both worlds- our renovated heritage terrace has a park view in a quiet neighbourhood, yet is a short walk from the amazing atmosphere in Newtown. 2mins from busses, 5mins from train station, both options 15min to Sydney CBD- or you can drive as we have a private rear access car park. Gorgeous original wrought iron out front and a renovated  open plan kitchen, living and dining room makes this terrace great to look at and relaxing to be in. The kitchen is fully furnished with everything you need to cook or just relax on the couch with a wine.  We have a unique rear lane access with a garage that can accomodate one car but you can park a second car in tandem behind the garage. The entire property is yours from 2 bedrooms (each with queen beds), 1 full bathroom, toilet in garage, open plan kitchen, living and dining, outdoor deck with bbq and seating, laundry in the garage, and a couch that can sleep (and has done so many times!) and extra guest comfortably. We can be there to giv
neighborhood_overview: This terrace is in a quiet street, directly opposite a park. This is a great spot for families but also a short trip to Newtown and the CBD if you’re looking for some action.
notes: St Peters train station is only 450m away and we are very close to the city. If you’re from out of town and haven’t checked out Newtown, you definitely should! It’s just around the corner and will find everything from cafe’s, bars, restaurants, boutique shops and there are often events on.
transit: You an literally choose any transport option! One car spot in garage and another spot in tandem allows you to drive. There are also bus stops 2mins walk and St Peters train station 450m away, so plenty of choice here.
access: The entire property is yours from 2 bedrooms (each with queen beds), 1 full bathroom, toilet in garage, open plan kitchen, living and dining, outdoor deck with bbq and seating, laundry in the garage, and a couch that can sleep (and has done so many times!) and extra guest comfortably.
interaction: We can be there to give access to the property and will leave you be to relax.
house_rules: This is our home, so please treat it like one. You are welcome to use everything in the kitchen as you please, but all other belongings in cupboards and draws are out of bounds. Dishes to be washed, or we charge a $50 cleaning fee.

reviews.comments: Fantastic place, amazing location,  and Arianne made it all so simple with her wonderful communication
Arianne's place is well located in the city, close to most of the places. It was great to stay there and wish to meet them soon.

Really nice house, modern and full equipped. Arianne and Phillip are amazing hosts, making you feel like in your own house. They responded fastly to any enquiry and were always worried about us and our hispitality.
Can’t mention how convenient the place was. Adrianne was quick to respond to queries. She was flexible with check in and out. The place is equipped and it was a great base to get to the city.
The house is spacy, with nice back yard and very clean. It is close to public transport. Communication was easy with Arianne. I recommend the place!

Arianne's place was exactly like as (Website hidden by Airbnb) was cosy and comfortable..the location was great as it was near the train station..arianne was a good host very responsive.. eventhough i didnt have a chance to meet her but her mother denise was very nice welcoming me and family to the house..

name: luxueux appartement ,a partager en colocation
house_rules: L appartement doit rester propre en tous temps vaisselle dans le lave vaiselle ,douche propre après usage , enlever chaussures extérieur  entrer les coussins extérieur pour ne pas qu’il sois pas décolorée par Le Soleil  Je vous fais de l espace dans le garde manger et frigo pour vos effets personnels

host.host_about:
J’ai un condo luxueux vue sur le lac St Louis près de 
l aéroport de Dorval Trudeau 
Ma chambre est située au 2 étage mezzanine je loue une grande chambre avec TV internet Wi fi  au premier plancher niveaux du salon salle à manger cuisinette 1 salle de bain à partager j’aime mon condo, face à la  piste cyclable la vue est magnifique je vous prête mon vélo à la location à pieds des resto , Epicerie ,Stationement,pour visiteur

name: 2- AMAZING FLAT IN RIO DE JANEIRO 201/301
summary: A Brand new flat in the best point of Santa Teresa! The flat is located in a quiet street within walking distance of 2 minutes from Museum Chácara do Céu, Parque das Ruínas, and the famous Color Steps (Selarón). Bars and Restaurants are very close!
space: Fully furnished and well-equipped apartment with cable TV, High speed internet WIFI, Split Air Conditioner, sofa bed and a comfortable Queen size bed in the bedroom.  The apartment has 110V and 220V sockets. The apartment also includes Sheets and towels, Washing machine and soap for laundry for the first wash. The Building has an incredible terrace which overlooks the city and the Sugar loaf mountain. The view is just amazing!  This Apartment doesn't has the view from Sugar loaf mountain, just from the deck (Common area ). We have more options in the same building with view in our profile.  We have our office in the building and our manager will help you with all you need. She will give you relevant information about the neighborhood, travel, dining suggestion as well as many insider tips to make your stay just perfect. neighborhood_overview: Santa Teresa is the most charming neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro. It is located on top of the centre of Rio de Janeiro. It is famous for its winding, narrow streets which are a favorite spot for artists and tourists.  It is home to several artists and art studios and galleries.  The atmosphere there is relaxed, the neighborhood is colorful place, with great music and full of pubs and restaurants.  Wonderful views of the city can be appreciated.
notes: We have optional cleaning service for just 10 Eur/Day. If the stay is more than 15 days we give a cleaning services once a week free of charge.
transit: Sugar Loft Building is in the heart of the city, close to all it’s famous sites. Here, you can easily go anywhere, whether it’s by subway (7min walking to the nearest station), taxi cab, bus or with the traditional and famous tram of Santa Teresa. Their vehicles are the symbol of the neighbourhood! Copacabana Beach is just 10 minutes by car or Taxi.
access: The Flat is located in a quite street of Santa Teresa, near all major tourist hotspots of Rio de Janeiro. Public transport is easily accessible and well connected to the city.  (The metro " Gloria Station ) it is 7 minutes walking, bus stop just 1 minute from the building or with the traditional and famous tram of Santa Teresa. Their vehicles are the symbol of the neighbourhood! Copacabana Beach is just 10 minutes by car or Taxi. 5 minutes walking from Lapa and 3 minutes from the principal street from the neighborhood  where you can find all bars and restaurants with a typical Brazilian food.
interaction: Always happy to help guests. Walk to bars and restaurants. Check in at 3pm (but flexible if the apartment is available and cleaned by cleaning lady)
house_rules: The Apartment is not a party place but rather a quiet getaway spot. No loud parties are allowed. Smoking inside is strictly forbidden - 250BRL will apply to security deposit in case of smoke smell found inside the apartment. You are welcome to smoke outside if you wish.

host.host_about: ESTAMOS DISPOSTOS A FAZER COM QUE TODOS TENHAM UMA EXCELENTE ESTADIA NO RIO DE JANEIRO

reviews.comments:
What a place! They’ve done a great job remodeling a classic old building 
overlooking the city (with great view of Sugarloaf Mountain). Spotless, 
secure, modern, and comfortable, with a tasteful, minimalist design that 
is hard to find in this city. It’s in front of a very special – and 
well-stocked! – old neighborhood bar where local legends, artists, and 
musicians hang out every day.

The location on the edge of Santa Teresa is magical: it’s on top of the 
hill, but there are busses ( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) and motorcycle taxis (near 
the Gloria metro station) that make getting there easy. The famous tiled 
steps and Flamengo park are close by, and within just a few minutes you 
have the madness of Lapa or the convenience of the metro, but the 
location is amazingly peaceful. Cannot wait to get back here someday!

Marcela did everything to make my stay perfect. She helped me with all the things I needed and getting around. The apartment was perfect for me. A good kitchen, bed and a little balcony. I like it that it is away from the touristy locations. It is a more real Rio experience this way. The apartment is located on a hill. It is about 15 minutes walking to the subway and there is also a beach at about 30 minutes walking. There's also a bus that stops close by. I can recommend this place.

I had an amazing experience by staying here. The flat was newly modernized, looking like a hotel room, in a building with about ten flats available for rent. The view was towards the sea and the Sugar Loaf mountain, so very beautiful. The internet is good, with a unique router for each apartment. The TV has about one hundred channels available, most in dubbed in Portuguese. The room comes furbished with a drawer in the wall, with a fridge, freezer, cooker, washing machine. Soap and shampoo is provided for the first day, and detergent enough for a month to wash cloths. 

The hosts were very warm in welcoming me, providing advice about visiting Rio and a complex Rio tourist map (you can have this map from the airport as well, as well as other materials about tourism in Rio). One day when I lost the key, they waited me late at 11.30 when I arrived with a new set of keys. 

The neighborhood of Santa Teresa is safe and well lit. But you should know the flat is on the top of the hill, and you need about 15 minute climb from the Gloria metro station or 10 minutes from Lapa and the famous stairs Selaron. However, there are also taxis by motorcycle for 3 reals from Metro Gloria, as well as buses that can take you to the Central Station for also 3 reals. Being at the top of the hill gives an amazing view over the city, especially the Sugar Loaf mountain. In front of the flat there is a small shop from where you can by water, beer, fruits and even pizza to go.  The Lapa neighborhood has many nice bars. And right on the hill there is the Museum of the Ruins, where on old house has been offered to the tourists to see the city from its top floors, given an even better view. 

Also the price was very good for the quality.

Overall, a great experience. I recommend it.

Nous avons passé un super séjour dans l'appartement de Marcela et Frédérico! Le quartier est un quartier bohème juste au dessus du fameux quartier dansant de Lapa et à 5 min en descente des escaliers colorés de selaron. Une petite épicerie se trouve juste en bas de l'appartement, parfaite pour les produits de première nécessité, ils font d'ailleurs de très bonnes pizzas et sont très aimable.
Frédérico est très disponible et répond rapidement lorsqu'on le sollicite. Les photos de l'appartement sont très fidèles.
Rio est une magnifique destination nous y avons séjourné 1 mois sans regret.

The apartment is just great, loved it!
Very nice new and clean.
When you had a place in Copacabana before you will just love the quietness in Santa Teresa.
There is a bar/mini-supermarket at the other side of the street which is handy. It is not far from Metro station Gloria, a bit hike up the mountain but no problem when you are healthy.
I got a local prepay phone card which is handy for foreigners as you cannot buy this yourself (need to register with a social security number). My luggage was delayed and Marcela and Frederico had it delivered at their place and brought it to the apartment. All in all great service. I didn't need much more help but am sure that you can ask them for tips to visit Rio too. Thanks for the nice stay!

There’s not enough accolades I can offer to express how happy I was to stay at this wonderful place! It truly is an Amazing Flat In Santa Teresa! Frederico & Marcela were absolutely charming and made sure my stay was very close to perfect. The views from several units are spectacular with unobstructed views of Pão De Açucar-Sugar Loaf Mountain and the neighborhood of Santa Teresa is very appealing. Walking down the hill or taxi, bus or van to Lapa, Centro or Gloria metro station is only literally minutes away. I was very fortunate to find this "Amazing Flat In Santa Teresa" and I highly recommend.

Frederico and Marcela are amazingly nice people!  I was there during Carnaval and Frederico and Marcela were nice enough to have drinks available for the occupants.  Their place is located on the border of Gloria and Lapa.  It's literally 5 min to the Lapa steps and 7 min to the Gloria metro.  The area was very safe and the streets were well lit.  The room has its own balcony and small amenities to sustain yourself.  I really enjoyed myself in Rio and I will return!!  Thank you for your hospitality!
The hosts are very welcoming and provides everything you need! Even have a brochure with all the must see's and the greatest restaurants in the area!
Espaço limpo , confortável , muito bem localizado

This place is awesome. It's so clean, the shower is hot, and Amelia dropped by twice to help us out with the stove and to bring us a separate set of keys. Santa Teresa is the best neighborhood too! We loved it.

Amazing place to stay in Rio. Forget about Copacabana, Botafogo, Ipanema and Leblon. Stay in Santa Tereza and enjoy the best part of Rio. The apartment is wobderful, equiped, clean and the service is just perfect. For sure I'll stay there again.

The place is great and well located. It is close to the nightlife in Rio (about a $2 Uber ride from Lapa, which is quite convenient). The kitchen had everything we needed and the studio had plenty of space. It is in walking distance from the Celaron steps and from the classic St Tereza street car. They were great hosts and assisted us in everything we needed. Five stars for sure. We can't wait to return next time we're in Rio.
Hermoso departamento. Limpio y ciudado.

Good room @ Santa Teresa. Better to rent a car. Stairs of Santa Teresa can be hard. Otherwise Uber still working, Taxis are crooks in Rio. The room is enough for 2 to small for 3 but if you search something cheap it will be enough. Communication and check-in were perfect. Great host-Service. All in all I would recommend the room for the price. Thx

Fui muito bem recebido pela Amélia, que me explicou a região, deu dicas de bons lugares e foi super simpática. Para quem quer fugir dá zona sul, sta Tereza e uma ótima oportunidade para conhecer o rio de janeiro e apreciar um bela vista dá janela.

Estamos mas q conformes con el departamento, el barrio, la atencuon de Amelia q es sumamente encantadora y dispuesta a resolver cualquier cuestion (nos llamó a Uber xq no teníamos la aplicacion, nos dio adaptadores para cargar las baterias de los celulares y nos asesoró para los paseos). El único inconveniente es q el departamento es por escalera pero el resto de las comodidades (cama muy cómoda, aire, electrodomésticos, etc.) hace q valga la pena la estadía. Los felicitamos!

La casa es hermosa! Y la atencion de Marcela muy calida y servicial. A muy poca distancia esta el transporte para llevar al centro. El barrio es muy tranquilo, seguro y tiene todo al alcance. Destaco la atención de Marcela, que fue EXCELENTE!!
El alojamiento cumple con lo que promete en la publicación, es moderno y confortable en su equipamiento. Y la atención de su gerente Amelia es destacable! 100% recomendable.

logement typique dans un quartier juste en haut du Sélaron. l'appartement est clair, très propre, très bien équipé. Beaucoup de rangements, spacieux pour cuisiner. Il reste très fonctionnel. nous avons eu la chance d'avoir un appartement avec balcon pour observer la vie locale... très agréable

Execelente apartamento, muy limpio y remodelado por dentro, espacioso , con una vista increíble y cerca a una tienda en donde puedes encontrar cosas como snaks, Amelia súper atenta y nos aconsejó muy bien para conocer tanto experiencias turísticas como locales!
The place corresponds exactly to the presentation and the photos. We had a nice stay there, definately kids friendly ;)

One of the best apartments I have stayed in Rio.  The neighborhood has plenty of character but seems quite safe specifically where the apartment is located.  The amenities included are great and the building is very unique.  Highly recommended.
This is a very nice apartment in Santa Teresa.  The apartment is nicely appointed and very comfortable.  It is walking distance to the main cafes / restaurants in Santa Teresa.

Good place in the very cool Santa Teresa neighborhood. Though it was a short walking distance from restaurants/bars and main attractions it was a very quiet and peaceful area. We felt safe the entire stay. Our host was sure helpful and gave great recommendations as well.
Frederico e Marcela são ótimos anfitriões, com boa comunicação e super acessíveis. O apartamento é perfeito; muito agradável e com boa (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, me hospedarei novamente.
Apartamento pequeño pero bien situado!
Mooi, strak appartement! Toen we de gastvrouw zagen, kregen wij goede tips en ideeen! Top.. appartement vlakbij leuke touristenplekjes!!

Very well furnished flat, stands out in the Santa Teresa area. Great views over Rio from the back of the building. Location is very close to a great venue where lots of music events, exhibitions, etc take place. 
It's a short stroll from the top of the famous Celeron steps and the Bar do Serginho where they also tend to have street parties on weekends. 
They have several individual flats very tastefully and thoughtfully renovated with various of electrical sockets, essential in Brazil. And we had the best internet in Brazil! The TV was very conveniently located. 
The compact kitchen seemed to have the essentials and anything else was quickly provided - we did not get into any cooking. 
And last but not least, we were given top advice from the flat manager as what to do and where to go in Rio, not to be missed!

Our stay at Santa Teresa was absolutely perfect. The place is exactly like in the picture. We felt very safe !
The communication went perfectly, everything was clear and well organised !
We will be back for sure, thank you to Pedro, Ameria
Recomendamos mucho el alojamiento, está muy bien equipado para varios días de estadía. La zona es muy bella y tranquila, está a metros de medios de transporte. Esperamos volver nuevamente!

Great located appartment, perfect for two people. Thank you for the restaurant, bar recommendations!
The communication was great, also during our stay!

Great apartment. This was a unique Air BnB experience in that they are very professional in how everything is set up with full-time staff to help you with tourism throughout the city.

Santa Teresa is a really beautiful neighborhood that I felt I was in a unique and authentic neighborhood. You are on top of a hill which sets you up for amazing views but plan to walk down hill to get to the subway and uber uphill to get to the front door.

If you get a chance, take a city tour with Bike in Rio on the first day you are there to a get a better idea of how Rio is laid out and it will give you a better idea what is accessible from Santa Teresa and how to better arrive to the surrounding neighborhoods.

The apartment is exactly like the pictures.  There are other apartments in the building that dont' have windows facing the street that you can pay a bit more for but all in all we enjoyed our apartment.  What you see in the pictures is what you get.

Appartement conforme aux photos. Situé à 5 minutes à pied de l'animation de Santa Teresa, 2 minutes des escaliers Selaron, dans une rue assez calme. Tres propre. Amelia, la manager presente sur place nous a bien recu, et a pris le temps de nous donner d'excellents conseils sur Rio et les alentours de l'appartement. Le wifi fonctionne bien egalement.
Je recommande.
Foram super ágeis na comunicação e o apartamento é lindo, além de estar super limpo  :)

Le logement est comme sur les photos, propre,fonctionnel très bien situé près de l'escalier de Saleron , du parc des ruines , des arcades de Lapa et des restaurants. L'accueil d'Amélia a été très chaleureux , elle a pris le temps de nous écouter, nous informer et nous conseiller tout en prenant en compte nos souhaits et nos contraintes. Elle a même fait le booking du taxi pour notre départ . La communication est facile car elle parle Anglais et Espagnol. Un endroit que nous recommandons. Un grand merci à nos hôtes.

As fotos são iguais ao local, o ambiente é muito limpo, confortável e decoração bem contemporânea.  O local é muito  bem localizado, próximo aos grandes pontos turísticos de Santa Teresa/Lapa/Gloria.

Quero voltar em uma próxima oportunidade ao local, parabéns pela organização e sucesso!

Great artsy neighborhood with old cobblestone streets.  Close to historic sites and very safe.  The apartments were very clean and modernly decorated.  Each apartment has stunning views and it's own character.  I've stayed in several other sites in Rio and I HIGHLY recommend Sugar Loft.  I can't wait to return and try a different apartment.

Todo fue fácil en el Sugar Loft: la llegada, tips al llegar para disfrutar mejor Río, y el barrio de Santa Teresa... Incluso cuando nuestra lavadora no funcionó (aunque lo que realmente sucedía es que habían dejado la llave del agua cerrada) Amelie se ofreció a hacer la colada por nosotros!
Zona segura, con muchos restaurantes cerca, y a 15-20 reales en Uber de las playas de Ipanema y Copacabana.

Difícil resumir a estadia no espaço da Marcela, só estando lá para vivenciar a singularidade de Santa Tereza. O bairro é super charmoso e acolhedor, e o contato com a natureza é um capítulo à parte, além da vista maravilhosa, pois o bairro é localizado em uma  parte alta da cidade. Há bares e restaurantes, e um pequeno comércio local que satisfaz itens de primeira necessidade. O apto é super limpo, recém reformado e com boa roupa de cama e toalhas, além de equipamentos na cozinha para refeições peqenas. Super indico o espaço e os anfitriões.

O apartamento tem um tamanho ótimo, cheio de guarda-roupa, super limpo e organizado, tudo tem um detalhezinho que facilita a vida, não falta nada! É bastante fácil conseguir informações, a vista da área comum é linda, a localização é boa, a rua é segura. O bar do Serginho, que fica na frente, além de charmoso cobre todas as necessidades básicas. A locomoção de lá para os pontos turísticos da cidade não é difícil, o próprio bairro tem diversos atrativos.

Really delightful apartment, fabulous lighting, comfortable bed, good Wi-Fi and shower, and a little shop with everything you need across the road. The view from the communal terrace is awesome, and Santa Teresa is a great buzzy neighbourhood - albeit one that requires strong legs to navigate it's steep hills.
Thank you, it was a great place and Amelia was very friendly and helpful.

The apartment is great and is as modern and nice as pictured. There were a few ants and ant like bugs but the staff responded as soon as I called. The neighborhood is great and full of tourist during the day, but is not safe after dark.
The unit is in a very safe nice location. We had everything we needed upon arrival. Our host was very helpful and gave us many travel tips. Highly recommend this unit!
O espaço é incrível, minha segunda ida e voltarei outras vezes certeza. A localização é ótima!!!

Wir raten dringend davon ab dieses Apartment zu buchen
Es war sehr unhygienisch die Lage äußerst problematisch

Very nice remodelled apartment in a great neighbourhood, Santa Teresa. Host was difficult to contact, needs to be more attentive to guests. Beware that water in apartment is not potable and host does not provide any bottled water. A lively fun eclectic area, close to many attractions. Very peaceful blocos, good music, dancing and laughter. No violence, very safe.

Cet appartement est simplement parfait! L'emplacement est idéal!

Une mention spéciale pour la vue du toit sur toute une partie de Rio... Mémorable!
São excelentes, super atenciosos e apartamento super limpo e com uma vista maravilhosa, vale a pena

Frederico and Marcela’s place was extremely clean and very organized. Actually, it’s probably the most organized Airbnb that I’ve ever stayed at. Check-in and communication between the hosts was also excellent. Having said this, I don’t feel like the area is very safe. I have lived in Brazil for 5 years and am generally able to distinguish “safe” areas from “unsafe” areas and I do have to say that the area the loft is in, isn’t the safest. For you to have an idea, several Uber’s and Taxi drivers refused to go up the hill to drop me off because of the abundant number of assaults & robberies happening in the area. In addition, there are posters up all over the neighbourhood warning travelers about the real possibility of being robbed. So, getting around by foot especially at night is challenging and finding an Uber is equally as difficult. If you are okay with this, though, I’d recommended Frederico and Marcela’s place. The view is spectacular.

Stay here if at all possible. My apartment had everything I needed for home away in Rio. Located in a quiet neighbourhood it takes only 25 mins to ipanema beach. Not overrun with tourist, safe and local shop owners look out for the guest at this apartment complex. My host communicated with efficiently via the Airbnb app and via text message throughout my stay... even during off hours. I’m coming back to Brazil and choosing to stay here again. Thanks so much !!

O apartamento estava limpíssimo, com cozinha, banheiro, e máquina de lavar (Website hidden by Airbnb) para nós! Não podia ser melhor, um charme!
O “SugarLoft” é muito bem localizado, com lindas vistas, gerenciado pela Amélia, para o casal de donos Frederico e Marcela, que vivem em Barcelona, mas são muito presentes em comunicação por mensagens e emails; todo mundo de enorme gentileza, recomendo! 
O prédio não tem elevador, mas para quem tem uma longa jornada sentados num carro, como no nosso caso, as escadas são especialmente bem vindas.
À princípio estávamos um pouco hesitantes quanto a segurança do bairro, mas ficamos felizes em saber que rua está bem policiada e que não tem havido ocorrências indesejáveis. Nosso carro ficou na rua, sem problema, os 3 dias que ficamos hospedados e foi fácil achar vaga para estacionar bem próximo do prédio. Amélia, que vive na vizinhança, nos disse que anda pelas redondezas sem preocupação e que devíamos apenas evitar a Celaron, uma escadaria para o Centro, durante a noite, sentimos esta segurança. A experiência foi memorável e pretendemos voltar!

O apartamento é novo, lindo e muito limpo. Exatamente como na foto. Houve um pequeno desconforto com relação ao valor que paguei e o valor que o apartamento estava anunciado no Airbnb na hora que fiz a reserva mas foi tudo resolvido, nos colocaram num apartamento com uma vista linda e que corria um vento delicioso. Eu tive uma necessidade especial com relação ao horário de check-in que foi prontamente atendida. Recomendo muito os apartamentos de Frederico & Marcela e com certeza voltarei se houver oportunidade. PS: foi um pouco difícil de chamar Uber de lá então, se precisarem de transporte, é melhor pedir com um tempo de antecedência e tentar outros aplicativos de táxi mesmo (foi como eu consegui).
Super indico! Localização mega privilegiada e apartamento impecável! Super limpo e gracioso na estética! Foi uma ótima estadia!

Nous avons séjourné dans le studio de Marcela qui se trouve à Santa Teresa durant une petite semaine. Les lieux étaient propres et accueillants avec tout le confort et le nécessaire dont nous avions besoin. L’immeuble est sécurisé et est privé (uniquement voyageurs Airbnb a priori). Juste en bas il y a un petit commerce alimentaire qui dépanne bien. Santa Teresa se trouve à environs 30min de l’aéroport de Rio, 20-25min de Copacabana et Ipanema et à 5min de Lapa, quartier animé (vendredi et samedi) le soir avec des restaurants et des bars très sympas. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié la réactivité et l’accueil que nous avons eu et retournerons avec plaisir chez Marcela a notre prochain séjour à Rio de Janeiro.
Tivemos tudo como combinado.
Cumpre o que promete ! Espaço bem legal !
Tudo foi ótimo! Obrigado!!

This apartment was amazing, perfect for our stay in Rio, the bed was super comfy and also a great shower. Kitchen was well equipped and use of the washing machine was a bonus and such a light airy clean and modern apartment. We loved the area and the restaurant opposite, Amelia is so helpful and gave us such great advice and recommendations. One of our favourite stays in our year of travelling. Thank you

Céntrico, un barrio con mucha historia cercano a muchos medios de transporte....Un lugar único y confiable....te entregan tips para ahorra y hacer tu visita más cómoda y confortable, si vuelvo a visitar Río, volveré a este loft, los dueños son un amor y 100% confiables.

This place is in the perfect location for San Teresa in Rio de Janeiro. Close to many attractions but also in a quiet neighborhood. Amazing hospitality and great tips for things to do and see. Highly recommended!
beau appartement et une belle vue

Amei o apartamento, super aconchegante, limpo e bem localizado! Adorei à vista e é bem próximo do metro do Rio onde pude aproveitar para ir à praia e fazer outros passeios. 

O aquário também é bem próximo para ir de uber! 

Indico a todos pois são muito atenciosos e de qualidade!

O Flat é incrível. Bem localizado, extremamente limpo, toalhas e roupas de cama adequadas, uma vista maravilhosa, decoração impecável, tudo novo e muito bem equipado. A iluminação do espaço também era muito aconchegante. A Amélia, anfitriã, foi super gentil e nos recebeu super (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos e super recomendamos o Sugar Loft.
Atendimento impecável, extremamente atenciosos e disponíveis. Apartamento muito bom e funcional.
Lugar lindo, quarto super confortável e pessoal bem solícito. Cantinho gostoso de ficar.
Really loved this place! For Santa Teresa this location is pretty safe. We didn’t have any problems walking to and from Lapa at night. The best thing is the view from the terrace. Thank you!

O studio é uma graça, iluminado, ventilado, espaçoso, reformado com bons materiais, fresco e silencioso. É bom estar de carro pra se deslocar com mais facilidade... Eu recomendo e com certeza voltaria a me hospedar lá.
Good location - tourist spots and small grocery store closeby.  However there are ants everywhere in the kitchen.  Overall fair.

O local é muito limpo e estiloso. A anfitriã, Amelia, é de uma delicadesa e dedicação que supera as expectativas. Se quiser um deck privado, preste atenção para reservar o apartamento correto, pois existe a opção de deck compartilhado, que é mais barata. Também observe que somente algumas acomodações tem vista para o Pão de Açúcar, que é belíssima! As acomodações de frente para a rua serão muito confortáveis, mas não terão a vista do quarto, apenas das áreas comuns. O entorno é super agradável e tem opções de comida e boa música! O acesso aos andares é somente de escada, então, se for para algum andar distante do Térreo, leve isso em consideração caso algum hóspede tenha limitações para se locomover. No mais, a atenção da Amelia merece destaque por sua gentileza e carinho. Além do café da manhã no Cultivar, que fica bem pertinho e tem um pão de queijo delicioso!
It was a great pleasure to stay in this beautiful place. We will be back! Thanx for everything !

Gostaria de agradecer a Amélia, que nos deu dicas locais, com comidas e pessoas ótimas! Santa Teresa é um bairro lindo, os apartamentos são ótimos, todos funcionam direitinho e é bem confortável em todos os sentidos! Nos sentimos em casa :)
Excelente espaço, perto de tudo
Super recomendo. Já quero voltar :)

name: Bohemian Suite
summary: Solarium addapted to guest room. Totally cozy, very comfortable and relaxed space near airport. Private entrance. For alternative travellers. Shared bathroom in the house
space: A gem. Alternative & simple.
description: Solarium addapted to guest room. Totally cozy, very comfortable and relaxed space near airport. Private entrance. For alternative travellers. Shared bathroom in the house A gem. Alternative & simple. Shared bathroom in the house. Kitchen for food storage and light prep. Preferably please reach me via Airbnb site. If I don't respond immediately drop me another line. I speak English and French. Messanger, text phone works too. Beautiful quiet neighborhood with the occaisional aircraft passing over head. Not many restaurants in the vicinity. Bus, train, foot Parking available. Evening stays only.. Too hot during the day to stay, evening check in.

I am a traveler at heart and free spirit. I love people and enjoy their company.  I am happy to help with anything I can.  
You are welcome in my home.
I promise that you will enjoy your stay.
Living Free!

reviews.comments: Rachelle's place is a convenient walk from YUL. Very clean in a quiet neighbourhood.
Cute little space in the backyard,  everything is very clean, very close to the airport!
The host communicates in a fast way and she is very accommodating of my needs
Very beautiful room with nice bohemic interior and glass roof, good access to bathroom and shower. Got everything needed and amazing hospitality by Rachelle!

Rachelle is the coolest host! I slept here for a night as I had a long layover. I chose to walk to the airbnb; I got lost for a second but it was pretty straightforward once I went through the TransCanada parking lot. This was the first private room that I stayed in while using Airbnb, Rachelle made the experience very chill and exceptional. I highly recommend this room!
Great host. Second stay in less than 2 weeks. Highly recommended.
Rachelle and Carl were the perfect hosts. The room was quirky and comfortable. The perfect spot if you need to be near the airport.
Accueil chaleureux et chambre confortable,  c'est l'endroit idéal si on souhaite rester près de l'aéroport.
Great shower, safe space, quiet home

The ‘Bohemian’ is perfect for solo stays and the bed was comfy so I slept well.  Morning breakfast was a total pleasure....lively conversation with amiable hosts, great coffee, plus homemade pancakes can’t be beat.  I left happy and totally ready for the day ahead.  Highly recommended!

Conveniently located close to the airport -30 minute walk- and this room is located in the solarium of the house which makes it OK for a short overnight stay. For me that’s all I needed due to my overnight layover but if you want more privacy she has other rooms available in the house, which she has in very good conditions, clean and all set. She’s very kind, always ready to help and cares for your confort and wellbeing while your stay. I totally recommend her.

name: Central Cosy One Bedroom Apartment
summary: Very cosy and confortable, yet simple, apartment in the city centre.
description: Very cosy and confortable, yet simple, apartment in the city centre.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The apartment is exactly as pictured and the host was easy to communicate with.  Great location close to many tourist attractions, bars and restaurants.  Good value, I'd be happy to stay here again.

name: Wan Chai Flat Share Room (MH3c)
summary: 8-9 mins walk to MTR 4 rooms sharing apartment with kitchen and bathroom - Double Bed + Wardrobe + Desk with chair - Fully furnished - Air-conditioning - Refrigerator, Microwave, Hot Plate, WIFI internet, etc. All you need is a suitcase to move in! The electricity is not included It will be equally shared with all the tenant in the apartment
description: 8-9 mins walk to MTR 4 rooms sharing apartment with kitchen and bathroom - Double Bed + Wardrobe + Desk with chair - Fully furnished - Air-conditioning - Refrigerator, Microwave, Hot Plate, WIFI internet, etc. All you need is a suitcase to move in! The electricity is not included It will be equally shared with all the tenant in the apartment need to sign a flat share agreement before you move in  key deposit 500 dollars key deposit refundable  hong kong stamp duty tax about 80 dollars electricty not included it will be calculated pro-rata
interaction: need to sign a flat share agreement before you move in  key deposit 500 dollars key deposit refundable  hong kong stamp duty tax about 80 dollars electricty not included it will be calculated pro-rata
house_rules: - - IMPORTANT: All photos here are for REFERENCE ONLY. Please message me to confirm it the room is available or not. There is NO move in after 7 pm. There is a Flat share agreement to sign with us if you decide to confirm the booking with us, and a Hong Kong Government stamp duty to pay to the Hong Kong Government Tax which is usually less than HK$100 AND a key Deposit $500 which is refundable when you move out with us. It is mandated by Hong Kong law that a tenant and landlord / principal tenant have to sign a tenancy agreement to make the deal legal.  Thank you for your understanding.

Welcome to Hong Kong.
I am here to help and make sure you have a wonderful stay at my places.

Fica a 270 metros da estação de metrô  (4 minutos a pé). 2 quadras da praia de Ipanema e 3 quadras da praia de Copacabana. Próximo a supermercados 24hs e farmácias 24h. Diversos bares, cafés e restaurantes nos arredores.

name: Pristine 1BR in Quartier des Spectacles by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the chic decor, spacious living area, and expansive windows letting in lots of natural light. Located in the Quartier des Spectacles, known for the renowned Contemporary Art museum - Place-des-Arts, you're close to an array of wonderful local shops and restaurants.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the chic decor, spacious living area, and expansive windows letting in lots of natural light. Located in the Quartier des Spectacles, known for the renowned Contemporary Art museum - Place-des-Arts, you're close to an array of wonderful local shops and restaurants. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay. There's plenty to offer within walking distance. Try Bouillon Bilk or Restaurant Boustan for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping, head to Rue St. Catherine and take a stroll along the storefronts. To explore the rest of the city, head to the Saint Laurent metro
neighborhood_overview: There's plenty to offer within walking distance. Try Bouillon Bilk or Restaurant Boustan for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping, head to Rue St. Catherine and take a stroll along the storefronts. To explore the rest of the city, head to the Saint Laurent metro station.  Quartier des Spectacles was designed as a center for Montreal's cultural events and festivals, with world-class entertainment taking place year-round in Place des Arts. The area is a great starting point to explore the city. It’s within walking distance of Chinatown, the Old Port, the Plateau, Downtown, the Village, and metro lines.
notes: This Sonder does not have cable, but with our Chromecast enabled television you can easily stream your favorite content or music through a phone, tablet, or laptop.
transit: Drivers can find free and paid parking options nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

host.host_about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.comments: Exactly as described, highly recommend.

The apartment was exactly as photographed. Beautiful and clean place with great amenities. I would choose Sonder’s as a host again. They provide 24/7 service and replied in a timely manner. Even made a courtesy call after a minor error was made to ensure we got the correct information. Thank you Sonders!

Nous avons adoré notre séjour à Montréal et notre logement ! L’appartement était exactement conforme aux photos du site, idéalement situé au cœur du centre-ville, à proximité immédiate des commerces et transports, et pourtant au calme ! Nous n’avions pas reçu les instructions d’entrée à notre arrivée mais l’agence a été très réactive pour arranger ce désagrément. Á recommander sans hésitation !
Great space, quick access, price, more than expected. Totally worth it.

Overall, wonderful location close to attractions and public transport. Very clean and looks better than the photos!   Had issues with door code and door system over our 4 day stay, but customer service was easily reached both times.

This was a prime location as it is central to local spots and is within walking distance to many essentials, i.e., grocery stores, cafes/coffee shops, restaurants/takeaways and convenience stores. 
Sonders provided exemplary service from providing a functioning iron and ironing board at the time of our arrival, as well as, offering 24 hr support when we had any question or concern. 
Two minute details of improvement would be to provide a full body mirror in the apartment as taller individuals, like myself, have to kneel down in order to view themselves in the washrooms mirror. Secondly, an extra throw blanket for those cold winter nights would have made our stay that much more enjoyable. 
Overall, staying with Sonder was an utter delight.
Great location to access both Old Port and the shops near St. Catherine. Plenty of great eateries within just a block or two. Clean and stylish condo.

name: Bon vivre
summary: Climat chalereux et tres acceuillant. Appartement tres propres et proche de tout. Par exemple, j'ai l'universite juste a deux pas de la maison et de plus le metro et les bus a proximite. De plus je suis disponible pour le transport et ce moyennant quelque frais en plus.
description: Climat chalereux et tres acceuillant. Appartement tres propres et proche de tout. Par exemple, j'ai l'universite juste a deux pas de la maison et de plus le metro et les bus a proximite. De plus je suis disponible pour le transport et ce moyennant quelque frais en plus.

name: Quarto e Sala Moderno/Melhor Localização de Copa
summary: Quarto e sala recém reformado, moderno e confortável, localizado a 120m da praia, no melhor ponto de Copacabana (Posto 5 e 6), próximo das principais atrações, bares e restaurantes, próximo da praia de Ipanema e do Arpoador.  Apartamento c/ 45m2, preparado pra receber casais e famílias c/ carinho e atenção nos detalhes, equipado com: Cama de casal (colchão visco) Sofá-cama Geladeira Cooktop Microondas Utensílios completos Rack Smart TV 43' Ar e Ventilador Roupa de cama e banho (padrão hoteleiro)
description: Quarto e sala recém reformado, moderno e confortável, localizado a 120m da praia, no melhor ponto de Copacabana (Posto 5 e 6), próximo das principais atrações, bares e restaurantes, próximo da praia de Ipanema e do Arpoador.  Apartamento c/ 45m2, preparado pra receber casais e famílias c/ carinho e atenção nos detalhes, equipado com: Cama de casal (colchão visco) Sofá-cama Geladeira Cooktop Microondas Utensílios completos Rack Smart TV 43' Ar e Ventilador Roupa de cama e banho (padrão hoteleiro) Como seu anfitrião estarei disponível para ajudá-lo em quaisquer necessidades através do telefone, e-mail ou (Hidden by Airbnb) . Além disso, temos uma ajudante no prédio que estará disponível para realização do check-in, check-out e eventuais suportes. Além de ser o principal destino turístico do Rio, Copacabana é animado, é vivo e é interessante para todos os tipos de públicos!  Se não quiser se hospedar conosco, ou se, eventualmente, não pudermos atendê-lo, não deixe de se hospedar no bairro
neighborhood_overview: Além de ser o principal destino turístico do Rio, Copacabana é animado, é vivo e é interessante para todos os tipos de públicos!  Se não quiser se hospedar conosco, ou se, eventualmente, não pudermos atendê-lo, não deixe de se hospedar no bairro...
notes: Distâncias - Pontos Importantes Praia de Copacabana: 120 metros Forte de Copacabana: 400 metros Praia do Arpoador e Praia de Ipanema: 600 metros Lagoa: 2 Km Pão de Açucar: 5 km Lapa: 9Km Centro: 10Km Estação de Metrô (Estação General Osório): 400 metros Conexão Aeroporto (Frescão) : 120 metros Estação Bike Itau: 450m Supermercado: 20m Padaria: 20m Farmácia: 30m Bancos: 50m
transit: Nosso apartamento fica muito bem localizado!!!! Estamos a 2 minutos a pé da praia de Copacabana (120 metros),  no melhor ponto do bairro, um ponto estratégico, entre o posto 5 e 6, que, além de mais tranquilo, também está a 10 minutos a pé do Arpoador e da Praia de Ipanema. O Forte de Copacabana e a famosa Confeitaria Colombo (frente mar) podem ser acessados através de 5 minutos de caminhada pela orla. Bares famosos como o Boteco Belmonte e o Pub Escondido estão a 10 minutos a pé. Além disso, estamos a 400 metros da estação de metrô (General Osório) e a 180 metros do ponto do ônibus frescão, que faz a conexão para os dois aeroportos da cidade. A Lagoa pode ser acessada a pé em 20 minutos de caminhada ou rapidamente de carro. O Pão de Açucar e a Urca estão a 10 minutos de carro. E os bairros do Centro e da Lapa ficam a 20 minutos de carro. Abaixo do prédio, na mesma rua, contamos com amplo comércio, além do completíssimo Supermercado Zona Sul, Academia Smart Fit, bancos, cafeterias, ham
interaction: Como seu anfitrião estarei disponível para ajudá-lo em quaisquer necessidades através do telefone, e-mail ou (Hidden by Airbnb) . Além disso, temos uma ajudante no prédio que estará disponível para realização do check-in, check-out e eventuais suportes.
house_rules: - Proibido barulho após as 20hrs - Proibido receber convidados e fazer festas no imóvel - Proibido alterar a disposição dos móveis - As normas do condomínio devem ser respeitadas

host.host_location: Brasília de Minas, State of Minas Gerais, Brazil

reviews.comments: o apart do Gustavo e simples mas supriu minhas necessidades.. tudo limpo e organizado.. ele atendeu meus pedidos com muito carinho.. tirou minhas dúvidas rapidas..chekin e check out flexível..cama super confortável..utensílio de cozinha.. apartamento arejado.. fui bem recebida pelo porteiro e pela secretaria do Gustavo..e fica próximo de tudo..uma quadra da praia..facil acesso.. recomendo sim!! voltarei em breve..
Hospedagem tranquila! Tudo que está na descrição corresponde a realidade!
Nice place, good location. Gustavo is very quick to reply and willing to help.
Localização excelente! Custo x Beneficio incrível! Super Recomendo!

O apartamento tem uma ótima localização, do lado do supermercado, restaurantes, transporte publico e um quarteirão da praia.
As fotos são fidedignas ao apartamento! 
Gustavo foi bem flexível facilitando minha permanência no apartamento, alem da hospitalidade pelos porteiros do prédio! Recomendo e voltaria!

The place is cozy and perfect for a small group. Stayed 2 nights, the location is great. you can walk to the beach , which is a block away or dine in any of the many restaurants that are within walking distance. Thank you for everything Gustavo!
Ambiente agradável.
O apartamento do Gustavo é bem organizado e decorado. Um ambiente aconchegante. Indico!

A localização é sem igual, um supermercado e uma hamburgueria na ai Lado, uma farmácia na frente, um Banco do Brasil na esquina e a praia a uma quadra. O ap muito limpo e reformado, confortável e supre todas as necessidades para duas pessoas!!
Apartamento bem localizado, perto da praia , metrô , bares ... espaço excelente para casal , idêntico as fotos , indo ao Rio a trabalho ou lazer eu recomendo.

Espaço aconchegante , bem localizado .  Perto do mercado , farmácia a menos de dois minutos da praia de Copacabana e uns 18 minutos do Posto 9 em Ipanema ( isso caminhando) se for de carro  dá no máximo uns 8. A localização é excelente.

a estadia no apartamento do Gustavo foi incrível, o apartamento é super moderno e super confortável no melhor ponto de Copacabana, uma quadra da praia no posto 6 e 5 min dr caminhada de Ipanema e do Arpoador. Gustavo se mostrou muito solicito em me ajudar com tudo que precisei, inclusive em achar um lugar para ficar mais uns dias já que o apartamente estava ocupado e eu precisei estender minha estadia. Recomendo muito e voltaria com certeza.

ótima experiência no apartamento do Gustavo.
super bem recebida e acomodada.
O apartamento é super limpo e bem perto da praia.
Appartement idéal pour un court séjour à Rio. Fonctionnel, propre et très bien placé (à quelques pas de Copacabana et d'Ipanema, non loin du métro).

O apartamento é exatamente como descrito. Bem prático e básico, bem localizado e extremamente limpo. Tem tudo que você precisa para passar uma curta temporada e ir à praia com tranquilidade.  Gustavo foi atencioso e prestativo. Recomendamos!

O apartamento é exatamente como a descrição e como as fotos mostram. Colchão confortável, cobertas e lençóis limpos, toalhas a disposição, além de itens básicos de cozinha. O apartamento estava muito bem limpo e organizado na nossa chegada. Gustavo respondeu prontamente qdo questionado, inclusive na solicitação/oferta de antecipação do checkin. Indico a hospedagem e voltaria em novas oportunidades. ;)

O apartamento é bem localizado e confortável. As fotos retratam fielmente o apto.
O Gustavo foi bem atencioso.
Tudo ótimo.

Appartement super bien entretenu et propre. Il se trouve à 2 minutes à pieds de Copacabana, 10 minutes à pieds du métro et les bus passent juste en dessous... Gustavo reste à l'écoute de ses hôtes et les personnes qui prennent soin du building sont chaleureux et très gentils. En gros: parfait séjour passé chez Gustavo.

Gustavo cuenta con un equipo de ayuda excelente, siempre dispuesto a ayudarte cuando lo necesites. La ubicación del Departamento es ideal, estása una cuadra de la playa de Copcabana y a 6 de Ipanema. Además, por la zona al restó, supermercados, casas de cambio, todo lo que un turista pueda necesitar. Lo único, yo tuve problemas con el wi fi, pero Gustavo y su gente intentaron siempre darme una solución
Apto de ótima localização. Tinha tudo o que precisávamos para nossa estadia. Gustavo foi sempre rápido nas respostas e atencioso. Recomendo muito.

Excelente apartamento, muito bem localizado e prático. Super limpo e cheiroso! E a comunicação com o Gustavo foi a melhor possível! Superou as expectativas!!! Nota especial para o secador de cabelos: muito bom!!! Com certeza retornarei!!!!
The host canceled this reservation 146 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Gustavo es un excelente anfitrión, estuvo pendiente de nuestra llegada y nos dio buenas recomendaciones, las fotos que se muestran son iguales al apartamento. El espacio es suficiente para 2 personas, lo recomiendo.
ótimo lugar e a hospitalidade. Adoramos o Apartamento, limpo, estiloso e fomos mto bem recebidos :)

Tudo muito maravilhoso no  flat, roupas de cama e banho impecáveis, super limpo, localização excelente, é bem pertinho da praia, local seguro,o Gustavo sempre muito prestativo quando solicitado,superou muito minhas expectativas.

O apartamento cumpriu bem o que procurávamos: apenas um local pra dormir no final do dia. Apesar do imóvel ser antigo (como a maioria em Copa), acho que poderia ter mais capricho na limpeza e manutenção. Rodapés e portas estão muito sujos, chão da cozinha e área desgastados, a porta do banheiro não tinha maçaneta na parte externa. São detalhes pequenos mas que melhorariam a sensação de conforto em estar longe de casa. A TV parou de funcionar após o primeiro dia de estadia, mas o Gustavo mostrou-se justo e solícito na resolução e se propôs a devolver 1 diária. Acho o preço justo pelo que oferece. Obrigada Gustavo, até a próxima!

Hermoso el apartamento, tal cual se lo ve en las fotos, bien ubicado, cómodo y por sobre todo estaba impecable. Tanto el anfitrión Gustavo como la gente del edificio bien predispuestos y atentos para ayudar en todo. Súper recomendable y sin dudas volvería a elegir este alojamiento.
L'appartement est idéalement situé à Copacabana. Propre et bien équipé, notre séjour s'est très bien déroulé. Nous recommandons!

El departamento está muy bien ubicado. Cerca de las bicicletas de la ciudad, subte, playa. Muy cómoda su cama para descansar.
No vimos al anfitrión pero dejó todo organizado para nuestra entrada y salida.
Como aspectos negativos el edificio es bastante viejo y hay muy mal olor.
No hay espacio de mesada, es muy difícil cocinar.
Very good location and Gustavo is very helpful! We liked his house :)

Fuimos para Año Nuevo, la ubicación no puede estar mejor ya que está a dos cuadras de la Playa de Copacabana y tiene abajo un supermercado zona sul, policía y banco en la esquina y farmacia en la otra. El departamento es un poco más grande de lo que se ve en las fotos.
Gustavo súper atento! Lo recomendamos

Gustavo's place is perfectly located, within walking distance of Copacabana beach, Ipanema beach and the metro. The check-in and check-out procedure is stress-free and super convenient with a safe deposit box. Big up to the apartment's neat decoration, functionality and  quietness despite being in the middle of Copacabana's tumult. We spent 5 days with a 15-month baby and all went extremely smoothly.
Nossa estadia foi excelente, não tivemos problemas com nada. Gustavo respondeu todas as nossas dúvidas e se mostrou à disposição sempre. Ótimo custo-benefício dado a localização.

Espacio muy cómodo y agradable. Fuimos con mi pareja y la verdad que el lugar nos quedó perfecto! La cama es muy cómoda. Tiene todo lo necesario. Y la ubicacion es genial! Todo cerca! Y Gustavo muy atento en todo! Pasamos unos días geniales!
