host.host_about:
She always sings,
" I've heard it said people come into our life for a reason..."
Today YOU are her guest, from now on YOU are her friend !! She's looking forward to meeting YOU from all over the world

reviews.comments: Very friendly n fast connect host. Good location and will recommend to other. Will stay again next time
位置非常方便 房子在香港也算很大了 五个成年人住还很空的 但是很多东西需要自己带去 总的来说非常ok拉
交通方便,人多可以选择
It's a good location near the train station, restaurants and etc, however the toilet smells and its not that clean
房源地址确实与描述一致,离旺角地铁站只有两三分钟路程,但房东提供的地址不准确,搜索地图后找来找去找不着,旺角出口短短的两三分钟路绕了半个小时,房源描述有厨房实际无,还有些生活工具备漏的,好在都一一帮忙解决,唯一不满意的就是窗帘,太小又不遮光,一大早就被亮醒,已给房东提出建议改进

perfect location , near everything i really love it. Internet cannot use,even the host try to tell many users  and password,but it doesn't work (a bit upset). the host should have the manual in the room, the correct username and password of wi-fi. The room quite dirty (look like they clean and keep everything under the bed and sofa). the host read the message very fast but super late reply. If u don't mind all above ,just come cause its a perfect location in Mongkong.

Thanks Kelly, such a great location.  Just that I will have to bring my own toilet papers next round.  You did mentioned to bring the personal item e.g. toothbrush and so on, but we never expected that toilet paper is part of it.  Anyhow, this small matter doesn't affect our stay.  We enjoy our stay here.
位置不好找,房子空间挺大,下楼购物方便,但是不能存行李｡
地段非常好｡
Nice stay during in mongkok.. thanks
A must have location, but really hard to fit 5 people. Being a HK place probably not that big of a minus. Some beds need replacement.

name: The Porto Concierge - Camellia House
summary: Practical and conveniently located 5 bedrooms house with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer! In this house can sleep up to 11 people comfortably. 7 minutes walking distance to Marques metro station. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. The Porto Concierge service available 24/7 for your convenience. Free luggage storage at The Porto Concierge - Welcome Center.
description: Practical and conveniently located 5 bedrooms house with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer! In this house can sleep up to 11 people comfortably. 7 minutes walking distance to Marques metro station. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. The Porto Concierge service available 24/7 for your convenience. Free luggage storage at The Porto Concierge - Welcome Center.
house_rules: -  Also I would like to inform that Portuguese immigration services, SEF, require that all non-portugese guests fill a form with some personal details such as passport number, nationality, etc.. This form will be sent through a certified program or given to you on the check in.

reviews.comments:
L'accueil à été excellent. La communication également très bonne malgré notre arrivée tardive. Il s'agit d'une maison entière totalement rénovée, très propre et très accessible en transport en commun, taxi ou autres. Nous avons adorés notre séjour. Il y a une terrasse privative. Le voisinage est très calme. 
Je vous conseil ce logement sans aucun problème.
Le seul bémol serait l'insonorisation des vitres, on entends facilement la circulation extérieure mais cela ne nous a pas empêché de dormir.

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended

The Porto Concierge is a simple but stylish place to stay, with everything you need to get by. The beds are super comfy, and Rui was extra responsive which helped us get ourselves organised for our weekend in Porto.

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended

Todo igual que las fotos,  super limpio y muy amable el chico que nos recibió. 
Está a unos 25 minutos andando del centro pero por la calle Santa Catalina se llega muy pronto,sino cerca hay una parada de metro.  
Pudimos aparcar justo delante de la casa que no era de pago.  En las inmediaciones habia sitio también aunque alguno de pago. 
Como recomendación dejar algún producto más de limpieza como escoba,  recogedor...  Y en los aseos solo había un rollo de papel higiénico y gel muy pequeñito.

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended
Alojamiento con una gran relación calidad precio.
Magnífica relación calidad precio. Las habitaciones y los baños muy bien. Aparcamiento público al lado de la casa, y el metro al centro a cinco minutos andando.
Una casa en buenas condiciones con un patio muy amplio (le hace falta cuidarlo un poco) donde se puede desayunar y comer al aire libre.

Amazing location with easy walk to metro or around Porto! Great for large family or friend group with plenty of bedrooms and bathrooms. Rui, our concierge, met us right after leaving the airport and helped us get settled in by touring the house and then giving great recommendations as he walked us through a map of Porto. We will definitely be back here again one day!!

Sitio amplio miy limpio y con capacidad suficiente para alojar 11 personas de forma muy comoda. En el entorno zona de supermercado, restauracion, mcdonalds, panaderia, autobus,... En distancia, en coche a unos 8 minutos de la plaza de los aliados. Muy buen emplazamiento con capacidad para muchas personas. Ojo, el precio varia en funcion del numero de huespedes. Lo gesgiona una emoresa de oporto q es referencia de muy buena calidad y swrvicios en pisos airbnb. Altamente recomendable

Parfait petit appartement avec quelques bruits dû à la proximité de la route.
Mais rien a dire a part ça.

Excellent service. Very clean, fit 11 people quite comfortably and had a great patio for relaxing. Rui also let us store our luggage at the welcome center when our plane arrived very early in the morning.

Wonderful house! Big, very clean and pleasant to stay in. The concierge makes the stay very easy and pleasant. Out of the center of town, but close enough to walk if you’re up for it. Metro is nearby.
Logement conforme aux photos, très propre, nous avons tous appréciés ce confortable et joli logement.

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended

Very nice house. Recommended to everyone. Nearby nice coffee restaurant with good service and English speaking owner. Light rail 10 minutes walking. Small supermarket nearby. Nice bathrooms and good beds. We enjoyed it. 6 adults.

Hospitalité, réactivité. Nous sommes arrivés très tardivement mais aucun souci pour Rui qui et venu nous ouvrir le logement en pleine nuit. L’appartement est très propre, pas très loin de la station de métro Marques. Super Séjour. Encore merci.

The place is neat and tidy and the host is organised, friendly and helpful.  All amenities are available and I like the beds which help give us a sound sleep.  Metro is not far away but we found Uber more accessible and more economical with a group of 3 or 4.  The coffee shop/patry next door is fantastic for breakfast if one does not want to prepare it in the kitchen.  It's a pity that we have got no time to enjoy the terrace, otherwise it would be an addition to the wonderful memories.

Une location très bien située, pratique d’accès et agréable (l’espace extérieur est un vrai plus).
La literie est confortable. 
Une conciergerie disponible et réactive par (Hidden by Airbnb) .
Nous recommandons !

Excellent accueil !
Le logement est confortable, agréable et plutôt bien placé malgré la proximité de la route (qui peut gêner les personnes au sommeil léger). Le seul regret est qu'il n'y ait pas de chauffage qui aurait été appréciable lors des fraîches soirées de fin octobre.

Very kind host showing us all best places in Porto to visit, house is clean and enough space for 10 people. We had a great stay !

But it's kind of cold in the house (visited in autumn) and curtains don't block light properly.

Estava viajando eu, minha esposa, minha filha de dois anos, meus pais de mais de 60 anos e meu sogros de mais de 60 anos.
A casa  é administrada por uma empresa e não pelo Rui!
Achei interessante pois eles disponibilizaram alguém para nos receber, mesmo sendo as 22:00 e não cobraram nenhuma taxa por isso, além de darem suporte via Wapp até as 02:00 am. Além de sermos recebidos por uma garrafa de vinho.
Eles demoram a responder às dúvidas via AirBnb e minha comunicação local foi por um número de (Hidden by Airbnb) que descobri no dia da minha chegada.
No primeiro dia foi muito estressante  pois estava chovendo, ventando, muito frio e quando chegamos na casa só um quarto tinha ar condicionado/aquecedor!!
As roupas de cama não condiziam com a temperatura do ambiente!!
Entramos em contato com a administradora e ela nos informou que só conseguia resolver no outro dia.
Pedi q eles, quando fossem instalar os aquecedores, não instalassem nos quartos sem a nossa presença e deixassem na sala q instalaríamos (pois nossas coisas particulares estavam nos mesmos). No segundo dia, quando chegamos do passeio, todos estavam instalados nos quartos.
No segunda dia foi colocado aquecedores nos quartos, porém, quando ligávamos a torradeira ou o microondas o disjuntor geral desarmava!!
Resumindo, a casa, no inverno, não comporta 11 pessoas (como anunciado)!!
Porém, problemas acontecem e a empresa responsável demorava a resolver mas resolvia!!

Bonito, limpio, no engañan las fotos. A media hora andando hasta el centro. Si vas hasta plaza Marqués y bajas por la famosa calle de Santa Catalina.
La pega es que hemos ido en noviembre y, todo que no hacía mucho frío, la casa es fría y tiene pocos calefactores. No había calefacción ni en baños ni en zonas comunes. Tampoco en dos habitaciones por lo que pasamos frío. También faltaban mantas en las camas. 
Pero, si solucionan el tema de la calefacción y ponen mantas, ¡es un lugar ideal para visitar Oporto! La casa es muy bonita. Recomendable por precio y por espacio.

Ótimo
Anfitrião. Casa excelente.
Bacano

Rui's flat is beautiful!! Very clean and bright flat, with enought space for a lot of people. The kitchen was modern and the living area very cozy. It takes a while to walk into the city center but its within walking distance to metro stations, so that should be no problem in the end. We've had a great time!

Belle maison bien située dans Porto car bien desservie par les transports en commun. Les chambres sont confortables tout comme la literie. Effectivement problème d'insonorisation de la maison mais cela ne nous empêchera pas de revenir.
Casa muy acogedora, limpia con estancias amplias y muy cómodas. Sólo mejoraría su climatización, las estancias en invierno son muy frías.

Casa agradável, espaçosa, luminosa e bem decotada.
Numa altura de inverno, tem falta de isolamento térmico ou como manter uma temperatura agradável.
This is a beautiful house which is perfect for welcoming a large group of people.

name: Sunlight in Ahuntsic - Le Durham
summary: Beautiful apartment in a great surroundings, steps away from the subway and only 20 minutes from downtown Montreal. Groceries, drug store very close,  restaurants and bicycle path also very near.
space: A parking space is provided for a standard size car.
description: Beautiful apartment in a great surroundings, steps away from the subway and only 20 minutes from downtown Montreal. Groceries, drug store very close,  restaurants and bicycle path also very near. A parking space is provided for a standard size car. This is a complete private apartment located on the 2nd floor of our Duplex.  The main entrance gives access to a small lobby with 2 secured doors. The  left door is the apartment. There are 2 keys: one for the Main door and the second for the apartment. We provide 2 sets of keys. We live downstairs and we want you yo feel free to advise us if you need anything, or if you have any question that would ease your stay.  By email, text message or simply knocking at our door.
neighborhood_overview: Quartier paisible sur une rue paisible. A quelques pas de la rivière des Prairies ou il est possible d'aller marcher ou faire du Velo. Station de bixi a quelques pas.
notes: A votre disposition également, un petit cabanon attenant au stationnement permettant de loger des vélos ou autre si besoin.
transit: En plus du  fait que vous pourrez stationner votre automobile gratuitement, le logement étant a une distance de marche du métro Henri Bourassa vous donnera la flexibilité requise pour aller au centre ville de Montréal en 20 minutes si vous désirez sortir sans souci de stationnement.
access: This is a complete private apartment located on the 2nd floor of our Duplex.  The main entrance gives access to a small lobby with 2 secured doors. The  left door is the apartment. There are 2 keys: one for the Main door and the second for the apartment. We provide 2 sets of keys.
interaction: We live downstairs and we want you yo feel free to advise us if you need anything, or if you have any question that would ease your stay.  By email, text message or simply knocking at our door.

reviews.comments: The place is very nice and near to the river with nice benches to watch the sunset.
Logement propre, bien situé, calme et à proximité de tout(métro,  parc,  supermarché, etc...). Les hôtes sont d'une extrême gentillesse et à l'écoute. Nous avons passé 20 jours très agréable. Merci

The hosts are ready to listen to what you need and want and they are willingly to help you. please don't hesitate to ask something you feel confused and don't know how to do!!
Enjoy your stay at the Sunlight (this place is just like the sunlight)^^

Une de mes meilleures experience airbnb! 
Proprio accueillant, logement bien équipé et décoré avec goût, propreté impeccable, quartier tranquille avec commodité tout près (resto, épicerie, pharmacie).
Station de metro tout près de l’appartement.
Je le recommande fortement☺️

Great Apartment in in Montreal 
JC’s place is great for all kind of travel, offer amazing space of 2 bedrooms, dining room, leaving room and office.
Apartment very-well maintained and decorated,  includes all required amenities for travelers and quick response from JC for any needed clarifications.
The place is close to Metro, supermarket, parks, walking paths, and restaurants as will convenient driving with easy access to high way and roads and private parking space.
Apartment has all you need and highly recommended, myself and family thanks JC for the lovely stay.
Regards,
Anas
Tout y est parfait.

Apartment was as appears in the pictures.  It's a well furnished apartment and very comfortable, it has all the amenities you would require either for a short stay or a long stay.  I highly recommend this apartment
very clean, just as advertised if not better

quiet neighbourhood, loud house. you can hear TV's, music, footsteps and slamming doors from the unit below. owners are in building. quick responses and occasional visits. if they can't meet you during checkin, they make an effort to catch you coming in or out of building. 
hosts need a bit more airbnb experience before I can highly recommend.

name: Habitación doble en pleno barrio gótico
summary: Habitación amplia y cómoda con cama doble y balcón. En pleno barrio gótico.
space: Barrio gótico con mucha vida nocturna y mucho encanto. Unas de las zonas mas concurridas de barcelona, donde podras conocer lugares emblemáticos de la cuidad. Barrio tipico donde podras disfrutas del contacto con la vida local ( bares , locales de suvenir, arquitectura)., Por la noches las calles son seguras y puedes ir caminando desde la plaza cataluña al puerto  a la catedral y a las playas que están aproximadamente 10 minutos caminando.

Linea verde liceu ( rambla de cataluña) Linea amarilla jaume1 ( calle ferran)

host.host_about:
Hola, soy Daniela ,  chilena , profesora y entrenadora , de nacionalidad española, vivo hace cuatro años en Barcelona. Soy muy empática y con ganas de vivir la vida felizzzzz.

name: 4 luxury Mosman bedrooms own ensuites, new kitchen

neighborhood_overview: 周边环境及设施--步行10分钟可至Bridgepoint购物中心(IGA 超市和Harris Farm, ALDI); Mosman商业区(那里有琳琅满目的特色精品店及诸多美食餐厅等); Balmoral 海滩;Chinaman 海滩;Taronga 动物园;Sydney harbour kayaks(悉尼港皮艇);Clifton 公园;Mosman艺术中心等｡
transit: Plenty of easy free on-street parking for those travelling by car. If you are going to Vivid or any other Sydney centre icons we recommend public transportation. Bus 243 stop is literally two minutes away, note though that aside from frequent peak hour timings ( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) bus 243 leaves every hour starting from 10:05. Alternatively 10 minutes walk will bring you to the Military road with myriads of "CITY" buses to catch. Both bus options will bring you to Wynyard station at the heart of Sydney CBD in less than half an hour. A great alternative for those going to the Sydney Opera House or the Circular Quay or the Royal Botanic Gardens is to catch bus 225 at the Cremorne Junction (10 minutes walk from our house) followed by the iconic ferry from the Cremorne Point Wharf that will take you to the Circular Quay in 10 minutes - with all the Opera House and Harbour Bridge views that the harbour crossing can bring you. GOING BACK FROM SYDNEY: From Wynyard (STAND A):  B

name: Terrace, sea view at Diagonal Mar!
summary: Luxury 4-bedroom apartment with a terrace at highly sought-after Diagonal Mar area of Barcelona.  This beautiful apartment in the exclusive Illa del Llac development in Barcelona's Diagonal Mar boasts incredible beach, sea and city views!
space: The apartment is a great, all-marble, 4 bedroom apartment with sleeping space for 8. The first room is a double-bed bedroom with access to the terrace and has an ensuite bathroom. The rest of rooms have 2 single beds each. There is a second bathroom in the corridor. Sleeping area is separate from the living room, terrace and kitchen so a nice rest is assured even with some guests staying at the living room. Kitchen is complete with stoves, oven, microwave, freezer, fridge, coffee machine and everything you need to cook great meals while in Barcelona. Both bathrooms have a nice bath to relax after a long day!

neighborhood_overview: Diagonal Mar is the best quarter in Barcelona in summer, as its one of the few quarters next to the beach, its the most modern and has the best shopping center in town so you don't need to move if you came to Barcelona to relax. Still you'll be just 20 minutes away from the city center so you can visit during the day and then relax in the beach or pool. The apartment is just in front of one bus stop which will take you to Villa Olímpica and Ramblas in no-time. If you prefer other transports (metro, tram), they are just 10 minutes away. We're committed to make your stay a true-Airbnb experience. We'll try to do as much as possible to do so!
notes: Apartment has official registry number: HUTB-005956
access: Guests will be in the best area in Barcelona, just a few steps away from the Barcelona beach (300 meters), and a zone with a swimming pool to relax after a hard walking day or just to enjoy the whole day! The condo includes a common zone to relax with swimming pool and gym! Its open from 10am to 8pm.
interaction: Me or my assistant will wait for you in the apartment. Once you're arriving you can call me or her to assure we're waiting for you in the apartment. During your stay we'll be always available for any problem, doubt or recommendation!

host.host_about:
Owner of apartments in Barcelona. All of my apartments include linen, towels, coffe machine, toaster, microwave and all ammenities you might need to assure you a pleasant stay. I live near the apartments in Barcelona all year round, so any problem during your stay will be solved immediately. 

I also provide a small guide on the apartments, surroundings and Barcelona so if you have no idea what to do during your free time there is plently of suggestions! I was born in Barcelona, so I can recommend to any sort of visitor the best for their stay!

总之目前价格还是非常实惠,性价比很高｡评论的标准是按照比较高的标准,房主刚刚开始air bnb,希望越来越好!加油

host.host_about:
Memories are the details. Istanbul is a fantastic city, and I being a guest at my home will be magnificant detail in your memories of your lifetime.

I live in one of the best districts in İstanbul. I think this is a great chance for me to live in such a calm and central place in such a crowded an such huge city.
Cooking, Reading,Yoga, running, music and hosting my friends are my components of my small life. 
I always try to keep my home clean and tidy. Dirty House = Bad energy :) 
I'm sure we'll have great time at home laughing, smiling, eating.. 
And be sure I'll be a perfect advisor for where to see,eat, drink, dance :)
My must is nature, each time i find a chance, i go to forests, get lost in the nature, do medidation..

reviews.comments: Fatih is one of the best hosts that I’ve met! He’s not just renting you a room, he shares his home with his guests and does this with all his heart. On the first day he made an amazing dinner for us, taught me how to make Turkish tea and coffee, and told a lot of interesting things about Turkey that only local man knows. He also made a list of best places in Istanbul that are not crowded with tourists and where you can feel real Istanbul life (has anyone ever done this for you?!) The apartment is located in really quite and friendly area, no tourists, real local experience and good transportation options to go anywhere. The room is nice and clean and has amazing view to the city and Bosphorus. So if you want to escape noisy and crowded touristic places and get to know real Turkish life and hospitality, you should definitely choose Fatih’s place. I’m sure you’ll be surprised to see Turkey with his eyes! :)

Fatih is a great host, ready to help in different situations) 
Perfect location of the house, nice parks around, nothing of the usual touristic kind and very pleasant.

it looks like a brand new suits. the room was very clean & convenient. not too far from Taksim main street but the hill which is connected the main road to this place was quite steep. other than that it was a very nice place.

Ömer's aparthotel is a great stay in Istanbul! Before we went to Istanbul, the communication with Ömer was good; he replied quickly. We took the Havabus from the airport to Taksim (from Atatürk it's +/- 40 mins & from Sabiha Gökçen it's +/- 70 mins; depending on the traffic of course). From the Havabus station to the aparthotel is only 10 mins walk. Once we got there, we were welcomed nicely and the check-in went really smooth. 

The room itself is like the pictures: neat, clean and modern. The bathroom is perfect as well. Everything you need is provided (clean sheets, comfortable bed, kitchenware, towels, hairdryer, soap, AC, etc.). The location is good: 10 mins walk to the Taksim square and to the metro line. 

Ömer is a great host; friendly, kind, patient, honest and always willing to help. His colleague too. 

This aparthotel is one of the reasons why we enjoyed our stay in Istanbul. It's such a nice place to come 'home' after a long day of walking and sightseeing. I definitely recommend this stay to everyone who is visiting Istanbul!

I was impressed by the view of the (Website hidden by Airbnb) was classic, neat and very cosy room.

I will recommend it to everyone who wants privacy,and classic room to stay.
Fantastic host. Great place too. Would deffinetely recommend it to anyone looking to visit Istanbul.

Great place to stay, very clean and organized and it's bigger than it looks.
The location is good too, only few steps to istiklal street.
Beautiful apartment in a great location. Ömer is very pleasant and kind.

Fantastic place with everything you need! Small convenience stores are less than 20 metres from your doorstep, and restaurants are a short 5minute walk. The room was spacious and clean with a perfectly designed bathroom. Even though temperatures were freezing outside, the room was well insulated without me having to adjust anything. Omer and his staff were extremely friendly and helpful throughout the entire trip.

name: 【城遇】樱空 日式loft公寓 近罗湖口岸国贸金光华万象城东门 双地铁口 好住好逛又好吃
summary: 樱空 我自己很爱的一个loft户型｡当时在日本的时候住了当地的这种民居非常的喜欢｡也希望这个小而美的空间能带给你们在闹市中难得的静谧｡ 这个公寓位于罗湖最繁华的商圈,地铁口,交通非常的便利｡ (Hidden by Airbnb) 都挺方便｡好吃好逛｡离罗湖口岸也非常的近,可以走路直达｡

interaction: 可以线上联系我,预定后我会把密码和详细的地址发给您
house_rules: 进屋脱鞋 可做饭,但请自己收拾好 禁止吸烟 出门关灯关空调

host.host_about: 爱吃,爱旅行,养猫

reviews.comments: 十分好 有機會會再入住
非常棒的房间 loft非常舒适 地理位置也非常棒 十分便利 有很多好吃的东西 房主小姐姐也特别贴心 满分满分!!!
Perfect house for 1~2 people. Quiet area but super close to a lot of food and malls.
住宿環境不錯,地理位置都很好
非常喜欢的风格,交通很便利,离罗湖口岸罗湖火车站非常近,走着就到了,房间可以做饭,临近很多大型商场,下次来深圳还住这里｡
比预期的要好,性价比高,物品整洁干净
很用心的日式小阁楼｡收拾得干净整洁,装修风格统一实用,洁具和洗漱用品的品质也都很棒,地点非常便利｡高个子留意二楼卧室屋顶容易碰到头,别问我怎么知道的-_-||
房主特别友好好客,房子也十分温馨,装修很有格调,最重要的是房子特别干净,是很棒的一次住宿体验
Its a nice department. Clean and quiet
值得再來
很不错很好｡小姐姐很热情,离罗湖口岸很近适合去香港玩的人｡
对于去香港玩的旅客位置真的很方便,离罗湖口岸很近步行五六分钟左右｡吃的也很方便,性价比很高~因为刮台风的原因腿划伤了顺走了房东的创口贴房间里还有伞,小音响之内的小物件,期待再次入住
Place is clean and tidy. Easy to find. Near metro and shopping malls. Will consider to stay here again next time. Cheers!

This place is well-furnished and I think everyone will like the style. The location is good as well, very close to Dong Men street and Lao Jie, where you can enjoy delicious food and shopping. It is very close to LuoHu station as well. You can conveniently go to Hong Kong. Over all, I highly recommend this place to you.

Cozy and beautiful, we had a wonderful night here! :)
All the things are clean and comfortable, the design of the room is same as the picture in this website! Nice place!
总的来说非常不错啦~房子最大的优点就是非常干净整洁,而且洗护用品都很齐全也都是不错的牌子;地理位置也真的很不错,超近就是各大商圈,吃喝玩乐都超级方便,比去口岸还快｡缺点就是隔音真的很差,附近领居们也挺吵闹的;还有就是离口岸也没有特别近哦,走路还是要15分钟的,有行李的话走着的确不方便,但是已经很不错啦~
房子很温馨舒适,交通非常方便,楼下就是便利店,很愉快的入住体验!
超出了预期,不错｡
很棒的房子,很棒的房东｡很开心的旅行｡s所有的一切都很方便｡感谢房东｡一切都很舒心｡谢谢｡
房间很漂亮,和照片几乎没差,自助入住也很方便｡就是从罗湖口岸走过去还是有一点远的,拖着大行李箱并不是很方便｡下水道堵!!洗澡的时候水渗不下去,这个很尴尬……洗发水没有惹挤得有点心累其他都挺好

充滿日式風味的複式小窩居,裝潢和擺設都有種令人很放鬆的感覺~鄰近有地鐵站,出門方便~附近也有大商場可步行到達~

臨出發前我們的行程有變動,屋主也很樂意幫忙解決問題,非常感謝!(⁎⁍̴̛ᴗ⁍̴̛⁎)
房子很好看很温馨哒~离口岸也近,大概10分钟左右路程吧

总体来讲房源位置不错,布置也挺小清新的｡
但是,隔音太差了,一到晚上就是小孩哭闹的声音,还有走廊的脚步声都听得很清楚｡
而且,房东的洗澡间下水有问题,洗澡的时候整个洗澡间和厕所都会淹水｡
另外,Wifi也是不能用的,虽然房东提出来要来维修,但是时间一直碰不上,所以没用wifi｡

地理位置很好 離羅湖口岸很近 我盆友家也很近哈哈 
可以去東門逛一下 因為走的比較匆忙 就隨便吃了個飯
房間很整潔 晚上睡得非常舒服
房间很好看,也很喜欢日式风格,周围吃的交通都很便利,适合朋友情侣一起来住,浪漫 ~
謝謝屋主快速回答問題｡ 地點也不錯喔!超讚的^_^
不错,闹中取静,房间阳光充足,舒服｡
Amazing
挺好的,地理位置也很方便,下次还会考虑住｡
特别有氛围,设施也都很好｡
环境超好,拍照超美的哟~
装修很温馨 家居都是和风的 设施也很现代  出门是人民南地铁站 走路十五分钟左右可达国贸或罗湖地铁站
挺好的,挺干净,要是枕头再舒服点就更好了,离火车站很近,也不吵闹,装修也挺别致干净
位置方便,去罗湖口岸都挺近的~
房间位置很棒 很方便第二天去香港 布局合理 大落地窗很加分 装修风格也很棒 唯一遗憾周边晚上有些吵 但是整体很棒
Convenient and stylish space, fast communication with host.
整体不错,温馨有格调,而且离火车站跟口岸都很近,方便的很｡入住超级方便,根据房东的入住提示完全可以自助入住｡提醒一下要中午12点前退房,12点的时候保洁过来打扫卫生｡
性价比一般般,房东不太热情有点遗憾
房间整洁度太差,第一天就看到了几只蟑螂,设备也太陈旧,和预想的差太多
Very outstanding place. Very good location, walking distance to train station and shopping mall.
房间就是隔音不是那么好,其他都挺不错的
第二次住了,超喜欢!日式的小loft,温馨又好看｡而且交通位置真的是很赞,走路去罗湖口岸,旁边还有很多商场,附近向西村巨多好吃的,简直想多住一晚｡房东小姐姐也很nice,小东西都准备得很齐全,点个香薰趴在床上看樱花树和星星灯,美得不要不要的,下次过香港还是会选择住这儿的
离口岸很近,附近有购物商城,交通很方便,房间也很干净,住的很愉快｡
非常舒适满意的住所,不过要小心楼梯
房间很漂亮,超出我的预期,住得很舒服开心,下次到深圳必定再租
房东很好很耐心,住的屋子也很有气氛!交通也便利!下次来还会首选这里
房間很整潔 設施齊全 住下來所需要的東西應有盡有 房東回覆也很快 總體來講很不錯
一开始就是被日式loft风格的设计所吸引的,布局也很合理,厕所跟浴室独立设计不会冲突使用,位置优越到口岸商圈也近,要是能考虑一下带电脑的人群多个工作台的话就更加完美了
Nice Location, quick response, nice house!!! Great
感謝房主 房屋佈置很好看
很好 房间风格很好看 卫生也不错

The location could be a difficult to access for those who have a few luggages and coming from Lohu port, as you have to use stairs up and down without escalators. But all ways out of the port are the same.
It is basically mid distance between Guomao and Lohu metro stations. And that is also interesting, as there are more restaurants and malls in this area, actually more interesting than inside Lohu port.
The place is small but clean and tidy. It is perfect for 2 people for a short stay. Nice Japanese decoration.
